name: Home Cassis - Maison Mediterranée - Piscine chauffée
description:
Located less than 1 km from Grande Mer, Home Cassis - Maison Mediterranée - Piscine chauffée offers an infinity pool, a casino and air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. This beachfront property offers access to table tennis. The holiday home features parking on-site, a solarium and private check-in and check-out.

Each unit is equipped with a terrace offering sea views, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a well-fitted kitchen and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Guests can enjoy a meal at an outdoor dining area at the holiday home.

A minimarket is available at the holiday home.

Guests at the holiday home can enjoy snorkelling and fishing nearby, or make the most of the garden.

Bestouan is 1.1 km from Home Cassis - Maison Mediterranée - Piscine chauffée, while Anse de Corton Beach is 1.4 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 45 km from the accommodation.

name: Best Western Hotel & SPA Coeur De Cassis
description:
Located in the center of Cassis, Best Western Hotel & SPA Coeur de Cassis welcomes you 200 meters from the port and 300 meters from the beach. It offers accommodation with a view of the garden, the town and its castle, and the mythical Cap Canaille. After a great day of visiting the Calanques National Park, enjoy the calm of our hotel and relax in our SPA consisting of a hammam, sauna, experience shower and a herbal tea room with its salt wall . You can also relax on our rooftop!
With an elevator, the hotel is fully equipped to accommodate people with reduced mobility. All rooms at the Best Western Hotel & SPA Coeur De Cassis are air-conditioned and have free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a minibar. They have a private bathroom with toiletries and a hairdryer. The suites and superior rooms have a Nespresso coffee machine
The buffet breakfast is served every morning in our breakfast room or on its terrace.
Our reception staff will be happy to provide you with all the useful information during your stay to make it as pleasant as possible

name: HPC Suites
description:
Offering a shared outdoor pool with a terrace and views of the sea, HPC Suites is situated in a 4000 metres² park in the centre of Cassis. Marseille is 16 km away and the nearest beach is a 10-minute walk away. Free private parking is available on site.

The property was entirely renovated in 2019. Featuring a terrace, all units include a dining area and a seating area with a flat-screen TV. There is also a kitchen, fitted with an oven and microwave. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine. HPC Suites features free WiFi throughout the property. Towels and bed linen are offered.

Free private secure parking is available.

The port is an 8-minute walk away and many restaurants and a traditional Provençal market can be found in the neighbourhood.

You can play table tennis at the property, and the area is popular for diving and cycling. Aix-en-Provence is 35 km from HPC Suites. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 36 km from the property.

description:
Featuring lake views, Mas du Couvin, maison d'hôtes en Camargue offers accommodation with terrace, around 34 km from Arles Amphitheatre. This 5-star bed and breakfast offers full-day security and luggage storage space. The bed and breakfast provides rooms with air conditioning, free private parking and free WiFi.

The units at the bed and breakfast are equipped with a seating area. All units come with a coffee machine and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer, while selected rooms have a fully equipped kitchen equipped with a dishwasher. At the bed and breakfast, the units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with fresh pastries, fruits and juice are available daily at the bed and breakfast. There is a coffee shop and lounge.

The bed and breakfast boasts a variety of wellness options, including a hot tub, spa facilities and yoga classes. The bed and breakfast has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Montpellier Arena is 49 km from Mas du Couvin, maison d'hôtes en Camargue, while Parc des Expositions de Montpellier is 49 km away. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes, 36 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hôtel Les Arcades
description:
Just 100 metres from the nearest beach and 400 metres from the church in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, this 3-star hotel offers free WiFi access throughout the property. It is 35-minute drive from Arles and a thalassotherapy centre can be found nearby.

The rooms at Hôtel Les Arcades feature an LCD TV with cable cahnnels such as Canal+, Canal+ Sport, RAI1 and RTL, a work desk and a mosquito net. Some rooms are air-conditioned and all have a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room. You can also enjoy one of the bar’s selection of soft drinks on the terrace.

Le Grau-du-Roi is a 45-minute drive from Les Arcades and Nîmes is 45 km away. Guests can explore the coastline and the Camargue Natural Regional Park. Free public parking is available 50 metres from the property and there is a space in front of the hotel where guests can park to unload their car.

name: Mas de la Fouque - Hôtel & Spa
adresse: Route du Petit Rhône, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France
description:
Mas de la Fouque boutique-hotel is located at the heart of the Camargue Nature Reserve just 10 minutes' drive from Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer and 2 km from the beaches. It offers an outdoor swimming pool and an on-site bar.

Each air-conditioned room and suite is uniquely decorated. Some have a private terrace facing the lagoons or swimming pool.  They are equipped with satellite TV. Free WiFi internet access in available throughout the property.

Guests can view local wild life such as flamingos, Camargue horses and wild bulls whilst enjoying a drink on the outdoor lounges. The on-site Nuxe spa proposes a sauna, outdoor relaxing bath and an indoor pool

The restaurant serves organic, natural cuisine and guests can dine al fresco or by the fireplace in winter. A buffet breakfast is served daily.

Free private parking is available on site. Nimes Train Station is 40 minutes from Mas de la Fouque and Montpellier-Mediterranee Airport is 35 km away.

name: Les Vagues
description:
Featuring a restaurant, bar and views of sea, Les Vagues is located in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, 300 metres from Arenas Beach. The property is around 400 metres from Crin Blanc Beach, 500 metres from Amphora Beach and 39 km from Arles Amphitheatre. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.

Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower and free toiletries, all units at the hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms will provide you with a terrace. All rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

Activities such as hiking, snorkelling, cycling can be enjoyed in the surroundings, and guests can relax along the beachfront.

The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 41 km from Les Vagues.

name: Mas De Calabrun
adresse: Route De Cacharel D 85A, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France
description:
Featuring an outdoor pool, boules pitch and table tennis table, Mas de Calabrun is a hotel located on a private estate in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer in the Camargue Regional Park. The beach is 8 minutes' drive away. It offers free WiFi.

The air-conditioned guest rooms feature traditional Camargue décor, a flat-screen TV and a view of the garden or pool. There is a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer.

The Calabrun can also organise horse riding and jeep tours.

Free private parking is available on site and the hotel is an hour’s drive south of Nimes.

name: Appartement calme à deux pas de la mer
adresse: rez de chaussée 10 carriero dou pounentau, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France
description:
Appartement calme à deux pas de la mer is situated in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, 600 metres from Amphora Beach, 1 km from Arenas Beach, and 39 km from Arles Amphitheatre. It is located 600 metres from Est Beach and features a minimarket. Parking on-site is available and the apartment also provides bike hire for guests who want to explore the surrounding area.

The apartment with a terrace and inner courtyard views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchenette with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the quiet street views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 41 km from the apartment.

name: Hôtel du Pont Blanc
adresse: Chemin du Pont Blanc, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France
description:
Set in Saintes-Marie- de-la-Mer, Hôtel du Pont Blanc sits in a flowery garden with terrace and swimming pool, just an 8-minute walk from the beach. Free Wi-Fi and free private parking are provided.

The hotel’s rooms feature a terrace with garden views and a flat-screen TV. They all have an en suite bathroom with free toiletries, hairdryer and bathtub.

Every morning, a continental breakfast is served at the hotel at an extra cost. Throughout the day, you can find your little quiet corner in our garden. A little reading break? A little nap in the shade of our pines? Let yourself be tempted. A range of restaurants are to be found a 5-minute walk away.

Saintes-Marie- de-la-Mer city centre is just a 5-minute walk away. Guests can drive 25 km to Aigues-Mortes or 34 km to Le-Grau-du-Roi.  Arles Train Station is 35 km away.

name: Les Rizières
description:
Set by a pond, Les Rizières is a hotel situated 2.8 km from Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer and 2.4 km from Pont De Gau Ornithological Park with its pink flamingos. All the rooms are situated at ground-level around a patio planted with trees.

Air-conditioning, satellite TV and a minibar feature in the rooms. Free WiFi internet access is available throughout the hotel.

The seasonal outdoor, heated swimming pool is surrounded by a furnished sundeck.

Less than 10 km from Les Rizières is the Camargue National Park and the sea is just 2.8 km away.

name: Manade Cavallini - Mas de Pioch
description:
Set in Les Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, Manade Cavallini - Mas de Pioch is a typical Camargue style country house sitting in a 250-hectare park with 200 Camargue bulls. It offers rooms and an apartment. There is a large furnished terrace, a shaded garden and an outdoor swimming pool.

The rooms are located on the first floor. The apartments are all located on the ground floor, 1.5 km from the centre of property. All units come with a private bathroom with a bath or shower. Some have a TV.

A French breakfast with bread, pastries, juices and hot drinks can be served in the dining room, on the terrace or in the garden.

Bicycle rental and horse riding can be arranged on site, at an extra cost and with 24 hours advance notice. Guests can benefit from preferential rates on certain activities. A tour of the property and Camargue style entertainment evenings are also organised and there is a children’s playground with swing and tennis table facilities.

Les Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer beaches are located just 10 km away from the property. Aigues-Mortes is just 22.5 km away and Arles Train Station is 28.6 km away.

name: Les Bains Gardians
description:
Situated in a quiet natural environment in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, Les Bains Gardians offers comfortable rooms, 1 outdoor swimming pools, and hot tub, a tennis court and an equestrian centre. Guests also have access to free WiFi.

Guest rooms are equipped with a private terrace from which guests can admire the surroundings. They also have a private bathroom, a TV and a minibar. The entire property is non-smoking, and this is strictly enforced.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning, which includes a wide selection of homemade breads and rolls, cake, cheeses, cold meats, eggs, mushrooms, sausages, fruit juices, coffee and tea, yoghurt, salmon and fresh fruits.

Additional facilities include a bar and 1 restaurant, one of which serves traditional Provençal dishes.

At the Les Bains Gardians, it is possible to play tennis or table tennis, go horse riding, mountain biking or enjoy an excursion in a 4x4. There is also a children’s pony club. Free secure parking is available at night.

name: Hôtel Le Mirage
adresse: BP 29 - 14 Rue Camille Pelletan, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France
description:
Hôtel Le Mirage is 100 metres from the beach and 200 metres from Sainte-Marie-de-la-Mer Marina. It offers a garden with lounge chairs. Free WiFi is available throughout.

The heated non-smoking rooms at Le Mirage feature a flat-screen TV, a wardrobe and a desk. A mosquito net and a private bathroom are also provided.

Guests can have a continental breakfast every morning in the dining room or in the garden at Le Mirage. A range of restaurants and a grocery store can be found within 200 metres of the property.

This hotel is a 30-minute drive from Arles and 4 km from Pont de Gau Ornithological Park. Free public parking is available on site.

name: Mas Des Salicornes
adresse: 38 Chemin du Pont Blanc, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France
description:
Mas Des Salicornes is a countryside hotel just a 10-minute walk from the beach, in the heart of Provence. Each room features a terrace and guests can enjoy the outdoor pool. Free WiFi access is provided.

All of the guest rooms at the Mas Des Salicornes overlook the Provençal-style garden. They are equipped with a TV, safety deposit box and air conditioning. Ironing facilities are available at reception.

A continental breakfast is available and guests can enjoy an after-dinner drink in the bar.

Mas Des Salicornes can organise a range of activities, such as excursions by horse and carriage and evening entertainment.

Situated within a walking distance from the city centre of Les Saintes Maries De La Mer, the hotel is a 20-minute drive from the Camargue Regional Park. Arles is a 35-minute drive away.

name: L'auberge Camarguaise
adresse: Route D' Arles D570, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France
description:
Offering a seasonal outdoor pool and a sun terrace, L'auberge Camarguaise is situated in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer. The property was renovated in March 2016 and offers free private parking and free WiFi throughout.

Every room includes A double bed a private terrace, flat-screen TV and a private bathroom fitted with a bath.

There is a shared lounge and a bar at the property and bicycle hire is available.

The area is popular for horse riding and cycling.

The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 50 km from L'auberge Camarguaise.

name: Hotel Lou Marquès
description:
Lou Marquès is located in Les Saintes Maries De La Mer, in Camargue Regional Nature Park.  It offers free WiFi and a sunny terrace and it is just 400 metres from the beaches.

All the air-conditioned rooms at Lou Marquès come with an LCD TV and a telephone. They all have a private bathroom with a shower and some of them also include a private terrace.

You may have your breakfast served in the communal lounge or take it on the terrace. You can ask the reception about the nearest restaurants.

Free public parking is available on site and the hotel is a 5-minute drive from Pont de Gau Ornithological Park. Arles is a 30-minute drive away.

name: Résidence La Palma
description:
Résidence La Palma is located in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer just 100 metres from the beach and village centre. You can explore the Camargue on horseback, on a bike, or on a 4x4, and admire the pink flamingos.

The self-catering apartments at Résidence La Palma are individually decorated and offer free Wi-Fi, tiled floors and air conditioning. Some apartments feature a balcony, dishwasher, or large refrigerator.

You can prepare homemade meals in the kitchen equipped with a stove, microwave and kitchenware, and you can enjoy them in the dining area. A continental breakfast is served at the hotel next door at an extra cost.

You can visit the Provencal shops just 50 metres away and Arles 35 minutes away. A bird park with species from the Camargue region is 4 km away and you can visit the fleur de sel salt producers at Aigues-Mortes just 35 minutes away.

name: La Villa Mazarin
description:
Set in a building dating from the 15th century, La Villa Mazarin is located in the fortified city of Aigues-Mortes. It offers a terrace and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Free WiFi is available throughout.

The guest rooms have air conditioning, heating, satellite TV, a telephone and a fridge. All rooms are furnished in 17th-century Provençale style.

In the hotel's restaurant, Salon Mazarin, you can enjoy French culinary specialities or choose from a selection of light meals and snacks. The salon opens onto the courtyard and sun terrace.

Montpellier is 26 km from La Villa Mazarin, while Nîmes is 32 km away. The nearest airport is Mediterranee Airport, 19 km from the property.

name: le dit vin secret
adresse: 13 rue sadi carnot 13 rue sadi carnot, 30220 Aigues-Mortes, France
description:
Located in Aigues-Mortes, 24 km from Montpellier Arena and 24 km from Parc des Expositions de Montpellier, le dit vin secret offers free bikes and air conditioning. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, full-day security and a housekeeping service, along with free WiFi. Guests can access the bed and breakfast via private entrance.

At the bed and breakfast, all units are equipped with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every unit has a dressing room. At the bed and breakfast, certain units are equipped with a kettle and wine or champagne.

Zenith Sud Montpellier is 28 km from the bed and breakfast, while Odysseum Shopping Centre is 29 km away. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 29 km from le dit vin secret.

name: Maison des Croisades
description:
Maison des Croisades in Aigues-Mortes offers bike rental and a garden. The hotel features free WiFi and a terrace. Guests can enjoy Canal & Garden Views. Le Grau-du-Roi beach is a 10-minute drive away.

All rooms in Maison des Croisades are equipped with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a wardrobe.

Guests at Maison des Croisades can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Montpellier is 33 km from Maison des Croisades, while Nîmes is 44 km from the property. Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport is 24 km away.

name: La Maison de Lyna
description:
Situated in Aigues-Mortes, 24 km from Montpellier Arena and 24 km from Parc des Expositions de Montpellier, La Maison de Lyna features accommodation with free WiFi in a historic building. This recently renovated aparthotel is located 28 km from Zenith Sud Montpellier and 29 km from Odysseum Shopping Centre. When staying at the aparthotel, guests can use private entrance.

At the aparthotel, each unit is fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A fridge is also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the aparthotel, every unit is equipped with a seating area.

A selection of options including fresh pastries, fruits and juice is available for the continental breakfast.

Montpellier Town Hall is 29 km from La Maison de Lyna, while The Corum is 32 km from the property. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 29 km from the accommodation.

name: Hôtel Saint Louis
description:
Set in the historical heart of Aigues-Mortes, 200 yards from the Tour de Constance, Hôtel Saint Louis is an air-conditioned hotel with a wellness center and restaurant. Free WiFi access is available on site and public city parking spots are available for free.

All rooms feature a contemporary décor inspired by the region and are fitted a flat-screen TV, a mini-bar and a telephone. Each room has a private bathroom. In the summer, guests can enjoy a drink on the patio or sun terrace. The onsite restaurant features a baroque-style décor and offers modern Camargue cuisine made with local produce and outdoor seating.

Nîmes is 43 km from Hôtel Saint Louis, while Arles is 49 km from the property. Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport is 26 km away.

 There is a wellness center with a sauna and massages are also available on request.

name: Lou Mirèio
description:
Set in Aigues-Mortes and only 24 km from Montpellier Arena, Lou Mirèio offers accommodation with city views, free WiFi and free private parking. The air-conditioned accommodation is 24 km from Parc des Expositions de Montpellier. The property is non-smoking and is situated 28 km from Zenith Sud Montpellier.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Odysseum Shopping Centre is 29 km from the apartment, while Montpellier Town Hall is 29 km from the property. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 29 km from Lou Mirèio.

name: Hotel Canal Aigues Mortes
description:
Hotel Canal Aigues Mortes is a 5-minute walk to the fortified city, on the banks of the canal, visible from its panoramic terrace and swimming pool. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Free parking is available and garage parking is possible for an extra charge, or free of charge for motorbikes.

All of the rooms in the 3-star Hotel Canal Aigues Mortes are soundproofed and have a flat-screen TV with French and foreign channels.

In the warmer months the buffet breakfast can be eaten on the outdoor terrace. In the summer, guests can also enjoy snacks or light meals by the canal.

Bicycle rental is available onsite and there is also a seminar room for meetings.

Hotel Canal Aigues Mortes is a 10-minute drive from Grau-du-Roi beach and a 20-minute drive from Montpellier-Méditerranée Airport. Aigues-Mortes train station is a 4-minute walk away. Montpellier, Arles and Nîmes can all be reached within 45 minutes by car.

name: Résidence Odalys Le Mas des Flamants
description:
Located outside Aigues-Mortes’ fortifications, Résidence Odalys Le Mas des Flamants is just next to the Vidourle River. You can relax in the swimming and paddling pools or go to the beach at Le-Grau-du-Roi, 7 km away.

Set in small and terraced houses, the apartments at Résidence Odalys Le Mas des Flamants offer a private patio or garden. A TV and Wi-Fi access are also available with an extra cost.

Meals can be prepared in the accommodation’s kitchenette and enjoyed in the small dining area. Each kitchenette includes hotplates, a microwave and a dishwasher.

One free parking space is offered per apartment and an on-site launderette is also at your disposal. Local activities include walking the 5 minutes to the town centre or relaxing on Port-Camargue Beach, 7 km away.

name: Résidence Odalys Fleur de Sel
description:
Set in Aigues-Mortes, Résidence Odalys Fleur de Sel is a 5-minute walk from the historic town centre and offers a seasonal outdoor heated pool. Free WiFi is available on site.

The apartments are spread throughout small maisonettes and each features a private bathroom, a living room with a flat-screen TV and a fully-equipped kitchenette. Some apartments have a terrace or balcony.

Montpellier is 25 km from Résidence Odalys Fleur de Sel. Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport is 18 km from the property. Free outdoor parking is available.

name: Hôtel Le Médiéval
adresse: 221 Avenue Du Pont De Provence, 30220 Aigues-Mortes, France
description:
Le Médiéval is located on the banks of the canal in Aigues-Mortes, 30 km from Montpellier. It offers en suite rooms, free parking and an outdoor swimming pool.

Hotel Le Médiéval provides a daily buffet continental-style breakfast that can be taken on the terrace in fine weather. The hotel also provides free Wi-Fi access in public areas.

Free private parking is possible on site and the medieval ramparts are a 2-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Les suites du 17
description:
Featuring inner courtyard views, Les suites du 17 offers accommodation with patio, around 24 km from Parc des Expositions de Montpellier. The property features quiet street views and is 28 km from Zenith Sud Montpellier and 29 km from Odysseum Shopping Centre. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Montpellier Arena is 24 km away.

Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the guest house, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the guest house can enjoy walking tours and bike tours nearby, or make the most of the garden.

Montpellier Town Hall is 29 km from Les suites du 17, while The Corum is 32 km away. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 29 km from the accommodation.

name: Marcelle en Camargue
description:
Boasting a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and views of pool, Marcelle en Camargue is a recently renovated guest house situated in Aigues-Mortes, 24 km from Montpellier Arena. This guest house features air-conditioned accommodation with a patio. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

All units in the guest house are fitted with a coffee machine. Featuring a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and bathrobes, units at the guest house also boast free WiFi, while some rooms have a terrace. At the guest house, each unit has bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop and bar.

Guests can also warm themselves near outdoor fireplace after a day of cycling.

Parc des Expositions de Montpellier is 24 km from the guest house, while Zenith Sud Montpellier is 28 km from the property. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 29 km from Marcelle en Camargue.

name: Marina à Aigues Mortes - GARD
description:
Situated in Aigues-Mortes, 24 km from Montpellier Arena and 24 km from Parc des Expositions de Montpellier, Marina à Aigues Mortes - GARD offers a garden and air conditioning. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 28 km from Zenith Sud Montpellier.

The villa with a terrace and lake views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a bath. Towels and bed linen are available in the villa. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Odysseum Shopping Centre is 29 km from the villa, while Montpellier Town Hall is 29 km from the property. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 30 km from Marina à Aigues Mortes - GARD.

name: Ô 36 Rempart Sud B&B
description:
Offering city views, Ô 36 Rempart Sud B&B is an accommodation set in Aigues-Mortes, 24 km from Parc des Expositions de Montpellier and 28 km from Zenith Sud Montpellier. It is located 24 km from Montpellier Arena and provides free WiFi plus a shared kitchen. The bed and breakfast features family rooms.

At the bed and breakfast, all units come with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, the units at the bed and breakfast have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms are fitted with a terrace. At the bed and breakfast, all units are soundproof.

Fresh pastries, juice and cheese are served as part of the breakfast offered at the property.

Odysseum Shopping Centre is 29 km from the bed and breakfast, while Montpellier Town Hall is 29 km away. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 29 km from Ô 36 Rempart Sud B&B.

name: Cabane MAIA Aigues Mortes
adresse: SALINS D'AIGUES MORTES, Route du Grau du Roi, 30220 Aigues-Mortes, France
description:
Cabane MAIA Aigues Mortes is a beachfront property situated in Aigues-Mortes, 27 km from Parc des Expositions de Montpellier and 31 km from Zenith Sud Montpellier. Set 27 km from Montpellier Arena, the property offers a private beach area and free private parking. The property is non-smoking and is located 32 km from Odysseum Shopping Centre.

Providing access to a terrace with lake views, the air-conditioned holiday home consists of 1 bedroom and a fully equipped kitchenette.

Montpellier Town Hall is 32 km from the holiday home, while The Corum is 35 km from the property. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 32 km from Cabane MAIA Aigues Mortes.

name: Nice Home In Aigues-mortes With Wifi And 2 Bedrooms
description:
Offering sea views, Nice Home In Aigues-mortes With Wifi And 2 Bedrooms is an accommodation situated in Aigues-Mortes, 28 km from Zenith Sud Montpellier and 29 km from Odysseum Shopping Centre. With free private parking, the property is 24 km from Montpellier Arena and 24 km from Parc des Expositions de Montpellier. The property is non-smoking and is set 29 km from Montpellier Town Hall.

With free WiFi, this 2-bedroom holiday home features a cable TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and oven. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

The Corum is 32 km from the holiday home, while Fabre Museum is 32 km from the property. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 29 km from Nice Home In Aigues-mortes With Wifi And 2 Bedrooms.

name: Au Cœur des Remparts
description:
Located in Aigues-Mortes, 24 km from Parc des Expositions de Montpellier and 28 km from Zenith Sud Montpellier, Au Cœur des Remparts offers air conditioning. The 3-star apartment has city views and is 29 km from Odysseum Shopping Centre. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Montpellier Arena is 24 km away.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and a fridge, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Montpellier Town Hall is 29 km from the apartment, while The Corum is 32 km away. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 29 km from Au Cœur des Remparts.

name: Noemys Aigues-Mortes - Hotel avec piscine
description:
Featuring free WiFi and a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, Noemys Aigues-Mortes - ex Mona Lisa Royal Hôtel is located in Aigues-Mortes, a 15-minute drive from the Carmague Natural Regional Park. The nearest beach is a 15-minute drive away. Free parking is available on site.

Certain rooms include views of the pool or garden. Each room comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Some rooms also feature a private terrace.

A buffet breakfast is available for an extra charge.

Noemys Aigues-Mortes - ex Mona Lisa Royal Hôtel also provides meeting facilities.

Nîmes is 40 km from Noemys Aigues-Mortes - ex Mona Lisa Royal Hôtel, while Arles is 45 km from the property. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 26 km from the property.

name: Boutique Hôtel des Remparts & Spa
description:
Located in a former military station dating from the 18th-century, inside the medieval ramparts of Aigues-Mortes, this refined hotel offers a bar and a terrace with sun loungers. There is also a spa with an indoor heated pool. This boutique hotel is located opposite the Tower of Constance and The Centre for National Monuments.

The guest rooms with ceiling heights between 3.30 and 4 metres feature stone walls, a minibar, a flat-screen TV and free WiFi. All rooms come with a bathroom with a free standing bathtub, a walk-in shower, bathrobes and slippers. There is no separation between the sleeping area and the bathroom. They all feature views of the ramparts.

A continental breakfast is served each morning and can be enjoyed in the lounges or on the terrace, weather permitting.

Guests are invited to enjoy a drink in the hotel’s lounge bar, which features contemporary furniture and panoramic views of the ramparts.

Aigues-Mortes Train Station is a 5-minute walk from the hotel while Montpellier Méditerranée Airport is a 20-minute drive away. Golf de la Grande Motte is 12 km from the hotel.

name: Maison Arthur
description:
Situated in Aigues-Mortes and only 24 km from Montpellier Arena, Maison Arthur features accommodation with quiet street views, free WiFi and free private parking. The property is around 24 km from Parc des Expositions de Montpellier, 28 km from Zenith Sud Montpellier and 29 km from Odysseum Shopping Centre. Guests can access the bed and breakfast via private entrance.

Fitted with a terrace, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. Units have a coffee machine, while some rooms also boast a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a microwave and a fridge. At the bed and breakfast, each unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Montpellier Town Hall is 29 km from the bed and breakfast, while The Corum is 32 km from the property. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 29 km from Maison Arthur.

name: Appartements 3 étoiles terrasse ou patio intra-muros
description:
Appartements 3 étoiles terrasse ou patio intra-muros in Aigues-Mortes provides adults-only accommodation with a casino and barbecue facilities. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. In addition to free WiFi, the property also provides a sun terrace as well as a solarium.

Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower, slippers and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units have bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Aigues-Mortes, like bike tours. If you would like to discover the area, fishing, hiking and walking tours are possible in the surroundings and Appartements 3 étoiles terrasse ou patio intra-muros can arrange a bicycle rental service.

Montpellier Arena is 24 km from the accommodation, while Parc des Expositions de Montpellier is 24 km away. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 29 km from Appartements 3 étoiles terrasse ou patio intra-muros.

name: Awesome Home In Aigues-mortes With 2 Bedrooms And Wifi
description:
Offering sea views, Awesome Home In Aigues-mortes With 2 Bedrooms And Wifi is an accommodation located in Aigues-Mortes, 28 km from Zenith Sud Montpellier and 29 km from Odysseum Shopping Centre. With free private parking, the property is 24 km from Montpellier Arena and 24 km from Parc des Expositions de Montpellier. The property is non-smoking and is set 29 km from Montpellier Town Hall.

With free WiFi, this 2-bedroom holiday home provides a cable TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and oven. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

The Corum is 32 km from the holiday home, while Fabre Museum is 32 km away. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 29 km from Awesome Home In Aigues-mortes With 2 Bedrooms And Wifi.

name: Mas de la Montille
adresse: Route des Saintes Marie de la Mer , 30220 Aigues-Mortes, France
description:
The Mas de la Montille is located in Aigues Mortes, 10 km from Espiguette Beach.  It features a seasonal swimming pool and an orchard in its garden and you can relax in the hot tub.

All of the air-conditioned bedrooms of the guest house have a view of the garden and are decorated in an elegant way. Some of them also feature oriental furniture and a seating area.

A breakfast made of organic products is available and can be delivered into their room. Homemade meals accompanied by a drink from the bar are available upon request.

The garden also has a children’s playground with a trampoline and you can go visit the donkey and the hen.

It is located 15 km from the La Grande Motte Golf Resort and 20 km from Montpellier and its train station.

name: La petite Camargue
description:
Set in Aigues-Mortes, 23 km from Montpellier Arena and 23 km from Parc des Expositions de Montpellier, La petite Camargue offers air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. The property features pool and garden views, and is 27 km from Zenith Sud Montpellier. The property is non-smoking and is situated 28 km from Odysseum Shopping Centre.

The kitchenette comes with a microwave, a fridge and kitchenware, as well as coffee machine and kettle.

Guests can enjoy the outdoor swimming pool and garden at the homestay.

Montpellier Town Hall is 28 km from La petite Camargue, while The Corum is 31 km away. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 28 km from the accommodation.

name: Bel Appartement Terrasse 4 Étoiles Intra Muros
adresse: 7, rue de la République, 30220 Aigues-Mortes, France
description:
Located within the Aigues-Mortes Medieval City district in Aigues-Mortes, Bel Appartement Terrasse 4 Étoiles Intra Muros has air conditioning, a terrace, and garden views. With city views, this accommodation provides a patio. Providing free WiFi throughout the property, the allergy-free apartment features a solarium.

This apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom equipped with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

There is a coffee shop on-site. Dining options are available close to the apartment.

For guests with children, Bel Appartement Terrasse 4 Étoiles Intra Muros offers a children's playground. A bicycle rental service is available at the accommodation.

Montpellier Arena is 24 km from Bel Appartement Terrasse 4 Étoiles Intra Muros, while Parc des Expositions de Montpellier is 24 km away. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 29 km from the apartment.

name: Hôtel Carré Vieux Port
description:
Hôtel Carré Vieux Port is located in central Marseille, 30 metres from the Vieux Port where boats leave for the Frioul Archipelago and the Château d'If. It offers guest rooms with air conditioning, a smart TV with satellite channels and free WiFi access.

Each of the Carré Vieux Port’s guest rooms is also soundproofed and features tea and coffee making facilities. They all feature a bathroom with bathtub or shower.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the dining room or in the comfort of your room. It includes homemade pastries and homemade bread and it is free for children aged 10 years old or younger.

The hotel's reception and bar are open 24 hours.

The Carré Vieux Port is 25 metres from La Canebière and 200 metres from Marseille’s Opera. The Pharo Palace is 700 metres away. The Tourist Information Office is within walking distance and Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station is just 1.5 km away. Public parking is possible nearby, at an extra cost.

name: LE PANIER ENCHANTÉ - Suites & Loft - Terrasse et patio au dessus du Vieux Port
adresse: 7 Rue de la Charité, 13002 Marseille, France
description:
Set in the centre of Marseille, 2.8 km from Plage des Catalans, the historic LE PANIER ENCHANTÉ - Suites & Loft - Terrasse et patio au dessus du Vieux Port offers accommodation with free WiFi and a garden. With garden views, this accommodation provides a patio. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

All units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a desk. Units come with a kettle and a private bathroom with free toiletries, while some rooms also feature a fully equipped kitchen fitted with an oven. At the apartment complex, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Joliette Metro Station, Vieux Port Metro station and Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 21 km from LE PANIER ENCHANTÉ - Suites & Loft - Terrasse et patio au dessus du Vieux Port.

name: La LUNA of MARSEILLE - VILLA D'ARCHITECTE B&B
adresse: 4 impasse de la Lune, 13007 Marseille, France
description:
Located in Marseille, La Luna offers an infinity swimming pool, a terrace with views of the Rade Islands and a garden. The Old Port is only 2 km away and the Calanques de Marseille are 7 km from the property.

All rooms feature a view of the sea, a minibar, safety deposit box, wardrobe and tea and coffee making facilities. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

An American or continental breakfast serving homemade pancakes, jam and cake is provided each morning. Restaurants can be found within 500 metres of the property.

Marseille Train Station is a 15-minute drive away and Marignane Airport is 27 km from the property. Additional features include a hot tub, small sauna and free Wi-Fi access in the public areas.

name: Staycity Aparthotels Marseille Centre Vieux Port
description:
Featuring free WiFi, Staycity Aparthotels Marseille Centre Vieux Port offers air-conditioned accommodation in Marseille, only 550 metres from the port. Marseille Saint-Charles train station is a 12-minute walk away from the property.

All apartments and studios are accessible via a lift and feature a flat-screen TV. Each unit has a kitchenette fitted with a dishwasher, microwave, toaster, fridge, stovetop, coffee machine and kettle. There is a private bathroom with free toiletries in each unit. Towels and bed linen are offered.

Bars, shops and restaurants can be found within a 2-minute walk of the property.

The nearest metro station is only 44 metres from the property. Velodrome Stadium is 6.4 km from Staycity Aparthotels Marseille, while La Canebiere is 1 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 24 km from the property.

Some units come with a balcony.

name: Marseille City Chambres&Appartements
description:
Marseille City Chambres&Appartements offers rooms and apartments located a 10-minute walk from Marseille’s Old Port and from Saint-Charles, the main train station. It features free Wi-Fi access.

The air-conditioned rooms includes a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries.

The apartments come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen. There is a bathroom with a shower, a towel warmer and a toilet.

You will find bars and restaurants within 200 metres of the property. La Canebière, Marseille’s historic high street, is a 10-minute walk away as well as the EuroMéditerranée business district.

name: Résidence Kley
description:
Résidence Kley has a shared lounge, terrace, water sports facilities and tennis court in Marseille. Located around 1.1 km from Joliette Metro Station, the hotel with free WiFi is also 1.3 km away from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. The accommodation offers evening entertainment and a shared kitchen.

At the hotel, the rooms have a desk. At Résidence Kley all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

You can play table tennis at the accommodation, and the area is popular for hiking and windsurfing.

Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station is 1.2 km from Résidence Kley, while Vieux Port Metro station is 1.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Hermès
description:
Hôtel Hermès is just 35 metres from the Vieux Port in central Marseilles. It offers a roof-top terrace with panoramic views of the harbour and the city, and free Wi-Fi.

Each guest room at the Hermès has a partial view of the Vieux Port. They are soundproofed and feature flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and private bathrooms.

The hotel staff are available to assist you 24 hours a day. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning, served in the dining room.

The Vieux-Port Hotel de Ville Metro Station is just a 3-minute walk from the Hermès hotel. The Saint Charles SNCF Train Station is a 20-minute walk away.

name: Hôtel Le Mistral
description:
Located just 50 metres from Point Rouge Beach, this  hotel is a 10-minute drive from the Stade Vélodrome football stadium. It offers free newspapers and free Wi-Fi, just 20-minutes from the city centre.

An LCD TV and a work desk feature in the individually-decorated rooms at Hôtel Le Mistral. All rooms are air-conditioned and some have a private bathroom with complementary toiletries.

A continental breakfast is served every morning in the colourful breakfast room or in the comfort of guest rooms. Le Mistral also has a bar where guests can relax after a day of sightseeing.

Free public parking is available near the hotel and Vieille Chapelle Bus Stop is directly opposite the property. Guests can also use the taxi rank next to Mistral to access Marseille’s facilities and sights.

name: Hôtel Life Marseille VP - Vieux Port
description:
Hôtel Life Marseille VP - Vieux Port is set in an 18th-century stone building opposite the Vieux Port in Marseille's city centre. Recently renovated It offers panoramic harbour views and rooms with free WiFi. The property features a lift that runs from the first floor and staircase access to reception and the first floor.

Each guest room at Life is soundproofed, air conditioned and has a view of the harbour or the courtyard. There is a flat-screen satellite TV. The modern bathrooms are equipped with a bath or a shower and eco-friendly toiletries.

Guests can enjoy a daily buffet breakfast, served in the lobby. The staff at Life are available to assist you 24 hours a day.

The lobby is also a place where you can meet other guests staying at the hotel.

Life Hotel is 100 metres from the Vieux-Port Metro Station and Marseille's main road, La Canebière. The Saint Charles SNCF Station is a 15-minute walk away.

name: New Hotel Le Quai - Vieux Port
description:
New Hotel Le Quai - Vieux Port is located in central Marseille, overlooking the Old Port and La Canebière shopping street. This hotel offers soundproofed rooms with air-conditioning and satellite TV. Free WiFi access is available.

Entirely renovated in 2018 and 2019, the New Hotel is decorated in a colonial style and the rooms have a desk and a  private bathroom. They also have a a courtesy tray with a kettle. A bottle of water is offered upon arrival.

A buffet breakfast is served daily in the dining room or in guest rooms. The multilingual staff can also provide information on the local area at the 24-hour reception.

Famous landmarks close to the hotel include Notre Dame de la Garde, the Vieille Charité cultural centre, MUCEM museum, Pharo Palace and Saint Victor's Abbey.

New Hotel Le Quai - Vieux Port is situated opposite the Vieux-Port Hotel de Ville Metro Station and 300 metres from the Belsunce Alcazar Tramway. Chanot Exhibition Centre can be reached in 10 minutes on the metro. The Panier district is just a 10-minute walk away.

name: Appartement Vieux-Port de Marseille - Davso
description:
In the heart of Marseille, set within a short distance of Vieux Port Metro station and Saint-Ferreol Street, Appartement Vieux-Port de Marseille - Davso offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. This recently renovated apartment is located 2 km from Plage des Catalans and 2.9 km from Fausse Monnaie. The property is close to popular attractions like Palais du Pharo, Notre-Dame de la Garde Basilica and Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Castellane Metro Station, Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations and Joliette Metro Station. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 22 km from Appartement Vieux-Port de Marseille - Davso.

name: Nuit insolite à bord d'un Yacht
description:
Set in the centre of Marseille, Nuit insolite à bord d'un Yacht is a recently renovated accommodation, which offers soundproof rooms. The property features sea and city views, and is 1.8 km from Plage des Catalans. The boat has family rooms.

At the boat, all units include a wardrobe. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, units at the boat also have free WiFi, while selected rooms will provide you with a terrace. At the boat, the units have bed linen and towels.

Guests may chill out in the bar or lounge, while a minimarket is also available.

Guests at the boat will be able to enjoy activities in and around Marseille, like walking tours and bike tours.

Popular points of interest near Nuit insolite à bord d'un Yacht include Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations, Vieux Port Metro station and Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 22 km from the accommodation.

name: NH Collection Marseille
description:
Featuring a cocktail bar, garden and a fitness centre on the 6th floor, NH Collection Marseille is located in the new business and leisure district of Marseille, La Joliette. Located between the port and the city centre, the building was inaugurated by Napoleon III in 1864 and preserves its original style.

Rooms at NH Collection Marseille feature elegant décor and offer an electric kettle, coffee machine and private bathroom.

Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant, which serves local and international dishes with a variety of local cheeses and wines.Guests can also find a cocktail bar located close to the hotel reception, as well as a garden in the centre of the hotel.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property as well as 4 meeting rooms.

Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations is 900 metres from NH Collection Marseille, while Palais du Pharo is 1.4 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 19 km from NH Collection Marseille.

name: Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - Marseille Vieux Port
description:
Overlooking the Old Port, Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - Marseille Vieux Port is located in the heart of Marseille. It offers modern air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi.

The soundproofed rooms at Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - Marseille Vieux Port include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms also have port and sea views.

Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - Marseille Vieux Port is just a few steps from the Vieux-Port Hotel de Ville Metro Station. Boulevard La Canebière is 400 metres away, where public transport is available to all of Marseille's famous sites.

name: Vieux Port République Cannebiére
description:
Set in the centre of Marseille, just 1.9 km from Plage des Catalans and 100 metres from Vieux Port Metro station, Vieux Port République Cannebiére offers accommodation with sea views and free WiFi. It is situated 700 metres from Saint-Ferreol Street and features full-day security. The apartment features family rooms.

The units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with slippers, a shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Marseille, like windsurfing, diving and fishing. Hiking can be enjoyed nearby.

Popular points of interest near Vieux Port République Cannebiére include Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations, Joliette Metro Station and Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 22 km from the accommodation.

name: Zenitude Hôtel Résidences Marseille Saint-Charles
description:
Located in Marseille, Zenitude Hôtel Résidences Marseille Saint-Charles is a residence just a 5-minute walk from Saint-Charles Train Station, a 12-minute walk from the Old Port and 5 metro stops away from the Palais des Congrès et des Expositions de Marseille. It offers a 24-hour front desk, air conditioning and self-catering accommodation with free WiFi.

Studios and apartments at Zenitude Hôtel Résidences Marseille Saint-Charles are serviced by a lift and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bathtub. Some are suitable for guests with reduced mobility.

A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every morning in the dining room. Each accommodation type has a kitchen equipped with kitchenware, a refrigerator and a dishwasher.

Zenitude Hôtel Résidences Marseille Saint-Charles is a 15-minute walk from the Opera and Marseille’s Cathedral is 1 km away. Public parking is available nearby at an extra cost.

name: La Residence Du Vieux Port
description:
La Résidence Du Vieux Port is set right on the banks of the Old Port in central Marseille. It offers modern rooms and suites with panoramic views of the city. Free WiFi access is available.

The stylish air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. There is a kettle in all rooms with tea and coffee provided. Some have wide bay windows and a terrace offering views of the Old Port.

Le Relais 50, the adjoining restaurant, serves Mediterranean specialities and guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel’s bar.

La Résidence Du Vieux Port is just 200 metres from La Canebière and the Vieux Port Metro Station, which can take guests to Saint-Charles Train Station. Public parking is available on site at an additional fee.

name: Residhotel Vieux Port
description:
Residhotel Vieux Port is located in Marseille's city centre, in front of the old port and a 15-minute walk from both the Mucem Museum and les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. It offers air-conditioned guest rooms with a private bathroom, flat-screen TVs and free WiFi.

Each spacious apartment has a kitchenette, a seating area and a flat-screen TV. Bed linen and towels are included.

A continental breakfast is available daily in the dining room. The reception is open every day from 07:30 to 12:30 and from 14:00 to 22:30.

Residhotel Vieux Port is in close proximity to the Palais de la Bourse and the Boulevard de la Canebière.

Vieux-Port Metro Station is just 200 metres from the property, and Saint-Charles train station is 1.3 km away. Public parking is available nearby.

name: Marseillement votre
description:
Situated in Marseille, 2.9 km from Plage des Catalans, Marseillement votre features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. The property has garden and city views, and is 1.1 km from Vieux Port Metro station. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.

Each unit has a fully equipped kitchen with a toaster, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. At the apartment complex, units include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near Marseillement votre include Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, Saint-Ferreol Street and Joliette Metro Station. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 22 km from the accommodation.

name: Toyoko INN Marseille Saint Charles
adresse: 25 Avenue du General Leclerc, 13003 Marseille, France
description:
Set in Marseille, just a 5-minute walk from Marseille Saint Charles Train Station, Toyoko INN Marseille Saint Charles features a garden and free WiFi. The hotel is easily accessible from A7 highway. Secured parking is provided but parking spots are limited and cannot be booked in advance.

The air-conditioned guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV, desk and a private bathroom with a bath.

Speaking English and French, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception.

Marseille's Old Port is 1.1 km from the accommodation and Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is 20 minutes' walk away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 20 km from Toyoko INN Marseille Saint Charles.

name: Maison Dormoy
description:
Situated in Marseille, 2.9 km from Saint-Ferreol Street and 3.2 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre, Maison Dormoy features free WiFi.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at the property.

Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations is 3.4 km from Maison Dormoy, while Marseille Chanot Exhibition and Convention Centre is 3.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 29 km from the accommodation.

name: Mercure Marseille Canebière Vieux-Port
description:
Well located in Marseille, Mercure Marseille Canebière Vieux-Port provides air-conditioned rooms, free bikes, free WiFi and a shared lounge. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a restaurant and to a bar. The accommodation features room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests.

Guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. At the hotel, each room comes with a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include English, Spanish and French.

Popular points of interest near Mercure Marseille Canebière Vieux-Port include Vieux Port Metro station, Saint-Ferreol Street and Castellane Metro Station. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 22 km from the accommodation.

name: Les Appartements du Vieux Port
description:
Located in the centre of Marseille, Les Appartements du Vieux Port is 150 metres from the Old Port. The apartments offer free WiFi and a modern-style décor.

All apartments feature a flat-screen TV, a seating area and a wardrobe. The private bathroom includes a shower.

Guests can prepare their own meals in the kitchen, which is equipped with kitchenware, an oven and a fridge. A stove, a coffee machine are also provided, and some apartments have a dishwasher.

Les Appartements du Vieux Port is a 2-minute drive from the Opera and 170 metres from the Marseille Tourism Office. A large range of restaurants, cafés and shops can be found in the area.

name: Les appartements chics du Vieux-Port
description:
Les appartements chics du Vieux-Port features accommodation within 500 metres of the centre of Marseille, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a fridge and kitchenware. The air-conditioned accommodation is 2.2 km from Plage des Catalans. The property offers soundproof units and is situated 3 km from Fausse Monnaie.

At the apartment complex, every unit comes with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Saint-Ferreol Street, Castellane Metro Station and Vieux Port Metro station. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 23 km from Les appartements chics du Vieux-Port.

name: Odalys City Marseille Centre Euromed
description:
Odalys City Marseille Centre Euromed is located in the Euromed - La Joliette district of Marseille, less than 1 km from Joliette Metro Station, a 10-minute walk from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre and 2.2 km from Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations. This 4-star aparthotel offers a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation provides a sauna, free WiFi throughout the property and family rooms.

Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. At the aparthotel, all units include bed linen and towels.

A selection of options including fresh pastries, fruits and juice is served for the buffet breakfast.

The aparthotel also features a plunge pool and a hammam for guests to relax in. A bicycle rental service is available at Odalys City Marseille Centre Euromed.

Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station is 1.9 km from the accommodation, while Vieux Port Metro station is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 20 km from Odalys City Marseille Centre Euromed.

name: Les Roches Brunes
description:
Located in Collioure, 70 metres from Balette Beach, Les Roches Brunes provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, this 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. The accommodation features room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests.

Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Each room comes with a safety deposit box, while selected rooms are equipped with a balcony.

Les Roches Brunes offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Speaking English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are willing to help at any time of the day.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Boutigue Beach, Saint Vincent Beach and Collioure Royal Castle. The nearest airport is Perpignan - Rivesaltes Airport, 42 km from Les Roches Brunes.

name: Hôtel Princes de Catalogne
description:
Situated on a quiet square in picturesque Collioure, this hotel is located a 400 metres from the beach. The hotel was renovated in early 2021 and features a contemporary style.

All rooms at the Hôtel Princes de Catalogne are air-conditioned and have views of the mountains, Fort Miradou or of a quiet street. They are equipped with TV and free Wi-Fi internet access.

Staff at the Hôtel Princes will be happy to help you organise excursions, guided visits or other activities such as seawater therapy and climbing.

name: Hôtel la Bona Casa
adresse: 20 Rue de la Republique, 66190 Collioure, France
description:
Hotel Bona Casa is located in the historic centre of Collioure, just 300 metres from the beach and from the Château Royal. The hotel proposes free Wi-Fi internet access and a shaded terrace.

The guest rooms at Hotel Bona Casa have a view of the street or the patio, and some have a private terrace. They each include a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries. The hotel is completely non-smoking.

A continental breakfast is served every morning and shops and restaurants are found within 200 metres from the property. Guests can also relax in the hotel’s tea room from March to October.

Port-Vendres is 3 km from the hotel and Argelès-sur-Mer is 6 km away. The property is a 30-minute drive from central Perpignan and from the Spanish border, which can also be reached by train.

name: Appartement Collioure centre & GARAGE PRIVATIF
adresse: RDC PORTE DROITE 25 Rue des Glacis, 66190 Collioure, France
description:
Appartement Collioure centre & GARAGE PRIVATIF is located in Collioure, 400 metres from Boramar Beach, 400 metres from Boutigue Beach, as well as 300 metres from Collioure Royal Castle. This apartment offers free private parking, private check-in and check-out and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 200 metres from Port Avall Beach.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Stade Gilbert Brutus is 33 km from the apartment, while Casino Collioure is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Perpignan - Rivesaltes Airport, 42 km from Appartement Collioure centre & GARAGE PRIVATIF.

name: Hôtel La Casa Pairal
description:
Situated 250 metres from Collioure beach and port, Hôtel La Casa Pairal features an exotic floral garden and a heated outdoor swimming pool. The hotel is located in a 19th century Catalan building in the old quarter of Collioure.

Hôtel La Casa Pairal offers air-conditioned rooms with a traditional décor. They each have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar and free WiFi. Some rooms overlook the city or the hotel’s courtyard with a fountain or the village square.

A buffet breakfast is served daily in Hôtel La Casa Pairal’s breakfast room, or in guests’ rooms upon request. Drinks are served in the hotel’s garden area.

The hotel’s reception is open 24 hours a day. Additional services available include free newspapers and a safety deposit box.

Collioure Train Station is 500 metres away. The hotel is located 23 km from the Spanish border.

name: La Frégate
description:
La Frégate features a shared lounge, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Collioure. The property is around 33 km from Stade Gilbert Brutus, 3.2 km from Casino Collioure and 23 km from Saint-Cyprien Golf Course. The property is non-smoking and is located 200 metres from Boramar Beach.

Guests at the hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Guests at La Frégate will be able to enjoy activities in and around Collioure, like hiking.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Nord Beach, Port Avall Beach and Collioure Royal Castle. The nearest airport is Perpignan - Rivesaltes Airport, 42 km from La Frégate.

name: Le Mas des Citronniers
adresse: 22 Avenue de La Republique, 66190 Collioure, France
description:
Located in the centre of Collioure, just 250 metres from the beach, this hotel offers air-conditioned guestrooms in a traditional Catalan building. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.

Guest rooms at Le Mas des Citronniers are decorated in bright colours. Each features a flat-screen TV, a desk, a small fridge and an en suite bathroom. Some of the rooms offer a patio with a view of the garden.

A breakfast buffet is served each morning in the hotel’s breakfast room or a full breakfast is served in guests’ rooms upon request. Breakfast is provided with a supplement.

The reception desk at Le Mas des Citronniers is open 24 hours a day and additional facilities available include free newspapers.

Collioure Train Station is located 550 metres from the hotel and the Château Royal de Collioure is 300 metres away.

name: Grand Hotel Du Golfe
description:
Set on the Corniche, Grand Hotel Du Golfe is a 4 stars art design hotel dating from the 1970's, just 5 minutes' walk from the creeks and 10 minutes' walk from Racou Beach. Argelès-sur-Mer city centre is 4 km away.

Each air-conditioned rooms are directed towards the sea and most of them feature a balcony. All of the modern guest rooms are soundproofed and include an LCD TV, a telephone, a safe, a hairdryer, free WiFi and a minibar. A room for guests with reduced mobility is available upon prior request.

A buffet breakfast is prepared every morning at the Grand Hotel Du Golfe. Le bistrot à la mer open every evening of the week, the onsite restaurant, proposes creative meals using fresh regional produce. Guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel lounge bar or on the terrace, weather permitting.

The beauty institute "Beauty Spa" offers massages and facials from the houses of SOTHYS and INGRID MILLET. We suggest you to book
 the treatments in advance. Accessible at an additional cost, the Spa - with its chromatic Hammam & Jacuzzi - offers a panoramic view
the Mediterranean Sea and the vineyards. The establishment puts at your disposal an outdoor swimming pool of 19 meters, heated from April to early November. The establishment, with a Mediterranean garden, can organize wine tasting sessions of Languedoc-Roussillon wines upon request.

The historic town of Collioure is 2.5 km from Grand Hotel Du Golfe. Free private parking is available at the property. The Spanish border is 25 km away.

Guest rooms at Madeloc are decorated in neutral tones and one bright colour, each also features air conditioning, an LCD TV and a minibar. Some of the rooms also have a terrace or a balcony. Rooms are located on one of the three floors of the hotel and are accessible by stairs only. One room is adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

A buffet breakfast is offered every morning with the option to dine in the comfort of guest rooms. Madeloc also offers free WiFi throughout the property.

A gift shop is also available and offers local produce, spa products and jewelry.

Collioure Train Station is just 200 metres away and the D914 is 5 minutes away. The hotel is 6.5 km from Argelès-sur-Mer and 25.5 km from the Spanish border. Upon request and for an extra cost, private parking is possible on site.
