description:
Le Hameau de la Nicolinière is situated in Bormes-les-Mimosas, 500 meters from Cabasson and Fort de Bregançon sandy beaches. Providing free private parking, the property offers a free bottle of wine upon your arrival.

All with a big private garden, the self-catering villas include a fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, oven and coffee machine. An LCD TV with DVD player is available in the living room.

You can eat at Les Palmiers restaurant, which is 50 meters away or do shopping a 10-minute drive away. Boats can be rented at the property, which also provides free Wi-Fi internet access throughout.

Situated 20 km from the A56 motorway, Le Hameau de la Nicolinière is 9 km from Le Lavandou, where ferries lead to the Porquerolles Islands.

name: Hôtel de la Plage - HDLP
adresse: La Favière 352 Boulevard de la Plage, 83230 Bormes-les-Mimosas, France
description:
Set in Bormes-les-Mimosas, 500 metres from Faviere, Hôtel de la Plage - HDLP offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can make use of a bar.

All guest rooms at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge.

Hôtel de la Plage - HDLP offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

You can play table tennis at the accommodation, and the area is popular for hiking and snorkelling.

Popular points of interest near Hôtel de la Plage - HDLP include Pointe de Gouron Beach, Plage de l'Anglade and La Favière. The nearest airport is Toulon - Hyeres Airport, 23 km from the hotel.

name: Eden Rose Grand Hotel BW Premier Collection
description:
Set in Bormes-les-Mimosas, 29 km from Chateau de Grimaud, Eden Rose Grand Hotel BW Premier Collection offers accommodation with a garden, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. With a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The accommodation features room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests.

The units will provide guests with a minibar.

With staff speaking German, English, Spanish and French, information is available at the reception.

Le Pont des Fées is 29 km from the hotel, while Toulon Train Station is 40 km away. The nearest airport is Toulon - Hyeres Airport, 22 km from Eden Rose Grand Hotel BW Premier Collection.

name: Studio "La mer" à Bormes-les-Mimosas
adresse: 119 Avenue de la Mer, 83230 Bormes-les-Mimosas, France
description:
Studio "La mer" à Bormes-les-Mimosas is set in Bormes-les-Mimosas, 1.3 km from Pointe de Gouron Beach, 1.4 km from Plage de l'Anglade, and 34 km from Chateau de Grimaud. This beachfront property offers access to a terrace and free private parking. The property is non-smoking and is located 800 metres from Faviere.

With free WiFi, this apartment provides a cable flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and microwave. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the garden views. The accommodation offers an air conditioning, a heating and a private bathroom.

Guests at the apartment can enjoy fishing nearby, or make the most of the garden.

Le Pont des Fées is 34 km from Studio "La mer" à Bormes-les-Mimosas, while Toulon Train Station is 41 km away. The nearest airport is Toulon - Hyeres Airport, 23 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel La Voile
adresse: 165 Avenue Des Girelles - La Favière, 83230 Bormes-les-Mimosas, France
description:
Hotel La Voile is ideally situated just 400 metres from the beaches and Bormes harbour in a quiet, peaceful environment near the village of La Favière. There is an outdoor heated pool and a lounge bar.

Some of the guestrooms offer a view of the sea or garden. Choose from single or double rooms, some of which can accommodate up to 4 people.

A buffet breakfast is available in the dining area every morning for an extra charge. The hotel can also recommend a range of restaurants in the local area.

Hotel La Voile is located near the charming medieval village of Bormes Les Mimosas and less than 100 metres from the local shops and restaurants. The surrounding area offers a variety of nautical and outdoor activities. Private parking is available upon request with a supplement.

name: Villa piscine chauffée en option Provence 11 personnes
description:
Situated just 2.9 km from Grande Plage, Villa piscine chauffée en option Provence 11 personnes offers accommodation in Bormes-les-Mimosas with access to a garden, a shared lounge, as well as a 24-hour front desk. This property offers access to a patio, table tennis, free private parking and free WiFi. The villa features an outdoor swimming pool, wellness packages and free shuttle service. Accommodation for disabled guests is also available at the property.

Boasting a Xbox One, the spacious villa has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, a living room with a seating area and a dining area, 5 bedrooms, and 3 bathrooms with a walk-in shower and a bath. The unit is air conditioned and is comprised of a terrace with an outdoor dining area as well as a flat-screen TV with streaming services. Additional in-room amenities include wine or champagne.

Yoga classes and fitness classes are arranged at the fitness room in house. You can play darts at the villa. If you would like to discover the area, snorkelling, hiking and walking tours are possible in the surroundings and Villa piscine chauffée en option Provence 11 personnes can arrange a car rental service.

Chateau de Grimaud is 30 km from the accommodation, while Le Pont des Fées is 31 km from the property. The nearest airport is Toulon - Hyeres Airport, 22 km from Villa piscine chauffée en option Provence 11 personnes.

name: Studio climatisé avec une place de parking et classé 2 étoiles à la Faviére
adresse: Le côte d'azur 3, 515 avenue de la mer, 83230 Bormes-les-Mimosas, France
description:
Located in Bormes-les-Mimosas in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur region, with Faviere and Plage de l'Anglade nearby, Studio climatisé avec une place de parking et classé 2 étoiles à la Faviére provides accommodation with free private parking. The air-conditioned accommodation is less than 1 km from Pointe de Gouron Beach. The property is non-smoking and is set 34 km from Chateau de Grimaud.

This apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom equipped with a walk-in shower. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and linens for a supplement.

Le Pont des Fées is 34 km from the apartment, while Toulon Train Station is 41 km away. The nearest airport is Toulon - Hyeres Airport, 23 km from Studio climatisé avec une place de parking et classé 2 étoiles à la Faviére.

name: Hostellerie du Cigalou - Teritoria
description:
Set in the medieval village of Bornes-les-Mimosas, this 3-star hotel is just a 25-minute drive from Toulon. It offers an outdoor swimming pool surrounded by mimosas and individually decorated guest rooms.

The rooms and suites at Hostellerie du Cigalou also include an LCD TV and an en suite bathroom. Each one is air-conditioned and a minibar can be added to the accommodation upon request.

The buffet breakfast can be served in the dining room or on the communal terrace. The hotel also has an on-site bar and restaurant, which offer Provencal specialities and cocktails.

Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas and free public parking is possible near the hotel. Other local attractions include the towns of Hyères and Saint-Tropez, both less than 30 km away.

name: Studio avec Jardin et Parking Privés
description:
Located in Bormes-les-Mimosas and only 32 km from Chateau de Grimaud, Studio avec Jardin et Parking Privés provides accommodation with quiet street views, free WiFi and free private parking. Providing a garden, the property is located within 38 km of Toulon Train Station. The property is non-smoking and is situated 32 km from Le Pont des Fées.

The apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchenette, and a terrace with inner courtyard views. Guests can take in the ambience of the surroundings from an outdoor dining area. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Zénith Oméga Toulon is 38 km from the apartment, while La Favière is 3.8 km away. The nearest airport is Toulon - Hyeres Airport, 20 km from Studio avec Jardin et Parking Privés.

name: Le petit atelier
adresse: 34 Chemin de la Bergerie, 83230 Bormes-les-Mimosas, France
description:
Situated in Bormes-les-Mimosas, 2.8 km from Plage de l'Anglade, Le petit atelier offers accommodation with a hot tub and beauty services. There is a private entrance at the holiday home for the convenience of those who stay. The holiday home features rooms with air conditioning, free private parking and free WiFi.

The holiday home provides guests with a terrace, garden views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with hot tub and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the holiday home, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

The holiday home has a barbecue and a garden.

Pointe de Gouron Beach is 2.8 km from Le petit atelier, while Grande Plage is 2.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Toulon - Hyeres Airport, 20 km from the accommodation.

name: HomeStay Bormes
description:
HomeStay Bormes is located in Bormes-les-Mimosas and features a pool with a view and pool views. Built in 2018, the property includes hot tub and spa facilities. The homestay provides rooms with air conditioning, free private parking and free WiFi.

Each unit comes with a terrace offering mountain views, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a well-fitted kitchen and a private bathroom with shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine. At the homestay, all units have bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop and bar.

You can play table tennis at the homestay, and the area is popular for hiking and walking tours. If you would like to discover the area, snorkelling, cycling and fishing are possible in the surroundings and HomeStay Bormes can arrange a bicycle rental service.

Chateau de Grimaud is 30 km from the accommodation, while Le Pont des Fées is 31 km away. The nearest airport is Toulon - Hyeres, 19 km from HomeStay Bormes, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Séjours & Affaires Aix-en-Provence Mirabeau
adresse: 615 Avenue Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, 13100 Aix-en-Provence, France
description:
This Séjours & Affaires residence is located in Aix-en-Provence near the Cours Mirabeau. It offers furnished studios and free Wi-Fi internet access.

All of the studios at Séjours & Affaires Aix-en-Provence Mirabeau are soundproof and have a complete kitchen area with fridge, microwave, hotplates and dishes. All of them are serviced by a lift.

The studios have fold-out sofa beds, and a house cleaning including the change of linen is provided once a week.

name: Hôtel des Augustins
adresse: 3 Rue De La Masse, 13100 Aix-en-Provence, France
description:
Located just of the famous Cours Mirabeau in the heart of the old town of Aix-en-Provence, Hotel Les Augustins is set within the walls of a 12th-century convent.

Hotel Les Augustins boasts a subtle blend of historic and modern architecture and a magnificent lobby.

The hotel features spacious rooms combining traditional architecture and modern facilities. Each room provides air conditioning, a TV and a minibar.

A continental breakfast is served every morning in the dining room or in the comfort of guest rooms. There is also free Wi-Fi access in the entire hotel and a 24-hour reception,

name: Aparthotel Adagio Aix-en-Provence Centre
description:
Ideally located on a peaceful street in the centre of Aix-en-Provence, this residence is a 10-minute walk from the cafés and fountains on Cours Mirabeau. Gare d’Aix-en-Provence is 900 metres away. Free WiFi is available in all areas.

Apartments and studios at Aparthotel Adagio Aix en Provence Centre are contemporary in style and offer an LCD TV. All have a kitchen with hotplates and some have a separate bedroom.

Breakfast and drinks and snacks vending machines are some of the other facilities on offer at Aparthotel Adagio Aix en Provence Centre. There is also a 24-hour reception with luggage storage and a dry cleaning service.

Rotonde Square is a 5-minute walk away and Aix-en-Provence Natural History Museum is just 850 metres from the residence. For guests arriving by car, private indoor parking is possible on site, according to availability. A8 highway is 2.5 km away.

name: Renaissance Aix-en-Provence Hotel
description:
Located within a 10-minute walk of the centre of Aix-en-Provence, Renaissance Aix-en-Provence Hotel boasts free access to a spa with a heated indoor pool, steam room, fitness room, and 2 treatment cabins are also available. It offers a 24-hour front desk, free WiFi and newspapers.

The spacious guest rooms all feature garden or city views. They come with a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

Various breakfast options such as American, continental and a breakfast buffet are available for guests. The hotel also offers a bistro and a bar.

Guests can go golfing 3 km away, bowling 1 km away or horse riding 1.9 km away. The Grand Theatre is 200 metres away. Marseille-Marignane Airport is a 25-minute drive away.

name: Le Concorde
adresse: 66-68 Boulevard Du Roi René, 13100 Aix-en-Provence, France
description:
Le Concorde is ideally located in the centre of Aix-en-Provence, only a 5-minute walk from the famous Cour Mirabeau and near the Granet Museum. It offers a flowered garden.

The guest rooms all feature a TV, air-conditioning and Wi-Fi access.

You can start the day with a generous breakfast in the breakfast room or in the courtyard.

For guests arriving by car, the hotel has a large private garage in the basement available for an additional charge, allowing you to explore the city without any parking worries.

name: Hôtel Le Mozart
description:
Located 500 metres from the Granet Museum, Hôtel Le Mozart offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. It is easily accessed from Motorway A8, a 3-minute drive away.

Additional facilities in the rooms include an LCD TV with satellite channels. The rooms also provide a telephone and an en suite bathroom, which is complete with a bath or shower.

You can enjoy the buffet breakfast in the dining room or on the terrace.

Free private parking is available onsite. Alternatively, guests can keep their vehicle in the secure garage for a supplementary cost and upon reservation. Newspapers are also available at the 24-hour reception.

name: Prêcheurs Studios
description:
Located a 2-minute walk from Cours Mirabeau, Prêcheurs self-catering studios are set in a Provencal house with a BBQ and seating area in its courtyard. It offers studios with free international calls and free use of a tablet computer.

A flat-screen TV with cable channels, an iPod dock and a welcome pack are provided in each studio. Guests can prepare meals in the kitchenette, which includes hot plates, an oven and a dining area.

Prêcheurs Studios is 100 metres from Place des Prêcheurs, the market place and 350 metres from of Aix-en-Provence town centre. A regular shuttle bus services Aix-en-Provence TGV Train Station, 15 km away, and Marseille Provence Airport is 24.8 km away.

name: Hôtel Escaletto
description:
This 3-star hotel is located in the centre of Aix-en-Provence, a 1-minute walk from Thermes Sextius thermal baths and 550 metres from Cours Mirabeau. Free WiFi is available.

Rooms are contemporary and offer a terrace with a panoramic view over the city and the Mont Sainte-Victoire Mountain.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning, and free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the hotel.

With a 24-hour reception, the Hotel escaletto offers easy access to all the main tourist attractions of
Aix-en-Provence.

name: Aquabella Hôtel & Spa
description:
Surrounded by a beautiful garden, Aquabella offers Provencal-style rooms and guests have free access to the spa. It is located in central Aix-en-Provence, a short walk from the old town.

The guest rooms at the Aquabella are all air-conditioned and equipped with free Wi-Fi access and mini-bars. Bathrobes are also provided.

Guests can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine in the hotel restaurant, L’Orangerie. During the summertime La Terrasse de la Tour is the hotel’s outdoor grill, serving grilled dishes and salads by the outdoor swimming pool.

Guests can relax at the Aquabella’s Sensoriel Spa. Guests have access to the sauna, hammam, and hot bath. There is also a Kneipp shower and ice fountain.

Guests will find public parking just 50 metres away from the property, available at an extra cost.

name: Odalys City Aix en Provence Les Floridianes
description:
Odalys City Aix en Provence Les Floridianes is situated a 5-minute walk from the cafes and fountains that line the Cours Mirabeau. It offers guest rooms and self-catering accommodation with 24-hour reception and an outdoor swimming pool during summer.

Free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, including BeIN Sport, are provided in the accommodation, which also has seating area. All of the air-conditioned rooms and suites at Odalys City Aix en Provence Les Floridianes have a private bathroom.

The fully equipped kitchenette in the apartment includes a dishwasher, microwave and a small dining area. Les Floridianes also serves a buffet breakfast in the dining room which opens onto the terrace surrounding the pool.

Gare d’Aix-en-Provence Train Station and Jourdan Park are both 500 metres from the residence. The A8 Motorway is 1.6 km away. Undercover parking is available on site with a supplement.

name: B&B Villa Roumanille
description:
Located just 1 km from the centre of Aix-en-Provence, Villa Roumanille is a typical Provençal house, which offers a garden and terrace. Cassis and its cliffs are a 30-minute drive away.

All rooms feature a private terrace or balcony with garden views, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a wardrobe. The en suite bathrooms are complete with a hairdryer.
All rooms have air conditioning.

A breakfast is provided each morning at Villa Roumanille. Possibility of table d'hôte on reservation during summer.

The Aix-en-Provence TGV Station is 15 km from the property and Montagne Saint-Victoire is a 30-minute drive away. Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout and free private parking is possible on site.

name: Hotel Cardinal
description:
Situated in Aix-en-Provence, within 800 metres of Cours Mirabeau and Saint-Sauveur Cathedral, Hotel Cardinal features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom. Attractions in the area include Aix-en-Provence Congress Centre, a 3-minute walk away.

The individually decorated rooms and suites in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine and desk. Some rooms here will provide you with a kitchenette with a microwave, a fridge and a stovetop.

Languages spoken at the reception include English and French.

Marseille Provence Airport is 21 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Paul
description:
Centrally located in Aix-en-Provence, Hotel Paul is only 150 metres from the Spa, the Palais des Festivals and the historical part of the city. It features a garden with a terrace area. Free WiFi is available in all the rooms.

Accessed via stairs, the guestrooms at Hotel Paul feature a flat-screen TV, a desk and a fan. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower.

During the summer months, guests can relax in Paul Hotel's garden, which features tables and chairs with sun shades. There is also a TV room.

Every morning a continental breakfast is served for an extra charge. For lunch and dinner, guests can choose from a range of cafes and restaurants found within 400 metres of the property.

Aix-en-Provence train station is 1.5 km from the hotel and Marseille Marignane airport is 30 km away. Marseille is 35.5 km away. Public parking is available nearby.

name: Best Western Le Galice Centre Ville
description:
Located a 10-minute walk from the centre of Aix-en-Provence, Best Western Le Galice Centre Ville features a seasonal outdoor pool and a terrace. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, a desk, a kettle and a minibar. The private bathrooms have a bath or shower and a hairdryer.

The hotel has business facilities, including fully equipped meeting rooms open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. There is also a 24-hour reception.

Best Western Le Galice Centre Ville is 25 km from Marseille Provence Airport and 15 km from Aix-en-Provence TGV Train Station. A secured underground car park is available for an extra fee.

name: Golden Tulip Aix en Provence
description:
Golden Tulip Aix en Provence is situated on the exit of the A8 and A51 motorways, just 10 minutes' drive from the centre of Aix-en-Provence and Paul Cézanne’s house. It features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and free WiFi. The hotel was completely renovated in April 2019.

All the rooms at Golden Tulip Aix en Provence come with a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV with Canal+ and satellite channels. They are decorated in a contemporary style.

The "Tulipe" restaurant is open daily and offers traditional, gourmet and local cuisine.

Guests can relax on the terrace with deckchairs and a barbecue. There is also a fitness room and an air-conditioned relaxation area with a dry sauna and shower which can be privatized.

There are theatres, a golf course and a cinema all within close proximity of the hotel. Situated on the western outskirts of town, the hotel is 2 km from Cours Mirabeau. An underground garage is available for parking for an extra charge.

name: Hôtel Cézanne Boutique-Hôtel
description:
This boutique design hotel is located in the centre of Aix-en-Provence and offers 55 rooms. If features a terrace and a lounge.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Cézanne have free WiFi access.  All rooms include satellite TV with more than 50 channels and some have views over the town.

At Hôtel Cézanne there is a terrace with an outdoor bar, where guests can enjoy an aperitif. There is also a meeting room.

Breakfast can be taken until 10:30 and offers fresh juice bar, home-made savoury dishers, pastries, pancakes, brioche, artisanal charcuterie boards, jam from Hautes-Alpes and a gluten-free selection. It can be enjoyed in the outdoor bar in fine weather.

The property is 200 metres from the Cours Mirabeau and 300 metres from a bus station, with connections to the airport and the TGV train station. Aix-en-Provence TGV train station is 12 km from the hotel.

The rooms at the Boutique Hotel Cézanne have free WiFi access and air-conditioned during hot season. All rooms include satellite TV with more than 50 channels and some have views over the town.

Private secured parking is available on site for an additional fee.

name: Appartement de charme
adresse: 25 Rue de la Cépède, 13100 Aix-en-Provence, France
description:
Situated in the centre of Aix-en-Provence, Appartement de charme features accommodation with free WiFi in a historic building. The property is set 32 km from Joliette Metro Station, 33 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre and 33 km from Vieux Port Metro station. The property is non-smoking and is located 31 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station.

The recently renovated apartment has 1 separate bedroom, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and oven, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property offers quiet street views.

Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations is 33 km from the apartment, while Saint-Ferreol Street is 33 km from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 27 km from Appartement de charme.

name: Hôtel Birdy by Happyculture
adresse: 775, Avenue Guillibert-De-La-Lauzière Pichaury Ii, Les Milles, 13591 Aix-en-Provence, France
description:
Hôtel Birdy by Happyculture is located a 10-minute drive from Aix-en-Provence, next to an 18-hole golf course. It offers an outdoor swimming pool and has free WiFi throughout the property.

The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Each room has a private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony or private terrace.

The hotel restaurant is open from Sunday evening to Friday midday. Guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel bar from 10am to 10pm . Buffet Breakfast is available.

There are 3 meeting rooms available to organise meetings, workshops or cocktails. Guests have access to the garden and terrace.

Hôtel Birdy by Happyculture is just 17.4 km from Marseille Provence Airport and 6.7 km away from Marseille TGV Train Station. Free parking is available on site.

name: Les Suites du Cours & Spa
description:
Set in Aix-en-Provence in Cours Mirabeau, Les Suites du Cours & Spa boasts a spa centre. Saint-Sauveur Cathedral is 600 metres away. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property.

All units feature air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. There is a seating and/or dining area in some units. There is also a kitchen complete with a dishwasher and oven. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Each unit is fitted with a private bathroom with a bath or shower, free toiletries, and a hairdryer. Bed linen is provided.

Greffe Commercial Court Aix-en-Provence is 100 metres from Les Suites du Cours & Spa. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 21 km from Les Suites du Cours & Spa.

name: Hôtel Rotonde
description:
Hôtel Rotonde is located in central Aix-en-Provence, 5 minutes' walk from the SNCF train station. Free WiFi is provided, together with free on-site parking subject to availability.

It offers soundproofed rooms with air conditioning, satellite TV and a minibar. Each has a bathroom with hairdryer.

Hôtel Rotonde serves a continental buffet breakfast. Guests can also enjoy a drink at the bar or on the shaded terrace.

The hotel is 300 metres from Cours Mirabeau and 30 km from Marseille Provence Airport.

name: Château de la Gaude
description:
Set in Aix-en-Provence, 38 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, Château de la Gaude offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. With a terrace, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests.

The units in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. Château de la Gaude provides certain units with garden views, and rooms are equipped with a coffee machine. At the accommodation all rooms come with bed linen and towels.

At Château de la Gaude you will find a restaurant serving French, Japanese and Mediterranean cuisine. Dairy-free and gluten-free options can also be requested.

The hotel offers a sauna.

Joliette Metro Station is 38 km from Château de la Gaude, while Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is 39 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 34 km from the accommodation.

name: Campanile Aix-en-Provence Sud - Pont de l'Arc
description:
Located in Aix-en-Provence, 3 km from the historical centre and Cours Mirabeau, Campanile Aix-en-Provence Sud - Pont de l'Arc offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi.

Each of the guest rooms is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Tea and coffee making facilities are available in each room.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the hotel. The hotel's restaurant serves contemporary French cuisine that can be enjoyed on the terrace during the summer months. Campanile Aix-en-Provence also offers hot and cold buffet.

The hotel is serviced by a lift and free private parking is available on site. A bus stop can be found opposite the hotel, where direct bus access is available to the city centre.

The property is 13 km from Aix-en-Provence TGV Train Station and 8 km away from Aix en Provence Arena stadium and concert hall. Marseille Provence Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

Nearby facilties and locations : Sismic ( Concert and Entertenaiment), L'Arena ( Concert and Entertenaiment), Grand Theatre de Provence, Private Hospital

Attractions : Pavillon Vendome, Provencal Market (3km)

name: Hôtel de France
description:
Located in the heart of Aix-en-Provence, Hôtel de France is situated in a street parallel to Cours Mirabeau only 50 metres from the famous Fontaine de la Rotonde, and offers air conditioned rooms with free WiFi access.

Decorated with white and beige shades, all rooms at Hôtel de France feature a TV with satellite channels, a desk and a minibar. The private bathroom comes with a bathtub or a shower and Nuxe products.

Breakfast is served daily and can be enjoyed in the dining room or in the guest room. The property is located near numerous restaurants, bars and markets.

Other facilities available at Hôtel de France include a 24 hour front desk and a shared lounge. The property's location makes it an excellent base to discover Aix-en-Provence, which train station is just a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Negrecoste Hôtel & Spa
description:
Negrecoste Hôtel & Spa is an 18th century hotel with a sun terrace, set in the heart of the Cours Mirabeau, a 10-minute walk from Aix-en-Provence SNCF Train and Bus Station. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The air-conditioned guest rooms feature an LCD TV and a paid minibar. The private bathrooms are equipped with a bath or shower, free Nuxe toiletries and a hairdryer. Some of the rooms also offer a view of the Cours Mirabeau.

Meeting facilities are available and there is a 24-hour reception. Upon reservation and for an extra charge, guests can relax in the onsite spa with a hot tub, sauna and hammam and guests benefit from reduced rates for a 1-hour spa pass and for the onsite treatments.

Bars, shops and restaurants can be found within 100 metres of the hotel. Other local attractions include the city's cathedral, a 5-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Marseille Marignane, 25 km from the hotel. Paid private parking is available on site upon reservation.

name: Les Quatre Dauphins
description:
Les Quatre Dauphins is a hotel set in a former private mansion in the heart of Aix-en-Provence, just 50 metres away from Quatre Dauphins Square and 350 metres from Cours Mirabeau. The property is a 5-minute drive from Aix-en-Provence Train Station. Free WiFi is included.

An elegant stairwell leads to the guest rooms in this 3-storey hotel. Decorated in a Provençal style, each room comes with private bathroom and satellite TV. The rooms of the top floor have exposed wooden beams.

The central location of the Quatre Dauphins hotel allows you to visit the old part of Aix-en-Provence. Paid public parking is available 300 metres from the property.

name: Royal Hôtel
description:
Set in the heart of Nîmes, Royal Hôtel features an on-site restaurant, La Bodéguita, which opens onto Assas Square. The hotel is within 3 minutes' walk of the Maison Carrée Temple and Carré d'Art Modern Art Gallery. Free WiFi access is available.

The property accepts dogs less than 10 kg .

Accessed via a staircase, every room includes air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a view over the internal patio or Assas Square. Some units feature a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom.

Breakfast is served daily, made with a selection of fresh organic produce. You can sample Spanish cuisine and fish à la plancha in the restaurant. Tapas can be enjoyed on the bar’s outdoor terrace.

Tango evenings are organised on Assas Square during July and August. There are also regular art viewings and exhibitions held on the square.

Parc Expo Nîmes is 2.7 km from Royal Hôtel. Montpellier-Méditerranée Airport is 53 km from the property.

name: Appart'City Collection Nîmes Arènes
description:
Appart'City Collection Nîmes Arènes is set in the historic centre of Nîmes, a 1-minute walk from the Arena and 300 metres from the train station. Underground public parking is available nearby. Free WiFi is provided.

The studios and apartments feature a flat-screen TV and seating area. The fully equipped kitchenette has a microwave and stovetop. The private bathroom has a bath or shower.

Breakfast is composed of various breads. Croissants are also provided. Fresh fruit and fruit salad, as well as cheeses are offered. Guests can also enjoy organic yogurt and a large variety of organic tea.

The nearest airport is Nîmes-Alès-Camargue-Cévennes Airport, in Garons/Saint-Gilles, 12 km from Appart'City Collection Nîmes Arènes.

name: Best Western Marquis de la Baume
description:
Located in the centre of the historic town of Nîmes, Hôtel Marquis de la Baume is a 17th-century town house just 3.7 km from Parc Expo Nîmes and 650 metres from Nîmes Arena. Free WiFi is provided.

The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a satellite flat-screen TV, a minibar and an electric kettle. There is a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served everyday in the comfort of guest rooms or in the interior patio, weather permitting.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and guests can enjoy the on-site bar.

The hotel is just a 10-minute walk from the Colosseum and the Magne Tower. Public parking is available nearby.

name: Hotel Majestic
adresse: 9 Rue de la Servie, 30000 Nîmes, France
description:
Renovated in 2019, Hotel Majestic is located in Nîmes, just 320 metres from the Arenas of Nîmes and the town centre. The property is 600 metres from La Romanité Museum, 1 km from Maison Carrée and 30 km from Pont du Gard. Free WiFi is offered throughout.

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The private bathroom has free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Guests can enjoy hot or cold drinks on the hotel's patio all year round. Breakfast is served daily. The staff will be happy to offer advice on visiting the area.

The hotel is just 300 metres from the Nîme TGV train station. Montpellier-Méditerranée Airport is 52 km from the property.

name: Twenty Business Flats Nîmes Trigone
adresse: 8 Avenue de la Méditerranée, 30000 Nîmes, France
description:
Situated in Nîmes, 34 km from Arles Amphitheatre, Twenty Business Flats Nîmes Trigone features accommodation with a fitness room. It is set 13 km from Parc Expo Nîmes and offers a lift. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

Featuring a private bathroom, units at the aparthotel also have free WiFi, while selected rooms will provide you with a terrace.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

You can play table tennis at the aparthotel.

Avignon Central Station is 43 km from Twenty Business Flats Nîmes Trigone, while Papal Palace is 45 km away. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Odalys City Nîmes Arènes
description:
Odalys City Nîmes Arènes has a hammam and air-conditioned guest accommodation in Nîmes, 14 km from Parc Expo Nîmes, 33 km from Arles Amphitheatre and 45 km from Avignon Central Station. It is located 46 km from Papal Palace and features a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation provides a hot tub, free WiFi throughout the property and family rooms.

The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer, while the kitchenette features a microwave, a fridge and a stovetop. Kitchenware is also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the aparthotel, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

Zenith Sud Montpellier is 47 km from the aparthotel, while Avignon TGV Train Station is 47 km away. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 8 km from Odalys City Nîmes Arènes.

name: Hostel Vertigo Nîmes Gare Centre
description:
Hostel Vertigo Nîmes Gare Centre has a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and bar in Nîmes. Located around 13 km from Parc Expo Nîmes, the hostel with free WiFi is also 34 km away from Arles Amphitheatre. The accommodation features karaoke and a shared kitchen.

At the hostel rooms are equipped with air conditioning and a private bathroom.

Speaking English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are always at hand to help.

Avignon Central Station is 43 km from Hostel Vertigo Nîmes Gare Centre, while Papal Palace is 45 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

name: Hôtel De L'Amphithéâtre
description:
Located in the pedestrian area of Nîmes historical city centre, Hôtel De L'Amphithéâtre consists of 2 mansions dating from the 17th and 18th centuries. It is just steps from the Roman Amphitheatre and the temple Maison Carrée.

The rooms are individually and elegantly decorated and all offer a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. Some rooms offer a view of the Place du Marché, with a fountain representing the town's symbols of a palm-tree and a crocodile.

Guests can find restaurants, cafés and shops within walking distance of the hotel. Nîmes Train Station is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Les Madones
adresse: La madone du mas Chemin de Bois Fontaine, 30900 Nîmes, France
description:
Set in Nîmes, within 29 km of Parc Expo Nîmes and 37 km of Arles Amphitheatre, Les Madones offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and free WiFi as well as free private parking for guests who drive. This apartment features a garden as well as a tennis court.

All of the air-conditioned units feature a private bathroom, flat-screen TV, fully equipped kitchen and terrace.

The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 5 km from the apartment.

name: Hôtel & Spa Vatel
description:
Located a 10-minute drive from Nimes city centre and 15 kilometres from the Nimes-Arles-Camargue Airport, this 4-star resort offers free access to the Vatel’s Spa and fitness centre, where facilities include an indoor heated pool and hot tub.

Rooms at the Hotel & Spa Vatel have free internet access and a private bathroom.

During the Feria Festival, there is a shuttle service leading to Nîmes city centre and Arena departing every 30 minutes from the hotel.

This hotel is attached to Vatel, Graduate School of Business & Management.

Free private parking is provided and the hotel is just a 5-minute drive from the E15/A9 motorway.

name: Margaret - Hôtel Chouleur
description:
Conveniently set in Nîmes, Margaret - Hôtel Chouleur provides air-conditioned rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a fitness centre. Among the various facilities are a garden, a terrace, as well as a bar. The accommodation offers room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests.

At the hotel, each room includes a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Margaret - Hôtel Chouleur features certain rooms with city views, and all rooms come with a coffee machine. All units include a safety deposit box.

At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving French cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested.

Speaking English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are always at hand to help.

Parc Expo Nîmes is 14 km from Margaret - Hôtel Chouleur, while Arles Amphitheatre is 33 km away. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes, 9 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Logis NIMOTEL Hôtel Cosy
adresse: 152 Rue Claude Nicolas Ledoux, 30900 Nîmes, France
description:
Nimotel is located 1 km from the A9 motorway and a 10-minute drive from central Nimes. It has 24-hour reception, a secure outdoor pool and free WiFi access.

The air-conditioned rooms have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms also feature coffee and tea making facilities.

Nimotel’s restaurant, Partage, serves a range of traditional dishes and Provencal specialities. There is also a bar and a poolside terrace where guests can relax. A buffet breakfast is available daily.

Free on-site parking is available for guests exploring the Languedoc-Roussillon region by car.

name: Appart'City Classic Nîmes
adresse: 364, allée de l’Amérique Latine, 30900 Nîmes, France
description:
This Appart'City is located in Nîmes, a 20-minute walk from the Arena of Nîmes and the TGV Train Station  It is 500 metres from Le Parnasse Sports Centre and Exhibition Centre.

Each soundproofed and air-conditioned apartment at the Appart’City Nîmes has free WiFi access and a kitchenette equipped with a dishwasher, a microwave and a washing machine. They are all serviced by a lift.

Breakfast is still served from Monday to Sunday. It is composed of various breads, including gluten-free bread, pastries, fresh and hot beverages. Fresh fruit and fruit salad, as well as cheeses and yogurts are also provided.

Private parking is available and the property is 10 km from Nimes Airport.

name: La Balade Nîmoise Center Car Park AC
adresse: Residence L'espace des Halles - Appartement 205 22 Boulevard Gambetta, 30000 Nîmes, France
description:
Set 14 km from Parc Expo Nîmes and 34 km from Arles Amphitheatre in the centre of Nîmes, La Balade Nîmoise Center Car Park AC offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The air-conditioned accommodation is 44 km from Avignon Central Station. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk and a lift for guests.

The 1-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with a TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Papal Palace is 46 km from the apartment, while Avignon TGV Train Station is 46 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 9 km from La Balade Nîmoise Center Car Park AC.

name: Nîmes Centre - A 5 minutes des Arènes
description:
Set in Nîmes, 15 km from Parc Expo Nîmes, Nîmes Centre - A 5 minutes des Arènes offers recently renovated accommodation with free WiFi and a bar. The property features city and inner courtyard views, and is 45 km from Avignon Central Station. The property is non-smoking and is situated 34 km from Arles Amphitheatre.

The 1-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Nîmes, like walking tours.

Papal Palace is 47 km from Nîmes Centre - A 5 minutes des Arènes, while Zenith Sud Montpellier is 47 km away. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Zenitude Hôtel-Résidences Nîmes Centre
adresse: 5 allée Boissy d'Anglas - Triangle de la Gare, 30000 Nîmes, France
description:
Zenitude Nîmes Centre is an eco-friendly residence located in Nîmes. Parc Expo Nîmes is 1.6 km from the property. Free WiFi is featured.

The spacious studios and apartments come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. There is a kitchen, dining area and private bathroom in each unit.

The Arena of Nîmes is just 10 minutes' walk away. The nearest airport is Mediterranee Airport, 43 km from Zenitude Nîme Centre. There is a private parking on site, subject to availability.

Choose from a wide selection of dishes and relax over a tasty meal.

name: Novotel Atria Nimes Centre
description:
Located in Nîmes city centre, this hotel is just minutes from the train station, the Arènes Roman amphitheatre, and the town’s main square.

It features 119 air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, a bar, and 9 conference rooms.

A buffet breakfast is served daily, and French cuisine is proposed by the hotel’s restaurant. Guests are invited to relax at the bar, which offers drinks and snacks.

name: Roussy Nîmes Romaine
description:
Located in Nîmes in the Languedoc-Roussillon region, Roussy Nîmes Romaine features a balcony. The property is set 34 km from Arles Amphitheatre, 43 km from Avignon Central Station and 45 km from Papal Palace. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Parc Expo Nîmes is 13 km away.

The spacious apartment is equipped with 2 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and dishwasher, and a living room with a TV. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Avignon TGV Train Station is 45 km from the apartment, while Zenith Sud Montpellier is 48 km away. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 9 km from Roussy Nîmes Romaine.

name: L'Ecluse - Clim - Parking - Central
description:
Located 34 km from Arles Amphitheatre, 43 km from Avignon Central Station and 45 km from Papal Palace, L'Ecluse - Clim - Parking - Central features accommodation set in Nîmes. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 13 km from Parc Expo Nîmes.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Avignon TGV Train Station is 46 km from the apartment, while Zenith Sud Montpellier is 48 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 9 km from L'Ecluse - Clim - Parking - Central.

name: Les Trois Rois
adresse: RDC résidence Les Trois Rois 18 Rue Henri IV, 30900 Nîmes, France
description:
Boasting quiet street views, Les Trois Rois features accommodation with a terrace, around 1.8 km from Parc Expo Nîmes. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Papal Palace is 46 km away and Zenith Sud Montpellier is 47 km from the homestay.

There is a dining area and a kitchen complete with an oven, a microwave and a fridge. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Arles Amphitheatre is 33 km from the homestay, while Avignon Central Station is 45 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 8 km from Les Trois Rois.

name: Studio cosy au coeur de l'Ecusson - Arènes à 2 min
description:
Studio cosy au coeur de l'Ecusson - Arènes à 2 min is a recently renovated apartment in the centre of Nîmes, 14 km from Parc Expo Nîmes and 33 km from Arles Amphitheatre. The property is set 46 km from Papal Palace, 47 km from Avignon TGV Train Station and 47 km from Zenith Sud Montpellier. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Avignon Central Station is 45 km away.

This apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and is protected by full-day security.

Odysseum Shopping Centre is 48 km from the apartment. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 9 km from Studio cosy au coeur de l'Ecusson - Arènes à 2 min.

name: Central Hotel
description:
Central Hotel is set in a renovated, 18th-century building, in the historical centre of Nimes, right behind the ancient roman site, the Porte d’Auguste. It offers soundproofed rooms with private bathrooms.

The guest rooms’ doors are decorated by a local artist. Each room is equipped with a TV and a shower.
Some rooms feature views of Nimes’ rooftops and the Magna Tower.

The Central Hotel has a private bar, and a traditional French breakfast is served every morning. Room service is also available.

Free WiFi access is provided in the Central’s common areas, and guests also have access to a luggage room. There is also 1 room suitable for guests with reduced mobility.

Central Hotel is 100 metres from a shuttle stop for Nimes Airport, and less than a 10-minute walk from the Gare de Nimes TGV Train Station. The Notre-Dame-et-Saint-Castor Cathedral is just 280 metres away.

name: Le Mas des Oliviers Nîmes
description:
Offering a garden and pool view, Le Mas des Oliviers Nîmes is situated in Nîmes, 10 km from Parc Expo Nîmes and 37 km from Arles Amphitheatre. Private parking is available on site at this recently renovated property. Guests can make use of the year-round outdoor pool or the barbecue, or enjoy views of the garden and inner courtyard.

All units feature air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also feature free WiFi, while some rooms are fitted with a terrace. At the bed and breakfast, each unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

A selection of options including fresh pastries and juice is available for the continental breakfast. Guests are welcome to relax in the on-site lounge, while packed lunches are also available upon request.

You can play table tennis at the bed and breakfast.

Avignon Central Station is 40 km from Le Mas des Oliviers Nîmes, while Papal Palace is 42 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Jolie annexe du mas dans le cœur de la garrigue nîmoise
adresse: BIS 685 Chemin de Mas Christol, 30000 Nîmes, France
description:
11 km from Parc Expo Nîmes, Jolie annexe du mas dans le cœur de la garrigue nîmoise is a recently renovated property set in Nîmes and offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and private parking. There is a private entrance at the holiday home for the convenience of those who stay. The holiday home provides parking on-site, an infinity pool and private check-in and check-out.

The holiday home provides guests with a terrace, garden views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. At the holiday home, units come with bed linen and towels.

In the warmer months, you can make use of the barbecue facilities and dine on the private patio.

The holiday home has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Avignon Central Station is 41 km from the holiday home, while Papal Palace is 43 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 16 km from Jolie annexe du mas dans le cœur de la garrigue nîmoise.

name: Spa Nimeslodge
description:
A recently renovated apartment situated in Nîmes, Spa Nimeslodge features a garden. The air-conditioned accommodation is 21 km from Parc Expo Nîmes, and guests can benefit from private parking available on site and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 36 km from Arles Amphitheatre.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with garden views. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Nîmes, like walking tours.

Zenith Sud Montpellier is 47 km from Spa Nimeslodge, while Odysseum Shopping Centre is 48 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Boutique Hôtel Entraigues
adresse: 4 place de l'Evêché, Rue de la Calade, 30700 Uzès, France
description:
Set in Uzès in the Languedoc-Roussillon Region, 32 km from Avignon, Boutique Hôtel Entraigues features an outdoor pool. The hotel has a sun terrace and views of the city. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site for an extra charge, subject to availability.

The rooms have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and tea and coffee making facilities. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day, a terrace or a patio.

A variety of other restaurants are available within a 2-minute walk.

An array of activities are offered in the area, such as golfing and cycling. Nîmes is 20 km from Hôtel Entraigues, while Arles is 41 km away. Avignon-Provence Airport is 40 km from the property.

name: La bohème place aux herbes
description:
Offering city views, La bohème place aux herbes is an accommodation set in Uzès, 38 km from Avignon Central Station and 40 km from Papal Palace. Among the facilities at this property are a minimarket and bicycle parking, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is located 31 km from Parc Expo Nîmes.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and oven, and 1 bathroom with walk-in shower. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Uzès, like hiking.

Avignon TGV Train Station is 40 km from La bohème place aux herbes, while Parc des Expositions Avignon is 48 km away. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 35 km from the accommodation.

name: La DAME de FLAUX
description:
Situated in Uzès, 38 km from Avignon Central Station and 40 km from Papal Palace, La DAME de FLAUX offers air conditioning. The property features inner courtyard views and is 40 km from Avignon TGV Train Station and 48 km from Parc des Expositions Avignon. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Parc Expo Nîmes is 31 km away.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Pont du Gard is 14 km from the apartment, while Pont d'Avignon is 39 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 35 km from La DAME de FLAUX.

name: La Taverne
description:
La Taverne is located in Uzès, on a pedestrian street just a 2-minute walk from the Duché Castle. The tourist office is 100 metres from the property and Haribo Museum is 3 km away.

The rooms at La Taverne are decorated in a contemporary style and include free WiFi access. Each one also features an LCD TV, air conditioning and an en suite bathroom with free toiletries.

Breakfast is available every morning in the breakfast room. Additional facilities at the hotel include luggage storage and newspapers at reception.

Other local activities include driving the 14 km to Pond du Gard or visiting Nimes, which is a 30-minute drive away. The hotel is situated next to Uzès Tourist Office and the Town Hall.

The bedrooms are either located on an upper floor and accessible by stairs or on the ground floor in the annex.

The reception opens from 4 p.m. to 7 p.m. each day. The hotel haven't the night receptionist.

name: Chambre Hôte vue splendide
description:
Situated in Uzès, 32 km from Parc Expo Nîmes and 39 km from Avignon Central Station, Chambre Hôte vue splendide features spacious air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. This recently renovated homestay is located 40 km from Papal Palace and 41 km from Avignon TGV Train Station. The property is non-smoking and is located 48 km from Parc des Expositions Avignon.

The homestay has a satellite flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are available in the homestay. Additional in-room amenities include chocolates or cookies.

A bar can be found on-site.

A car rental service is available at the homestay, while walking tours can be enjoyed nearby.

Pont du Gard is 14 km from Chambre Hôte vue splendide, while Pont d'Avignon is 40 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 35 km from the accommodation.

name: Le trente trois
adresse: 33 Rue de la Petite Bourgade, 30700 Uzès, France
description:
Set in Uzès, Le trente trois offers city views and free WiFi, 31 km from Parc Expo Nîmes and 38 km from Avignon Central Station. The property is located 39 km from Papal Palace, 40 km from Avignon TGV Train Station and 48 km from Parc des Expositions Avignon. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.

The units come with tiled floors and feature a fully equipped kitchenette with an oven, a dining area, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Pont du Gard is 13 km from Le trente trois, while Pont d'Avignon is 39 km away. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 34 km from the accommodation.

name: appartement 3 min a pied du centre d'Uzès parking piscine
description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a heated pool, quiet street view and a balcony, appartement 3 min a pied du centre d'Uzès parking piscine is situated in Uzès. This property offers access to a terrace, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 31 km from Parc Expo Nîmes.

Boasting a DVD player, the apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, a living room with a seating area and a dining area, 2 bedrooms, and 2 bathrooms with a bath and a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Avignon Central Station is 38 km from the apartment, while Papal Palace is 40 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 35 km from appartement 3 min a pied du centre d'Uzès parking piscine.

name: Hôtel Le Saint-Geniès
description:
This family-run hotel sits in a garden, in a quiet residential area, 1.5 km from Uzès historical centre. It has an outdoor pool and offers nice views over the countryside.

Hotel Le Saint-Geniès provides cosy soundproofed rooms with air conditioning and flat-screen cable TV. The private bathrooms feature hairdryers and showers.

A full buffet breakfast is available to order every morning and can be enjoyed on the terrace. Guests can also relax on the sun terrace by the pool.

The Saint-Geniès provides free Wi-Fi access in its guest rooms. It is 30 km from Nîmes, 16 km from the Pont du Gard and a 30-minute drive from Avignon. Free public parking is available on site.

name: Maison De La Bourgade
adresse: 31 Rue de la Petite Bourgade, 30700 Uzès, France
description:
Located in Uzès, in a historic building, 31 km from Parc Expo Nîmes, Maison De La Bourgade is a bed and breakfast with pool with a view and garden. Among the facilities at this property are full-day security and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is situated 38 km from Avignon Central Station.

The bed and breakfast comes with a satellite flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are featured in the bed and breakfast. The accommodation offers an air conditioning, a heating and a private bathroom.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with fresh pastries, fruits and juice are available daily at the bed and breakfast.

You can play table tennis at Maison De La Bourgade. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy cycling and walking tours nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace.

Papal Palace is 39 km from Maison De La Bourgade, while Avignon TGV Train Station is 40 km away. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes, 34 km from the bed and breakfast, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Appartement moderne central avec piscine, garage privé et terrasse sud
adresse: 1 Rue des Cèdres appartement 001 le mas des oliviers, 30700 Uzès, France
description:
Set in Uzès, Appartement moderne central avec piscine, garage privé et terrasse sud offers accommodation with private pool, free WiFi and free private parking for guests who drive. This recently renovated apartment is located 31 km from Parc Expo Nîmes and 38 km from Avignon Central Station. Outdoor dining is also possible at the apartment.

The apartment with a terrace and garden views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Guests can enjoy the indoor pool at Appartement moderne central avec piscine, garage privé et terrasse sud.

Papal Palace is 40 km from the accommodation, while Avignon TGV Train Station is 40 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 35 km from Appartement moderne central avec piscine, garage privé et terrasse sud.

name: Maison de Roche-Uzès Centre Historique L' Ucetia
description:
Located in Uzès, 31 km from Parc Expo Nîmes and 38 km from Avignon Central Station, Maison de Roche-Uzès Centre Historique L' Ucetia provides a restaurant, inner courtyard views and free WiFi. Guests can benefit from a terrace and a children's playground. The property is non-smoking and is set 40 km from Papal Palace.

This apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom equipped with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.
