The apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Avignon TGV Train Station is 4.5 km from the apartment, while Parc des Expositions Avignon is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Avignon-Provence Airport, 10 km from Duplex-Ceiling height 1,9m-Free private parking-Netflix-Self check in!! Duplex climatisé-Hauteur sous plafond 1,9m-Parking privé gratuit-Netflix-Arrivée autonome!!.

name: Face au Palais
adresse: 13 B Place du Palais, 84000 Avignon, France
description:
Face au Palais is located across the Papal Palace in the centre of Avignon. Free WiFi access is available.

The rooms offer air conditioning and garden views. All rooms come with a refrigerator. The private bathrooms have a shower and a hairdryer. Extras include a safety deposit box and soundproofing.

At Face au Palais you will find a private garden.

The bed and breakfast is 1.2 km from Avignon Central Station and 9.5 km from Avignon-Provence Airport.

name: Le Vieux Sextier - AC Clim - Lumineux - WIFI - Hypercentre
adresse: 16 Rue du Vieux Sextier, 84000 Avignon, France
description:
Offering free WiFi and city views, Le Vieux Sextier - AC Clim - Lumineux - WIFI - Hypercentre is an accommodation set in the heart of Avignon, just 500 metres from Papal Palace and less than 1 km from Avignon Central Station. It is located 11 km from Parc des Expositions Avignon and offers private check-in and check-out. The property is non-smoking and is situated 5 km from Avignon TGV Train Station.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. There is also a seating area and a fireplace.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Avignon, like walking tours.

Arles Amphitheatre is 38 km from Le Vieux Sextier - AC Clim - Lumineux - WIFI - Hypercentre, while Parc Expo Nîmes is 44 km from the property. The nearest airport is Avignon-Provence Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

name: A l'ombre du Palais
description:
Situated 150 metres from Papal Palace and a 10-minute walk from Avignon Bridge, A l'ombre du Palais features accommodation with a shared furnished terrace. Free WiFi is provided.

Each accommodation unit includes a seating area with a TV with satellite channels, a kitchenette with a dining area, and a private bathroom. A microwave and fridge are also available, as well as a kettle.

After a day of hiking, cycling or fishing, guests can relax in the shared lounge area or on the roof terrace. Guests also have access to a fully equipped shared kitchen with an oven and a dining area that can seat 16 people. Guests have access to a utility room with a washing machine, tumble dryer and iron. There is also a communal barbecue which guests can use upon request and for an extra charge.

Many shops and restaurants can be found within a 5-minute walk.

Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Pont d'Avignon, University of Avignon and Ceccano Media Library. Avignon TGV train station is a 15-minute drive away and the nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 93 km from A l'ombre du Palais.

name: Les Précieuses Suites & Spa I
adresse: 7 Rue Puits des Allemands, 84000 Avignon, France
description:
Les Précieuses Suites & Spa I is situated in Avignon.

The suites offer a TV, a kitchen and a bathroom with a spa bath.

If you would like to discover the area, cycling is possible in the surroundings.

Papal Palace is 800 m from the apartment, while Pont d'Avignon is 1.3 km away. The nearest airport is Avignon-Provence Airport, 10 km from Les Précieuses Suites & Spa I.

name: **Auberge de l'Aude**
description:
Offering inner courtyard views, **Auberge de l'Aude** is an accommodation located in Carcassonne, 300 metres from Carcassonne Cathedral and 600 metres from Memorial House (Maison des Memoires). The air-conditioned accommodation is 50 km from Termes Chateau. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The units in the bed and breakfast are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Free WiFi is available to all guests, while certain rooms here will provide you with a terrace. At the bed and breakfast, the units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with fresh pastries, fruits and juice are available daily at the bed and breakfast. There is a coffee shop and lounge.

For guests with children, **Auberge de l'Aude** features outdoor play equipment. A car rental service is available at the accommodation.

Comtal Castle is 1.9 km from **Auberge de l'Aude**. The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 3 km from the bed and breakfast.

name: Appartement Lila
adresse: 1 étage 78 Rue Aimé Ramond, 11000 Carcassonne, France
description:
Set in Carcassonne in the Languedoc-Roussillon region with Memorial House (Maison des Memoires) and Carcassonne Cathedral nearby, Appartement Lila offers accommodation with access to a fitness room. There is a private entrance at the holiday home for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi, a 24-hour front desk and full-day security are available.

At the holiday home, each unit comes with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a shower and free toiletries. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the holiday home, units have bed linen and towels.

Guests at the holiday home can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Guests at Appartement Lila will be able to enjoy activities in and around Carcassonne, like hiking.

Termes Chateau is 50 km from the accommodation, while Comtal Castle is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 3 km from Appartement Lila.

name: GOOD KNIGHT
description:
Located 5 metres rfom the Carcassonne Castle, 2.4 km from Carcassonne Cathedral, GOOD KNIGHT provides accommodation with a garden, private parking and a terrace.

Around 5 km from Pont Rouge Commercial Zone, the property is also 5 km away from Perpignan IUT University - Carcassonne Campus and offers free WiFi. Local points of interest like Cavayere Lake and Grain d’Arts Media Library are reachable within 8 km and 1.8 km, respectively.

Popular points of interest near GOOD KNIGHT include Chipie International, Grain d’Sel Media Library and Tribunal d'Instance - Magistrates Court. The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: Carcassonne Townhouse
description:
Carcassonne Townhouse is set 1.1 km form the Cité Médiévale, and 800 metres from the Place Carnot and shops and restaurants. The Pont Vieux can be reached within 280 metres.

All guest rooms in the bed and breakfast are fitted with a coffee machine. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Carcassonne Townhouse, each room includes a seating area and have free WiFi. Complimentary tea and coffee making facilities can also be provided.

A continental breakfast is served every day at the property and can be enjoyed on the terrace, depending on the weather.

Carcassonne Townhouse offers a terrace.

Carcassonne Train Station is 1.2 km from the bed and breakfast. The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 4 km from the property. Free on-street parking available next to the property.

name: La Maison de L' Ambassadeur Carcassonne
description:
Located in Carcassonne, La Maison de L' Ambassadeur Carcassonne is a historic bed and breakfast that provides free WiFi, and guests can enjoy free bikes and a garden. The air-conditioned accommodation is 200 metres from Memorial House (Maison des Memoires). Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

The units in the bed and breakfast are equipped with a coffee machine. Some of the units include a cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and bathrobes. At the bed and breakfast, all units come with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the bed and breakfast will be able to enjoy activities in and around Carcassonne, like cycling. The bed and breakfast has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Carcassonne Cathedral is 300 metres from La Maison de L' Ambassadeur Carcassonne, while Comtal Castle is 1.6 km away. The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 3 km from the accommodation.

name: SOWELL HOTELS Les Chevaliers
adresse: 2 bis Rue des Calquières, 11000 Carcassonne, France
description:
Set a 2-minute walk from the Aude river and featuring views of the Pont Vieux bridge, SOWELL HOTELS Les Chevaliers offers accommodation with free WiFi in Carcassonne. The medieval city is just a 10-minute walk away.

Some units at the property feature a terrace with a garden view or a view of the medieval city.

A buffet breakfast is served in the morning. The restaurant offers traditional cuisine and local specialities. Guests can also enjoy a drink on the terrace, which offers views of the medieval city.

Speaking Spanish and English at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area.

The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 4 km from the property.

name: LOFT SPA - Côté château.
description:
Located in Carcassonne, LOFT SPA - Côté cité - is a 10-minute walk from the medieval walled city of Carcassone. Each accommodation has a private outdoor hot tub. Free WiFi is provided and free private parking is available on site.

Certain units feature a seating area or a terrace with a Japanese-style garden. All air-conditioned units include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. There is also a kitchen, equipped with a dishwasher and oven. A microwave and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine. Every unit features a private bathroom with a walk-in shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are featured.

Carcassonne Town Hall is 1.2 km from LOFT SPA - Côté cité -, while Grain d’Arts Media Library is 1.2 km away. The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 6.5 km from the property.

name: LA COUR CARREE
description:
Located in Carcassonne, 50 km from Termes Chateau and 80 metres from Carcassonne Cathedral, LA COUR CARREE provides accommodation with free WiFi in a historic building. The air-conditioned accommodation is 400 metres from Memorial House (Maison des Memoires). The bed and breakfast features family rooms as well as facilities for disabled guests.

The units are equipped with a safety deposit box and certain rooms here will provide you with garden views. The units include a private bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

Vegetarian and vegan breakfast options with fresh pastries, pancakes and fruits are available daily at the bed and breakfast.

Guests at LA COUR CARREE will be able to enjoy activities in and around Carcassonne, like cycling, hiking and walking tours.

Comtal Castle is 1.8 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 3 km from LA COUR CARREE.

name: Hôtel Le Donjon - Cœur de La Cité Médiévale
adresse: 2 Rue Du Comte Roger, La Cité, 11000 Carcassonne, France
description:
Located in the heart of the medieval city of Carcassonne, Hôtel Le Donjon - Cœur de La Cité Médiévale is surrounded by the city’s ancient ramparts. The hotel features a restaurant and bar. It is divided into 2 buildings. Free WiFi is provided throughout.

With views of street or the garden, the rooms are individually decorated and include a flat-screen TV. They overlook either the citadel or the hotel’s garden.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the hotel. Le Donjon’s restaurant serves traditional French cuisine and there is also a cocktail bar where guests are invited to relax in the evening.

The hotel has a 24-hour reception and room service is available upon request. A dry-cleaning and laundry service is also provided at the hotel.

Le Donjon is located 2.4 km from Carcassonne Train Station. The Basilica of Saint-Nazaire is a 2-minute walk from the hotel and the Château Comtal is less than 100 metres away.

name: Hotel Du Pont Vieux
description:
Ideally located at the foot of the fortified town at Carcassonne, in an 18th-century building, this hotel offers rooms overlooking the castle towers or the hotel’s garden. Free WiFi is provided. Carcassonne city centre is 600 metres away.

Each bedroom features air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and free toiletries.

On sunny days you can enjoy your continental buffet breakfast amongst the flowers on the outdoor terrace.

A range of convenient services are offered at the Hotel Du Pont Vieux. These include packed lunches, as well as bicycle and car rental. The staff at the Pont Vieux are available 24-hours a day to help you organise your stay in Carcassonne.

Garage parking is available upon prior request and subject to availability. Carcassonne Train Station is 3 km away.

name: Hotel Espace Cite
description:
Hotel Espace Cite is just 200 metres from the medieval city centre of Carcassonne, and 500 metres from the Midi canal, both listed sites of UNESCO's world patrimony. This hotel offers free WiFi access.

Each air-conditioned room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and has a private bathroom with a shower.

A buffet breakfast is served daily in the hotel's breakfast room or on the terrace weather permitting, which has views of the medieval city. Please note that Breakfast room is on the 1st floor, no lift available.

According to availability, the hotel provides private parking in an underground garage at an extra cost.

Carcassonne Train Station is 2.5 km away.

name: La Rapière
description:
Set just outside the medieval walls, this bed and breakfast is just 150 metres from the medieval city of Carcassonne and a 15-minute walk from the city centre. It offers a seasonal bar and restaurant with a terrace and views of the medieval city. Free WiFi is provided.

Rooms are simply decorated using neutral tones and all have air-conditioning, a TV and a private bathroom. Two rooms at La Rapière offer views of the medieval city and one room has a private terrace.

On the terrace or in the dining room, you can enjoy the B&B’s continental breakfast. A range of drinks are available from the bar, while the restaurant serves French and local cuisine in the form of set menus.

Free private parking is available on site and the A61 motorway is 3 km away.  The Canal du midi is a 20-minute walk from the hotel. For guests arriving by train, Carcassonne Train Station is ideally 2 km from the property.

name: SalutBB Chambre d'hote
description:
Housed in a historic building, SalutBB Chambre d'hote features accommodation with a garden and free WiFi in Carcassonne, 49 km from Termes Chateau. The property has garden and city views, and is 400 metres from Carcassonne Cathedral. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The units at the bed and breakfast are fitted with a seating area. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, all units at the bed and breakfast have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms are equipped with a terrace. At the bed and breakfast, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with fresh pastries, fruits and juice are available each morning at the bed and breakfast.

Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

Memorial House (Maison des Memoires) is 600 metres from SalutBB Chambre d'hote, while Comtal Castle is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 2 km from the accommodation.

name: ibis Carcassonne Centre - La Cité
description:
ibis Carcassonne Centre is ideally located 1 km from Carcassonne's Train Station and only 800 metres from the medieval heart of the city. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned guest rooms with free WiFi.

A flat-screen satellite TV and a desk are provided in each guest room. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer and toiletries.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00. A snack bar provides food throughout the day.

Part of the 17th-century Canal du Midi is 500 metres from the hotel and Jean Alary Theatre, the Fine Arts Museum and Comtal Castle are all within a 10-minute walk. Pont-Rouge Industrial Zone is 10 minutes' drive away and Carcassonne Airport is 13 minutes' drive from the hotel.

name: Mercure Carcassonne La Cité - entièrement rénové
description:
Set just a 4-minute walk from the medieval district of Carcassonne, Mercure Carcassonne La Cité - entièrement rénové offers an outdoor swimming pool in summer and views of the city walls. Free WiFi is provided.

Mercure Carcassonne Porte De La Cite features air-conditioned rooms with modern en suite facilities. Rooms are decorated in pastel tones and overlook the garden or the Montagne Noire.

The hotel's restaurant, Le Vicomté, serves Mediterranean specialties for lunch and dinner. A selection of wines are available to accompany your meals. Guests can also relax at the bar, next to the fireplace.

Other services include room service, free private parking, a garden and 3 meeting rooms for up to 90 people. Carcassonne Train Station is 2.5 km away.

name: Hôtel du Château & Spa - Teritoria
adresse: 2 Rue Camille Saint Saens, 11000 Carcassonne, France
description:
Hôtel Du Chateau - Les Collectionneurs is 30 metres from the entrance of the medieval Cité de Carcassonne. It features free access to an outdoor pool, and a spa with an indoor pool, hot tub and hammam available for an additional charge. Free WiFi access is available.

The guest rooms at Hôtel Du Chateau are equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Each room or suite has a private bathroom.

You can enjoy a drink in the panoramic bar, which offers view of the city. Snacking options are available and guests can take cooking classes upon request.

The hotel also has a 24-hour reception and private parking.

The Hôtel Du Chateau is within 300 metres of the N113 motorway exit and the Basilica of Saint Nazaire is 7 minutes' walk away. Saint Celse is just a 5-minute walk from Hôtel Du Chateau - Les Collectionneurs. Carcassonne Train Station is an 8-minute drive away.

name: Hôtel Montmorency & Spa
adresse: 2 Rue Camille Saint Saens, 11000 Carcassonne, France
description:
Hotel Montmorency is located 30 metres from the entrance to the medieval city of Carcassonne. It offers free WiFi access, an outdoor pool and a hot tub. A Spa with an indoor pool and hammam is also available at an extra cost.

Rooms at Hotel Montmorency are equipped with a telephone, LCD TV and private bathroom with a bath. Some rooms are air-conditioned.

Guests can relax with a drink in Montmorency’s bar and enjoy the view from its panoramic terrace. Snacking options are available.

Montmorency Hotel is 60 km from Narbonne and 70 km from Castres. Private parking is available for a supplement. Carcassonne Train Station is a 10-minute drive away.

name: Hôtel l'Aragon
description:
Situated just 50 metres from the historic centre of Carcassone in the Aude region, Hôtel l'Aragon features free WiFi throughout the property. Free private parking is available on site, and you will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Guest rooms at Aragon are equipped with air conditioning, satellite flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Buffet breakfast is served every morning at Hôtel l'Aragon. Guests can relax in the lounge or on the terrace, weather permitting.

Basilique Saint-Nazaire is 9 minutes' walk from the hotel, and Château Comtal is 5 minutes' walk away.

name: Au point du jour - Gîtes Carcassonne, Lac de la Cavayère
adresse: 19 Chemin du Point du Jour Montlegun, 11000 Carcassonne, France
description:
3.4 km from Cavayere Lake, Au point du jour - Gîtes Carcassonne, Lac de la Cavayère is a recently renovated property situated in Carcassonne and features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and private parking. This apartment has a private pool, a garden and barbecue facilities. This 3-star apartment offers private entrance.

The apartment provides guests with a terrace, pool views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

For guests with children, the apartment offers outdoor play equipment. Hiking and walking tours can be enjoyed nearby.

Comtal Castle is 7.7 km from Au point du jour - Gîtes Carcassonne, Lac de la Cavayère. The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Astoria
description:
Hotel Astoria is located in the centre of Carcassonne, 150 metres from the train station and a 20-minute walk from the medieval city. It offers free Wi-Fi internet access.

The guest rooms are located in two buildings, one with 2 floors and one located entirely on the ground floor. They are all equipped with a TV and telephone and each room has a private bathroom.

Astoria Hotel provides private parking and a garage, available with an extra cost and upon reservation. Parking in the garage is free for motorbikes and bicycles.

The courthouse is a 5-minute walk away and the Canal du Midi is 50 metres away.

name: 45BB
description:
Boasting a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and views of pool, 45BB is a bed and breakfast set in a historic building in Carcassonne, 50 km from Termes Chateau. Featuring a housekeeping service, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. In good weather, guests are welcome to sit outside.

All units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fridge, a kettle, a walk-in shower, bathrobes and a desk. Featuring a private bathroom with a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also have free WiFi, while certain rooms also offer a balcony. At the bed and breakfast, units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

If you would like to discover the area, skiing, cycling and hiking are possible in the surroundings and the bed and breakfast can arrange a bicycle rental service.

Popular points of interest near 45BB include Carcassonne Cathedral, Memorial House (Maison des Memoires) and Comtal Castle. The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 3 km from the accommodation.

name: Demeure Saint Louis, Cité 10mn à pieds, PARKING Privé, BORNES 7,2 KW, AC, FULL WIFI
description:
This charming 18th-century guest house is an ideal base for visiting the medieval city of Carcassonne. It offers individually-decorated rooms and a floral garden with a pond and a shaded terrace.

Each room at the Demeure Saint-Louis has free WiFi, air conditioning and a private bathroom with a shower or bath. Some rooms are equipped with a TV.

Breakfast is served daily in the elegant dining room, which features chandeliers and varnished wood floors. Guests can relax with a book in the cosy lounge.

Free private secured parking is available on site.

name: Gîte Carcasso
description:
Gîte Carcasso is located near the city walls, 100 metres from the medieval castle and opposite Saint Gimer church. The property offers a free WiFi connection.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom with free toiletries and a walk-in shower. The accommodation is fitted with a kitchen, which has a fridge, freezer, washing machine, tumble dryer, dishwasher, microwave oven and stovetop. The living area features a flat-screen TV.

Bed linen and towels are included in the price, and cleaning products, coffee, tea, sugar, salt, pepper, oil, water and fruit juice are provided.

Carcassonne Cathedral is 900 metres from Gîte Carcasso. The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 4 km from the property.

name: Les Florentines
description:
This B&B is 200 metres from the main entrance to the medieval city of Carcassonne, in the Languedoc-Roussillon region. It offers views of the fortified city walls, and individually decorated guest rooms with free Wi-Fi access.

Some of the rooms open up to a private terrace and offer views of the city and the mountains.

Breakfast is served every morning by the fireplace in the B&B’s breakfast room. Guests are free to watch TV and relax in the B&B’s communal lounge area.

The Carcassonne Train Station is 1.7 km away. The city’s cathedral is 1.5 km from the B&B and the Carcassonne Salvaza Airport is reached by car in 15 minutes. The B&B's owners live just 200 metres away.

name: A l'ombre des remparts
description:
Boasting free bikes and views of inner courtyard, A l'ombre des remparts is an apartment set in a historic building in Carcassonne, 1 km from Memorial House (Maison des Memoires). There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment features rooms with air conditioning, free private parking and free WiFi.

The apartment provides guests with a patio, city views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Guests at A l'ombre des remparts will be able to enjoy activities in and around Carcassonne, like fishing, hiking and walking tours. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy windsurfing and cycling nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace.

Carcassonne Cathedral is 1 km from A l'ombre des remparts, while Comtal Castle is 700 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 5 km from the apartment.

name: Residhotel Grenette
description:
Residhotel Grenette is located in central Grenoble, a 3-minute walk away from Place Victor Hugo. It offers self-catering accommodation with free WiFi.

Each unit has a living area with work desk and cable TV.  The kitchenette features a hot-plate, microwave, refrigerator and coffee maker.

The Residhotel provides a daily buffet breakfast service which is served in its breakfast room.

The Grenette is only a 5-minute walk from the historic centre of Grenoble, and the train station is 800 metres away. Private parking spaces are limited and available at an extra charge upon reservation and depending on availability.

name: Le Grand Hôtel Grenoble, BW Premier Collection by Best Western
adresse: 5 rue de la Republique, 38000 Grenoble, France
description:
The 4-star Le Grand Hôtel is located in the Grenoble City Centre, 10 metres from Place Grenette. The guest rooms are soundproofed, air-conditioned and some offer a balcony.

The guest rooms have a private bathroom with a bathtub or a walk-in shower. They also have a minibar, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and free WiFi.

Le Stendhal onsite bar offers a variety of drinks, cocktails and wines. Guests have the option of a full-breakfast or an express breakfast. A range of cold dishes can be delivered to your room for lunch or dinner.

The front desk at Le Grand Hôtel Grenoble is open 24 hours a day. Grenoble TGV Train Station is 1.5 km away. Public parking is available nearby.

name: RockyPop Grenoble Hotel
description:
Situated in Grenoble, 1.6 km from Grenoble Train Station, RockyPop Grenoble Hotel features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as a sauna. The property is 1.9 km from WTC Grenoble, and within 600 metres of the city centre.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. The rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

You can play table tennis at this 4-star hotel, and bike hire is available.

Speaking English and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the 24-hour front desk.

AlpExpo is 4.8 km from RockyPop Grenoble Hotel, while Alps Stadium is less than 1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Alpes–Isère Airport, 48 km from the accommodation.

name: Hôtel d’Angleterre Grenoble Hyper-Centre
description:
Hôtel d’Angleterre Grenoble Hyper-Centre is set in the heart of Grenoble, opposite the gardens of Place Victor Hugo. It is just a 1-minute walk to the Victor Hugo tram stop and offers free WiFi and an onsite bar .

All the rooms are soundproofed and air-conditioned. They feature a desk, a LCD satellite TV and a DVD player. The private bathrooms come with free toiletries. Some rooms also have a hydro-massage bathtub and a private balcony with views over the Vercors mountain range.

A buffet breakfast is available every day and includes hot, cold, sweet and savoury options. An other continental breakfast option consisting of a hot drink, a juice, a pasty, bread, butter and jam is also available.

An underground car park is available nearby at an extra charge.  The nearest airport is Grenoble - Isère Airport, 45 km from the accommodation.

name: Hôtel de l'Europe Grenoble hyper-centre
description:
Hôtel de l'Europe Grenoble hyper-centre is located in the heart of Grenoble and is the oldest hotel in the city. It is set in a 17th-century building. Free WiFi is provided.

All rooms are air-conditioned and soundproofed. They come with a flat-screen TV with Bein Sports, Canal+ and Eurosport satellite channels. Some rooms also feature a balcony with views of the city.

Hôtel de l'Europe Grenoble hyper-centre offers a daily continental breakfast, which can also be served in the guest room upon request.

Hôtel de l'Europe Grenoble hyper-centre is 350 metres from the cable car that goes up to the Bastille. Grenoble train station is 1 km away, or a 5-minute journey by tram. Public parking is available nearby.

name: R'Apparts T2 Refuge Chic
description:
R'Apparts T2 Refuge Chic is set in Grenoble, 1.7 km from WTC Grenoble, 1.6 km from Grenoble Train Station, as well as 4.8 km from AlpExpo. The property is around 2.7 km from Alps Stadium, 5 km from Summum and 6.5 km from The Bastille Grenoble.

The accommodation is non-smoking.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

Col de Parménie is 34 km from the apartment. The nearest airport is Alpes–Isère Airport, 46 km from R'Apparts T2 Refuge Chic.

name: Hotel Mercure Grenoble Centre Président
description:
Hôtel Mercure Grenoble Président is located 10 minutes from Grenoble’s city centre and accessible by tram and other public transport services. The hotel offers free access to its fitness centre, swimming pool, sauna and hot tub.

The air-conditioned guest rooms have a contemporary style and feature a flat-screen TV, free WiFi access and a coffee maker. All rooms feature a private bathroom.

The President restaurant serves traditional French cuisine with regional dishes. Meals can be complemented by the extensive Grands Vins Mercure wine list from Monday to Friday evening.

Guests of the hotel can enjoy a glass of wine or a cocktail in the hotel’s bar, Le Sirius. This bar has an African décor and features musical entertainment, themed nights and a terrace. Guests are also offered a free massage on Tuesdays.

Private parking is available on site for an extra charge.

name: Residhotel Le Central'Gare
adresse: 8 Place de la Gare, 38000 Grenoble, France
description:
Situated opposite the train station and close to the lively Grenette square, the Residhotel Le Central'Gare offers self-catering accommodation with free WiFi. It boasts excellent transport links and a meeting room suitable for business functions or seminars. A 24-hour front desk is provided.

All units are fitted with a microwave, fridge, a coffee machine, a stovetop and kettle. They are air conditioned and include a seating area with a flat-screen TV.

A continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The heart of the city with its shops, restaurants and museums is just a 10-minute walk away. You can also take the tram, which stops right outside the hotel.

The nearest airport is Grenoble - Isère Airport, 35 km from the accommodation. Private parking spaces are limited and available upon reservation and at an additional cost.

name: Esprit Bistrot / Rent4night Grenoble
description:
Offering a garden and garden view, Esprit Bistrot / Rent4night Grenoble is located in Grenoble, 3.9 km from WTC Grenoble and 4.8 km from AlpExpo. This apartment offers free private parking, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 3.4 km from Grenoble Train Station.

The spacious apartment includes a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, as well as a coffee machine. The unit is air conditioned and is comprised of a terrace with an outdoor dining area as well as a TV with streaming services. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Grenoble, like hiking.

Alps Stadium is 700 metres from Esprit Bistrot / Rent4night Grenoble, while Summum is 4.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Alpes–Isère Airport, 49 km from the accommodation.

name: Maison Barbillon Grenoble
description:
Maison Barbillon Grenoble is located in Grenoble, just 100 metres from the train station. It offers comfortable guest rooms with satellite TV and free WiFi Internet access.

Guest rooms at the Maison Barbillon Grenoble have an authentic and elegant décor and feature a private bathroom including a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room. There are many restaurants within walking distance of the hotel.

Maison Barbillon is accessible via the A480 motorway. The hotel is located beside Grenoble World Trade Centre and Saint-André Cathedral is just a 13-minute walk away.

name: Hostel Le Hüb Grenoble
adresse: 25 Avenue Doyen Louis Weil, 38000 Grenoble, France
description:
Situated in Grenoble, 300 m from WTC Grenoble, Hostel Le Hüb Grenoble features accommodation with a bar, private parking, a shared lounge and a garden. Featuring a terrace, the 3-star hostel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a shared bathroom.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at the hostel.

Guests at Hostel Le Hüb Grenoble will be able to enjoy activities in and around Grenoble, like skiing.

AlpExpo is 7 km from the accommodation, while Alps Stadium is 3.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Grenoble - Isère Airport, 44 km from Hostel Le Hüb Grenoble.

name: Novotel Grenoble Centre
description:
The Novotel is set at the heart of Grenoble's business district, only a few steps from the TGV train station. A tram stop is conveniently situated just outside the hotel. Many large companies are located close to the Novotel Grenoble Centre, and the historical centre is only a 10-minute drive away.

The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a desk, a safety deposit box and a minibar. Some rooms feature a Nespresso coffee machine. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer.

Guests at the Novotel benefit from access to the hotel fitness centre. The hotel also features a restaurant, a bar, conference rooms, facilities for the disabled, and private parking at an additional cost. Up to 2 children (16 years and under) stay free when sharing with parents.

This hotel is also just a few kilometres from the Belledonne Massif and the Vercors Mountains.

name: Les Appartements de Grenoble
description:
Set in Grenoble, 1.9 km from Grenoble Train Station and 500 metres from the centre, Les Appartements de Grenoble offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a garden. The property features mountain and garden views, and is 2.7 km from WTC Grenoble. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

Each unit is fitted with a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a stovetop and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the aparthotel, the units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

The family-friendly restaurant at the aparthotel serves local cuisine, and is open for dinner and lunch. During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

A bicycle rental service is available at Les Appartements de Grenoble.

AlpExpo is 6.3 km from the accommodation, while Alps Stadium is 3.3 km away. The nearest airport is Alpes–Isère Airport, 46 km from Les Appartements de Grenoble.

name: Adagio Grenoble Centre
description:
Adagio Grenoble Centre is located in the Europole business district of Grenoble, a 5-minute walk from the city’s TGV Train Station and a 10-minute walk from the city centre. With studios and suites, it offers free WiFi access, a fitness room and a sauna.

All the contemporary studios and suites are equipped with interactive TV and a fully equipped kitchen.

Adagio Grenoble Centre serves a daily continental breakfast as well as full concierge services.

Grenobles old town and Notre Dame Cathedral are within easy walking distance. The A480 motorway is 1.3 kilometres away for guests exploring the Rhone-Alpes region by car.

name: Okko Hotels Grenoble Jardin Hoche
description:
Featuring a sauna and a fitness centre, Okko Hotels Grenoble Jardin Hoche is located in Grenoble, right next to the Hoche Gardens. This design hotel offers a terrace with views over Hoche Park, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi access.

Each room is air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV, a desk and a coffee machine. The private bathroom has a shower and comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Soft drinks are also included throughout the day free of charge in the lounge, and in the evening guests are offered a small plate of antipasti, delicious dips and seasonal products.

Okko Hotels Grenoble Jardin Hoche features the Le Club lounge and a library. The hotel is 500 metres from Paul Mistral Park, 50 metres from La Caserne de Bonne shopping mall and 1.5 km from Grenoble Train Station.

name: Residhome Grenoble Caserne De Bonne
description:
This 4-star Residhome is located in Grenoble, just a 10-minute walk from the city centre. It offers accommodation with free WiFi and views of the Vercors and Belledonne Mountains.

Apartments at the Caserne de Bonne Residhome have a fully equipped kitchen and a private bathroom. They are each furnished with a flat-screen TV and a work desk.

Guests of the Residhome Grenoble Caserne De Bonne have access to the sauna and gym area. The resort also provides a 24-hour reception and bar. There is a shopping centre with shops and restaurants just 150 metres away.

The Caserne De Bonne is a 15-minute walk from the SNCF train station and just 3 minutes from the nearest Tram stop.

name: Kyriad Grenoble Centre
adresse: 116 Cours de la Libération, 38100 Grenoble, France
description:
Located 200 metres from Stade Lesdiguières, Kyriad Grenoble Centre offers 3-star accommodation with 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Alpexpo convention centre is 3 km away from the property. A private car park under video surveillance is available for guests and is free of charge.

All rooms are air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, including Canal+. The private bathrooms come with a bath and free toiletries. Tea and coffee making facilities are provided.

Room service and bar access are available 24/7 and the hotel serves a buffet breakfast every day.

La Bastille Grenoble cable-car is 4 km from the accommodation, while  Grenoble train station is 3 km away and accessible in 10 minutes with the tramway. Grenoble - Isère Airport is 46 km away.

name: Le petit Berriat - Grenoble centre
description:
Featuring garden views, Le petit Berriat - Grenoble centre provides accommodation with a balcony, around 500 metres from Grenoble Train Station. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The apartment features facilities for disabled guests.

The recently renovated apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a toaster. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Guests at the apartment can enjoy skiing and hiking nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace.

WTC Grenoble is less than 1 km from Le petit Berriat - Grenoble centre, while AlpExpo is 5.4 km away. The nearest airport is Alpes–Isère Airport, 46 km from the accommodation.

name: Appartéa Grenoble Alpexpo
description:
Appartéa Grenoble Alpexpo is located 400 metres from the SAEM Alpexpo Exhibition Centre, opposite the Grand Place tram stop.  It offers studio and apartments with free internet access.

Each studio and apartment is equipped with air conditioning and cable TV. The kitchen includes a microwave, stove and fridge.

Appartéa Grenoble Alpexpo offers a daily buffet breakfast.  Additional services include on-site public parking.

Appartéa Grenoble Alpexpo is within easy access of the A480 and A41 motorways, and an hour’s drive from many ski resorts.

name: Hotel Europole
description:
Hotel Europole is located in the centre of Grenoble, less than 100 metres from the SNCF Train Station and a 3-minute walk from the Palais de Justice.

The modern guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and WiFi internet access. They also have lift access.

In addition to a 24-hour reception from Monday to Friday, the hotel offers a laundry and dry cleaning service.

Hotel Europole is 45 km from Grenoble-Saint-Geoirs Airport. On-site public parking is available for guests arriving by car.

name: Séjours & Affaires Grenoble Marie Curie
description:
This residence is a 5-minute walk from Grenoble Train Station and less than 100 metres from Cité Internationale Tram Stop. It is Ideally situated in the Europole business district, 650 metres from the Grenoble School of Management, 400 metres from the Minatec Complex and 1.8 km from the CNRS research centre.

Séjours & Affaires Grenoble Marie Curie offers studios and apartments with free WiFi access, a seating area with a desk and a flat-screen TV. Each has a fully equipped kitchen with a refrigerator, stove and microwave.They also have a private bathroom, which is complete with free toiletries.

The residence offers a continental breakfast in the breakfast room or on the terrace. Shops and restaurants can be found within 1 kilometre of Séjours & Affaires Grenoble Marie Curie.

Grenoble city centre is 1.7 km away. The property has private parking available at an extra cost. Exit 2 on the A480 motorway is a 3-minute drive away.

name: Sweet Loft Grenoble-Love Room avec jacuzzi & sauna
description:
Well set in the centre of Grenoble, Sweet Loft Grenoble-Love Room avec jacuzzi & sauna offers a patio, air conditioning, free WiFi and flat-screen TV. Beauty services and a bicycle rental service are available for guests. Guests also enjoy access to the sauna and hot tub, as well as the spa facilities and wellness packages.

Featuring a DVD player, the apartment has a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge, a living room with a seating area and a dining area, 1 bedroom, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hot tub. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some wine or champagne and chocolates or cookies. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Breakfast can be enjoyed on-site daily, which includes fresh pastries and juice. There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available. During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Grenoble, like walking tours.

Popular points of interest near Sweet Loft Grenoble-Love Room avec jacuzzi & sauna include Grenoble Train Station, WTC Grenoble and Alps Stadium. The nearest airport is Alpes–Isère Airport, 48 km from the accommodation.

name: RockyPop Grenoble Appartements
description:
RockyPop Grenoble Appartements provides accommodation located 600 metres from the centre of Grenoble and features a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. There is private parking and the property offers an electric vehicle charging station.

The aparthotel will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a desk, a coffee machine, an oven, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a a bath or shower. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a kettle. The units include a wardrobe.

A bar can be found on-site. During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Grenoble Train Station, WTC Grenoble and Alps Stadium. The nearest airport is Alpes–Isère Airport, 48 km from RockyPop Grenoble Appartements.

name: Chambre privée en hyper-centre de Grenoble
description:
Chambre privée en hyper-centre de Grenoble in Grenoble provides accommodation with free WiFi, 1.6 km from WTC Grenoble, 7 km from AlpExpo and 1.3 km from Alps Stadium. The property is around 1.6 km from The Bastille Grenoble, 7.2 km from Summum and 34 km from Col de Parménie. The property is 1.3 km from Grenoble Train Station, and within 300 metres of the city centre.

Towels and bed linen are featured in the homestay. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Guests at the homestay can enjoy a continental breakfast. During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

The nearest airport is Alpes–Isère Airport, 46 km from Chambre privée en hyper-centre de Grenoble.

name: Apparthotel Le Hüb Grenoble
adresse: 25 Avenue Doyen Louis Weil, 38000 Grenoble, France
description:
With WTC Grenoble reachable in 300 metres, Apparthotel Le Hüb Grenoble provides accommodation, a restaurant, a bar, a shared lounge and a garden. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site.

Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bath, a hairdryer and free toiletries. A microwave and fridge are also available, as well as a kettle and a coffee machine.

A buffet breakfast is available daily at the aparthotel.

Apparthotel Le Hüb Grenoble features a terrace.

AlpExpo is 5 km from the accommodation, while Alps Stadium is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Grenoble - Isère Airport, 44 km from Apparthotel Le Hüb Grenoble.

name: Hotel Colmar Vignes Eguisheim
adresse: 2 rue des Trois Châteaux, 68420 Eguisheim, France
description:
This hotel is located 200 metres from the city centre of Eguisheim, a 10-minute drive from Colmar. It offers free Wi-Fi internet access and free private parking.

The rooms at the Hotel Colmar Vignes Eguisheim are also equipped with TVs and some have private balconies.

Guests can enjoy a daily buffet breakfast.

The Alsace wine route and the Vosges Mountains are easily accessible from Hotel Colmar Vignes Eguisheim.

name: Hôtel L'Auberge Alsacienne
description:
Located in the village of Eguisheim in the Alsace region, this hotel features modern rooms with private bathroom and a traditional restaurant. Free WiFi is available in the entire hotel.

The soundproofed rooms at Hôtel L'Auberge Alsacienne include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Hairdryer and free bathroom toiletries are also provided.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the dining room. The hotel’s restaurant offers typical Alsatian food with à la carte menus.

Eguisheim centre is only 300 metres away and Colmar SNCF Train Station is 6 km from the property. German frontier is very close and Freiburg is 1 hour’s drive.

name: The Originals Boutique, Hôtel La Ferme du Pape, Eguisheim
description:
The Originals Boutique, Hôtel La Ferme du Pape, Eguisheim is located at the gate of a charming village, in the heart of vineyards and a gourmet region. The hotel is situated 8 km from Colmar.

Rooms at the The Originals Boutique, Hôtel La Ferme du Pape, Eguisheim feature traditional decor and are equipped with modern amenities such as free WiFi  access.

The The Originals Boutique, Hôtel La Ferme du Pape, Eguisheim offers a shaded terrace where you can savour local specialities accompanied with wines from the region.

The hotel features a lift, free private parking and facilities for the disabled. The golf course and the tennis courts are 5 km from the hotel and the town swimming pool is 6 km away.

name: Chambre Pin Up Wings
description:
Located in Eguisheim, 6.1 km from House of the Heads and 6.6 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church, Chambre Pin Up Wings offers a terrace and air conditioning. The property is around 9.2 km from Colmar Expo, 33 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle and 38 km from Parc Expo Mulhouse. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Colmar Train Station is 5.3 km away.

The guest house is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are provided in the guest house. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Mulhouse Train Station is 41 km from the guest house. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg Airport, 54 km from Chambre Pin Up Wings.

name: Hotel SPA Husseren Collections - Proche Colmar - Eguisheim
description:
The hotel, with terraces southerly oriented, is located between vineyards and forest, at the foothills of the ruins of the three castles in the heart of Alsace, on the wine-road, 6 km from Colmar, 70 km from Strasbourg.

The establishment boasts a bistronomic restaurant, Bain , with a terrace featuring forest views. Guests can also enjoy an indoor swimming pool, a sauna, and bright seminar rooms with professional material and Wi-Fi access.

Staff at the Hotel Restaurant & Spa Husseren Collections speak English, German, Danish and Italian. Nine charging stations (including 3 tesla) for electric cars are available at this property.

Parking is available and for free.

name: L'Hostellerie du Château
description:
Set at the heart of the medieval village of Eguisheim, the Hostellerie du Château is located on the Alsace wine route. It offers individually decorated guest rooms with free fibre-optic WiFi access.

Each guest room is equipped with satellite TV and a minibar. The tiled private bathrooms feature a bathtub.

At L'Hostellerie du Château, a continental buffet breakfast is served every morning in the dining room.

L'Hostellerie du Château is located 6 km from Colmar City Centre and Strasbourg Airport is 87 km away. Guests can visit the 3 castles in the village, just a short walk away.

name: Gite St Léon à Eguisheim
description:
Situated in Eguisheim, Gite St Léon à Eguisheim is a recently renovated accommodation, 5.6 km from Colmar Train Station and 6.5 km from House of the Heads. The property has city and quiet street views, and is 7 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. Both parking on-site and free WiFi are accessible at the apartment.

The 1-bedroom apartment features a living room with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Guests are welcome to eat in the on-site restaurant, which is open for dinner and lunch.

If you would like to discover the area, cycling, hiking and walking tours are possible in the surroundings and Gite St Léon à Eguisheim can arrange a bicycle rental service.

Colmar Expo is 10 km from the accommodation, while Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 35 km from the property. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg Airport, 54 km from Gite St Léon à Eguisheim.

name: Eguisheim village préféré des français grand studio
description:
Eguisheim village préféré des français grand studio is set in Eguisheim, 5.3 km from Colmar Train Station, 6 km from House of the Heads, and 6.4 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. Outdoor dining is also possible at the apartment.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchenette, and a terrace with garden views. The air-conditioned unit at the property features a shower and a dressing room. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Guests at Eguisheim village préféré des français grand studio can enjoy hiking nearby, or make the most of the garden.

Colmar Expo is 9.3 km from the accommodation, while Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 34 km from the property. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg Airport, 54 km from Eguisheim village préféré des français grand studio.

name: Les chambres du domaine
description:
Les chambres du domaine, a property with a terrace, is situated in Eguisheim, 5.5 km from Colmar Train Station, 6.3 km from House of the Heads, as well as 6.8 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. This bed and breakfast features free private parking, a housekeeping service and free WiFi. Parc Expo Mulhouse is 38 km away and Mulhouse Train Station is 41 km from the bed and breakfast.

Accessible via private entrance, all units have air conditioning, soundproofing, desk and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower. A toaster and kettle are also available. At the bed and breakfast, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy an à la carte breakfast.

Guests at Les chambres du domaine will be able to enjoy activities in and around Eguisheim, like hiking.

Colmar Expo is 10 km from the accommodation, while Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 35 km from the property. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg Airport, 54 km from Les chambres du domaine.

name: Résidence Pierre & Vacances Le Clos d'Eguisheim
description:
Résidence Pierre & Vacances Le Clos D'Eguisheim is located 700 metres from Eguisheim village centre, in the Alsace region along the Alsace Wine Route. It offers a heated, indoor swimming pool and fully equipped apartments.

Each apartment is fully furnished with a terrace or loggia with garden furniture, a separate living area and a private bathroom. The kitchens include a vitroceramic cooking hob, fridge and coffee maker. WiFi access is available for a fee. A bakery services is available at a surcharge.

The Résidence Pierre & Vacances overlooks the Three Keeps Hill. It is located just 6.5 km from Colmar city centre and 30 km from the German border. Private parking is available at an extra cost and guests can rent books and board games free of charge.

Green Key-awarded.

name: Gite Le Petit Malsbach Eguisheim
description:
Offering inner courtyard views, Gite Le Petit Malsbach Eguisheim is an accommodation set in Eguisheim, 6.6 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church and 10 km from Colmar Expo. The air-conditioned accommodation is 5.3 km from Colmar Train Station, and guests can benefit from private parking available on site and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 6.1 km from House of the Heads.

The apartment with a terrace and mountain views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 33 km from the apartment, while Parc Expo Mulhouse is 39 km away. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg Airport, 54 km from Gite Le Petit Malsbach Eguisheim.

name: Le Hameau d'Eguisheim - Chambres d'hôtes & Gîtes
description:
Set in a typical Alsatian timbered house, Le Hameau d’Eguisheim offers B&B and self-catering accommodation on an estate with a vineyard. The property is in the heart of the medieval village of Eguisheim.

Each guest room has been decorated in a unique style and has a private bathroom, free WiFi access, a flat-screen TV and tea and coffee making facilities. There is also an independent apartment for up to 6 guests, which is equipped with its own kitchen.

A breakfast is served each morning in the property’s former wine cellar. Guests can also relax in the adjacent, communal living area and or on the outdoor terrace, which has a view of the interior courtyard.

Activities such as hiking, mountain biking and Christmas markets are popular in the area. Eguisheim Christmas Market is 57 meters away.

name: Auberge des Trois Châteaux
description:
Auberge des Trois Châteaux is in the heart of Eguisheim, surrounded by vineyards of Alsace along the Alsatian wine route. Its traditional Winstub serves local, traditional specialties and local wines.

En suite with bath or shower and a hairdryer, the rooms offer flat-screen TV with satellite channels, telephone and an alarm clock. Free Wi-Fi is provided in the entire property.

This 17th-century house, typical of the region is just 8 km from Colmar and 5 km from the Colmar Train Station. The 3 castles in the region – le Wahlenbourg, le Weckmund and Hohlandsbourg castle are all within 12 km of Auberge des Trois Châteaux.

name: James Vignoble Hôtel, Eguisheim
description:
James Vignoble Hôtel Eguisheim is located among the vineyards of Eguisheim. It offers a spectacular view of the Black Forest.

The establishment is equipped with two pools, one outdoor heated to 29°C (Closed in winter, open according to weather conditions and seasons). Our relaxing area is open and has one indoor swimming pool which is heated to 29°C, it also has a Jacuzzi and a panoramic sauna at an extra cost. Bath robes, towels and flip flops are proposed to our guests at the Front Desk, with a supplementary price.

There are 31 furnished rooms with a private bathroom. Each room at the James Vignoble Hôtel Eguisheim is equipped with a TV, telephone, air-conditioning and minibar.

A breakfast buffet with sweet and savoury options is available daily. Breakfast must be reserved upon arrival. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Parking is in extra at 8€ per day on site. You will find a choice of restaurants within a 5-minute walk from the hotel. Eguisheim Christmas Market is 500 meters away.

The wellness area is open from 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. This private space has an additional cost of €11 for ages 13 and over and €4 for ages 7 to 12. To make this moment relaxing, we provide you with bathrobes, towels and flip-flops.

name: Chabi Chalet Gîte au coeur d'Eguisheim
adresse: 57 Rue du Rempart Sud, 68420 Eguisheim, France
description:
Offering a terrace and quiet street view, Chabi Chalet Gîte au coeur d'Eguisheim is set in Eguisheim, 6.8 km from House of the Heads and 7.2 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. Featuring mountain and city views, this apartment also provides guests with free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 5.9 km from Colmar Train Station.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Colmar Expo is 10 km from the apartment, while Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 35 km away. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg Airport, 54 km from Chabi Chalet Gîte au coeur d'Eguisheim.

name: Résidence Vénus
adresse: 10 Rue du Rempart Nord, 68420 Eguisheim, France
description:
Set along the Alsace Wine Route, the 1-bedroom apartment of Résidence Vénus is located 13 km from Ammerschwihr Golf Club. The property features a TV, radio and a fully equipped kitchen.

This modern apartment has a living room with a sofa bed and a CD player. An oven, stove and toaster are provided in the kitchen. Free Wi-Fi access is available and the en suite bathroom is fitted with a shower.

Located in the historic village of Eguisheim, this property is a 15-minute drive from Colmar, and Koenigsbourg Castle is 32 km away.

description:

The bed and breakfast features a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are available in the bed and breakfast. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Parc Expo Mulhouse is 38 km from the bed and breakfast, while Mulhouse Train Station is 41 km from the property. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg Airport, 54 km from Chambre Rose des Vents.

name: Gite à Eguisheim proche de Colmar et Kaysergberg.
adresse: 65 Rue du Rempart Sud, 68420 Eguisheim, France
description:
Offering garden views, Gite à Eguisheim proche de Colmar et Kaysergberg. Is an accommodation situated in Eguisheim, 6.7 km from House of the Heads and 7.2 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. The property is set 10 km from Colmar Expo, 35 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle and 39 km from Parc Expo Mulhouse. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Colmar Train Station is 5.9 km away.

The 1-bedroom apartment features a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and oven, and 1 bathroom with walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Eguisheim, like hiking.

Mulhouse Train Station is 42 km from Gite à Eguisheim proche de Colmar et Kaysergberg.. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg Airport, 54 km from the accommodation.

name: Le Nature d'Eguisheim
description:
Set in Eguisheim, 5.8 km from Colmar Train Station and 6.7 km from House of the Heads, Le Nature d'Eguisheim offers barbecue facilities and air conditioning. description:
Located in Eguisheim, 5.3 km from Colmar Train Station and 6.1 km from House of the Heads, Gîte La Grange provides spacious air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. The property is situated 9.2 km from Colmar Expo, 33 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle and 38 km from Parc Expo Mulhouse. name: Gîte de charme sur les remparts

Offering quiet street views, Gîte de charme sur les remparts is an accommodation set in Eguisheim, 6.4 km from House of the Heads and 6.9 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. The property features garden and city views, and is 5.5 km from Colmar Train Station. The property offers a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

description:
Located in Eguisheim, 6.8 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church and 10 km from Colmar Expo, Le cépage, au coeur des vignes. Offers a garden and air conditioning. With free private parking, the property is 5.7 km from Colmar Train Station and 6.4 km from House of the Heads. The property is non-smoking and is set 34 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle.

Providing a terrace, this holiday home also provides guests with a flat-screen TV, a well-equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, as well as 2 bathrooms with a shower and a hair dryer. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

name: Gîte "Smart'In"
adresse: Résidence Saint Léon 1 Rue du Château, 68420 Eguisheim, France
description:
Offering mountain views, Gîte "Smart'In" is an accommodation set in Eguisheim, 5.6 km from Colmar Train Station and 6.5 km from House of the Heads. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and an ATM, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 35 km away and Parc Expo Mulhouse is 39 km from the apartment.

Boasting a Nintendo Wii, the apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a toaster, a living room, a dining area, 1 bedroom, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available.

The area is popular for skiing and hiking, and bike hire is available at this 3-star apartment. Outdoor play equipment is also available for guests at the apartment.

Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 7 km from Gîte "Smart'In", while Colmar Expo is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg Airport, 54 km from the accommodation.

name: Hôtel Vaubecour
adresse: 28 rue Vaubecour, 2ème étage,, 2nd arr., 69002 Lyon, France
description:
Hôtel Vaubecour is located in Lyon, on the 2nd floor of a building. Lyon’s Museum of Fine Arts is 1.6 km away and Lyon Perrache Train Station is 500 metres from the hotel. Free WiFi access is available.

Accessed via a lift, the non-smoking guest rooms feature a desk and a TV with satellite channels. The private bathrooms have a shower. Hôtel Vaubecour offers a free daily cleaning service for your convenience.

Please note that the property does not have air conditioning.

Breakfast is available, which can be enjoyed in the breakfast room. A library and board games are at guests' disposal.

The hotel is 2.4 km from La Part-Dieu Business District. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 20 km away.

Please note that the elevator is not accessible to people with reduced mobility.

name: Le Carré Merciere
description:
Set in a renovated, 17th- century convent in Lyon, this guest house is located just a 5-minute walk from the city centre. The American kitchen includes an espresso machine and free Wi-Fi is provided.

An LCD TV features in the accommodations, and the private bathroom is fitted with a walk-in shower and heated towel rail. Bed and bath linen are included, and the loft offers high ceilings and exposed beams.

The kitchens at Le Carré Mercière are equipped with a dishwasher, hotplates and a fridge. There is also a seating and dining area.

Lyon Saint-Exupéry Airport is 18 km away, and this guest house is located in a district classified as a World Heritage Site by UNESCO. The Fourvière Basilica is just 900 metres away.

name: Lagrange Aparthotel Lyon Lumière
adresse: 81-85 Cours Albert Thomas, 3rd arr., 69003 Lyon, France
description:
Lagrange Aparthotel Lyon Lumière is located halfway between Sans Souci and Monplaisir-Lumière metro stations, both of which offer direct links to Place Bellecour and Lyon Old Town. The residence features studios and apartments with free WiFi access, 200 metres from Institut & Musee Lumiere.

Each unit features a flat-screen TV and a kitchenette equipped with a microwave, a toaster, a coffee machine, a stovetop, as well as a fridge and kettle. Bed linen and towels are provided.

A continental buffet breakfast is served every morning. The residence also has luggage storage in reception, and a laundry room available for an extra charge.

If you are arriving by train, Lyon Part-Dieu Train Station is a 10-minute metro ride from the property. Lyon Saint-Exupéry Airport is a 25-minute drive away. Subject to availability, guests can park onsite for an extra charge.

name: At home in lyon
adresse: 63 Rue de la Villette, 3rd arr., 69003 Lyon, France
description:
Featuring free WiFi, At home in lyon offers aparthotel accommodation in Lyon, a 2-minute walk from Lyon Part-Dieu Train Station. It is 20 minutes from Bellecour Square by metro or bus. The Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon is 2.4 km away.

The studios come with a pull-down bed and feature a flat-screen TV and DVD player. There is a seating and/or dining area in some units. All units feature a kitchenette equipped with a dishwasher and oven. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine. Some studios have a balcony. There is a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer in every unit. Beds are made upon arrival.

Each studio is serviced by a lift.

Tour Part-Dieu is 1 km from At home in lyon, while Institut & Musee Lumiere is 1.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport, 17 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Chromatics & Restaurant Hill Club
adresse: 12 rue Marc Antoine Petit, 2nd arr., 69002 Lyon, France
description:
Hôtel Chromatics & Restaurant Hill Club is located on Lyon’s Presqu’île, a 6-minute walk from Perrache train and metro station. It has an on-site restaurant, as well as a shaded terrace and garden. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

All the guest rooms at the Hôtel Chromatics & Restaurant Hill Club Perrache are air conditioned and have a private bathroom, and flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

A Buffet Breakfast is available daily. Guests can relax with a drink during the evenings in the hotel bar or on the terrace.

Set in the heart of the city, the hotel is 800 metres from Place Carnot and the E15/A6 motorway. The old town and Saint Jean Cathedral are 2.5 km away.  The tramway stop Suchet is 200 metres from the property. The property offers a preferential rate at the public parking, available a 4-minute walk away.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Lyon
description:
Located 300 metres from Part-Dieu Train Station, the hotel features an on-site bar & restaurant with panoramic views of Lyon from the 32nd floor of the iconic Part Dieu Tower. It offers a fitness centre and free WiFi is available throughout the property. Private parking is available on site for an extra charge.

All rooms are air conditioned and provide panoramic views of Lyon. Equipped with a flat-screen TV, they feature a seating area, a private bathroom and a laptop safe.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the Celest Bar & Restaurant. Guests can have lunch or dinner onsite and enjoy the restaurant international and creative cuisine. Guests can also access the restaurant's food shop throughout the day.

Part-Dieu shopping centre is 100 metres away and metro station is 200 metres away. A6, A7, A42 and A43 motorways are all within a 20-minute drive from the hotel. The nearest airport is Lyon – Saint Exupery Airport, 27 km form Radisson Blu Hotel Lyon.

Private parking is available on site for an extra charge and under availability.

name: Les Cocons Montchat
description:
Les Cocons Montchat, a property with a garden, is set in Lyon, 5.6 km from Musée Miniature et Cinéma, 6 km from the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon, as well as 6.8 km from Lyon Perrache Train Station. It is situated 5.1 km from Part-Dieu Train Station and features full-day security. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

Featuring a private bathroom, units at the apartment complex also feature free WiFi.

Fourviere Roman Theatre is 7.1 km from the apartment, while Basilica of Notre-Dame de Fourviere is 7.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport, 24 km from Les Cocons Montchat.

name: Les Bulles de Mona "Le 93" -PROXIMITE GARE DE LYON-
description:
Les Bulles de Mona "Le 93" -PROXIMITE GARE DE LYON- provides a hot tub and spa facilities, as well as air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi in Lyon, 1.2 km from Part-Dieu Train Station. The accommodation has a spa bath. The apartment features family rooms.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with hot tub and a hair dryer. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units come with bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Lyon, like hiking.

Musée Miniature et Cinéma is 4.1 km from Les Bulles de Mona "Le 93" -PROXIMITE GARE DE LYON-, while the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon is 4.6 km away. The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery, 23 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description:
Hotel De Verdun 1882, BW Signature Collection is located in central Lyon on the Presqu’Ile, 450 metres from the Lyon Perrache TGV Train Station. It offers en suite rooms with satellite TV and high-speed WiFi.

Set within a former private mansion dating from 1882, Hotel De Verdun 1882 provides a daily buffet breakfast.

Hotel De Verdun 1882 has a 24-hour front desk and security guard.

Guests have easy access to the city’s many shops and restaurants. Place Bellecour is a 10 minute walk away and Vieux Lyon is 1.5 km from the hotel.

name: Pullman Lyon
adresse: 44 Boulevard Vivier Merle, 3rd arr., 69003 Lyon, France
description:
Situated in Lyon and with Part-Dieu Train Station reachable within 200 metres, Pullman Lyon features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can make use of a bar.

At the hotel, rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room comes with a safety deposit box, while some rooms include a balcony. The rooms have a wardrobe.

A buffet, continental or American breakfast is available each morning at the property.

The Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon is 3.8 km from Pullman Lyon, while Musée Miniature et Cinéma is 4.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport, 32 km from the accommodation.

description:
A recently renovated apartment in Lyon and within 1.7 km of Part-Dieu Train Station, Les Cocons Heritage has a terrace, comfortable allergy-free rooms and free WiFi. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment features family rooms.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Musée Miniature et Cinéma is 4.5 km from the apartment, while the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon is 4.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport, 23 km from Les Cocons Heritage.

description:
In the centre of Lyon, located within a short distance of the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon and Musée Miniature et Cinéma, SWEET LEONE JACUZZI PLACE TERREAUX offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. Well located in the 1st arr. District, this apartment provides a bar, as well as a hot tub. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

This apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom equipped with a hot tub. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Part-Dieu Train Station is 2.9 km from the apartment, while Fourviere Roman Theatre is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery, 35 km from SWEET LEONE JACUZZI PLACE TERREAUX, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description:
Hôtel Charlemagne is located in central Lyon, a 5-minute walk from the Lyon Perrache TGV and Metro stations. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free Wi-Fi internet access.

Each room at the Hôtel Charlemagne is equipped with satellite TV and en suite facilities. Some rooms also have a private balcony.

Breakfast buffet is available daily and the Hôtel Charlemagne’s restaurant, La Bibliothèque, serves regional cuisine. Guests can enjoy a drink at the Le Mélèze bar, which features an outdoor floral terrace.

Place Bellecour is a 20-minute walk from the hotel, and the Notre Dame de Fourvière Basilica is 2 km away. The Suchet tram stop is just 120 metres from the hotel.

Accessible via a lift, all rooms are air-conditioned and offer a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower.

The hotel serves a continental breakfast every morning in the hotel dining room. Guests can relax with a drink in the bar and chose from a variety of room service snacks 24 hours a day.

Hôtel Boutique Richelieu, Lyon Gare Part-Dieu is a 14-minute walk from the Tête d'Or Park, while Cité Internationale and Lyon Convention Centre are a 10-minute drive away. Brotteaux Metro Station is 280 metres from the hotel.

adresse: 35 Quai Charles de Gaulle, 6th arr., 69006 Lyon, France
description:
Residence Montempo Lyon Cite Internationale offers ApartHotel accommodation next to the Parc de la Tête d'Or, in the heart of the Congress Centre area and a 15-minute drive from the centre of Lyon. The Rhône river runs outside the residence and guests can enjoy the sun terrace with views of the park. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

All air-conditioned studios and apartments at the Residence Montempo Lyon Cite Internationale have a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave a dishwasher and a dining area. Each unit has a flat-screen satellite TV and a safety deposit box. All units also have a private bathroom with a shower, toilet and a hairdryer.

Residence Montempo serves a buffet breakfast daily. Guests can enjoy their breakfast in the dining area.

It offers a 24-hour front desk service.

Sights nearby include the Contemporary Art Museum and the Palais des Congrès de Lyon. Lyon Part-Dieu Train Station is 10 minutes away by bus.

name: Hôtel Edmond W Lyon Part-Dieu
adresse: 17, Rue Professeur Weill, 6th arr., 69006 Lyon, France
description:
