The fully renovated rooms feature air conditioning, flat-screen TV, coffee machine and desk. All accommodations include a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning.

A shared terrace is available free of charge between 7am and 10pm.

The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises.

name: Les Bulles de Mona "Le 149" -PROXIMITE GARE DE LYON-
description:
Featuring a spa bath, Les Bulles de Mona "Le 149" -PROXIMITE GARE DE LYON- is set in Lyon. The property features city and inner courtyard views, and is 1.4 km from Part-Dieu Train Station. Guests can access the apartment via private entrance.

The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a microwave, a coffee machine, a hot tub, free toiletries and a desk. Featuring a private bathroom, units at the apartment complex also have free WiFi. At the apartment complex, the units have bed linen and towels.

For those nights when you'd rather not dine out, you can choose to cook in your kitchen.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Lyon, like cycling, hiking and walking tours.

Musée Miniature et Cinéma is 4 km from Les Bulles de Mona "Le 149" -PROXIMITE GARE DE LYON-, while the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon is 4.5 km away. The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery, 23 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Lyon Marriott Hotel Cité Internationale
adresse: 70 Quai Charles de Gaulle, 6th arr., 69006 Lyon, France
description:
Lyon Marriott Hotel Cité Internationale offers air-conditioned rooms beside River Rhone and the Tete d’Or Park. It is housed within the Cite Internationale complex. It boasts a free fitness centre and free WiFi.

Flat-screen TV, a tea and coffee maker and a radio with an MP3 connection are supplied in all rooms. Private bathrooms are equipped with bath, shower, bathrobes and slippers.

A buffet breakfast is available daily. Breakfast can be served in the rooms for an extra charge. Italian dishes, fine cheeses and wines can be enjoyed at Zucca restaurant, which features an outdoor terrace. Activities can be enjoyed by kids in a dedicated room during Sunday brunch.

A bus stop serving the city centre is a short walk away, Lyon city centre is only a 10-minute drive away and the Centre des Congrès is a few steps away. The hotel is a 30-minute drive from Lyon Saint-Exupéry Airport.

name: Lyo Hôtel - Centre Lyon Perrache
adresse: 78 rue de la Charité, 2nd arr., 69002 Lyon, France
description:
Lyo Hôtel - Centre Lyon Perrache is set in Lyon’s Perrache district, 900 metres from Place Bellecour and 500 metres from Ampère – Victor Hugo Metro Station. Guests are invited to use the free WiFi or relax in the lounge area.

The guest rooms at Lyo Hôtel - Centre Lyon Perrache include a flat-screen TV and a work desk. They each feature a private bathroom and a wardrobe and some rooms have a spa bath.

A continental breakfast can be enjoyed every morning in the breakfast area or in the comfort of guest rooms. Shops, cafés and restaurants are found in the surrounding area.

The Basilica of Saint-Martin d’Ainay is 650 metres from the hotel and Perrache Metro Station and Tram Stop is 400 metres away. The property is 450 metres from the A6 motorway and 19 km from Lyon-Bron Airport. The nearest public car park is available for an extra charge, 250 metres away.

name: Résidence Montempô Part Dieu
adresse: 30 Avenue Georges Pompidou, 3rd arr., 69003 Lyon, France
description:
Located in Lyon, Résidence Montempô Lyon Part-Dieu offers fully equipped studios and apartments. It is 400 metres from Lyon Part Dieu Train Station and guests have access to free WiFi.

The studios and apartments have a dining area, a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a desk. The kitchenette includes a microwave, fridge and electric hotplates. There is a private bathroom with a shower.

Breakfast can be delivered to the room each day for an additional charge. It includes a croissant, fresh bread, a yogurt, fruit juice, a hot drink and jams.

Résidence Montempô Lyon Part-Dieu facilities include ironing and laundry for an additional charge.

A variety of cafes and restaurants can be found within a 10-minute walk. For guests arriving by car, private parking is available in the property's garage.

name: Hotel Elysée
adresse: 92 rue Président Edouard Herriot, 2nd arr., 69002 Lyon, France
description:
Hotel Elysée is located in the heart of Lyon city centre, just a few steps from the Place Bellecour. It offers soundproofed accommodation with free WiFi internet access.

This 19th century residence provides en suite guest rooms, equipped with air-conditioning and satellite TV. All rooms are accessible by lift, which begins at the first floor.

A daily breakfast is served in the hotel’s former vaulted cellar. Guests can also enjoy a drink from the bar.

Hotel Elyseé is within easy reach of the city’s many shops, cinemas, museums and gastronomic restaurants.

Bellecour Metro is 100 metres from the Hotel Elysée, offering connections throughout Lyon. Lyon Part Dieu Train Station is 2 km from the hotel.

name: YASI Hostel
description:
Featuring a garden, shared lounge, bar and free WiFi, YASI Hostel is located in Lyon, 1.2 km from Part-Dieu Train Station and 4.1 km from Musée Miniature et Cinéma. The property is around 4.6 km from the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon, 5.3 km from Lyon Perrache Train Station and 5.6 km from Fourviere Roman Theatre. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and a shared kitchen.

At the hostel, each room is fitted with a patio with a garden view. Guest rooms at YASI Hostel include air conditioning and a safety deposit box.

Staff speak English, Spanish and French at the reception.

Basilica of Notre-Dame de Fourviere is 5.9 km from the accommodation, while Musée des Confluences is 7.1 km away. The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport, 23 km from YASI Hostel.

name: B&B HOTEL LYON Centre Perrache Berthelot
description:
Opened in December 2017, B&B HOTEL LYON Centre Perrache Berthelot is situated a 9-minute walk from the nearest public transport station and offers accommodation with free WiFi. Trams, buses and metros make it easy for guests to access Lyon city centre and the Part Dieu station and district. Private covered parking is available onsite for an extra charge.

At the hotel, all the air-conditioned rooms include a desk, a wardrobe, a flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property.

Speaking English and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the reception.

Confluence Museum is a 5-stop tram ride away, while Place Bellecour is within a 20-minute walk.  Halle Tony Garnier conference and concert hall is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport, 30 km from the property.

name: Nemea Appart Hotel So Cloud Lyon Gare Part-Dieu
description:
Situated 3.5 km from Musée Miniature et Cinéma, Nemea Appart Hotel So Cloud Lyon Gare Part-Dieu offers accommodation with a balcony. This 4-star aparthotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a lift. The property is fitted with an indoor pool and is set 500 metres from Part-Dieu Train Station. Facilities for disabled guests are also available.

At the aparthotel, each unit is equipped with a wardrobe. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the aparthotel also have free WiFi. At the aparthotel, the units include a desk and a flat-screen TV.

Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast. There is a coffee shop and lounge.

If you would like to discover the area, walking tours is possible in the surroundings and Nemea Appart Hotel So Cloud Lyon Gare Part-Dieu can arrange a bicycle rental service.

The Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon is 3.9 km from the accommodation, while Lyon Perrache Train Station is 4.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport, 28 km from Nemea Appart Hotel So Cloud Lyon Gare Part-Dieu.

name: Résidence Villemanzy
adresse: 21 Montee St Sebastien, 1st arr., 69001 Lyon, France
description:
Offering views of the Alps and the River Rhône, Résidence Villemanzy is a former convent located Lyon. The Place des Terreaux, Lyon National Opera and the Rhône embankment are all within 650 metres of the property. Free WiFi access is available.

Each room at the Villemanzy has a kitchenette equipped with a dishwasher, microwave and a dining area. There is a cable TV in the rooms.

A breakfast buffet consisting of French pastries, hot drinks, dairy products, cereal, fruit salad and deli meats is available at an additional cost. There is also a garden and a terrace at the property.

Croix Paquet Metro Station is 200 metres away, while Tête d’Or Park is a 20-minute walk from Résidence Villemanzy. Lyon-Perrache Train Station is a 17-minute drive away.

name: Atipik Hôtel
description:
Situated 200 metres from the shores of Lake Annecy, Atipik Hôtel is at the entrance of the medieval old town and pedestrian shopping streets. It offers en suite rooms with free WiFi.

A flat-screen TV with international and TNT channels is provided in all rooms. Each has a private bathroom with a shower.

Enjoy a breakfast buffet as a way to start your day before heading out to visit the surrounding area.

Annecy TGV Train Station is 250 metres from Atipik Hôte.

name: Hôtel des Alpes
adresse: 12 Rue De La Poste, 74000 Annecy, France
description:
The Hôtel des Alpes offers 2-star accommodation a 10-minute walk from Lake Annecy and 100 meters away from the train station. The old city, shops and restaurants are within walking distance.

All units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a desk. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. The hotel has no lift but hotel staff is happy to help guests with their luggage if needed.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at Hôtel des Alpes. Guests can enjoy the onsite bar.

The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 48 km from the property. Public parking is available nearby. It is free from 19:00 to 08:00 and at extra charge during the rest of the day.

name: Allobroges Park Hôtel
description:
Set in Annecy City Centre, this 3-star hotel is located a 10-minute walk from Annecy Chateau. It has a 24-hour reception and offers free WiFi access.

All guest room are soundproofed and air-conditioned. They offer work desk and an LCD TV. Some rooms feature exposed beams. The private bathrooms are fitted with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

The onsite bar is open 24/7 and there is a terrace open during summer.

Lake Annecy is a 10-minute walk from Allobroges Hotel. Private Parking is available upon prior reservation only and subject to availability. Annecy Train Station is 260 metres away.

name: Hôtel du Château
description:
Hotel du Chateau is a hotel situated at the foot of Annecy Castle. It has views over the old town. The reception offers free WiFi.

Guest rooms at the Hotel du Chateau are simply decorated. They are equipped with a private bathroom, a telephone and a TV.

Continental breakfast is served every morning. Guests can enjoy a drink or a packed lunch on the hotel’s panoramic terrace, where a microwave and kitchenware are made available.

Hotel du Chateau is just a 5-minute walk from Lake Annecy. The train station is only a 10-minute walk away.

name: Best Western Plus Hotel Carlton Annecy
description:
Best Western Carlton Annecy is located in central Annecy at the medieval town's gates. Lake Annecy is a 10-minute walk away.

All guest rooms are soundproofed and air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV, a desk and a coffee machine. Every room has a private bathroom while some rooms offer a mountain view.

Guests can relax with a drink in the hotel bar during the evenings. The hotel’s buffet breakfast can be served in the comfort of your room or in the dining room.

A private garage is available upon prior reservation and for an additional fee. The Best Western Carlton Annecy is situated 200 metres from the train station, bus stop and taxi rank.

name: Hôtel du Palais de l'Isle
description:
This hotel is located in the heart of Annency, a few steps from the castle. It offers individually-decorated rooms with views of the canals, the medieval castle or the town.

Each air-conditioned guest-room in the 18th-century building has satellite TV, WiFi internet access and a private bathroom.

The Palais de l’Isle serves a daily buffet breakfast and guests are invited to relax with a drink in the bar. Guests are also able to purchase snack jars.

The Hôtel du Palais de l'Isle is just a few minutes’ walk from Lake Annecy and the cathedral. The property offers discount in the 3 nearby public car parks.

name: Icône Hôtel - Annecy
description:
Located in Annecy city centre, Icône Hôtel- Annecy offers a shared lounge, luggage storage and free WiFi. It is a 10-minunte walk from Lake Annecy and La Clusaz Ski Station is 33 km away.

The rooms feature a city view, a flat-screen TV and a bathroom with a bath or shower. They also offer a desk, a wardrobe and free toiletries. Breakfast in room is available at an extra cost.

Restaurants and shops can be found within 1 km. Annecy train station is 650 metres away. Geneva International Airport is a 40-minute drive from the property.

name: Impérial Palace
description:
Located in the heart of the French Alps, Impérial Palace is a 4-star hotel is on the edge of Lake Annecy, 1.6 km from Annecy's centre. It offers air-conditioned accommodation, a spa and a casino. Free WiFi is provided.

Each guest room at L'Imperial Palace has a minibar and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Most rooms also have a balcony with a view of the lake and surrounding mountains or park. A courtesy tray with tea is available in each room.

The hotel’s gastronomic restaurant, La Voile, provides traditional French cuisine. Meals are served on a shaded terrace overlooking the lake. L'Impérial Palace also has a a more casual restaurant called La Brasserie, a bar, and a lounge where guests can enjoy homemade pastries, snacks and a full buffet breakfast.

The onsite 600 m² spa includes a swimming pool, an experience shower, a sauna, a hammam, an ice fountain, a spa bath and private treatment rooms. Impérial Palace offers also offers a business centre.

Free parking is available on site. Charging stations for electric cars are available at this property. Geneva International Airport is 40 km away and Annecy Train Station is 1.5 km from the hotel. Annecy Château is 2 km away.

name: Le Pélican
description:
Situated in Annecy, 37 km from Rochexpo, Le Pélican features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can make use of a bar.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms have a wardrobe.

Breakfast is available each morning, and includes buffet, continental and gluten-free options.

Bourget Lake is 38 km from Le Pélican, while Stade de Genève is 43 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 43 km from the accommodation.

name: Ace Hotel Annecy
adresse: 8 Boulevard du Semnoz  - Zone d'activités  de Periaz Seynod, 74600 Annecy, France
description:
Offering a 24-hour front desk, Ace Hotel Annecy is located in Seynod. Free WiFi access is available in public areas and the rooms. The property is within 5 km from Lake Annecy and Annecy’s city centre.

Each room here will provide you with a TV, air conditioning and satellite channels. Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include a desk and a wardrobe.

At Ace Hotel Annecy you will find vending machines and a dining room where a breakfast is served each morning. The hotel is in a shopping area and a variety of restaurants can be found within 300 metres.

Facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including skiing, golfing and cycling. Lac d’Annecy Golf Course is a 25-minute drive from the hotel.

Free parking is available on site. Annecy Train Station is 3.4 km away. Public transit to the city centre of Annecy is just 100 metres away, and operates Mon-Sat.

name: Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy
adresse: 33 Avenue du Petit Port, 74000 Annecy, France
description:
Featuring 4-star accommodation, Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy is set in Annecy, 2.1 km from Palais de l Ile and 2.2 km from Chateau d'Annecy. The property is close to several noted attractions, around 1.7 km from Bridge of Love and around 1.8 km from Bonlieu Performing Arts Centre. The property is close to popular attractions like Annecy School of Art, Annecy Town Hall and Annecy Court House.

All guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. The rooms come with air conditioning, and selected rooms also offer a balcony.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property. The hotel features a restaurant open for lunch and diner with a terrace facing the Lake of Annecy.

The property boasts an indoor swimming pool, with sauna, hammam, hot tub and fitness room with free access. Spa massages and yoga session are available at an extra cost.

Guests can find 2 private parking on site (indoor and outdoor) available at an extra cost.

Non-stop information is available at the reception, where staff speak English and French.

Annecy Court House is 2 km from Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy, while Church of St. Francis is 2.1 km from the property. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 37 km away.

name: Séjours & Affaires Annecy Le Pont Neuf
adresse: 8 Rue Du Rond Point - Cran Gévrier, 74960 Annecy, France
description:
The Séjours & Affaires Annecy Le Pont Neuf is located 3 km from Lake Annecy and 1 km from Annecy’s historic centre. It provides access to La Clusaz and Grand-Bornand ski resorts, 45 minutes away by car.

Ideal for both short-term and longer stays, these comfortable apartments include free WiFi and modern amenities. A buffet breakfast is available from Monday to Friday at an additional cost.

The Séjours & Affaires Annecy Le Pont Neuf is located in Cran Gevrier and is near to shops, restaurants and local transport services.

Annecy Train Station is a 15-minute walk away and parking is available for an additional charge. Semnoz Ski Resort is a 30-minute drive away.

name: APPALACHES Annecy Rent Lodge
description:
Set in the centre of Annecy, 37 km from Rochexpo and 37 km from Bourget Lake, APPALACHES Annecy Rent Lodge offers free WiFi, a casino and air conditioning. The property has city views and is 42 km from Stade de Genève and 46 km from Jet d'Eau. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and parking on-site.

The spacious apartment features 4 bedrooms, a TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 3 bathrooms with a bath. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

Gare de Cornavin is 46 km from the apartment, while St. Pierre Cathedral is 46 km away. The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 43 km from APPALACHES Annecy Rent Lodge.

name: Aparthotel Adagio Annecy Centre
adresse: 2 Place Marie Curie (ex- Avenue Berthollet), 74000 Annecy, France
description:
Offering a fitness centre, Aparthotel Adagio Annecy Centre features studios and apartments with free WiFi in central Annecy. It is located 1 km from Lake Annecy, a 3-minute walk from the train station and it has a 24-hour reception.

Each air-conditioned apartment is equipped with a TV with satellite channels. All accommodation feature a seating area and have a private bathroom with a hairdryer. All apartments have a kitchen equipped with a microwave, a fridge and a kettle.

A full buffet breakfast is provided every morning at an additional cost.

With paid private parking on site, the residence is just 500 metres from the castle and the old town. Seynod Theatre is 5 km away.

name: APPENNINS Annecy Rent Lodge
description:
Set in the centre of Annecy, 37 km from Rochexpo and 37 km from Bourget Lake, APPENNINS Annecy Rent Lodge offers free WiFi, a casino and air conditioning. The property features city views and is 42 km from Stade de Genève and 46 km from Jet d'Eau. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and parking on-site.

The 2-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with a TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

Gare de Cornavin is 46 km from the apartment, while St. Pierre Cathedral is 46 km away. The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 43 km from APPENNINS Annecy Rent Lodge.

name: Best Western Hôtel International
description:
Featuring a fitness centre, Best Western Hôtel International is situated at the entrance of Annecy, 2 km from Annecy Lake and city centre. It offers a 24-hour front desk service, an onsite restaurant and a bar. It is 500 metres from the train station and a 4-minute drive to motorway A41.

Each soundproofed room at the Best Western Hôtel International is air-conditioned. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, tea and coffee making facilities, free WiFi access and a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is available in the hotel dining room.

Guests can explore the town, which is only a few minutes' walk from the Old Town, Annecy Cathedral and Château d'Annecy.

Featuring a fitness centre and a wellness area with sauna and steam room,

GChevêne car park is available 200 metres from the hotel and indoor car park of 9 places is available upon reservation.

name: Hôtel Les Muses
description:
Located in Annecy Le Vieux in the French Alps, Hôtel Les Muses is composed of 2 buildings with rooms that overlook Lake Annecy or Mont Veyrier.

Each room at Hôtel Les Muses is equipped with free WiFi access, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom. Some rooms feature a terrace and air conditioning.

A breakfast buffet is served daily. Activities in the surroundings include hiking and water-skiing. The Lake of Annecy is 50 metres away, and the lake's beach is 250 metres from the property.

Free private parking is available on site. Hôtel Les Muses's multilingual staff can provide local tourist information.

name: Hôtel du Nord
description:
Hotel du Nord, is located in the centre of Annecy and offers 2-star accommodation a few minutes from the lake, shops, bars, restaurants and train station. It offers 24/7 reception and free WiFi.

Guest rooms at the Hotel du Nord are all non-smoking and air-conditioned. They come with en suite facilities.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at Hôtel du Nord.

Speaking English, Spanish and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the reception.

There is free overnight parking nearby. The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 35 km from the property.

name: Swan Lake - Design apartment facing Lake Annecy
description:
Offering city views, Swan Lake - Design apartment facing Lake Annecy is an accommodation situated in Annecy, 37 km from Bourget Lake and 38 km from Stade de Genève. This apartment provides free private parking, a lift and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 32 km from Rochexpo.

The spacious apartment comes with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with lake views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Annecy, like golfing.

Jet d'Eau is 42 km from Swan Lake - Design apartment facing Lake Annecy, while Gare de Cornavin is 42 km away. The nearest airport is Geneva International Airport, 42 km from the accommodation.

name: Le Bel Abri
description:
Le Bel Abri is a hotel set in a former family house. It is located a 1-minute walk from Annecy Lake and a 6-minute drive from the city centre of Annecy. A sun terrace and free WiFi are available.

All accessed by a staircase, the rooms include a flat-screen TV, floor heating, air conditioning, soundproofing and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower. Some rooms have a balcony and views of the lake or the mountains. There is a room on the ground floor adapted to people with reduced mobility.

The restaurant's cuisine is inspired by international flavours. A bar is also available on site.

The property is 46 km from Geneva International Airport. Free public parking is available.

name: Les Quais d'Annecy
description:
Offering city views, Les Quais d'Annecy is an accommodation set in Annecy, 36 km from Bourget Lake and 41 km from Stade de Genève. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The property is 400 metres from the city centre and 35 km from Rochexpo.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. Free WiFi is available to all guests, while selected rooms will provide you with a terrace. At the apartment complex, the units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

If you would like to discover the area, hiking is possible in the surroundings and the apartment can arrange a car rental service.

Jet d'Eau is 44 km from Les Quais d'Annecy, while Gare de Cornavin is 44 km away. The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie, 41 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Apparthotel Privilodges Le Royal
description:
Apparthotel Privilodges Le Royal is located 200 metres from Annecy Lake and 350 metres from the Palais de l’Isle Jail in the heart of the old town.  It offers self-catering accommodation with free WiFi.

The air-conditioned studios and apartments at Privilodges Le Royal feature neutral decor. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a seating area are provided in each. Bed linen, towels are included in the price.

The kitchenettes are fully equipped with a fridge/freezer, hot-plates and a microwave oven.  A vacuum cleaner, iron and iron board are available upon request.

 At an additional cost, breakfast can be taken in your apartment and it is served as a buffet. Guests at Privilodges Le Royal Apparthotel also have access to a fitness room and luggage storage.

Annecy TGV Train Station is 650 metres from the hotel. Chateau d’Annecy is 600 metres away through the Old Town. A limited number of private parking spaces are available for an extra charge, upon reservation. Paying public parking is available nearby.

name: Hébé Hotel
description:
New hotel - Opening May 2021.

Hébé Hotel is located in the centre of Annecy, a 10-minute walk from the lake.

The hotel rooms each include a flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom with complimentary toiletries.

A continental breakfast is available each day. Annecy offers an array of bars and restaurants. The closest can be found just 300 metres from the hotel.

The property is located just 250 metres from the train station and bus station. Local sites of interest may include the town hall, St Maurice Church, and Saint-Pierre Cathedral.

name: La feuillette - vieille ville - parking gratuit
description:
In a central area of Annecy, La feuillette - vieille ville - parking gratuit features garden views from the terrace. This apartment offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony. Rochexpo is 36 km from the apartment and Bourget Lake is 37 km away.

With free WiFi, this apartment provides a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and oven. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

Stade de Genève is 42 km from the apartment, while Jet d'Eau is 45 km away. The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 42 km from La feuillette - vieille ville - parking gratuit.

name: Novotel Annecy Centre Atria
adresse: 1, place Marie Curie (1 avenue Bertholet), 74000 Annecy, France
description:
Novotel Annecy Centre Atria is located in central Annecy, a 5-minute walk from the old town, the lake and the Château d'Annecy. It offers free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk.

All guest rooms are soundproofed and air-conditioned. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels including beIN Sports and Canal +. They offer a minibar and tea and coffee making facilities. They feature a seating area and the private bathrooms are fitted with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Novotel Annecy Centre Atria offers a buffet breakfast. Various dining options including European and French dishes are available at The Craic, the in-house restaurant. Guests can also enjoy a drink and light snacks in the hotel bar.

Novotel Annecy Centre Atria also has an indoor play area and a library for children. Bike rental is available.

Annecy TGV Train Station is just 50 metres from the hotel and Lake Annecy is 1 km away. A private garage is available on site for an extra charge.

name: Résidence Lou Cigaloun - ANA LOCATION
description:
Situated just 23 km from Golf du Luberon, Résidence Lou Cigaloun - ANA LOCATION features accommodation in Gréoux-les-Bains with access to a garden, barbecue facilities, as well as a 24-hour front desk. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. This 2-star apartment offers private entrance.

Each unit features a terrace, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a dining area and a flat-screen TV, while the private bathroom includes a shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Gréoux-les-Bains, like cycling, fishing and hiking. If you would like to discover the area, walking tours is possible in the surroundings.

The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 80 km from Résidence Lou Cigaloun - ANA LOCATION.

name: Résidence Les Écureuils
description:
Featuring free bikes, garden and views of pool, Résidence Les Écureuils is situated in Gréoux-les-Bains, 23 km from Golf du Luberon. This property offers access to a terrace, table tennis, free private parking and free WiFi. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a seasonal outdoor pool.

At the apartment complex, each unit includes a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Guests can grab a bite to eat in an outdoor dining area at the apartment.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Gréoux-les-Bains, like cycling, fishing and hiking. A baby safety gate is also available for guests at Résidence Les Écureuils.

The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 81 km from the accommodation.

name: La Clorinde
adresse: chemin du Jas du colombier, 04360 Moustiers-Sainte-Marie, France
description:
Located in the heart of an olive grove, 800m from the village of Moustiers, La Clorinde is ideally situated to discover the Gorges du Verdon (1.5Km) and to appreciate the beauty of the lake of Sainte Croix (3Km) and the lavender fields.

The large, bright, quiet, air-conditioned rooms have a view on the garden and the mountains.

Breakfast (3 formulas), dinner, prepared with local products, will be served on the terrace and will make you appreciate the charms of the Provencal gastronomy.

We propose you, free of charge, a parking and a very powerful Wifi access. A laundry service is also available.

We speak 3 languages: French, English, Spanish

All your requests are welcome. La Clorinde, a haven of peace, will do everything possible to make your stay in Provence an unforgettable experience.

name: Villa Thermae
adresse: 1 Rue des eaux chaudes, 04800 Gréoux-les-Bains, France
description:
Villa Thermae is located in Gréoux-les-Bains. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 23 km from Golf du Luberon.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with mountain views. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the garden views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

The area is popular for cycling and fishing, and bike hire is available at this 3-star apartment. A casino and a baby safety gate are available at the apartment, while guests can also relax in the garden.

The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 90 km from Villa Thermae.

name: Camping La Ferme de Castellane
description:
This campsite is set on the river bank, located in the village of Castellane, within a 5-minute drive of the Verdon Gorge. Free WiFi is provided in public areas and the property has a table tennis table as well as a boules pitch.

A TV with cable channels and a private terrace feature in all the chalets and mobile homes, which have a simple décor with wooden furnishings. The en suite bathrooms are fitted with a shower. Located at the edge of the forest, all accommodation types offer mountain views.

Guests can enjoy a variety of relaxing massages onsite and upon request.

A microwave, fridge and hotplates are included in each kitchenette at Camping La Ferme de Castellane. There are barbecue facilities at the property.  The property has a heated swimming pool as well as unusual accommodation.

Additional services include a laundrette and there is a children’s playground. You can watch Canal+ channels in the TV room, which also has a library or play table football and board games.

The centre of Castellane is 2.3 km from the campsite and the city of Grasse is 65 km away. It is the starting point of the GR4 hiking path and there is a free, private parking available on site.

Unlimited coffee, tea and hot chocolate is served in the morning.

name: Le gite du grand cèdre - proche des gorges du Verdon
adresse: 45 chemin de Roumpe Cuou, 04500 Allemagne-en-Provence, France
description:
Set in Allemagne-en-Provence, Le gite du grand cèdre - proche des gorges du Verdon features accommodation within 44 km of Digne Golf Course. This property offers access to a patio, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 34 km from Golf du Luberon.

The holiday home with a terrace and garden views has 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Guests can take in the ambience of the surroundings from an outdoor dining area. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

There is a garden with a barbecue at this property and guests can go hiking nearby.

The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 101 km from the holiday home.

name: Les Bastides de Chanteraine
description:
Set in Aiguines, Les Bastides de Chanteraine offers accommodation with seating area. This property offers access to a terrace, table tennis, free private parking and free WiFi. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area.

Featuring views of the mountain, all units in the property come with private entrance and a heated pool. The units come with a coffee machine, while selected rooms here will provide you with a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a microwave and a minibar. At the campground, every unit has bed linen and towels.

A family-friendly restaurant, coffee shop and bar can be found on-site.

You can play darts at the campground, and the area is popular for walking tours. Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

The nearest airport is Toulon - Hyeres Airport, 113 km from Les Bastides de Chanteraine.

name: Terres de France - Résidence Côté Provence
description:
Set just 23 km from Golf du Luberon, Terres de France - Résidence Côté Provence provides accommodation in Gréoux-les-Bains with access to a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, a garden, as well as a lift. The holiday park also offers free WiFi, free private parking and facilities for disabled guests.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom, while some feature a terrace or a balcony. A dishwasher, a microwave and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The units at the holiday park feature air conditioning and a wardrobe.

Outdoor play equipment is also available for guests at the holiday park.

The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 90 km from Terres de France - Résidence Côté Provence.

name: La Bastide du Calalou; BW Signature Collection
description:
Bastide Du Calalou is located a 30-minute drive from the Gorges du Verdon and a 20-minute drive from the Sainte-Croix Lake. It features a heated, outdoor swimming pool, a tennis court and elegant guestrooms that overlook the Aups Valley.

Rooms at Bastide Du Calalou are equipped with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms also have a DVD and video player.

A full breakfast buffet is served daily and Bastide’s restaurant serves regional cuisine, prepared with local produce. Guests can enjoy lunch and dinner in the restaurant or on the terrace.

Bastide Du Calalou is close to the village of Tourtour and the black truffle market, which is the third largest in France and open from December to April.

name: B&B Auberge Verdon
adresse: Auberge Verdon La Valdenay, 04120 La Palud sur Verdon, France
description:
Offering a sun terrace and views of the mountain, Auberge Verdon is a B&B situated in La Palud in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur Region, 90 km from Fréjus, at the beginning of the Route des Crètes. Free private parking is available on site.

Rooms have a private bathroom equipped with a shower.

There is a shared lounge at the property.

Guests can enjoy various activities in the surroundings, including cycling and hiking. Grasse is 89 km from AUBERGE VERDON, while Gréoux-les-Bains is 58 km away. The nearest airport is Côte d'Azur Airport, 110 km from the property.

name: Lou Paradou
description:
The Lou Paradou hotel is located in Greoux-les-Bains, by the Verdon River, next to the lavender fields in the heart of the Provence. It is set within a large park and offers a heated, seasonal and heated outdoor pool.

The Lou Paradou offers air-conditioned studios equipped with a kitchenette, free Wi-Fi access in the rooms and a private balcony or terrace. Some studios have a view of the park and air conditioning.

A breakfast serving jams and fruit syrups both homemade is offered. The hotel is just 400 metres from Greoux village pedestrian centre and there is free on-site parking.

Guests can visit the Verdon Gorge, the largest canyon in Europe, the Luberon villages and Haute-Provence hilltop villages. Local leisure activities around Gréoux include hiking, mountain-bike, white-water sports, gliding and rock climbing.

Marseille Provence Airport is situated 80 km from the Hotel and Aix-en-Provence TGV Train Station is 70 km away.

name: Camping RCN Les Collines de Castellane
adresse: Route de Grasse, La Garde , 04120 Castellane, France
description:
Camping RCN Les Collines de Castellane is 20 km from Lac de Castillon and 6.5 km from Castellane, the gateway to the Gorges du Verdon region. It offers a seasonal outdoor swimming pool with slides and massage jets, a restaurant, a pizzeria and a snack bar.

The mobile homes, chalets and luxury tents at Les Collines have an equipped kitchen, a bathroom with a shower and bedrooms equipped with pillows and covers. Each unit has a furnished terrace.

Guests can play boules, basketball, football and volleyball at Camping RCN Les Collines de Castellane and there are outdoor fitness facilities. For an extra fee you can play tennis.

The area is popular for rafting, canyoning and horse riding.

name: Les Canyons du Verdon
description:
Located in Verdon Regional Park, Les Canyons du Verdon features an outdoor swimming pool with sunbeds, a garden and pétanque facilities. Castillon Lake is just 4.5 km away. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Decorated in fresh colours, all rooms feature a private entrance, while some include a balcony, pool views or garden view and a TV. They are complete with an en suite bathroom.

A breakfast buffet is offered at the hotel. Castellane village is conveniently located 250 metres away, allowing easy access to restaurants, bars and shops.

A conference room is available on request. It can accommodate up to 20 people.

Notre-Dame du Roc Chapel is only a 15-minute walk away and Saint-André-les-Alpes is a 20-minute drive from the hotel. Free Wi-Fi access is available in reception and free private parking is possible on site. Free storage for motorbikes is available on site.

name: Mazet Lavande
adresse: Mazet 16 et 23 l'espaî route d'allemagne en provence, 04800 Saint-Martin-de-Brômes, France
description:
Located in Saint-Martin-de-Brômes, Mazet Lavande has accommodation 46 km from Digne Golf Course. This property offers a pool with a view and free private parking. The property is non-smoking and is situated 30 km from Golf du Luberon.

The holiday home has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with mountain views. Guests can take in the ambience of the surroundings from an outdoor dining area. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Guests at the holiday home will be able to enjoy activities in and around Saint-Martin-de-Brômes, like skiing and cycling.

The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 97 km from Mazet Lavande.

name: Camping Calme et Nature
adresse: La colle Sentier du GR4 Les gorges du Verdon, 04120 Castellane, France
description:
This camping site is situated in the heart of the Verdon Gorges, at an altitude of 765 metres and just 2 km from Castellane. Camping Calme et Nature boasts a barbecue and sun terrace. The property is set in the Verdon Natural Regional Park. Free WiFi is available.

All units feature a seating and dining area. There is a kitchenette, fitted with a microwave and refrigerator. A stovetop and coffee machine are also available. Each unit comes with a private bathroom with a shower.

Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar and play table tennis at the property. Free use of bicycles is available. Guests can access the village of Castellane via the GR4 hiking trail, by foot or by bike.

Grasse is 66 km from Camping Calme et Nature, while Gréoux-les-Bains is 77 km away. The nearest airport is Côte d'Azur Airport, 86 km from Calme et Nature.

name: Gabrielle hôtel
description:
Located in the heart of Verdon National Park, Gabrielle hôtel is situated in the village of Aiguines. It overlooks Sainte Croix Lake, where you can go canoeing or rent pedal boats.

All rooms have an en-suite bathroom with a hairdryer, TV and electric blinds.

A continental breakfast is served every morning.

Gabrielle hôtel is surrounded by many hiking trails and guests can enjoy cycling, windsurfing or visit the vineyards of Provence.

name: Le Petit Grillo - Gite proche des gorges du Verdon
description:
Set in Allemagne-en-Provence in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur region, Le Petit Grillo - Gite proche des gorges du Verdon has a garden. The air-conditioned accommodation is 35 km from Golf du Luberon, and guests can benefit from private parking available on site and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 45 km from Digne Golf Course.

The apartment with a terrace and mountain views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. This apartment also provides guests with a patio that doubles up as an outdoor dining area. The apartment offers bed linen, towels and laundry service.

A coffee shop can be found on-site, and in the warmer months you can make use of the barbecue facilities.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Allemagne-en-Provence, like bike tours. Snorkelling, hiking and walking tours are possible within the area, and a casino is available on-site.

The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 102 km from Le Petit Grillo - Gite proche des gorges du Verdon.

name: Hôtel Le Colombier
description:
Located 1 km from Moustiers-Sainte-Marie village centre, Le Colombier is just 5 km from Sainte-Croix Lake. This Provencal house features a swim spa, 2 hot tubs and tennis court. Free WiFi is provided.

Le Colombier offers air-conditioned rooms with panoramic views of the valley or Moustiers rocks. Decorated with Provencal-style furniture, they each have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The Colombier provides free private parking and a garage for cars, bicycles and motorcycles. Local leisure activities nearby include rafting, paragliding and canyoning.

name: CASA AUGUSTA
adresse: 61 D Route de Puimoisson, 04500 Riez, France
description:
Boasting pool with a view and views of pool, CASA AUGUSTA is a recently renovated homestay situated in Riez, 35 km from Digne Golf Course. With city views, this accommodation features a balcony. Rooms are fitted with a terrace with garden views.

All units in the homestay are equipped with a coffee machine. With a private bathroom fitted with a walk-in shower and free toiletries, units at the homestay also boast free WiFi. At the homestay, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

Golf du Luberon is 42 km from the homestay. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 109 km from CASA AUGUSTA.

name: Auberge des Salles
adresse: 18 Rue St Catherine, 83630 Les Salles-sur-Verdon, France
description:
Situated in Les Salles-sur-Verdon, Auberge des Salles features a terrace with panoramic views of Lake de Sainte-Croix and the surrounding Verdon Natural Park. Hiking, fishing, and swimming are within 10 minutes' walk of the property.

Rooms have a flat-screen TV with cable channels and private bathrooms with either a bath or shower and a toilet. Some rooms have balconies with lake views and other rooms overlook the village and surrounding hills. A kettle is available upon request subject to availability.

The restaurant has a panoramic terrace on the lake of Sainte-Croix serving dinner everyday.

A buffet breakfast with hot drinks, orange juice, croissants, fresh bread with jams, honey and butter is served daily for a supplement. There is a bar on site.

The entrance to the Verdon Gorge is 6 km away and the village of Moustiers-Sainte-Marie is a 20-minute drive away. Les Arcs-Draguignan Train Station is 55 km away and the Hyeres Airport is 115 km away. Free private parking and free WiFi are available at the property.

name: Ferme de Bourras
adresse: Camping Bourras, 04120 La Palud sur Verdon, France
description:
Set in La Palud sur Verdon, Ferme de Bourras features accommodation with free WiFi and seating area.

Opening to a terrace with mountain views, all units are fitted with a kitchen with a toaster and a fridge. A stovetop is also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle.

The camping offers a barbecue.

Cycling can be enjoyed nearby.

Verdon Gorge is 7 km from Ferme de Bourras. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 108 km from the accommodation.

name: La Ferme Rose-Hôtel de Charme
adresse: La Ferme Rose, Chemin de Peyrengue, 04360 Moustiers-Sainte-Marie, France
description:
Located 1 km from Moustiers-Sainte-Marie, this hotel has a large collection of objects from the 1950's and paintings by Maurice Vagh-Weinmann. It also offers a seasonal outdoor pool and a furnished terrace.

Each air-conditioned and soundproofed room is individually decorated and has free Wi-Fi access, a TV and a private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony and views over the valley or the garden.

A continental breakfast is served daily. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar or on 1 of the 2 terraces with views of the garden.

Activities in the nearby area include cycling, hiking and paragliding. Nautical activities and fishing is possible by Lac de Sainte-Croix, 5 km from the hotel. Les Gorges du Verdon is also 5 km away.

name: Camping Notre Dame
adresse: D 952-Route des Gorges du Verdon, 04120 Castellane, France
description:
This family-run camping ground is situated just 600 metres from the centre of Castellane. Guests are free to relax under the lime trees or use the BBQ facilities in the garden.

Camping Notre Dame proposes mobile homes with a private patio, a lounge area and a kitchenette. They each have an en suite bathroom and both bed linen and towels are available to rent.

Pizzas can be delivered upon request and there is a small on-site grocery store. Laundry and ironing facilities are available and the property offers free Wi-Fi in public areas.

Lawn bowls and table tennis can be played on site and a children’s playground is presented. A public swimming pool is just 800 metres away.

Free on-site parking is possible and the camping is set in Verdon Regional Nature Park. Lac de Castillon is 5 km away and the Verdon River is 300 metres away, where you can go canoeing.

name: Studi-Hôtel Résidence Plein Voile
adresse: Place Sainte Anne, 83630 Les Salles-sur-Verdon, France
description:
Located in Les-Salles-sur-Verdon, Studi-Hôtel Résidence Plein Voile is just 200 metres from Sainte-Croix Lake and offers a garden and terrace. The Gorges du Verdon are 10 km away.

Decorated in a simple style, all rooms feature a wardrobe and private bathroom with free toiletries, while some also offer a balcony and views of the lake. Guest have access to the refrigerator.

A continental breakfast can be served each morning at Résidence Plein Voile. A bar, pizzeria and restaurant are conveniently situated just 50 metres from the property.

Watersports activities can be found 200 metres away at the lake and Moustiers Sainte-Marie is 12 km away. Free Wi-Fi access is available in the public areas and free public parking is possible at a location nearby.

name: Clos Augusta 2
description:
Set in Riez in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur region, Clos Augusta 2 features a garden. Featuring free private parking, the 3-star apartment is 35 km from Digne Golf Course. The property is non-smoking and is situated 42 km from Golf du Luberon.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and garden views has 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a bath. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 109 km from the apartment.

name: Hotel Reine Mathilde
description:
Hotel Reine Mathilde is situated in the medieval district, just 300 metres from the Bayeux Tapestry Museum. It offers free Wi-Fi access and modern guest rooms with private bathrooms.

The guest rooms are decorated in warm, neutral colours. Each has a TV and a work desk. The private bathroom provides a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served daily. The restaurant, Le Garde Manger, offers continuous service throughout the day. Guests can enjoy a varied selection of traditional dishes in the dining room or on the south-facing terrace.

Omaha Beach Memorial Museum is 24 km from Hotel Reine Mathilde. The American Museum is 19 km away.

name: Hotel Le Lion D'Or et Restaurant La Table Du Lion
description:
This former 18th-century post office is now a charming hotel located in one of Bayeux’s oldest quarters. It offers 24-hour reception and is just 400 metres from the Bayeux Tapestry Museum.

Free Wi-Fi access is provided in each soundproofed room. All rooms are light and spacious and have their own bathroom with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning. The hotel’s restaurant serves creative French cuisine. After dinner, guests can relax with a drink of Calvados and listen to some music by the fireplace in the lounge bar.

The staff at Le Lion D’or can help arrange local excursions through their concierge service. Massage treatments can be arranged near the property upon request.

name: Le Castel Guesthouse
description:
Le Castel is a guesthouse located in the centre of the medieval city of Bayeux between the station, the Cathedral and the Tapestry Museum.

Accommodation is housed in a 1937 Art Deco villa and includes comfortable rooms in a contemporary baroque-style atmosphere. The style of the rooms and the furniture will take you back to the 1930s.

Rooms include satellite TV and en suite facilities. Free Wi-Fi access is available in the guests lounge.

Le Castel offers a peaceful setting in the heart of the town, close to sites, shops and quality restaurants.

name: Gites les Pourquoi Pas - Résidence de Tourisme DSV Bayeux
description:
A recently renovated property, Gites les Pourquoi Pas - Résidence de Tourisme DSV Bayeux is located in Bayeux near Baron Gerard Museum, Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Cathedrale Notre Dame de Bayeux is 500 metres away.

Each unit is equipped with a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine. The units include bed linen.

German Battery of D-Day is 8 km from the apartment, while D-Day Museum is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Caen–Carpiquet Airport, 29 km from Gites les Pourquoi Pas - Résidence de Tourisme DSV Bayeux.

name: Le Petit Matin
adresse: 9 rue des terres - Place Charles de Gaulle, 14400 Bayeux, France
description:
This guest house is set in a building from the 18th century in Bayeux’s historical district. Le Petit Matin offers a garden, a furnished terrace. The spacious, soundproofed rooms have a private bathroom.

The heated guest rooms feature elegant furniture and wooden floors. Some offer a view of the Charles de Gaulle Square or the garden.

A traditional breakfast including homemade cakes is offered every morning and jams. Guests can also request a packed lunch.

Notre Dame de Bayeux Cathedral is 500 metres away and the Bayeux Tapestry is a 8-minute walk from the guest house. Le Petit Matin is also an ideal base for visiting the WWII D-Day landing beaches which are 9 km away. Omaha Beach is 10 km from the guest house.

name: Manoir Sainte Victoire
adresse: 32 Rue de la Juridiction, 14400 Bayeux, France
description:
Featuring a garden and views of city, Manoir Sainte Victoire is a bed and breakfast situated in a historic building in Bayeux, 200 metres from Baron Gerard Museum. There is a private entrance at the bed and breakfast for the convenience of those who stay. The bed and breakfast offers garden views, a sun terrace, and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The units come with tiled floors and feature a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the bed and breakfast, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Cathedrale Notre Dame de Bayeux is 200 metres from the bed and breakfast, while Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry is 600 metres away. The nearest airport is Caen–Carpiquet Airport, 27 km from Manoir Sainte Victoire.

name: Clos de Bellefontaine B&B
description:
Set in a 2000m² park, this 19th-century house is just 200 metres from the Bayeux Tapestry. You can admire the views of the garden from your elegant room or visit Omaha Beach, 6 km away.

A desk, an en suite bathroom and a wardrobe are provided in the rooms at Clos de Bellefontaine. You will also have access to tea and coffee making facilities in the communal lounge.

Breakfast is served every morning in the dining room or on the south-facing terrace. Additional facilities include free Wi-Fi in public areas and free use of the property’s laptop in the lounge.

Free private parking is available on site and bicycle rental is possible near the property. The centre of Bayeux and the train station are a 5-minute walk away.

name: ibis budget Bayeux
adresse: Zone d'Activité de Nonant, rue des Longues Haies, 14400 Bayeux, France
description:
Between Caen and Cherbourg, near the exit 36 on the N13 motorway, Hotel ibis budget Bayeux is just 13 km to the D-Day landing beaches. It offers 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi Internet access.

Guest rooms are soundproofed and equipped with satellite TV. All rooms are serviced by a lift and have their own bathroom with shower.

For your safety, breakfast and dinner are served in guest room. Snacks and drinks are available from the vending machines. Guests also have access to a free online newspapers and magazine service at Ibis Budget Bayeux.

Free private parking is provided on site making this hotel an ideal base for those exploring Normandy by car. The American cemetery is 30 km from the property and the Bayeux Tapestry Museum is an 8-minute drive away.

name: Domaine de Bayeux
description:
Located in the centre of Bayeux, the Domaine de Bayeux is set in an 18th century house featuring a tree-lined park. There are guest rooms in the main building and a further 11 air-conditioned designer bedrooms available in the extension of the orchard, each with private terrace or balcony.

Featuring a unique decor, the rooms will provide you with an LCD TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

A local breakfast is prepared daily at this property, and is served in the bright dining room featuring a chandelier.

With free parking, this hotel is 300 metres from Museum of Bayeux Tapestry, 600 metres from Baron Gerard Museum and 900 metres from Notre Dame de Bayeux Cathedral. The property is just a 5-minute walk from Bayeux Train Station.

name: La Maison de Mathilde
description:
La Maison de Mathilde is set in Bayeux, 100 metres from Baron Gerard Museum and 200 metres from Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry. The guest house, dating back to the Middle Ages, features a sun terrace with views of the garden.

All rooms include a flat-screen TV and some rooms offer views of the Cathedral of Bayeux. A terrace or patio are featured in certain rooms. Extras include free toiletries and a hair dryer.

There is luggage storage space at the property. Guests can enjoy lunch or dinner at a restaurant located across the street from the hotel.

The guest house also offers bike hire and is 10 km from Port-en-Bessin. The Cathedral of Bayeux is 300 metres from La Maison de Mathilde, while Museum of the Battle of Normandy is 800 metres away.

name: Hôtel Le Bayeux
description:
Hotel Le Bayeux is located in the historic centre of Bayeux in the Lower Normandy region. It offers en suite accommodation with free Wi-Fi internet access.

Rooms at Hotel Le Bayeux are equipped with a flat-screen TV, telephone and work desk. There are also family rooms that can accommodate 4 to 5 guests.

A buffet breakfast is served daily at the hotel and vending machines are also at the disposal of guests. Additional services at Le Bayeux include a laundry service, daily international newspapers in the hotel lobby and a shuttle service for excursions and airport transfers which is available on demand.

The hotel is a 10-minute walk from Bayeux Train Station. The Bayeux Tapestry Museum is 350 metres from the hotel and Notre-Dame Cathedral is 550 metres away. Bayeux is located 10 km from the D-Day beaches.

name: Au cœur du centre historique
description:
Offering city views, Au cœur du centre historique is an accommodation located in Bayeux, 300 metres from Baron Gerard Museum and 600 metres from Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry. Featuring bicycle parking, this property also provides guests with a bowling alley. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Cathedrale Notre Dame de Bayeux is 500 metres away.

The 1-bedroom apartment comes with a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Bayeux, like fishing, hiking and walking tours. Horse riding, diving and cycling are possible within the area, and a water park is available on-site.

German Battery of D-Day is 9.3 km from Au cœur du centre historique, while D-Day Museum is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Caen–Carpiquet Airport, 27 km from the accommodation.

name: Château de Bellefontaine - Teritoria
description:
Located 800 metres from central Bayeux and its cathedral, this 18th-century mansion offers guest rooms and a traditional restaurant open for dinner upon reservation. The park has a tennis court and a pond, and is planted with 200-year-old trees.

Each room is individually decorated and feature a minibar, free WiFi access and a flat-screen TV. The bathrooms include a hairdryer, free toiletries and a bath or a shower. Some rooms have a seating area.

Enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning at the Château de Bellefontaine - Teritoria. A continental breakfast can also be delivered to your room at a reduced rate. After breakfast, you can use the computer with internet access in the lounge, which also features a fireplace.

Bayeux Train Station is 1 km from the hotel and free public parking is available on site.

name: Churchill Hotel Bayeux Centre
description:
Situated on a pedestrian street in the heart of the historic centre, this hotel is just 400 metres from the Bayeux Tapestry Museum. It offers 24-hour reception, an on-site bar and a gift shop with gourmet products from the region.

The guest rooms have a flat-screen TV with international channels. Each has free WiFi, air conditioning and a private bathroom.

A continental breakfast is available every morning. Guests can also sample dishes from a range of cafes and restaurants in the streets surrounding the hotel.

Staff are available to help with tours and other sight-seeing suggestions. Departure for the D-Day beach tour is just behind the hotel. Omaha Beach is 25 km away.

name: Château Saint Gilles
adresse: 80, rue de la Mairie, Guéron, 14400 Bayeux, France
description:
Situated in Bayeux, 4.6 km from Baron Gerard Museum, Château Saint Gilles features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service. The hotel has a terrace and garden views, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a TV and a private bathroom with a shower.

Guests at Château Saint Gilles can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

You can play table tennis at the accommodation, and bike hire is available.

Cathedrale Notre Dame de Bayeux is 4.7 km from Château Saint Gilles, while Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry is 4.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Caen–Carpiquet, 29 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hôtel Le Saint Patrice
description:
Featuring 2-star accommodation, Hôtel Le Saint Patrice is situated in Bayeux, 800 metres from Baron Gerard Museum and 1.2 km from Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry. The property is around 8.5 km from German Battery of D-Day, 11 km from D-Day Museum and 12 km from Arromanches 360. The property is non-smoking and is set 400 metres from Cathedrale Notre Dame de Bayeux.

At the hotel, every room includes a desk. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Hôtel Le Saint Patrice also provide guests with free WiFi, while certain rooms will provide you with a city view. The units in the accommodation are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

Omaha Beach Memorial Museum is 20 km from Hôtel Le Saint Patrice, while Omaha Beach is 20 km away. The nearest airport is Caen–Carpiquet Airport, 28 km from the hotel.

name: Villa Des Ursulines
description:
Located in Bayeux, Villa Des Ursulines is 100 metres from Baron Gerard Museum. Cathedrale Notre Dame de Bayeux is 200 metres from the property. Free WiFi is offered .

All units feature a seating area. All units have a kitchenette fitted with a microwave and toaster. A fridge and coffee machine are also available. Each unit comes with a private bathroom with free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are provided.

Villa Des Ursulines also includes a terrace. The property also offers grocery delivery and packed lunches. Breakfast featuring a hot drink, fruit juice, a pastry and bread is available 150 metres from the property.

Bike hire is available at the property and the area is popular for windsurfing and cycling. Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry is 400 metres from Villa Des Ursulines, while Museum of the Battle of Normandy is 600 metres away. The nearest airport is Deauville – Normandie Airport, 59 km from Villa Des Ursulines.

name: Au Loup Historic Apartments
description:
Located 550 metres of Cathedrale Notre Dame de Bayeux and a 10-minute walk of Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry in Bayeux, Au Loup Historic Apartments offers accommodation with free WiFi, a seating area, a flat-screen TV and a kitchen.

Each unit has an oven, microwave, a coffee machine, as well as a fridge and kettle. There is a private bathroom with shower in all units, along with free toiletries and a hair dryer.

Baron Gerard Museum is 500 metres from the aparthotel. The nearest airport is Deauville - Normandie Airport, 88 km from Au Loup Historic Apartments.

name: Chambre d'hôtes Logis de Saint Jean
description:
Located in the historic centre of Bayeux, just 350 metres from the tapestry museum, Chambre d'hôtes Logis de Saint Jean offers a courtyard with an outdoor seating area and a communal living room. The cathedral is a 5-minute walk away. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

With direct access to the courtyard, all rooms feature a flat-screen TV, seating area and tea and coffee making facilities. The en suite bathroom includes a bathtub or a shower.

A breakfast including pastries, bread, homemade cake, fresh fruit, fruit juice and homemade jam is provided each morning.

The train station is ideally located 800 metres away and Omaha Beach is 15 km from the property. Free Wi-Fi access is available in the breakfast room and free public parking is possible on the street at a location nearby.

name: Le Clos de la Chapelle Bayeux
description:
Located in Bayeux, 300 metres from Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry, Le Clos de la Chapelle Bayeux features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and concierge services. It is situated 400 metres from Baron Gerard Museum and offers private check-in and check-out. D-Day Museum is 10 km from the guest house and Arromanches 360 is 11 km away.

The units at the guest house are equipped with a seating area. The guest house provides certain units that include a terrace and city view, and all units include a private bathroom and a desk. At the guest house, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

An à la carte, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Dining options are available close to the guest house.

Cathedrale Notre Dame de Bayeux is 500 metres from Le Clos de la Chapelle Bayeux, while German Battery of D-Day is 8.5 km away. The nearest airport is Caen–Carpiquet Airport, 27 km from the accommodation.

name: Apt cosy centre ville Bayeux avec terrasse ou extérieur proche plages du débarquement
description:
Apt cosy centre ville Bayeux avec terrasse ou extérieur proche plages du débarquement offers self-catering apartments in the centre of Bayeux. Wi-Fi is available throughout the apartments, and shops, restaurants and grocers can be found 200 metres from the property.

The apartments at Apt cosy centre ville Bayeux avec terrasse ou extérieur proche plages du débarquement feature a living room with a kitchen or kitchenette area, a TV, access to a shared garden and en suite facilities. A washing machine and clothes dryer are also at guests’ disposal.

The kitchen or kitchenette includes a dining area, dishwasher, refrigerator, stove and microwave. Kitchenware and outdoor furniture are also provided.

Apt cosy centre ville Bayeux avec terrasse ou extérieur proche plages du débarquement is 3 km from Bayeux Train Station, the D-day Beaches are 10 km away, and free public parking is possible nearby on site.

name: LE LAVOIR Classé 5***** BAYEUX Centre 9 Personnes
description:
Located in Bayeux, near Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry and Baron Gerard Museum, the historic LE LAVOIR Classé 5***** BAYEUX Centre 9 Personnes has a garden. Private parking is available on site at this recently renovated property. Providing free WiFi throughout the property, the allergy-free villa features a hot tub.

The spacious villa is equipped with 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with river views. The air-conditioned unit at the property features a walk-in shower and a dressing room. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Guests at the villa will be able to enjoy activities in and around Bayeux, like hiking and walking tours.

Cathedrale Notre Dame de Bayeux is less than 1 km from LE LAVOIR Classé 5***** BAYEUX Centre 9 Personnes, while German Battery of D-Day is 8.9 km away. The nearest airport is Caen–Carpiquet Airport, 27 km from the accommodation.

name: Le P'tit Croissant
description:
Set in Bayeux, 300 metres from Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry and 400 metres from Baron Gerard Museum, Le P'tit Croissant offers city views and free WiFi. The property is situated 8.7 km from German Battery of D-Day, 10 km from D-Day Museum and 11 km from Arromanches 360. The property is non-smoking and is located 600 metres from Cathedrale Notre Dame de Bayeux.

The 1-bedroom apartment comes with a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Juno Beach Centre is 21 km from the apartment, while Omaha Beach Memorial Museum is 21 km away. The nearest airport is Caen–Carpiquet Airport, 27 km from Le P'tit Croissant.

name: Hôtel De Brunville & Spa
description:
Just 400 metres from Bayeux Cathedral, this hotel offers an outdoor heated pool, a jacuzzi and a sauna which are accessible all year round. It is ideally located in the centre of Bayeux, near the Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry, and few kilometers away from the D-Day's beaches.

Rooms at the Hôtel de Brunville & Spa are comfortable and well-equipped with modern amenities.
A continental buffet breakfast is available every morning at Hôtel De Brunville & Spa. Fresh, regional products are served in the hotel’s restaurant and guests can enjoy drinks in the bar, or by the pool.

The Spa du Grand Luxembourg, located in an indoor 200 m² space, is the result of our quest for the very best in well-being treatments and equipment.

Come and discover our new offer, unique in Bayeux: jacuzzi, sauna, hammam, 4-season sensory shower, ice fountain, salt cave with infrared deckchairs and PHYTOMER treatments.
The indoor wellness area and treatments are available on reservation.

A limited number of paid parking spaces are available

Bayeux Tapestry Museum is 650 metres from Hôtel De Brunville & Spa. Bayeux Train Station is 1.3 km away.

name: Belle Normandy
description:
Featuring a garden and views of garden, Belle Normandy is a recently renovated bed and breakfast located in Bayeux, 600 metres from Cathedrale Notre Dame de Bayeux. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

Fitted with a terrace, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and free toiletries. At the bed and breakfast, all units are allergy-free. At the bed and breakfast, all units include bed linen and towels.

A bar can be found on-site.

Guests at the bed and breakfast will be able to enjoy activities in and around Bayeux, like walking tours.

Baron Gerard Museum is 400 metres from Belle Normandy, while Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry is 700 metres away. The nearest airport is Caen–Carpiquet Airport, 28 km from the accommodation.

name: Rouen hypercentre appartement T2
description:
Rouen hypercentre appartement T2 in Rouen provides accommodation with free WiFi, less than 1 km from Gare de Rouen Rive Droite, 3.3 km from Rouen Kindarena Sports Hall and 3.9 km from Voltaire Station, Rouen. name: Le Clos Fleuri
description:
Le Clos Fleuri is a renovated 19th-century holiday home located in Hameau de Sucre in Caumont, 11 km from Saint-Girons. The house has a private entrance and a garden with a furnished terrace. The property offers free parking.

On the ground floor you will find a living room and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a fireplace. There is also a double bedroom and a bathroom with a shower and a separate toilet on the ground floor. Two additional bedrooms can be found upstairs. Bed linen and towels are included.

An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including cycling and hiking. Saint-Lizier Gallo-Roman and episcopal  city can be visited just 10 km away and Mas d'Azil Prehistoric Caves can be explored 35 km from the property.

Supermarkets and a number of shops and restaurants can be found within 6 km of the property. Salies-du-Salat thermal baths centre, casino and golf course are located 13 km away.

name: STUDIOS MAGUI
description:
Offering a casino and mountain view, STUDIOS MAGUI is situated in Ax-les-Thermes, 48 km from Meritxell sanctuary and 24 km from Talc Career of Trimouns. Housed in a building dating from 1920, this apartment is 25 km from Grotte de Lombrives and 45 km from Fountain Fontestorbes. The apartment features quiet street views, a sun terrace, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available.

All units in the apartment complex are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Every unit is equipped with a coffee machine and a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, while certain rooms come with a fully equipped kitchen. The units will provide guests with an oven.

For guests with children, the apartment offers a children's playground. A ski equipment rental service, a ski pass sales point and ski storage space are all available at STUDIOS MAGUI, and guests can go skiing in the surroundings.

The nearest airport is Andorra–La Seu d'Urgell Airport, 80 km from the accommodation.

name: Malepère
adresse: Hameau de Montcabirol, 09500 La Bastide-de-Bousignac, France
description:
Boasting garden views, Malepère features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, a garden and barbecue facilities, around 19 km from Buffalo Farm. It is situated 30 km from Fountain Fontestorbes and provides bicycle parking. There is a sun terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi and free private parking.

The holiday home with a balcony and pool views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a bath. Guests can take in the ambience of the surroundings from an outdoor dining area or keep themselves warm by the fireplace on colder days. The holiday home offers bed linen, towels and laundry service.

You can play table tennis at the holiday home, and the area is popular for skiing and cycling. Malepère features a children's playground and a picnic area.

Montsegur Castle is 32 km from the accommodation, while Museum of Montségur is 33 km from the property. The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 47 km from Malepère.

name: Le Pidro - A family house with private stream and woodland
description:
Located in Castelnau-Durban, in a historic building, 19 km from Col de la Crouzette, Le Pidro - A family house with private stream and woodland is a holiday home with a garden and barbecue facilities. With garden views, this accommodation provides a patio. There is a picnic area and guests can make use of free WiFi, free private parking and an electric vehicle charging station.

The spacious holiday home with a terrace and river views features 3 bedrooms, 2 living rooms, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the holiday home. There is also a seating area and a fireplace.

A bicycle rental service is available at the holiday home.

Ariege Golf Club is 17 km from Le Pidro - A family house with private stream and woodland, while Chruch of Saint Lizier is 22 km away. The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 101 km from the accommodation.

name: La Caminada Vielha
description:
Offering a shared lounge and mountain view, La Caminada Vielha is situated in Montaillou, 29 km from Fountain Fontestorbes and 33 km from Talc Career of Trimouns. It is set 40 km from Grotte de Lombrives and offers a housekeeping service. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area.

At the bed and breakfast, each unit is fitted with a wardrobe. Units include a kettle, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms also boast a terrace and some have garden views. At the bed and breakfast, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

For visitors looking to embark on day trips to nearby landmarks, the bed and breakfast features a selection of packed lunches.

Skiing, cycling and hiking are possible within the area, and La Caminada Vielha offers ski storage space.

Museum of Montségur is 40 km from the accommodation, while Montsegur Castle is 41 km from the property. The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 91 km from La Caminada Vielha.

name: Villa la Renaissance
description:
Villa la Renaissance offers rooms in Bayonne, 600 metres from Ansot Park and 1.2 km from Saint Marie Cathedral. Featuring room service, this property also provides guests with a terrace. Guyenne et Gascogne Headquarters is 700 metres from the hotel and Musee Bonnat-Helleu, Museum of Fine Arts Bayonne is 1.1 km away.

Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. Every room has a desk and a flat-screen TV, and some units at Villa la Renaissance have a balcony. All guest rooms have a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at the property.
