Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Bayonne Town Hall, Jardin Botanique and Pyrenees Atlantiques Prefecture. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 5 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Villa KOEGUI Bayonne
description:
Hôtel Villa KOEGUI Bayonne has a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and shared lounge in Bayonne. This property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel all rooms have a wardrobe and a private bathroom.

Buffet and American breakfast options are available every morning at Hôtel Villa KOEGUI Bayonne.

The accommodation offers a sauna. Guests at Hôtel Villa KOEGUI Bayonne will be able to enjoy activities in and around Bayonne, like hiking and cycling.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Saint Marie Cathedral, Ansot Park and Musee Bonnat-Helleu, Museum of Fine Arts Bayonne. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 7 km from Hôtel Villa KOEGUI Bayonne.

name: Boutique Hôtel Un Appart en Ville
description:
Offering quiet street views, Boutique Hôtel Un Appart en Ville is an accommodation situated in Bayonne, 12 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station and 22 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station. This 3-star apartment offers a lift and free shuttle service. The apartment features city views, a sun terrace, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

All units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A dishwasher, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment, while hiking can be enjoyed nearby.

Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church is 22 km from Boutique Hôtel Un Appart en Ville, while Hendaye Train Station is 36 km from the property. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 5 km from the accommodation.

name: Maison d'hôtes City Break MIRADOUR
description:
Set within 12 km of Biarritz La Négresse Train Station and 22 km of Saint Jean de Luz Train Station in Bayonne, Maison d'hôtes City Break MIRADOUR offers accommodation with seating area. Among the facilities at this property are a concierge service and a housekeeping service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area.

At the bed and breakfast, the units are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A fridge is also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The units feature a safety deposit box.

A selection of options including fruits and juice is served for the continental breakfast.

Guests at the bed and breakfast will be able to enjoy activities in and around Bayonne, like hiking and walking tours.

Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church is 23 km from Maison d'hôtes City Break MIRADOUR, while Hendaye Train Station is 36 km away. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 5 km from the accommodation.

name: Parc 709 Bayonne
description:
Offering quiet street views, Parc 709 Bayonne is an accommodation situated in Bayonne, 22 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station and 22 km from Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 12 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station.

The apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with river views. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the city views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Hendaye Train Station is 35 km from the apartment, while FICOBA is 36 km away. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 6 km from Parc 709 Bayonne.

name: Okko Hotels Bayonne Centre
description:
Set in Bayonne, just 700 metres from the city centre and Ste Marie Cathedral, Okko Hotels Bayonne Centre features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking is available on site at an extra cost and subject to availability.

All the rooms have a flat-screen TV and a coffee machine. A hairdryer and free toiletries are provided in the private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Soft drinks are also included throughout the day free of charge in the lounge.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Okko Hotels Bayonne Centre also has a Club Area set on the top floor with panoramic views of the city, Adour River and Rhune Mountain.

Bayonne Arenes Bullring is 600 metres away and Ansot Park just 1.6 km away. Okko Hotels Bayonne Centre L’Okko is located 5 km from the Ocean beaches. The nearest airport is Biarritz - Anglet - Bayonne Airport, 4 km from the property.

name: ibis budget Bayonne
adresse: 6 avenue du Grand Basque, 64100 Bayonne, France
description:
Located 2 km from Bayonne historic centre and train station, and 8 km from the beaches, ibis budget Bayonne has a 24-hour front desk, free Wi-Fi and free parking.

The air-conditioned rooms all have a private shower room. Pets are welcomed at the property yet an additional fee of 10 EUR per animal per night will apply.

There is a Courtepaille Restaurant on site offering traditional food and a grill on the terrace. A continental breakfast can be served in the breakfast room or on the terrace and includes pastries, fruit juice, brioche, cake, yogurts, compote, cheese and hot drinks.

Biarritz-Anglet-Bayonne Airport is 7 km from ibis budget Bayonne and the A63 highway is 500 metres away. The Basque Museum is 2 km away.

name: Hostel 20 Bayonne
description:
Located 15 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station, Hostel 20 Bayonne offers 1-star accommodation in Bayonne and features a shared lounge, a terrace and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and luggage storage space.

Staff speak English, Spanish and French at the reception.

Saint Jean de Luz Train Station is 25 km from the hostel, while Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church is 26 km away. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 5 km from Hostel 20 Bayonne.

name: Hotel Cote Basque
description:
This hotel sits in the heart Bayonne’s historical town, in front of the Saint Esprit bridge. It offers free Wi-Fi and en suite rooms.

Guest rooms at the Hotel Cote Basque are equipped with satellite TV, air conditioning and are accessible by lift. Hairdryers can be requested.

A full buffet breakfast is served every morning.

The hotel is 100 metres from Bayonne train station,  5 km from Biarritz and 30 km from San Sebastien. A public car park is available nearby at an extra cost.

name: Temporesidence Cathedrale
description:
Located in Bayonne, Temporesidence Cathedrale is just 2.5 km from the train station and 6 km from Biarritz. It offers spacious apartments and studios with a fully equipped kitchenette.

All of the soundproof apartments and studios feature an LCD cable TV and a separate seating area. Each has a microwave, fridge and hotplates to prepare meals which can then be eaten in the dining area. The Wifi system of the entire residence was completely updated in June 2022 with access to high-speed optical fiber.

All of the rooms at Temporesidence Cathedrale are serviced by a lift and the residence also has laundry facilities and luggage storage. Public parking is available at a nearby location.

Local activities include hiking and the town offers many attractions such as Bayonne castle, the Basque Museum and Saint André’s Church.

name: Hotel Loreak
description:
Hotel Loreak is located 2 km from Bayonne city centre and offers en-suite accommodation with free Wi-Fi internet access and a flat-screen TV.

Renovated in May 2020, rooms at the Hotel Loreak are also air-conditioned and come with a work desk. There is a hairdryer in the private bathroom and all rooms are serviced by a lift.

The restaurant offers regional cuisine with a buffet service, and set menus are also available. Guest can also relax with a drink in the lounge.

Free on-site parking is available at the Hotel Loreak and the beaches of Biarritz and Anglet are just 8 km away. The hotel is serviced by the A63 motorway.

name: Appartement au coeur de Bayonne sur les remparts
description:
Appartement au coeur de Bayonne sur les remparts is situated in Bayonne, 22 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station, 23 km from Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church, as well as 36 km from Hendaye Train Station. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Biarritz La Négresse Train Station is 12 km away.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with city views. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the quiet street views. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

FICOBA is 36 km from the apartment, while Pasaiako portua is 48 km from the property. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 5 km from Appartement au coeur de Bayonne sur les remparts.

name: Hotel Le Port Neuf
description:
Hotel Le Port Neuf is located in the historical centre, 100 metres from Bayonne Cathedral and 300 metres from the Basque Museum. It offers free Wi-Fi access and an onsite bar with a terrace.

The rooms at Hotel Le Port Neuf are decorated in a contemporary style and include a flat-screen TV. There is also an en suite bathroom, which is complete with a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is served every morning from 8:00 to 10.00, and local gastronomic restaurants can be found 300 metres from the property. The property also boasts an on-sit wine bar.

The hotel is also ideally located a 10-minute walk from the train station.

name: Hôtel des Arceaux
description:
Set in a pedestrianised area of Bayonne’s historical centre, this charming hotel is housed in a 17th-century building. All the rooms are uniquely decorated and include free WiFi internet access.

Some rooms feature a private bathroom while other have access to a shared bathroom and toilet.

You can reach the attractions of Bayonne on foot thanks to the central location of the Hôtel des Arceaux.

The hotel is ideal for exploring the Basque country. Explore the mountains, beaches and countryside in the area surrounding the Hôtel des Arceaux.

name: Appartement Bayonne, 4 pièces, 5 personnes - FR-1-239-1013
description:
Located in Bayonne in the Aquitaine region, Appartement Bayonne, 4 pièces, 5 personnes - FR-1-239-1013 features a balcony. The property is situated 22 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station, 22 km from Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church and 35 km from Hendaye Train Station. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Biarritz La Négresse Train Station is 12 km away.

The spacious apartment is equipped with 3 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and a dishwasher, and 1 bathroom. A TV is provided. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

FICOBA is 36 km from Appartement Bayonne, 4 pièces, 5 personnes - FR-1-239-1013, while Pasaiako portua is 47 km away. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 5 km from the accommodation.

name: Temporesidence Chateauneuf
description:
Located in the Aquitaine region, this residence features modern accommodation with wired internet access and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The sandy beaches of Biarritz are just 8 km away.

The soundproofed accommodations feature a seating and dining area. The kitchenettes are equipped with a microwave, fridge and coffee maker. All accommodations have a private bathroom.

The Temporesidence Chateauneuf is set in the lively historic centre and Bayonne Train Station is 1 km away. Saint André Church is 210 metres from the residence. Public parking is available nearby.

The entire residence’s Wi-Fi system was fully updated in June 2022 with access to broadband fibre optic.

name: Libertitu
adresse: 44 avenue Maréchal Foch, double porte de gauche PAYS BASQUE, 64100 Bayonne, France
description:
Situated within 12 km of Biarritz La Négresse Train Station and 22 km of Saint Jean de Luz Train Station in Bayonne, Libertitu features accommodation with seating area. This 3-star bed and breakfast offers a lift, a housekeeping service and free WiFi. FICOBA is 36 km away and Pasaiako portua is 47 km from the bed and breakfast.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the bed and breakfast, each unit has bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop, and a grocery delivery service is also available upon request.

Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church is 22 km from the bed and breakfast, while Hendaye Train Station is 36 km from the property. The nearest airport is Biarritz, 5 km from Libertitu, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Studio avec parking à 12mns du centre historique de bayonne
adresse: 5 Avenue du Docteur Lafourcade, 64100 Bayonne, France
description:
Offering a garden and garden view, Studio avec parking à 12mns du centre historique de bayonne is set in Bayonne, 21 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station and 21 km from Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church. This apartment offers free private parking and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 11 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station.

With free WiFi, this apartment provides a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and toaster. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation offers an air conditioning, a heating and a private bathroom.

Hendaye Train Station is 34 km from the apartment, while FICOBA is 35 km away. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 3 km from Studio avec parking à 12mns du centre historique de bayonne.

name: Chez Fleur
adresse: 8 Rue Docteur André Vidal, 64100 Bayonne, France
description:
Set in Bayonne in the Aquitaine region, Chez Fleur features a terrace. The property is around 20 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station, 21 km from Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church and 34 km from Hendaye Train Station. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Biarritz La Négresse Train Station is 5.9 km away.

Towels and bed linen are featured in the bed and breakfast. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy an à la carte breakfast.

FICOBA is 34 km from Chez Fleur, while Pasaiako portua is 46 km away. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 3 km from the accommodation.

name: Hôtel Le Bayonne
description:
Set in central Bayonne in the Aquitaine region, Hôtel Le Bayonne offers a seasonal, outdoor swimming pool. Guests are invited to use the hammam.

Free fibre-optic Internet access and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels are provided in each of Hôtel Le Bayonne rooms. They are all air-conditioned and include work desks and telephones.

Traditional cuisine is proposed in the restaurant at Hôtel Le Bayonne, and drinks are served in the bar. Breakfast can be enjoyed daily in the breakfast area or in the comfort of guest rooms.

Bayonne Train Station is 3 km away and private parking is available with a supplement. The hotel is 7.6 km from Biarritz and 5.5 km from the Biarritz-Anglet-Bayonne Airport.

name: ibis Bayonne Centre
description:
Located a 5-minute walk from the centre of Bayonne, this ibis hotel is set on the banks of the Adour River, just 600 metres from the train station. It offers air-conditioned guest rooms and a furnished terrace.

The rooms at ibis Bayonne have a desk, a flat-screen TV and a telephone. Each room also features a private bathroom with a shower.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

At the ibis Bayonne, you can also relax with a drink from the bar and dine at the on-site restaurant.

Other facilities include a 24-hour reception, 2 meeting rooms and a lift. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout this property. Private parking is possible on site, with an additional cost, and Biarritz Parme Airport is 8 km from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Les Genêts Bayonne
adresse: Rond Point de Maignon, 86 avenue du 8 Mai 1945, 64100 Bayonne, France
description:
Located 1.5 km from the A63 motorway outside Bayonne, Hôtel Les Genêts Bayonne features soundproofed rooms and a restaurant serving local specialities.

The restaurant is closed at weekends (from Friday) and on public holidays. Exceptional closure from 23 October to 5 November 2023.

The rooms at the Hôtel Les Genêts Bayonne include an LCD TV, free Wi-Fi and air conditioning. They are decorated in neutral shades and feature stylish wooden furnishings.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the dining room at this hotel.

Free parking is provided on site, and the centre of Anglet is 3 km away. The beaches of Biarritz are only a 15-minute drive away.

name: Péniche DJEBELLE
description:
Located 16 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station, Péniche DJEBELLE offers accommodation with a balcony, as well as a shared lounge. Both free WiFi and parking on-site are available at the guest house free of charge. The property offers soundproof units and is set 26 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station.

The units in the guest house are equipped with a kettle. At the guest house, all units are equipped with a private bathroom.

The area is popular for cycling and fishing, in addition, car hire and free use of bicycles are available at this guest house. Guests at Péniche DJEBELLE can enjoy skiing and snorkelling nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace.

Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church is 26 km from the accommodation, while Hendaye Train Station is 40 km away. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 7 km from Péniche DJEBELLE.

name: ibis Styles Bayonne
adresse: 1 place de la République, 64100 Bayonne, France
description:
Located on the banks of the Adour River with an exceptional view of the medieval town of Bayonne, ibis Styles Bayonne is within walking distance of the 12th-Century Cathedral.

All of the 45 rooms are soundproofed and air-conditioned, equipped with en suite facilities and include central heating and flat-screen TV. Free Wi-Fi access and breakfast are included.

The 5 floors of the hotel are serviced by a lift. On the ground floor guests can enjoy light meals 24 hours a day.

The ibis Styles Bayonne is easily accessible from the A63 motorway. It is situated just 50 metres from Bayonne Train Station and just 200 metres from the historic city centre. It is 8 km from the airport and 35 km from the Spanish border. Guests can find public parking at an extra cost at the Train Station. Outdoor Parking spaces, which are free from 18:00 to 09:00, can be found close the property, on the river side. Direct access in front of the hotel by "Rue Neuve".

name: Villa AJNA Bayonne
description:
Located within 6.1 km of Biarritz La Négresse Train Station and 21 km of Saint Jean de Luz Train Station in Bayonne, Villa AJNA Bayonne features accommodation with seating area. Featuring a shared kitchen, this property also provides guests with an outdoor fireplace. The accommodation provides spa facilities, free WiFi and family rooms.

The units in the bed and breakfast are equipped with a kettle. All units have a coffee machine and a private bathroom, while some rooms here will provide you with a terrace and some have mountain views. At the bed and breakfast, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

A selection of options including fresh pastries, fruits and juice is served for the continental breakfast. There is a coffee shop, and a grocery delivery service is also available.

Guests can make the most of the garden, plunge pool and yoga classes on offer at the bed and breakfast. The area is popular for cycling and walking tours, and free use of bicycles is available at Villa AJNA Bayonne. An indoor play area is also available for guests at the accommodation.

Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church is 21 km from Villa AJNA Bayonne, while Hendaye Train Station is 34 km away. The nearest airport is Biarritz, 3 km from the bed and breakfast, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hôtel Vert
adresse: La Caserne, 50170 Le Mont Saint Michel, France
description:
Hotel Vert offers pastel-coloured rooms with a private bathroom, TV and free Wi-Fi access. It is located 2 km from the Mont Saint-Michel tidal island on the Normandy Coast.

Guests can enjoy regional cuisine at the Vert’s restaurant, La salicorne. The hotel’s bar, L’Equinoxe, opens onto a private terrace.

The Vert Hotel provides a 24-hour reception and private parking. There is also an on site supermarket and souvenir shop.

name: Les Terrasses Poulard
adresse: Grande Rue, 50170 Le Mont Saint Michel, France
description:
Composed of 2 different buildings, Les Terrasses Poulard is a historical property in the heart of Mont Saint-Michel and offers views of the bay, the village and the street.

Accessed by stairs, each room has a modern décor. Some rooms include large windows with bay views. They are equipped with TV and a private bathroom.

Breakfast is served at La Confiance restaurant, a 2-minute walk away, and the restaurant specialises in French and regional cuisine and is also open for lunch and dinner. Alternatively, guests can enjoy a meal at the onsite La Confiance restaurant and offers meals, drinks and snacks.

Guests can enjoy a drink in the Les Terrasses Poulard’s bar. It offers a 24-hour front desk service and guests can leave their luggage at the reception.

Activities in the area include cycling, fishing and hiking and explore the island.

name: La Mère Poulard
adresse: Grande Rue, 50170 Le Mont Saint Michel, France
description:
Housed in a historical building, this hotel is ideally located in the heart of Mont Saint-Michel. The classic-style rooms overlook the bay, the abbey or the medieval city.

All rooms at the La Mère Poulard are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi access. The private bathrooms are fitted with a bathtub.

Guests are invited to sample La Mère Poulard’s recipes, including the worldwide-famous omelette, in the prestigious restaurant. A drink can be enjoyed in the piano bar, overlooking the Bay of the Mont Saint Michel.

The hotel has a shop selling regional gourmet products. The front desk is open 24 hours a day.

Activities include cycling and hiking and visiting the Mont Saint-Michel. Avranches is a 23-minute drive away. Saint-Malo is 45 minutes from La Mère Poulard.

name: Le Relais Saint Michel
adresse: La Caserne, 50170 Le Mont Saint Michel, France
description:
Le Relais Saint Michel is an hotel facing the bay of Mont Saint-Michel. All guest rooms ( except Twin Room Saint-Michel with interior view) offer a private terrace and some have panoramic views of Mont Saint-Michel.

The soundproofed rooms are comfortable and spacious. They are fully equipped with modern comforts including a minibar and free Wi-Fi access. Each room has en suite facilities.

The hotel’s restaurant offers traditional cuisine. Guests can enjoy a drink or a meal on the terrace, which offers views of the Mont St Michel.

A free shuttle service that stops in front of the hotel will take you to the famous landmark Mont St Michel in just 10 minutes. Safety jackets are provided for guests wishing to take a walk at night. For guests arriving by car, secured parking is available with an extra cost.

name: Le Relais Du Roy
adresse: La Caserne, 50170 Le Mont Saint Michel, France
description:
Le Relais Du Roy is a 3-star hotel situated next to the River Couesnon, just 1.5 km from the Mont Saint-Michel and 50 metres from the free shuttle bus.

Featuring flat-screen TVs with satellite channels, a telephone and a welcome tray, each guest room at Le Relais Du Roy is decorated in a classic style. They also have a private bathroom with a bath or a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some of the rooms feature a balcony.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the hotel.

A grocery store can be found within a 3-minute walk from the hotel. The town of Pontorson is 7 km away. Private parking is available with an extra cost.

name: Mercure Mont Saint Michel
adresse: La Caserne, 50170 Le Mont Saint Michel, France
description:
This Mercure is situated in parkland just 2 km from the abbey of Mont Saint Michel. It offers spacious en suite rooms, a restaurant and bar and plenty of free on-site parking.

The air-conditioned rooms at Mercure Mont Saint Michel are equipped with facilities for making hot drinks.  A flat-screen TV with satellite and cable channels is also provided.

The restaurant, Le Pré Salé, is famous in the area and serves delicious seafood and regional specialities. The bar, Le Normandy, offers a relaxed setting for a drink amongst friends.

Mercure Mont Saint Michel is 6.5 km from Pontorson and 52 km from Saint-Malo.

name: Le Mouton Blanc
adresse: Grande Rue , 50170 Le Mont Saint Michel, France
description:
At the foot of the abbey, the Mouton Blanc Hotel, welcomes you in its historic 14th century location. Le Mouton Blanc provides comfortable rooms with a simple yet cosy decoration.

The rooms are divided in 3 buildings: one of them offers views of the Mont Saint-Michel, and the other one features medieval-style rooms.

The Mouton Blanc restaurant offers local traditional cuisine, served in the dining room or the terrace. Breakfast is served daily.

Personalised services for visits, recreation and other activities are available upon request.

name: La Vieille Auberge
adresse: Grande Rue, 50170 Le Mont Saint Michel, France
description:
La Vieille Auberge is located in the medieval village of Le Mont Saint Michel, just a short walk from the famous Mont Saint-Michel Abbey. It offers free WiFi access, a restaurant and a terrace with views of the Mont Saint-Michel Bay.

Rooms are located in 2 annex buildings with many stairs to climb. One building offers standard rooms on the main street and the other building, located at the top of the village, offers rooms with a sea view. They feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

There is also a bar at the hotel, and the restaurant serves traditional French cuisine.

This property is 24 km from Avranches and 49 km from Cancale. Dol-de-Bretagne is 30 km away.

name: Le Saint Aubert
adresse: La Caserne, 50170 Le Mont Saint Michel, France
description:
Set amid lush greenery, just 2 km from the Mont Saint-Michel, the hotel welcomes you in a warm and friendly atmosphere.

Hôtel Saint-Aubert features comfortable and very quiet rooms, surrounded by gardens full of flowers.

After a day spent exploring the Mont Saint-Michel, enjoy a delicious regional cuisine in the picturesque setting of a former farmhouse.

The helpful staff will be happy to provide you with information about the visits and the many attractions in the surrounding area.

name: Auberge Saint Pierre
adresse: Grande Rue, 50170 Le Mont Saint Michel, France
description:
Auberge Saint Pierre is a 14th-century half-timbered house located on Mont St Michel tidal island. It combines the period charm of exposed beams with modern comforts including TV and free Wi-Fi access.

The guest rooms at Auberge Saint Pierre have a private bathroom with a bath or shower. Some rooms have views of the sea.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast daily. Traditional Normandy cuisine and fish dishes are served in the authentic restaurant and guests may choose to dine on site.

Ideally situated for visiting Mont St Michel, this hotel is set on the main street that leads to the Mont Saint Michel abbey. Certain rooms are located in 2 separate buildings which are accessible by many stairs.

name: Hotel Gabriel
adresse: Route du Mont Saint Michel, 50170 Le Mont Saint Michel, France
description:
Hotel Gabriel is located 1.6 Km from Mont Saint-Michel. It offers free Wi-Fi access and en suite rooms just a 25-minute walk from the walls of the old city.

Accessed by stairs, the hotel's spacious rooms include satellite TV. Each room has its own bathroom with a shower.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning.

Hotel Gabriel is a 6-minute drive from the E401 motorway. Pontorson TGV Train Station has connections to Paris and is 7.3 km away.

La Salicorne offers you authentic, vegetable, colorful, festive and eco responsible world cuisine. Le Pré Salé offers you Pré Salé lamb and semi gastronomic french cuisine and L'Hippocampe offers you vegetarian and local cuisine.

name: Chez Adèle
adresse: La Truie Qui File, 50170 Le Mont Saint Michel, France
description:
Chez Adèle, a property with a shared lounge, is situated in Le Mont Saint Michel, 200 metres from Mont Saint-Michel, 29 km from Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel, as well as 49 km from Port of Houle. It is located 100 metres from Mont Saint Michel Abbey and features free shuttle service. The holiday home provides a sun terrace and a 24-hour front desk.

This 2-bedroom holiday home comes with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

The nearest airport is Dinard–Pleurtuit–Saint-Malo Airport, 57 km from the holiday home.

name: Hôtel la Croix Blanche
adresse: grande rue, 50170 Le Mont Saint Michel, France
description:
Situated in the heart of Mont Saint Michel medieval Village, Hôtel La Croix Blanche offers a terrace and a bar.

The rooms at Hôtel La Croix Blanche have a flat-screen, satellite TV and a minibar. Free Wi-Fi access is provided.

In addition to the visit of Mont-Saint-Michel and its abbey, guests can go to Saint-Malo, 50 km from the hotel. Dol-de-Bretagne Train Station is 30 km away.

name: A L'Ombre du Mont St Michel
adresse: 7 rue du Pont Landais, 50170 Huisnes-sur-Mer, France
description:
Offering an outdoor swimming pool and a garden, A L'Ombre du Mont St Michel is a B&B located in the countryside of Huisnes-sur-Mer, just 2 km from the Mont Saint-Michel. Free WiFi access is available throughout.

Rooms come equipped with a fridge and microwave. Each has a terrace opening onto the garden, a desk and a seating area. The private bathroom is fitted with a bath or shower and a hairdryer.

Breakfast is included in the rate and served each morning in the guests rooms. It features homemade crepes, cold cuts, cheese, gingerbread, jam and fruits. Eggs are also available, upon prior reservation.

Guests can can relax on the shared lounge. The property offers free private parking.

name: Le Marquis De La Guintre
adresse: 75 route du mont saint michel, 50220 Courtils, France
description:
Featuring a bar and views of inner courtyard, Le Marquis De La Guintre is a bed and breakfast situated in a historic building in Courtils, 12 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey. Housed in a building dating from 18th century, this bed and breakfast is 12 km from Mont Saint-Michel and 17 km from Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel. There is a sun terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi and free private parking.

At the bed and breakfast, each unit is equipped with a private bathroom.

At the bed and breakfast, the family-friendly restaurant is open for dinner, lunch and high tea and serves grill bbq cuisine.

Granville Train Station is 42 km from Le Marquis De La Guintre, while Champrepus Zoo is 43 km away. The nearest airport is Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport, 90 km from the accommodation.

name: La Jacotière
description:
Situated in Ardevon, La Jacotière is a B&B set in a renovated farm with a garden and a furnished terrace offering views of the Mont Saint-Michel, just 3 km away. Free Wi-Fi is provided.

The rooms offer a TV, a desk and wardrobe and a private bathroom with shower. The studio also has a kitchen equipped with microwave and stove.

Breakfast is served in the large dining room. Supermarkets, bars and restaurants serving traditional and international cuisine can be found a 5-minute walk away.

At the B&B, guests have access to guides on excursions to do in the area. There are shuttle services nearby to discover the Mont Saint-Michel. Pontorson Train Station is 8.5 km away, while Saint-Malo and Granville are 46 km away.

name: Etoile des Grèves
adresse: Quartier de la Rive 25 route de la Côte, 50170 Ardevon, France
description:
Offering quiet street views, Etoile des Grèves is an accommodation situated in Ardevon, 8.1 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey and 8.1 km from Mont Saint-Michel. Boasting bicycle parking, this property also provides guests with a picnic area. There is a sun terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi and free private parking.

At the bed and breakfast, units include a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. At the bed and breakfast, all units are soundproof. All units will provide guests with a outdoor furniture and a kettle.

After a day of cycling, hiking or walking tours, guests can relax in the garden or in the shared lounge area.

Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel is 21 km from the bed and breakfast, while Granville Train Station is 45 km from the property. The nearest airport is Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport, 93 km from Etoile des Grèves.

name: Chambres d'Hôtes Les Vieilles Digues
adresse: Route du Mont Saint Michel, 50170 Beauvoir, France
description:
Set in a renovated Breton-style house, this family-run B&B is located in Beauvoir, 3 km from Mont-Saint-Michel. With a 3000-m2 flowered park, it features en suite rooms with antique furniture and free Wi-Fi.

All with a private entrance, the elegant rooms at Les Vieilles Digues have free toiletries. Those on the ground floor include French doors with direct access to the patio, which has deck chairs.

The breakfast includes hot drinks, orange juice, yogurt, cheese and cereals and fresh baguettes are delivered daily by the local baker. The owners are at guests’ disposal for advising good restaurants nearby.

Guests are invited to have a walk or a ride along Le Couesnon River, which is 200 metres from Les Vieilles Digues. Saint-Malo and Cancale are a 45-minute drive and Pontorson Train Station is 5 km away. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: B&B La Rive - Le Mont Saint Michel
adresse: 7, Route de la Rive, 50170 Ardevon, France
description:
Chambres d'Hotes La Rive - Le Mont-Saint-Michel is located in Ardevon, and offers a view of Mont Saint-Michel which is 4 km away. The B&B offers free WiFi internet access, a garden and a terrace.

Rooms here are individually decorated and will provide you with air conditioning. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer, towels and private toilet.

Guests also have access to a shared kitchen with a dining area.

The area is popular for cycling and guests can hire bicycles at the property. Free parking is provided and the nearest restaurant is 500 metres away. The property is 40 km from Cancale and 45 km from Saint-Malo. The shuttle bus providing access to Mont Saint-Michel is only 1 km away.

name: Mon Saint Michel
adresse: 28 route de la Rive, 50170 Ardevon, France
description:
Set 8.6 km from Mont Saint-Michel, 21 km from Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel and 46 km from Granville Train Station, Mon Saint Michel features accommodation situated in Ardevon. The property has garden and quiet street views, and is 8.6 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey. There is a sun terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi and free private parking.

At the bed and breakfast, each unit comes with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. Units are equipped with a coffee machine and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer, while certain rooms also offer a fully equipped kitchen fitted with an oven. At the bed and breakfast, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

For guests with children, the bed and breakfast offers outdoor play equipment and a baby safety gate. Guests at Mon Saint Michel can enjoy cycling and hiking nearby, or make the most of the garden.

Champrepus Zoo is 47 km from the accommodation, while Granville's Marina is 47 km from the property. The nearest airport is Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport, 85 km from Mon Saint Michel.

name: Auberge de la Baie
description:
This hotel is situated in the countryside of Normandy and offers free Wi-Fi

Flat-screen TVs with satellite channels are provided in all of the modern guest rooms at Auberge de la Baie. They are all equipped with en suite bathrooms and hairdryers.

A buffet-style breakfast is served every morning.

Free parking is available on site and the city of Avranches is 23 km away. The hotel is a 45-minute drive from the beaches of Saint-Malo and Rennes is reached by car in 1 hour.

name: Vent des Grèves
adresse: Quartier de la rive ARDEVON 27 route de la Côte, 50170 Pontorson, France
description:
Offering garden views, Vent des Grèves is an accommodation set in Pontorson, 8.1 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey and 8.1 km from Mont Saint-Michel. This property offers access to a terrace, free private parking and free WiFi. The bed and breakfast features family rooms.

At the bed and breakfast each unit comes with private entrance, wardrobe, soundproofing, a TV and a private bathroom. The units have a dressing room. The units feature bed linen.

After a day of cycling, hiking or walking tours, guests can relax in the garden or in the shared lounge area.

Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel is 21 km from the bed and breakfast, while Granville Train Station is 45 km away. The nearest airport is Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport, 93 km from Vent des Grèves.

name: Ermitage - Mont-Saint-Michel
adresse: 14 Route du Mont Saint-Michel, 50170 Beauvoir, France
description:
Situated in Beauvoir, 5.4 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey, Ermitage - Mont-Saint-Michel features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a concierge service and free WiFi. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Ermitage - Mont-Saint-Michel provides some rooms that have a balcony, and all rooms are equipped with a kettle. At the accommodation rooms come with bed linen and towels.

Breakfast is available each morning, and includes buffet, à la carte and continental options. At Ermitage - Mont-Saint-Michel you will find a restaurant serving French, Seafood and local cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested.

Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Beauvoir, like cycling.

Mont Saint-Michel is 5.4 km from Ermitage - Mont-Saint-Michel, while Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel is 24 km from the property. The nearest airport is Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport, 88 km from the accommodation.

name: La Greve Saint Michel
description:
Boasting garden views, La Greve Saint Michel features accommodation with an open-air bath, a garden and barbecue facilities, around 5 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. The holiday home also provides free WiFi, free private parking and facilities for disabled guests.

The holiday home is equipped with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with river views. This holiday home also offers a balcony that doubles up as an outdoor dining area. This holiday home is allergy-free and soundproof.

A minimarket is available at the holiday home.

If you would like to discover the area, fishing and hiking are possible in the surroundings and the holiday home can arrange a bicycle rental service.

Mont Saint-Michel is 5 km from La Greve Saint Michel, while Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel is 24 km away. The nearest airport is Rennes–Saint-Jacques, 85 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Gites les 2 Clos au pied du Mont
adresse: 28 B ROUTE DE LA RIVE, 50170 Pontorson, France
description:
Gites les 2 Clos au pied du Mont features accommodation in Ardevon.

All of the holiday homes feature a private bathroom, flat-screen TV, fully-equipped kitchen and terrace. Guests can enjoy a patio with sea views in each accommodation.

A plancha grill is offered.


Saint Malo is 39 km from the accommodation, while Le Mont Saint Michel is 3.1 km away. The nearest airport is Dinard Brittany Airport, 44 km from Gites les 2 Clos au pied du Mont.

name: Hôtel de Paris
description:
Located in the centre of Besançon, Hôtel de Paris offers contemporary décor, a 24-hour reception and terrace. The Besançon Citadelle is just a 15-minute walk away. Vesoul is 48 km from the property.

All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a desk, wardrobe and telephone. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning at Hôtel de Paris. A traditional restaurants can be found within walking distance.

The fine arts museum is just a 5-minute walk away and Besançon Franche-Comté TGV Train Station is 12 km from the hotel. Additional features include luggage storage, daily newspapers and free wired internet.

name: Hôtel Restaurant Spa Le Sauvage
description:
Hôtel Restaurant Spa Le Sauvage, formerly the Clarisses Monestary, is located in the historic district of Besançon, 500 metres from the citadel's ancient walls. It offers views of the tree-lined park, the medieval walls, the city and the Doubs Valley.

All of the rooms feature parquet flooring and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. They also have a flat-screen TV, telephone and a desk. Some rooms offer a view on the garden and on the city.

Breakfast is served every morning in the dining area, on the terrace or can be brought to your guest room upon request. You can also relax on the west-facing terrace with a drink from the bar. Guest can access the spa upon reservation and for an additional fee.

Hôtel Restaurant Spa Le Sauvage is a 10-minute walk from the Musée du Temps and just 2 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station. Shops and restaurants can be found within a 10-minute walk. Private parking is available at a surcharge and free WiFi internet access is provided.

name: Best Western Citadelle
adresse: 13 rue du Général Lecourbe, 25000 Besançon, France
description:
The Best Western Citadelle is located in the historic city center of Besançon, a 5-minute walk from the Doubs River and the Citadelle. Free Wi-Fi is available in the rooms.

The air-conditioned rooms feature a television with Canal+ channels. The private bathroom is equipped with solar-heated water. Additionally, the establishment offers rooms adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

The hotel serves breakfast every morning for an additional fee. You can enjoy it in your room or as a buffet in the dining room. Room service is also available.

The small parking area, which includes 10 spaces, is only accessible by reservation for a supplementary fee of 15 EUR per space. An electric charging station is available on request and subject to availability at a rate of €25.

Please note that our parking area is only suitable for standard-sized vehicles (a small courtyard in the city center).

The establishment is 5 km from the Micropolis convention center. Public parking is available on-site for an extra charge. Please contact the establishment directly if you wish to reserve a parking space.

If you are traveling with pets, please contact the establishment directly to inquire about the pet policies. It is essential to contact the establishment.

You will be accommodated in one of our 41 rooms situated across various buildings as follows:

• The Main Building with elevator access, where we have 21 rooms.
• The Annex, also in the main building, without elevator access.
• The Hotel Pavilion, where we have 9 rooms, without an elevator.
• The Workshop, with 2 spacious rooms specially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

If you have a preference, feel free to let us know during your reservation. While we cannot guarantee, we promise to always do our best to accommodate the various requests of our guests.

name: ibis Styles Besançon
adresse: 22 bis Rue de Trey, 25000 Besançon, France
description:
Conveniently located in a park, ibis Styles Besançon is a 15-minute walk from the TGV Train Station and the centre of Besançon. It features an outdoor swimming pool with a sun terrace and free Wi-Fi.

The air-conditioned rooms are spacious and contemporary in style. They include an LCD TV and free Wi-Fi access.

A buffet breakfast is offered every morning at this hotel. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar or have dinner at the hotel's restaurant. A children's playground and meeting rooms are also available on site.

Providing free private parking, the property has a 24-hour reception. The hotel is a 10-minute drive from the Parc des Expositions Micropolis and just 3.7 km away from Citadel of Besançonet, which is one of the UNESCO World Heritage Sites.

name: ibis Besançon Centre Ville
description:
Located in the old town of Besançon, ibis Besançon Centre Ville is 500 metres from Viotte Train Station and both the Vauban Citadel and the Museum of Fine Arts can be found within a 20-minute walk. It offers free Wi-Fi access, a 24-hour front desk and a 24-hour snack bar.

All the air-conditioned rooms at ibis Besançon Centre Ville feature wooden floors, a flat-screen TV and a telephone. The private bathroom includes a shower and heated towel rail.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

This property is 18 km from the A36 motorway and private parking is available on site, at an extra cost and subject to availability.

name: L'adresse à Besançon
description:
Situated in Besançon, in a historic building, less than 1 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station, L'adresse à Besançon is an apartment with a garden and barbecue facilities. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The property features a children's playground and outdoor furniture.

The apartment with a terrace and garden views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some fruits and chocolates or cookies. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

As an added convenience, the apartment offers packed lunches for guests to bring on excursions and other trips off-property.

The apartment complex has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Popular points of interest near L'adresse à Besançon include Besançon-Mouillère train station, Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon and Time museum of Besançon. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 63 km from the accommodation.

name: ibis Besançon Centre la City
description:
Located on the banks of the Doubs River within the business complex known as La City, this ibis hotel is a 10-minute walk from Besançon city centre and its museums and a 35-minute walk from Citadelle.

The ibis Besançon La City offers air-conditioned rooms, 4 of which are equipped for people with reduced mobility.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. The Bistro Régent restaurant offers a bistro menu based on fresh produce.

With a 24-hour front desk, this hotel offers secure underground parking at an extra fee.

name: Logis Hôtel Victor Hugo & Spa
adresse: 6, Rue de La Viotte, 25000 Besançon, France
description:
Logis Hôtel Victor Hugo & Spa offers accommodation 50 metres from Viotte train station and just 15 minutes' walking distance from the historic city centre of Besançon. Many rooms open onto an inner garden.

All the rooms come with ensuite facilities, satellite TV, a telephone and free WiFi access.

To get off to a good start you can enjoy your breakfast before heading out to experience the capital of the Franche-Comté region.

Several adjustable equipped meeting rooms are available onsite and can accommodate groups of up to 45 people.

Other onsite services available to guests aged 12 and above include a fitness room, a heated outdoor pool, a sauna, 2 hot tubs, a hammam, a sensorial shower and a relaxation room . Massages using Equatoria products.

Secure private parking is featured onsite.

name: Hotel Du Nord
description:
This hotel is set in the heart of Besançon, just 700 metres from the banks of the Doubs River. Guests have free Wi-Fi internet access and are invited to relax in the hotel's lounge bar.

A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is provided in each of the simply decorated guest rooms. The rooms are serviced by a lift and include en suite bathrooms.

Every morning a buffet-style breakfast, including fresh orange juice and regional specialities, can be enjoyed in Hotel du Nord's breakfast area.

The Church of Sainte-Madeleine is a 10-minute walk away and the Besançon-Viotte Train Station is 1.5 km from the hotel. The Besançon Museum of Fine Arts and Archeology is just 450 metres away.

A bike box is available on site, free of charge for bikes, charges may apply for motorbikes.

name: All Suites Besançon
description:
Situated in Besançon, 3.3 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station, All Suites Besançon features accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers room service and luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is set 4.4 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station.

Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hotel also boast free WiFi. At All Suites Besançon rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV.

Micropolis is 5.7 km from the accommodation, while Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 61 km from All Suites Besançon.

name: Le coquet chez Maguy Maison de ville avec jardin
description:
Boasting a garden, a shared lounge, and a terrace, Le coquet chez Maguy Maison de ville avec jardin provides accommodation in Besançon with free WiFi and garden views. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a patio.

Featuring a Blu-ray player, the apartment has a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven, a living room with a seating area and a dining area, 3 bedrooms, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a bath. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Speaking English and French, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Besancon Viotte Train Station, Time museum of Besançon and Museum of Fine Arts and Archaeology of Besancon. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 62 km from Le coquet chez Maguy Maison de ville avec jardin.

name: B&B HOTEL Besançon Valentin
adresse: 3 Chemin des Trois Croix, 25480 Besançon, France
description:
Set in Besançon, 6.5 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station, B&B HOTEL Besançon Valentin offers accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking and a bar. Located around 7.7 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station, the hotel with free WiFi is also 10 km away from Micropolis. The property is non-smoking and is situated 6.6 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station.

At the hotel, the rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV. At B&B HOTEL Besançon Valentin all rooms include air conditioning and a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation.

Besançon Vesoul University is 6.3 km from B&B HOTEL Besançon Valentin, while Time museum of Besançon is 8.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 59 km from the hotel.

name: Mercure Besancon Parc Micaud - Hotel & Bar & Restaurant
description:
This Hotel Mercure is situated in the city centre of Besancon in the casino garden on the Doubs River and opposite the Micaud Park.

There are 91 air-conditioned guestrooms, 78 which are non-smoking, equipped with clean, private bathrooms and flat screen satellite TV.

The hotel restaurant, Le Vesontio, serves traditional cuisine and offers a splendid view of the casino gardens. L’Instant, the hotel bar, is open until 23:00.

There is a casino, a fitness centre and a karaoke bar within 3 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Régina
description:
Hotel Régina is situated conveniently in Besançon, and features a garden, free WiFi and a terrace. The property is set 4.8 km from Micropolis, 13 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station and 500 metres from Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon. Private parking is available on site.

At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room is equipped with a kettle, while selected rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also have garden views. The units feature a wardrobe.

The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and car hire is available at Hotel Régina.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Besançon-Mouillère train station, Besancon Viotte Train Station and Time museum of Besançon. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 60 km from Hotel Régina.

name: Hôtel AKENA BESANCON
description:
Situated in Besançon, 10 km from Micropolis, Hôtel AKENA BESANCON features accommodation with a terrace, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is set 16 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station.

At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms at Hôtel AKENA BESANCON have air conditioning and a wardrobe.

Besançon-Mouillère train station is 17 km from the accommodation, while Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station is 17 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 48 km from Hôtel AKENA BESANCON.

name: Zenitude Hôtel-Résidences La City
description:
This Zenitude Hôtel-Résidences La City is located in Besançon and offers studios and apartments with free WiFi access. It is next to the Doubs River and 2 km from the town’s train station.

Accommodation at the Zenitude Hôtel-Résidences La City is serviced by a lift and has a living room with, free Wi-Fi access and satellite TV. Each apartment also has, wire internet access and a kitchenette equipped with a microwave.

Breakfast is served daily in the breakfast room. This residence also provides a bike storage room, laundry facilities, a garage and free Wi-Fi at the reception.

The Zenitude Hôtel-Résidences La City is a 10-minute walk from the city centre and 1.5 km from the Cathedral Saint-Jean. A Tramway Station can be reached within a 2-minute walk and provides direct access to Besançon Viotte Train Station.

You have the possibility to luch here our take-away formulas consisting of a hot dish, a drink and a dessert. Choose from a wide selection of dishes and relax over a tasty meal.

name: Hôtel Fontaine Argent - Centre Ville
description:
Hôtel Fontaine Argent - Centre Ville is set in Besançon, 6.6 km from Micropolis and 13 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station. Featuring a terrace, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking is available on site.

All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

Popular points of interest near Hôtel Fontaine Argent - Centre Ville include Besançon-Mouillère train station, Besancon Viotte Train Station and Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 64 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Vauban
description:
Located in Besançon, Hotel Vauban a 2-minute walk from the Museum of Fine Arts and an 18-minute walk from the Citadel of Besançon. It offers free internet access, a 24-hour front desk and a terrace.

Serviced by a lift, all the soundproofed rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a telephone. The bathroom is complete with free toiletries, a hairdryer and a bath or shower.

Both a continental and a buffet breakfast are served every morning at Hotel Vauban.  The property has 2 restaurants: an Italian and traditional meals are served.

Some rooms are suitable for guests with reduced mobility. The hotel is a 5-minute drive from Besançon Train Station and a 15-minute walk from the Madeleine Church.

name: Charmant cocon centre historique
description:
Located in Besançon, 1.9 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station and 5.2 km from Micropolis, Charmant cocon centre historique provides accommodation with amenities such as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. This apartment is 14 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station and 6 km from Besançon Vesoul University. The property is 100 metres from the city centre and 1.2 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchenette, and 1 bathroom. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon, Time museum of Besançon and Museum of Fine Arts and Archaeology of Besancon. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 64 km from Charmant cocon centre historique.

name: ATELIER DES REVES - au coeur de Besancon - 88 m2
adresse: 5 Allée de l'Île aux Moineaux, 25000 Besançon, France
description:
A recently renovated property, ATELIER DES REVES - au coeur de Besancon - 88 m2 is set in Besançon near Besançon-Mouillère train station, Besancon Viotte Train Station and Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and full-day security, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Parking on-site is available and the apartment also offers bike hire for guests who want to explore the surrounding area.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and garden views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the city views. The apartment offers bed linen, towels and laundry service.

There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Besançon, like fishing.

Micropolis is 6.5 km from ATELIER DES REVES - au coeur de Besancon - 88 m2, while Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station is 13 km away. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 64 km from the accommodation.

name: ibis budget Besançon Centre Gare
description:
Located in Besançon, just 100 metres from Gare de la Viotte Train Station, ibis budget Besançon Centre Gare offers simple rooms with free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour access.

Each room is air-conditioned and includes a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower. A buffet breakfast is available daily.

The palace Granvelle is 2 km from the hotel, and the UNESCO World Heritage Site, the Citadel Vaubon is 2.5 km away. Besançon town centre is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Restaurant Vesontio
description:
Located 5 km from the centre of Besançon and the Musée des Beaux-Arts, Hotel restaurant Vesontio offers an air-conditioned restaurant and a meeting room. Free WiFi is available throughout. Besançon Tennis Club is 3.1 km away from the property.

Decorated in bright colours, rooms are equipped with satellite TV, a desk and a wardrobe. Each room has a private bathroom complete with hairdryer,

A buffet breakfast made with local produce is served every morning at this hotel, which you can also enjoy on the terrace. For lunch and dinner, homemade dishes are served.

Free private parking is possible on site and a garage is also available upon request. Easily accessible via the RN57 road and the A36 motorway, the hotel is 3 km from the Viotte Train Station and 10 minutes from the Besançon Franche-Comté Train Station.

name: Chambre d'Hôtes La Villa Molina
description:
Set in a tree-lined garden with a shaded terrace, this French villa is located a 5-minute walk from Viotte Train Station. A continental breakfast is served daily and the guest room offers a garden view.

Decorated in a modern style, the guest room features antique furnishings. An LCD TV with a DVD player is provided and there is a choice of films on offer. Free Wi-Fi access is also included at La Villa Molina.

The property is just a 3-minute walk from the tramway, which gives easy access to Besançon city centre and Micropolis Exhibition Centre. Besançon Museum of Fine Arts is 1.6 km from this guest house and the historic centre is just a 15-minute walk away. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Contact Hôtel Foch
description:
Situated a few steps from the Besançon train station and just 5 minutes from the city centre, the Hotel Foch offers quality comfort at an affordable price.

This charming hotel provides a panoramic view of downtown from its well-equipped guestrooms. Rooms feature shower or bath, TV and free Wi-Fi internet access.

The Hotel Foch also provides 24-hour reception, a car park just 20 metres from the hotel, a bar area and a buffet breakfast. 

Besançon is located close to the Swiss border and is the capital of the Doubs department in the region of Franche-Comté.

name: Au Duplex d'Or Centre Historique
description:
In the centre of Besançon, located within a short distance of Besançon-Mouillère train station and Besancon Viotte Train Station, Au Duplex d'Or Centre Historique offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a dishwasher and coffee machine. This recently renovated apartment is located 5 km from Micropolis and 13 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station. Outdoor dining is also possible at the apartment.

The apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with city views. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some chocolates or cookies. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Popular points of interest near Au Duplex d'Or Centre Historique include Time museum of Besançon, Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon and Museum of Fine Arts and Archaeology of Besancon. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 60 km from the accommodation.

name: Hôtel PALMITO
adresse: 7 rue du Port Vieux , 64200 Biarritz, France
description:
Set in the Old Town in Biarritz, this non-smoking hotel is located just 100 metres from the beach. Free Wi-Fi and an LCD TV are provided in the guest rooms.

A glimpse of the sea or the courtyard is offered in each room, and some rooms feature a balcony. All of the rooms have a private bathroom, and some have a walk-in shower.

You can enjoy a continental buffet breakfast while reading the newspapers provided.

Biarritz Barrière Casino is just 700 metres from the hotel and Biarritz Train Station is 4 km away. Restaurants, bars and nightclubs are located 50 metres away.

name: Nemea Appart Hotel Les Hauts de Milady Biarritz
adresse: 24 Avenue de la Milady, 64200 Biarritz, France
description:
Boasting a seasonal outdoor pool, a hot tub and a hammam, Nemea Appart Hotel Les Hauts de Milady Biarritz is situated in Biarritz, 600 metres from Cote des Basques Beach and 700 metres from Plage Marbella. Private parking is available on site. The accommodation features a sauna, free WiFi throughout the property and family rooms.

Each unit features a balcony, a flat-screen TV, a well-fitted kitchenette and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a kettle. All units have a safety deposit box.

The aparthotel also provides an indoor pool and a fitness room for guests to relax in.

Plage Milady is less than 1 km from Nemea Appart Hotel Les Hauts de Milady Biarritz, while Biarritz La Négresse Train Station is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 4 km from the accommodation.

name: Outsite Coliving Biarritz
description:
Boasting a shared lounge, a terrace as well as water sports facilities, Outsite Coliving Biarritz is set in the centre of Biarritz, 600 metres from Cote des Basques Beach. The property is around 3.5 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station, 18 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station and 18 km from Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church. The accommodation offers a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Some rooms also offer a kitchenette with a fridge and a microwave.

Popular points of interest near Outsite Coliving Biarritz include Grande Plage, Plage Pêcheurs and Plage Marbella. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 3 km from the accommodation.

name: T2 très bien placé à 2mns des plages
adresse: 47 Avenue de la Milady, 64200 Biarritz, France
description:
T2 très bien placé à 2mns des plages is a beachfront property located in Biarritz, 300 metres from Cote des Basques Beach and 400 metres from Plage Marbella. The property has garden views and is 500 metres from Plage Milady and 3 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station. Hendaye Train Station is 31 km from the apartment and FICOBA is 31 km away.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Saint Jean de Luz Train Station is 17 km from the apartment, while Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church is 18 km away. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 4 km from T2 très bien placé à 2mns des plages.

name: Hôtel Les Baigneuses de Biarritz
adresse: 14 rue du Port Vieux, 64200 Biarritz, France
description:
Facing the Atlantic Ocean and featuring a terrace, Hôtel Les Baigneuses de Biarritz is located in the heart of Biarritz, just 50 metres from the Plage du Port Vieux. The hotel offers free WiFi access and all the guest rooms have a view of the sea.

The guest rooms include a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower.

The restaurant at Hôtel Les Baigneuses de Biarritz serves brasserie meals and drinks can be enjoyed in the on-site bar. The continental breakfast consists of fresh bread, 1 French pastry, a hot drink, fresh orange juice, butter and marmalade.

The property does not have a lift. The hotel has no parking, the closest is the Saint Eugénie which is underground.

Biarritz – Anglet – Bayonne Airport is 5 km from the hotel and Biarritz Train Station is 4 km away. The property is 9 km from the centre Bayonne and a 37-minute drive from Hendaye.

name: Bellevue 766 Biarritz
adresse: 2 Place Bellevue, Résidence Bellevue - Clémenceau - Entrée A2, 64200 Biarritz, France
description:
Offering free WiFi and city views, Bellevue 766 Biarritz is an accommodation situated right in the centre of Biarritz, just 100 metres from Grande Plage and 200 metres from Plage Pêcheurs. Located on the beachfront, this property features a casino. The property is non-smoking and is set 700 metres from Cote des Basques Beach.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Biarritz La Négresse Train Station is 4.9 km from the apartment, while Saint Jean de Luz Train Station is 19 km from the property. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 5 km from Bellevue 766 Biarritz.

name: Hôtel Le Windsor Biarritz
description:
Fully renovated in 2021, the environmentally-friendly Hôtel Le Windsor Biarritz is located on the beachfront, in the heart of Biarritz. It offers modern accommodation with sea views and free Wi-Fi access. A room service as well as a conciergerie service are provided.

It has soundproofed and air-conditioned guest rooms. Each elegantly designed room has an en suite bathroom, flat-screen TV with satellite channels and views of the sea, the town or the courtyard.

Hôtel Le Windsor Biarritz offers two breakfast options. Guests can choose from a continental breakfast in the room or a buffet breakfast. The bistronomic restaurant, 'Chez Eugénie Biarritz', offers seafood and meals made with fresh and seasonal produce, cooked on site.

A public car park is available 50 metres from the hotel, at an extra cost. Hôtel Le Windsor Biarritz is within easy access of the town’s many shops, covered market, the Aquarium, the Rocher de la Vierge and Bellevue Casino Congress Centre.

name: Coup de Cœur assuré pour ce T2 rénové Hyper centre
description:
Right in the heart of Biarritz, situated within a short distance of Grande Plage and Cote des Basques Beach, Coup de Cœur assuré pour ce T2 rénové Hyper centre offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. The property is located 3.3 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station, 18 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station and 18 km from Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church. The property is non-smoking and is set 500 metres from Plage Pêcheurs.

This apartment features 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Hendaye Train Station is 31 km from the apartment, while FICOBA is 31 km from the property. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 3 km from Coup de Cœur assuré pour ce T2 rénové Hyper centre.

name: Studio Biarritz 2 min Halles, 3 min plages, plein centre.
adresse: 8 Rue de la Fontaine, 64200 Biarritz, France
description:
Studio Biarritz 2 min Halles, 3 min plages, plein centre. Is set in the Biarritz City Centre district of Biarritz, 400 metres from Plage Port Vieux, 500 metres from Plage Pêcheurs and 3.3 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station. The property is around 18 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station, 18 km from Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church and 31 km from Hendaye Train Station. The property is 300 metres from the city centre and 300 metres from Cote des Basques Beach.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment offers a flat-screen TV and a kitchen with a dishwasher and microwave. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Biarritz, like walking tours.

FICOBA is 31 km from Studio Biarritz 2 min Halles, 3 min plages, plein centre., while Pasaiako portua is 43 km from the property. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 3 km from the accommodation.

name: Best Western Kemaris
adresse: 35 Avenue du Maréchal Joffre, 64200 Biarritz, France
description:
Blending vibrant surroundings, a host of facilities and an inviting ambience, the Best Western Kemaris hotel features typical architecture of the Basque Country.

Bright and spacious, the guest rooms of the Kemaris boast a sophisticated decor and a host of modern comforts, with a flat-screen television and free Wi-Fi access. Each room offers a beautiful decor blending design and natural touches, and some of them also come with large terrace.

A buffet breakfast consisting of regional products is prepared every morning at this hotel, and you can enjoy a drink from the bar.

The Kemaris Best Western has a privileged location from which to fully discover by foot the city of Biarritz, and there are many restaurants and bars within walking distance. Private on-site parking is available upon reservation.

name: Large studio with balcony at the heart of Biarritz - Welkeys
description:
Large studio with balcony at the heart of Biarritz - Welkeys is located in the Biarritz City Centre district of Biarritz, 300 metres from Cote des Basques Beach, 400 metres from Plage Pêcheurs and 3.7 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station. This property offers access to a balcony and free private parking. The property is 300 metres from Plage Port Vieux, and within 300 metres of the city centre.

With free WiFi, this apartment provides a satellite TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and oven. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Saint Jean de Luz Train Station is 18 km from the apartment, while Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church is 18 km away. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 4 km from Large studio with balcony at the heart of Biarritz - Welkeys.

name: Hôtel de La Plage
adresse: 3, esplanade du Port Vieux, 64200 Biarritz, France
description:
Situated in Biarritz and facing the ocean, Hôtel de La Plage offers rooms with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi access just 50 metres from the Plage du Vieux Port. The train station is located a 10-minute drive away.

The rooms at Hôtel de La Plage have a private bathroom with free toiletries. Some rooms have a view of the sea. Free Wi-Fi access is provided throughout.

A continental breakfast is available every morning. All type of restaurants can be found within 150 metres.

The hotel is a 5-minuted rive from the centre of Biarritz and 15 km from Saint-Jean de Luz. Biarritz-Anglet-Bayonne Airport is situated a 10-minute drive away.

name: Hôtel AKENA Biarritz - Grande plage
adresse: 19 Avenue De La Reine Victoria, 64200 Biarritz, France
description:
The Hotel Hôtel AKENA Biarritz - Grande plage is located just 300 metres from the main beach of Biarritz, close to the town centre. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi internet access.

The comfortable guest rooms are all air-conditioned and have a TV and wooden floors.

Private parking is available on site upon request, subject to availability. The casino, spa centre and the Palais de Congres are less than 10 minutes walk from the Hotel Hôtel AKENA Biarritz - Grande plage, and the Golf du Phare is only 900m away.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel Biarritz
description:
Located in the centre of Biarritz, the Radisson Blu Hotel overlooks the Côte des Basques surfer's beach, and is surrounded by nightlife, tapas bars, casino, local market and the Marine Museum. It features an outdoor rooftop pool, fitness centre and spa offering at a surcharge a range of massages, face and body treatments, hammam and sauna.

This 4-star property offers soundproofed air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom, a courtesy tray, a minibar and cable TV service.

Free WiFi access is available throughout the hotel. During school holidays, a play room with puzzles and Wii games is also available.

A buffet breakfast is served daily and guests can enjoy regional and international cuisine at the hotel’s restaurants and bars. There is a shaded terrace with panoramic views of the Atlantic coastline and the Pyrenees Mountains.

The hotel is a 15-minute drive from Biarritz Airport. Charging stations for electric cars are available at this property.

name: Hôtel Cosmopolitain
description:
Located 700 metres from the Rock of the Blessed Virgin and just 200 metres from the beach in central Biarritz, Hôtel Cosmopolitain is a  3-star hotel featuring elegantly decorated guest rooms and common areas.

Hôtel Cosmopolitain also offers free Wi-Fi access and air-conditioned guest rooms with a private bathroom and satellite TV in each.

Lunch is available and guests can enjoy a cocktail or a glass of champagne in the hotel bar.

There are numerous bars and restaurants in the streets around Hôtel Cosmopolitain. The Sea and Chocolate Museum are 1 km away and the hotel is a 10-minute drive from Biarritz airport and SNCF Train Station.

name: Hôtel Jules Verne, BW Signature Collection
description:
The hotel is located in central Biarritz, near the Palais des Festivals, the casino and the local beaches. Guests are invited to use the heated outdoor swimming pool.

All the modern rooms at the Hôtel Jules Verne are air-conditioned and soundproofed and feature a flat-screen TV with satellite. Free Wi-Fi is provided and adjoining rooms are available on request.

Breakfast can be enjoyed daily in the comfort of guest rooms and a Nespresso coffee machine is available in some rooms.

The friendly and attentive staff at the hotel will be happy to help you organise your stay in Biarritz 24 hours a day. Parking in a garage s available with an extra cost.

name: Chambre d'Hôtes Arima
adresse: 13 Bis, avenue du Parc Bon Air, 64200 Biarritz, France
description:
Located just 1 km from the centre of Biarritz, Chambre d’Hôtes Arima offers an outdoor, salt water swimming pool and some rooms are equipped with a terrace. The beach is just a 10-minute drive away.

Accessed by a private entrance, all rooms feature a garden, pool and as well as a private bathroom.
The establishment has a summer kitchen with free access.


A continental breakfast serving yogurt, fruit juice, homemade fruit salad and pastries is available each morning. Guests can find gastronomic and traditional restaurants within 500 metres of the property.
Thalasso therapy centres are accessible close to the establishment.

There is a golf course as well as walking and cycling paths just 3 km away. Additional features include a large garden, free Wi-Fi access and free public parking at a location nearby.

name: Hôtel & Espace Bien-être La Maison du Lierre
adresse: 3 avenue du Jardin Public, 64200 Biarritz, France
description:
Hôtel & Espace Bien-être La Maison du Lierre is located in Biarritz, 300 metres from the beach and 5 minutes from the convention centres Bellevue, Casino and Gare du Midi as well as 100 metres from Biarritz central market. It offers free WiFi and Canal + channel.

The charming Maison du Lierre hotel provides numerous services. These include breakfast which can be enjoyed on the terrace in summertime. Upon reservation and for an extra charge, guests also access the onsite sauna, massage services and spa treatments.
