Each room has a private bathroom with a walk-in shower. The rooms overlook an interior courtyard. Some have a balcony or terrace.

Guests have access to a private living room with a computer corner.

name: Hôtel Le Café de Paris
description:
Hôtel Le Café de Paris is in central Biarritz, on the pedestrian Place Bellevue and a 5-minute walk from the Halls. All the rooms have panoramic views of the sea.

All rooms are equipped with en suite Italian ceramic bathrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite and Canal+ channels and free Wi-Fi.

Guests can sample refined cuisine in Hôtel Le Café de Paris’ restaurant, which hasa menu elaborated by the Michelin-starred chef Cédric Béchade. The restaurant offers an outdoor terrace overlooking the Place Bellevue and the sea.

name: Studios Régina (Mer-Golf)
description:
Offering free WiFi throughout, Studio Regina Mer Vue Golf offers self-catering accommodation located in Biarritz, next to Biarritz-Le Phare Golf Course. The property is 500 from Biarritz’s Lighthouse and 2 km from the Rock of the Blessed Virgin. The beach is 300 metres away.

Decorated in a vintage or Scandinavian style, the studios will provide you with a TV, an iPod dock and cable channels. There is a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and an oven. Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer. You can enjoy views of Biarritz golf course.

Many activities in the surrounding area include golfing, cycling and hiking. Bicycles and scooters can be rented just 20 metres from the property. There are also restaurants nearby.

If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out Boulard Castle (1.9 km) and the Chocolate Museum (2.5 km). Biarritz - Anglet - Bayonne Airport and Biarritz - La Negresse Train Station are both 4.5 km away.

name: Very Nice 1st Floor Flat with large Terrace in Biarritz City Center
description:
Very Nice 1st Floor Flat with large Terrace in Biarritz City Center features a terrace and is located in Biarritz, within just 700 metres of Plage Pêcheurs and 1 km of Cote des Basques Beach. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Grande Plage is 700 metres away.

The apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a fridge. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Biarritz La Négresse Train Station is 3 km from the apartment, while Saint Jean de Luz Train Station is 17 km away. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 3 km from Very Nice 1st Floor Flat with large Terrace in Biarritz City Center.

name: Appartement Biarritz, 2 pièces, 4 personnes - FR-1-239-782
description:
Appartement Biarritz, 2 pièces, 4 personnes - FR-1-239-782 is located in the Biarritz City Centre district of Biarritz, 600 metres from Plage Pêcheurs, less than 1 km from Plage Miramar and a 11-minute walk from Cote des Basques Beach. The property is around 2.6 km from Plage Marbella, 3.2 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station and 17 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station. The property is 500 metres from Grande Plage, and within 300 metres of the city centre.

The apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and a dishwasher, and 1 bathroom. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church is 18 km from the apartment, while Hendaye Train Station is 31 km away. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 3 km from Appartement Biarritz, 2 pièces, 4 personnes - FR-1-239-782.

name: Le Gamaritz
adresse: 5 Perspective de la Côte des Basques, 64200 Biarritz, France
description:
Le Gamaritz is located in Biarritz city centre, just a 2-minute walk from the Port Vieux beach. It offers design, air-conditioned accommodations with a walk-in shower, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi.

Guests of Hotel Le Gamaritz can enjoy breakfast in the dining room or on the terrace, at an extra cost. Some restaurants and tapas bars can be found in the area.

The Gamaritz is 6 km from the A63 motorway. It is 700 metres from the Biarritz Barriere Casino and a 10-minute drive from Biarritz-Anglet-Bayonne Airport and Biarritz Train Station.

name: Résidence Vacances Bleues Le Grand Large
description:
Offering panoramic views of Biarritz Cote des Basques Beach and a heated outdoor swimming pool, Le Grand Large is an aparthotel situated in the heart of Biarritz, just 200 metres from the Old Harbour with various stores, local markets and tapas bars nearby.

The spacious studios at the Le Grand Large feature a loggia with blades viewing the Ocean or the Lighthouse. They all are equipped with a modern private bathroom and a complete kitchenette with ceramic hob.

A continental buffet breakfast is available.

This aparthotel is less than a 5-minute walk from Cote des Basques Beach. Within 3 km, guests can enjoy Biarritz Golf and Bidart Golf. Biarritz-Anglet-Bayonne Airport is 4 km away.

name: Adorable studio sur la plage
description:
Located 400 metres from Plage Miramar, 500 metres from Plage Pêcheurs and 3.4 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station, Adorable studio sur la plage provides accommodation situated in Biarritz. The property is around 18 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station, 18 km from Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church and 31 km from Hendaye Train Station. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Grande Plage is 300 metres away.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is provided. The accommodation is non-smoking.

FICOBA is 32 km from the apartment, while Pasaiako portua is 43 km away. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 3 km from Adorable studio sur la plage.

name: Hôtel des Ducs
adresse: 5, rue Lamonnoye, Dijon Centre Ville, 21000 Dijon, France
description:
This hotel is located in historic centre of Dijon, listed as a World Heritage site by Unesco, 50 metres from The Palace of the Dukes. The Hotel Des Ducs have the main buiding (Hotel des Ducs) and 2 annexes (Maison des Ducs 150 m from the Hotel and Residence des Ducs 300 m from the hotel).

It offers a bar and free Wi-Fi. Hotel Des Ducs serves a buffet breakfast each morning and guests can relax with a drink on the terrace.

Rooms at Hotel Des Ducs are equipped with a telephone, flat-screen TV and private bathroom with bath or shower. The rooms are accessible by lift and some are air-conditioned.

Hotel Des Ducs is less than 50 metres from the Museum of Fine Arts, the city's opera house and the city's shopping area. The Burgundy Wine Route begins just a 10-minute drive away.

name: Hôtel des Halles
description:
Located in Dijon historical city center, 50 metres from the pedestrian area, Hôtel des Halles features a free WiFi access. The Halles centrales Covered Market is located 300m walk away. The road of vintage wines of Bourgogne starts a 10-minute drive from the property.

All rooms provide air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom fitted with a walk-in shower. Rooms are accessible by lift.

A buffet breakfast is served daily at Hôtel des Halles.

Godrans Tramway Stop is 30 metres away and provides direct access to Dijon Zenith and Dijon University. Paid public parking is located 250 metres away.

name: Chambre d'hôtes Le Petit Tertre
adresse: 41 Rue Verrerie, Dijon Centre Ville, 21000 Dijon, France
description:
Le Petit Tertre is located in the centre of Dijon, a 3-minute walk from the Palace of the Dukes of Burgundy and offers free Wi-Fi.

All apartments are fully furnished in an 18th century style. The Apartment-Empire has views of the courtyard and is decorated in a Napoléon style.

Guests can have breakfast in their room.

This property is a short walk from the Musée des Beaux Arts de Dijon and the Notre Dame church.

name: Residhome Dijon Cité Des Vignes
description:
Residhome Dijon Cité Des Vignes is set in Dijon, less than 1 km from Dijon Train Station, a 10-minute walk from Foch-Gare Tramway Station, as well as 3.1 km from Dijon Congrexpo. It is situated less than 1 km from Saint-Philibert Church and features a 24-hour front desk. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

Each unit is fitted with air conditioning, a private bathroom and a well-fitted kitchenette including a dishwasher, microwave, fridge and a stovetop. Kitchenware and kettle are also offered. At the aparthotel, units have bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with fresh pastries, fruits and cheese are available each morning at the aparthotel.

Chenove Centre Tramway Station is 3.8 km from Residhome Dijon Cité Des Vignes, while Universite Tramway Station is 4.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 50 km from the accommodation.

name: Maison Philippe Le Bon
adresse: 18 rue Sainte Anne, Dijon Centre Ville, 21000 Dijon, France
description:
Set in the heart of the historic centre of Dijon, Maison Philippe Le Bon is 300 metres from Palais des Ducs de Bourgogne. Free WiFi in all rooms and all public areas of the hotel.

The air-conditioned rooms at Maison Philippe Le Bon have a private bathroom and flat screen TV. Rooms offer views over the city of Dijon, the interior garden or Gothic courtyard or over rue Sainte Anne.

Restaurant La Closerie serves inventive, seasonal gourmet cuisine, complemented by an excellent wine list featuring many local wines. La Closerie offers elegant dining in a setting dating back to the 17th century, with original floortiles, exposed beams and rustic stonework, yet infused with contemporary touches.

In the summertime, lunch and dinner can be served in the hotel's private garden. A full buffet breakfast is served daily.

Guests at Maison Philippe Le Bon can explore the historical centre, its quaint streets and squares, while visiting Les Halles market, a wide variety of museums and original boutiques and shops.

Gare de Dijon-Ville train station is a 5-minute drive or a 15-minute walk away from Maison Philippe Le Bon.

name: Hôtel République

adresse: 24 Rue du Pont Saint-Pierre, 31300 Toulouse, France
description:
Situated conveniently in the Toulouse Left Bank district of Toulouse, Aparthotel Adagio Original Toulouse Centre La Grave is set 2.2 km from Zénith de Toulouse, 2.9 km from Toulouse Stadium and 5.1 km from Amphitheatre Purpan-Ancely. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The aparthotel features family rooms.

The aparthotel will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a desk, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a a bath or shower. There is also a dining area and a fully equipped kitchen equipped with a fridge, a stovetop, and kitchenware. At the aparthotel, the units have bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with local specialities, fresh pastries and pancakes are available every morning at the aparthotel.

Popular points of interest near Aparthotel Adagio Original Toulouse Centre La Grave include Saint-Cyprien Republique Metro Station, Le Pont Neuf and Carmes Metro Station. The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: Appartements lumineux, quartier Bonnefoy
adresse: 133 Rue du Faubourg Bonnefoy, 31500 Toulouse, France
description:
Appartements lumineux, quartier Bonnefoy has air-conditioned guest accommodation in Toulouse, 6.1 km from Toulouse Stadium, 7.1 km from Zénith de Toulouse and 7.2 km from Amphitheatre Purpan-Ancely. It is located 14 km from Diagora Convention Centre and provides full-day security. The apartment features family rooms.

All units comprise a seating area with a sofa, a dining area, and a fully equipped kitchen with various cooking facilities, including a dishwasher, an oven, a microwave and a toaster. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also offer free WiFi. At the apartment complex, every unit has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Toulouse-Matabiau Station, Marengo-SNCF Metro Station and Jeanne d'Arc Metro Station. The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 8 km from Appartements lumineux, quartier Bonnefoy.

name: Ibis Styles Toulouse Centre Canal du Midi
adresse: 5 boulevard de la gare, 31500 Toulouse, France
description:
The ibis Styles Toulouse Center Canal du Midi is located in the center of Toulouse, on the banks of the Canal du Midi and next to the Halle aux Grains concert hall, just 1 km from Place du Capitole and 3.5 km from of the Toulouse stadium. Wi-Fi is available free of charge.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Ibis Styles Toulouse Center Canal du Midi each have a private bathroom. A flat-screen TV is also present in each room. The rooms are accessible by a lift.

A continental buffet breakfast is served every morning. The Ibis Styles Toulouse Center Canal du Midi offers a 24-hour reception and free newspapers. Private parking is available for an additional charge.

The hotel is a 10-minute walk from Toulouse-Matabiau Train Station and 4 km from the Parc des Expositions. Toulouse-Blagnac airport is 15 minutes away by car. François Verdier metro station is a 5-minute walk away. Secure underground parking is available at an additional cost.

name: Nemea Appart Hotel Concorde Toulouse Gare Matabiau
description:
Located in the centre of Toulouse, next to the Canal du Midi and in front of Toulouse Matabiau Train Station, Néméa Appart‘Hôtel Résidence Concorde offers a fitness centre located on the 9th floor, including a sauna.

At Néméa Appart‘Hôtel Résidence Concorde each accommodation is air-conditioned and includes a TV as well as free WiFi access. The private bathrooms are fitted with a bathtub.

The apartments and studios have a kitchenette equipped with a microwave. Restaurants and bars can be found within walking distance.

In-room beauty treatments are available upon request and for an extra charge.

Néméa Appart‘Hôtel Résidence Concorde's location makes it an excellent base to discover Toulouse with Toulouse centre and Place du Capitole a 15-minute walk away. Toulouse Blagnac Airport is a 15-minute drive from the property.

name: Plaza Hotel Capitole Toulouse - Anciennement-formerly CROWNE PLAZA
description:
The 4* Plaza Hotel (formely Crowne Plaza) is ideally located in the heart of the city, 200meters from Capitole underground train network, 10km from Blagnac Airport and 15km from the Exhibition & Convention Center MEETT.
The Capitole Opera House is 200meters from the hotel & Pierre Baudis Convention Center is a 10-minutes walk.

In each of our 162 rooms & suites, a work desk area, TV Plasma screen, a bathroom with bathtub, safe box, Wifi, Tea/Coffe maker, telephones.
Some of our rooms offer a view over the Capitole Square.

The American buffet breakfast is served Monday to Friday from 06h30AM to 10h30AM and Saturday-Sunday till 11h00AM.
The restaurant-Bar “L’Atrium” is open daily for lunch and dinner. The Chef proposes delicious homemade dishes prepared with fresh and local products. The Atrium Bar welcomes you to enjoy a wide range of cocktails and drinks.

Our reception is open 24/7 all year round. And a free WIFI is available throughout the hotel.
The fitness center, reserved only for the hotel’s clients, is open daily from 06h30AM to 10h00PM.

Many tourist attractions are within walking distance from the hotel: Saint Sernin Cathedral, Couvent des Jacobins, Les Augustins Museum, Garonne river.

This is our guests' favorite part of Toulouse, according to independent reviews.

name: Appartements Design Hypercentre
description:
Situated in the centre of Toulouse, Appartements Design Hypercentre features accommodation with free WiFi in a historic building. This 4-star apartment offers a 24-hour front desk and private check-in and check-out. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

All units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a walk-in shower and free toiletries. A dishwasher, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units include bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Esquirol Metro Station, Carmes Metro Station and Jean-Jaures Metro Station. The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 8 km from Appartements Design Hypercentre.

name: Hotel Ours Blanc - Centre
description:
The Hotel Ours Blanc is located on the Place Victor Hugo, in central Toulouse. The Hotel Ours Blanc is situated 200 metres from Jeanne d’Arc Metro Station. Toulouse Stadium is 4 km from the property. Free WiFi is available in common areas.

Each guest room is soundproofed, air-conditioned and has a TV and high speed WiFi access.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast. You will find numerous restaurants nearby.

Guests can visit the nearby theatres, Gaumont and UCG cinemas. Hotel Ours Blanc – Centre can also visit the nearby Canal du Midi, the Place du Capitole and the Victor Hugo Market.

name: My Toul'House
adresse: 16 Boulevard de la Marquette, 31000 Toulouse, France
description:
Offering free WiFi and garden views, My Toul'House is an accommodation set in the heart of Toulouse, just 600 metres from Pierre Baudis Japanese Garden and 700 metres from Compans Caffarelli Metro Station. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment features family rooms.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Jeanne d'Arc Metro Station, Jean-Jaures Metro Station and Capitole Metro Station. The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 6 km from My Toul'House.

name: Hôtel Une Chambre en Ville
adresse: 67 bis rue des Chalets, 31000 Toulouse, France
description:
Attractively situated in the Matabiau district of Toulouse, Hôtel Une Chambre en Ville is situated 4.3 km from Toulouse Expo, 5 km from Zénith de Toulouse and 5 km from Toulouse Stadium. The property is located 6 km from Amphitheatre Purpan-Ancely, 1 km from Pierre Baudis Japanese Garden and 1.5 km from Place du Capitole. Free WiFi is available and private garage at an extra charge of €25 upon reservation.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Hôtel Une Chambre en Ville features some rooms with city views, and rooms include a coffee machine. At the accommodation rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests can enjoy a take-out breakfast, in the room or outside.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are always on hand to help.

The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 9 km from Hôtel Une Chambre en Ville.

name: Hôtel Raymond 4 Toulouse
description:
With private parking, Hôtel Raymond 4 Toulouse is a 5-minute walk from the Place du Capitole in Toulouse. It offers art deco inspired accommodation with free WiFi access and air conditioning. Toulouse Stadium is 4.5 km from the property, while Toulouse Business School is 1,5 km away.

The guest rooms have been individually decorated and are soundproofed. Each one is equipped with a radio, a private bathroom and a TV with Canal+ and international channels.

At Hôtel Raymond 4 Toulouse a full breakfast is served daily and can be sampled in the comfort of your room. Room service is also available.

The Pierre Baudis Congress Centre is a 15-minute walk from Hôtel Raymond 4 Toulouse. Jeanne d’Arc Metro Station is 250 metres away, and Toulouse-Matabiau Train Station can be reached by foot in 5 minutes.

We only have a classic outlet at the back of the garage. The electric recharge will be charged 10€ per night or day, and this, according to availability.

name: Hôtel Innes by HappyCulture
description:
This hotel is located in Toulouse city centre, next to the Jeanne d’Arc Metro stop. Free Wi-Fi access is provided, and guests have a coffee corner at their disposal in the reception hall.

Hôtel Innes by HappyCulture features rooms equipped with air-conditioning. All rooms have a contemporary design, a private bathroom, a TV and a courtesy tray.

There is a 24-hour front desk service.

A Buffet Breakfast is available for guests everyday .

Hôtel Innes by HappyCulture is a 5-minute walk from the Basilique Saint-Sernin and an ideal base for discovering the city of Toulouse and the River Garonne.

name: Aparthotel Adagio Access Toulouse Jolimont
description:
This Adagio Access Hotel is located in Toulouse, just 10 metres from Jolimont Metro station (line A) and 5 km from Toulouse Stadium. It has an outdoor swimming pool and offers air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi internet access.

Each studio at the Adagio Access Toulouse Jolimont has a satellite TV and a private bathroom. Guests can find free public parking nearby.

The Toulouse Jolimont Hotel provides a 24-hour reception. It is located 800 metres from Matabiau Train Station, as well as a 20-minutes walk or 3 metro stops from Place du Capitole.

name: Appartement T4 central quartier Saint-Georges
adresse: 17 Rue des Pénitents Blancs, 31000 Toulouse, France
description:
In the heart of Toulouse, set within a short distance of Esquirol Metro Station and Carmes Metro Station, Appartement T4 central quartier Saint-Georges offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. It is located 5 km from Zénith de Toulouse and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 3.6 km from Toulouse Stadium.

The spacious apartment features 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Jardin Royal, Capitole Metro Station and Place du Capitole. The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 8 km from Appartement T4 central quartier Saint-Georges.

name: Hôtel Le Père Léon
description:
Located in the centre of Toulouse, this 3-star hotel is just in front of Esquirol Metro Station and 3 km from Toulouse Stadium. It offers free WiFi access and en suite rooms serviced by an elevator.

All the air-conditioned rooms at Hôtel Le Père Léon are soundproofed and feature a flat-screen TV with Canal+ and BeIn sport channels. They provide a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hairdryer and a bath or shower. Some are suitable for guests with reduced mobility.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at Hôtel Le Père Léon. Restaurants and cafés can be found within 350 metres of the property.

This hotel is 180 metres from the Augustins Museum and a 3-minute walk from the Garonne River. Saint-Sernin Basilica is a 15-minute walk away.

name: The Social Hub Toulouse
description:
Attractively located in Toulouse, The Social Hub Toulouse features air-conditioned rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a fitness centre. Boasting a shared lounge, this property also has a restaurant and a terrace. Guests can have a drink at the bar.

At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a desk and a flat-screen TV. Rooms are equipped with a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while some rooms include a kitchenette fitted with a fridge. At The Social Hub Toulouse every room has bed linen and towels.

You can play billiards and table tennis at this 4-star hotel, and the area is popular for cycling.

The accommodation provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Speaking Arabic, English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area.

Popular points of interest near The Social Hub Toulouse include Pierre Baudis Japanese Garden, Compans Caffarelli Metro Station and Saint-Cyprien Republique Metro Station. The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 6 km from the hotel.

name: Duplex Tolosa - Near Pont-Neuf, 2 bedrooms 85m2, AC, Free car park - Proche Pont-Neuf, T3 85m2 avec clim, parking gratuit
adresse: 33 Rue de la République, 31300 Toulouse, France
description:
Located in Toulouse and only 2.2 km from Zénith de Toulouse, Duplex Tolosa - Near Pont-Neuf, 2 bedrooms 85m2, AC, Free car park - Proche Pont-Neuf, T3 85m2 avec clim, parking gratuit provides accommodation with city views, free WiFi and free private parking. The air-conditioned accommodation is 2.9 km from Toulouse Stadium. Amphitheatre Purpan-Ancely is 5.1 km from the apartment and Diagora Convention Centre is 13 km away.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Saint-Cyprien Republique Metro Station, Le Pont Neuf and Carmes Metro Station. The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 7 km from Duplex Tolosa - Near Pont-Neuf, 2 bedrooms 85m2, AC, Free car park - Proche Pont-Neuf, T3 85m2 avec clim, parking gratuit.

name: Résidences Guerlin
description:
Résidences Guerlin features accommodation within 500 metres of the centre of Toulouse, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with an oven, a microwave and a fridge. The property has garden and city views, and is 5.7 km from Zénith de Toulouse. The property offers soundproof units and is situated 4.4 km from Toulouse Stadium.

At the aparthotel, units have a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Some units have a seating area and/or a balcony with an outdoor dining area. All units will provide guests with a stovetop.

Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Jean-Jaures Metro Station, Marengo-SNCF Metro Station and Capitole Metro Station. The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 7 km from Résidences Guerlin.

name: Grand Hotel de l'Opera - BW Premier Collection
description:
This hotel is located in central Toulouse, 100 metres from the Capitole Metro station. It has a flowered courtyard and free WiFi is available throughout.

The Grand Hotel de l’Opera offers air-conditioned rooms with classic décor and equipped with free WiFi, satellite TV and a private bathroom. Some rooms also have a seating area.

A buffet breakfast is available daily and guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar. Many restaurants can be found in the neighbourhood.

Guests can easily explore the main attractions of the Pink City. The Hotel de l’Opera is situated opposite the famous Theatre du Capitole, 5 km from Toulouse Stadium and Basilica Saint-Sernin is just a 5-minute walk away.

name: Le Clocher de Rodez Centre Gare
description:
Hôtel Le Clocher de Rodez is located in the heart of Toulouse, 700 metres from the Toulouse-Matabiau Train Station. It offers soundproofed accommodation with air conditioning and free WiFi internet access.

Each guest room at Le Clocher de Rodez hotel is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, as well as tea and coffee making facilities. Rooms are serviced by a lift and have a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at Le Clocher de Rodez.

The hotel provides a 24-hour reception, and massages are also available upon request.

Le Clocher de Rodez is close to Jeanne d'Arc Metro Station and 600 metres from the Capitole Square. A public shuttle service to Blagnac Airport runs every 20 minutes. Toulouse Stadium is 4.5 km from the property.

name: Moxy Lille City
adresse: 3, Rue Jean Bart, Lille Centre, 59000 Lille, France
description:
Conveniently set in Lille, Moxy Lille City provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers a bar. Private parking is available on site.

All units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Languages spoken at the reception include English and French.

Popular points of interest near Moxy Lille City include Coilliot House, Printemps Gallery and Hospice Gantois. The nearest airport is Lille Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Lille Europe
adresse: avenue Le Corbusier, Lille Centre, 59777 Lille, France
description:
Located just 250 metres from Lille-Flandres Train Station, this 3-star hotel is set at the heart of the international business district. Pierre Mauroy Stadium is a 17-minute drive away. This hotel has a 24-hour reception and free internet access.

All soundproofed guest rooms are equipped with a TV with cable channels. Each colourful room includes a private bathroom with a hairdryer. All rooms at Hotel Lille Europe are serviced by a lift.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning and guests can use the microwave in the breakfast room featuring panoramic views.

Lille Europe hotel is accessible via the N356 motorway. The Opéra House is 750 metres from the hotel and Notre-Dame Basilica is a 10-minute walk away. Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre is 1.1 km from the hotel and the Grand Palais is 1.3 km from the hotel. Private parking on site is available and upon request only.

name: Stay Appart Hotel Lille Centre
adresse: 4 Rue des Deux Epées, Lille Centre, 59800 Lille, France
description:
Set in Lille, Stayappart Lille Nouveau Siècle offers two apartments with free WiFi access. The unit is 100 metres from Printemps Gallery.

An oven, a microwave and a Nespresso machine can be found in the apartment's kitchen. A flat-screen TV with cable channels is offered.

Guests have access to a shared laundry room with a combo washer dryer and ironing facilities.

Several shops and restaurants can be found nearby the property.

Grand Place Lille is 200 metres from Stayappart Lille Nouveau Siècle, while Lille's Opera is 400 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Lille Airport, 8 km from Stayappart Lille Nouveau Siècle. Lille Flandres train station is a 10-minute walk away from the apartment.

name: Hotel Chagnot
adresse: 24 Place De La Gare, Lille Centre, 59800 Lille, France
description:
Hotel Chagnot is situated in Lille city centre, directly opposite Lille Flanders Train Station and a 10-minute walk from Lille-Europe Station. It offers modern accommodation and free Wi-Fi access. Nouveau Siecle Convention Centre and Grand Palais Convention Centre are both 1 km away.

All of the soundproofed guest rooms have a private bathroom with shower and they are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

Hotel Chagnot serves an express breakfast to takeaway.

The hotel is located 8.8 km from Lille-Lesquin Airport. Le Palais des Beaux-Arts Museum is 15-minute walk from the hotel. Department stores Printemps and Galeries Lafayette are a 10-minute walk away, while the Opéra de Lille is 450 metres away. Pierre Mauroy Stadium is a 16-minute drive away.

name: OKKO Hotels Lille Centre
adresse: 13 Rue d'Amiens, Lille Centre, 59800 Lille, France
description:
OKKO Hotels Lille Centre has a fitness centre, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Lille. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is 400 metres from the city centre and 600 metres from Hospice Gantois.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At OKKO Hotels Lille Centre rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

The accommodation features amenities such as an on-site business centre and sauna.

Popular points of interest near OKKO Hotels Lille Centre include Lille Flandres Train Station, Printemps Gallery and Grand Place Lille. The nearest airport is Lille Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Aparthotel Adagio Lille Centre Grand Place
adresse: 76 Rue De L Hopital Militaire, Lille Centre, 59800 Lille, France
description:
Aparthotel Adagio Lille Centre Grand Place features accommodation within 700 metres of the centre of Lille, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware. This 4-star aparthotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a lift. The aparthotel has family rooms and facilities for disabled guests.

The aparthotel will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a dishwasher, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with local specialities, fresh pastries and fruits are available each morning at the aparthotel. There is a coffee shop and lounge.

You can play billiards at Aparthotel Adagio Lille Centre Grand Place. Guests can also relax on the sun terrace.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Printemps Gallery, Hospice Gantois and Coilliot House. The nearest airport is Lille Airport, 9 km from Aparthotel Adagio Lille Centre Grand Place.

name: Eklo Hotels Lille
adresse: 6 rue professeur Langevin, Fives, 59000 Lille, France
description:
Offering a terrace, Eklo Hotels Lille is set in Lille in the Nord-Pas-de-Calais Region, 2 km from Zénith of Lille. Lille Europe Train Station is 2.7 km away and Lille Flandres Train Station is 2.6 km away.

All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom. Other services (toiletries and late check-out) are available at the hotel for an extra fee.

You will find a 24-hour front desk and a bar at the property. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant called Barbapizz', which serves pizzas and salads. A self-service continental breakfast is available daily at an extra cost.

A shared kitchen, a library as well as board games and a table football are at guests' disposal. Bicycle rental and electric charging stations for cars are available at an extra cost. The nearest airport is Lille Airport, 7 km from the property.  Free private parking is available on site.

name: Holiday Inn Express Lille Centre, an IHG Hotel
adresse: 75 Bis Rue Leon Gambetta, Lille Centre, 59000 Lille, France
description:
Located in Lille city centre, this hotel is 350 metres from Lille’s Palais des Beaux Arts and 9 km from Pierre Mauroy Stadium. Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre is 900 metres from the property and Lille Grand Palais is 2 km away.

Rooms at the Holiday Inn Express Lille Centre are equipped with a flat-screen TV, a telephone, hairdryer and tea and coffee making facilities. All rooms are serviced by a lift. Free WiFi access is available.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast daily.

The Holiday Inn Express Lille Centre offers a 24-hour reception desk and secured, underground parking (subject to availability). Additional facilities include 1 meeting room and a dry-cleaning service.

The nearest Metro Station is République Beaux Arts, which offers direct access to Lille Europe and Lille Flandres Train Stations. The hotel is located 800 metres from La Grande Place and 1.5 km from The Citadel of Lille.

name: Brueghel
adresse: 3-5 Parvis St Maurice, Lille Centre, 59000 Lille, France
description:
This hotel is located in the heart of Lille. It is 300 metres from Gare Lille Flandres, 750 metres from Gare de Lille Europe and 10 minutes from Nouveau Siecle Convention Centre by walk. It has views of the Gothic St Maurice Church, which is situated across from the hotel.

All rooms are furnished with antique furniture. They include free Wi-Fi access, a TV and a private bathroom.

The hotel Brueghel has a unique antique design with statues and paintings on displayed, also a feature is the 1930's lift that can take guests to their rooms.

A continental breakfast is served every morning, and the hotel offers 24-hour front desk service.

Nouveau Siecle Convention Centre is a 20-minute walk from Brueghel. Euralille and Les Tanneurs shopping centres are only 120 and 450 metres away.

name: Grand Hotel Bellevue - Grand Place
adresse: 5, rue Jean Roisin, Lille Centre, 59000 Lille, France
description:
On the Grand Place in Old Lille, Grand Hotel Bellevue - Grand Place is set in a building of Flemish architecture and the rooms offer a marble bathroom and antique furniture. Rihour Metro Station is 100 metres away, Le Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre is a 2-minute walk from the property and Lille Grand Palais is 1.4 km away.

The hotel was renovated in 2018. Each air-conditioned guest room is equipped with satellite TV and free WiFi access. The elegant, soundproofed rooms include a minibar and some have tea and coffee making facilities. Staff is available 24 hours a day.

An extensive and varied buffet breakfast is served every morning at the Grand Hotel Bellevue - Grand Place. Guests can enjoy cocktails in Le Windsor bar and there are restaurants 50 metres away.

The historic centre is a 5-minute walk and Lille Flandres Train Station is 900 metres away.  Bois de Boulogne Park and the Citadelle are 1.5 km away and Lesquin Airport is 11 km away. Meeting rooms are available on site. There is a public car park 100 metres away.

name: Safari chic
adresse: 20 Rue des Canonniers, Lille Centre, 59800 Lille, France
description:
Offering garden views, Safari chic is an accommodation set in Lille, 600 metres from Grand Place Lille and less than 1 km from Tour de Lille. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a housekeeping service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 500 metres from Lille Opera, and within less than 1 km of the city centre.

The 1-bedroom apartment has a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Lille Europe Train Station, Lille Flandres Train Station and Hospice Gantois. The nearest airport is Lille, 10 km from Safari chic, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Art Deco Euralille
adresse: 110, Avenue de la République, 59110 Lille, France
description:
Located 1 km from Lille-Europe Train Station, Hotel Art Deco Euralille is situated in the heart of the Euralille business district. The Grand Place is a 20-minute walk away, while Lille Grand Palais and Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre are 1.7 km from Hotel Art Deco Euralille. This hotel features an on site bar.

Rooms are bright and have an Art Deco design. They each have air-conditioning, a satellite TV and free WiFi access. All rooms are serviced by a lift.

In the evening, guests are invited to relax in the hotel’s bar, which features a stained glass ceiling from the 1930s and leather chairs. There is also a library at the disposal of guests.

Romarin Metro and Tram Station is located in front of the hotel and offers direct access to Lille Flandres Station.

name: Lille A Part - Gites Urbains
adresse: 9 rue du Pont Neuf, Vieux Lille, 59800 Lille, France
description:
Located in the heart of Lille Old Town, this property offers 2 apartments located just a 10-minute walk from Lille Flandres Train Station, 2 km from Lille Grand Palais and 1.1 km from Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre. You can admire the courtyard from the living room while browsing the free WiFi.

Set in an 18th-century building, Lille A Part is now decorated in a contemporary style and includes a seating area with a flat-screen TV. There is also a dining area and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The hosts can provide a continental breakfast or you can prepare breakfast yourself using the toaster and Nespresso coffee machine. There are also hot-plates and a microwave for making hot meals.

Public parking with an additional charge is available near the apartment and Lille Europe Train Station is a 15-minute walk away. You may also choose to visit the Grand Place, also 15 minutes away on foot.

name: Campanile Lille Euralille
adresse: 23 Allée Vauban - La Madeleine, 59110 Lille, France
description:
Located 1 km from Lille Europe, 2 km from Lille’s Grand’ Place and 260 metres from Romarin Tram Stop, Campanile Lille Euralille is a 24-hour-front-desk hotel which features a restaurant. Pierre Mauroy Stadium is 10 km away.

Free Wi-Fi is provided in the rooms equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable and satellite channels and a private bathroom with bathtub or shower and hairdryer.

Every morning, a breakfast buffet is served at the hotel, and guests can enjoy it at an extra cost. They can also sample the hotel’s restaurant cuisine.

There is an outdoor car park, available at a surcharge. Euralille shopping centre is 2 km away, while Lille Palais des Beaux-Arts and Citadel of Lille are 2.5 km away. Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre is 1.9 km from the hotel while Roubaix and Lille-Lesquin Airports are just 10 km away.

name: Lille City Hotel
adresse: 57 rue de Bethune, Lille Centre, 59000 Lille, France
description:
Set on a pedestrian shopping street in Lille City Centre, this low-cost hotel is 260 metres from the Palais des Beaux-Arts Museum, 1.2 km from Lille Grand Palais and 9 km from Pierre Mauroy Stadium. Rooms feature satellite TV and free internet access.

Each air-conditioned guest room at Lille City Hotel is equipped with a telephone. All of the rooms have a private bathroom and are serviced by a lift.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at Lille City Hotel. There are many restaurants within walking distance of the hotel.

Lille-Flandres Train Station is just a 10-minute walk from Lille City Hotel. The Opera House and Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre are 600 metres from the hotel and the historic centre is 1 km away.

name: Citadines City Centre Lille
adresse: 83 Avenue Willy Brandt-Euralille, Lille Centre, 59777 Lille, France
description:
Located a 5-minute walk from the pedestrianised historical centre of Lille, this Citadines is 260 metres from Lille Flandres Train Station. The property is also a part of the Euralille business centre, located 8 km from Pierre Mauroy Stadium. WiFi internet access is available throughout the residence and is free of charge.

The Citadines Apart'hotel Lille Centre offers fully equipped studios and apartments which are ideal for one night or long stays. They include a kitchenette, en suite facilities and modern amenities such as satellite TV.

Citadines Apart'hotel offers reception service 24 hours a day. A continental breakfast is served daily from 07:00 to 10:00.

Citadines City Centre Lille is a 15-minute walk from Palais des Beaux Arts. The Grand Palais and Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre are both located within a 20-minute walk of the hotel.

name: CALM Appart' & Hostel
adresse: 2 rue des Buisses, Lille Centre, 59000 Lille, France
description:
Calm Apparthotel is located in Lille just a 2-minute walk away from the Gare Lille Flandres metro, tram and train stations and the a 10-minute walk from Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre. Guests can enjoy free WiFi.

The contemporary apartments at Calm Apparthotel are decorated in neutral tones. Each apartment offers a kitchenette, a flat-screen TV, a desk and a private bathroom with a shower.

Guests can prepare homemade meals in their private kitchenette equipped with a stove, microwave and a refrigerator. Restaurants and supermarkets can be found within a 5-minute walk.

The Lille-Lesquin Airport is 15 minutes away and the Citadel of Lille is 2 km away. Grand Palais is 900 metres away from Calm Apparthotel. Private parking is available at the aparthotel at an extra cost.

name: greet hotel Lille Gare Flandres - Groupe Accor
adresse: 14, rue du Molinel, Lille Centre, 59000 Lille, France
description:
Bienvenue dans le tout premier Greet de Lille. Notre hôtel vous accueille en face de la gare de Lille-Flandres.

L'emplacement idéal pour vos déplacements professionnels ou pour une visite de notre belle région.

Nous mettons à votre disposition différents types de chambres aménagées et décorées avec soin dans le respect de nos valeurs éco-responsables.

Depuis le 1er Septembre 2023, nous vous offrons également la possibilité de déjeuner ou dîner dans notre toute nouvelle brasserie bistronomique : Chez Simone.


Par sa vitalité culturelle, sa qualité de vie, son dynamisme économique et son énergie festive, la ville de Lille se présente désormais comme l'incontournable capitale de l'Eurorégion.


Toute l'équipe du Greet de Lille Flandres est heureuse de vous accueillir prochainement à Lille. Nous vous attendons avec impatience pour une expérience conviviale dans un lieu chaleureux et éco-engagé.

name: Kyriad Lille Gare - Grand Palais
adresse: 53-57 rue Christophe Colomb, Fives, 59800 Lille, France
description:
Located 1 km from Lille Grand Palais and the Euralille business district, the Kyriad Lille Gare - Grand Palais offers soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi. Free closed private parking is also available.

ATTENTION: the hotel is currently undergoing renovation and may be noisy during pre-set hours; however, everything is in place to welcome you in the best conditions.

Each room at Kyriad Lille Gare - Grand Palais includes a flat-screen TV, telephone and tea and coffee-making facilities. The attractively decorated rooms feature a bathroom with shower and hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is available every day. You can enjoy your meals 24 hours a day in the comfort of your room. After dinner, you can relax with a drink in the hotel bar or watch TV in the lounge. Other facilities include a meeting room.

The nearest metro station to the hotel is Caulier (Line 1), 450 meters away. The hotel is ideally located 7 minutes' walk from Lille Europe station and 10 minutes' walk from Lille Flandres station. The Zenith and Aéronef concert halls are 8 and 10 minutes' walk respectively, and the Grand Place is a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

The Pierre Mauroy stadium is 10 km from the Kyriad Lille Gare - Grand Palais. The N356 motorway is within easy reach, a 3-minute drive away.

name: Domitys L'Agapanthe
adresse: Rue Courtois, Lille Sud, 59000 Lille, France
description:
Set just 2.5 km from Coilliot House, Domitys L'Agapanthe provides accommodation in Lille with access to an indoor pool, a garden, as well as full-day security. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and a lift for guests.

Each unit has a balcony, a satellite flat-screen TV, a dining area, a well-fitted kitchenette and a private bathroom with shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. At the aparthotel, units come with bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with fruits, juice and cheese are available every morning at the aparthotel. A bar can be found on-site.

Hospice Gantois is 3.5 km from Domitys L'Agapanthe, while Lille Grand Palais is 3.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Lille Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Kanaï
adresse: 10 Rue De Béthune (adresse postale) / Entrée rue de la Vieille Comédie, Lille Centre, 59000 Lille, France
description:
Hotel Kanaï is located in the centre of Lille, in a pedestrianised area, only 200 metres from the famous Grand Place, a 15-minute walk from Lille Grand Palais and a 6-minute walk from Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre.

All rooms feature flat-screen satellite TV and modern furnishings.

A breakfast is available daily and is composed of produce from local farms.

Shops, restaurants and bars can be found within walking distance.

The friendly and attentive staff at the Hotel Kanaï will be happy to help you organise your stay in Lille 24 hours a day. Lille-Europe TGV Train Station is 1 km away and Lille Flandres Train Station is 550 metres from the property.

name: Lille Grand Place - Nice and equipped studio!
adresse: 102 Rue Pierre Mauroy, Lille Centre, 59800 Lille, France
description:
Lille Grand Place - Nice and equipped studio! features accommodation within 300 metres of the centre of Lille, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with an oven, a microwave and a fridge. The property is close to Hospice Gantois, Printemps Gallery and Zénith of Lille. Tour de Lille is 1.1 km from the apartment and Lille Europe Train Station is less than 1 km away.

A stovetop and kitchenware are also available, as well as a coffee machine. At the apartment complex, each unit has a desk, a TV and a private bathroom.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Grand Place Lille, Lille Opera and Lille Flandres Train Station. The nearest airport is Lille Airport, 9 km from Lille Grand Place - Nice and equipped studio!.

name: Hotel De La Treille
adresse: 7/9 Place Louise de Bettignies, Vieux Lille, 59000 Lille, France
description:
Hôtel de la Treille is located a 3-minute walk from Lille old district, 650 meters from Nouveau Siecle Convention Centre and 1.5 km from Lille Grand Palais. This pet-friendly accommodation offers free WiFi throughout.

All rooms feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Lille's Opera is 350 metres away, while Lille Europe train station is 15 minutes away by walk. Hôtel de la Treille is a 17-minute drive from Pierre Mauroy Stadium.

name: Novotel Suites Lille Europe
adresse: Boulevard De Turin, Lille Centre, 59000 Lille, France
description:
Set in the city centre, this 4-star hotel is just 600 metres from Lille-Flandres Train Station, a 11-minute walk from Lille Grand Palais and 10 km from Pierre Mauroy Stadium. It features a fitness centre and offers suites with free WiFi access and a microwave.

Each modern suite has a flat-screen TV and tea and coffee making facilities. The private bathrooms include a hairdryer. All of the rooms are serviced by a lift.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the Novotel Suites. Relax in an armchair while enjoying a drink from the Comptoirs Nomads Bar. Luxury food is sold in the hotel’s Boutique Gourmande.

The reception open 24 hours/24.

Grand Palais-Zénith is 800 metres from the hotel, Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre is 1.7 km from Novotel Suites Lille Europe and the Palais des Beaux-Arts Museum is 1.3 km away.

name: Hôtel Saint Maurice
adresse: 8 Parvis St Maurice, Lille Centre, 59800 Lille, France
description:
Located in a quiet pedestrian area in the centre of Lille, next to the Saint Maurice Gothic church, the hotel offers free WiFi access in all areas. Nouveau Siecle Convention Centre is 850 metres from Hôtel Saint Maurice.

Hôtel Saint Maurice features 38 rooms accessible by lift. Each room features a flat-screen TV and free WiFi access.

The hotel is 10 minutes walking from the old town and its museums. Lille Grand Place is 450 metres away, while Lille Grand Palais is 1.5 km from the hotel. Public parking is available at a surcharge near the property.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Le Havre Centre
adresse: 128 Boulevard Clemenceau, Perret, 76600 Le Havre, France
description:
Hilton Garden Inn Le Havre Centre is located on the beachfront in Le Havre, 350 metres from Le Havre Beach and 300 metres from Eglise St-Joseph. Popular points of interest nearby include Musee des Beaux Arts Andre Malraux, Normandy Business School and Museum Maison de l'Armateur. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, room service and luggage storage for guests.

All units will provide guests with a small fridge.

Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet and a continental breakfast.

Popular points of interest near Hilton Garden Inn Le Havre Centre include Le Volcan, Perret Model Appartment and Eglise St-Joseph. The nearest airport is Deauville - Normandie Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Le Marignan,Le Havre Centre Gare
adresse: 211 Boulevard de Strasbourg, Perret, 76600 Le Havre, France
description:

The property is located 2 km from Eglise St-Joseph, 23 km from Norman Museum of Ethnography and Popular Arts and 23 km from Honfleur's Old Harbour. The accommodation provides karaoke and room service.

The units at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, certain units at The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Le Marignan, Le Havre Centre Gare also provide guests with a city view. All guest rooms feature a desk.

Speaking English and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are willing to help at any time of the day.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Le Volcan, Saint-Michel's Church and Perret Model Appartment. The nearest airport is Deauville - Normandie Airport, 37 km from The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Le Marignan, Le Havre Centre Gare.

name: All Suites Appart Hotel Le Havre
adresse: 5-7 Place Armand Frémont, 76600 Le Havre, France
description:
Set in Le Havre in the Upper Normandy region with Le Volcan and Perret Model Appartment nearby, All Suites Appart Hotel Le Havre provides accommodation with access to a fitness room. This 3-star aparthotel offers a lift and full-day security. The aparthotel offers a sun terrace, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The units at the aparthotel come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchen, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. At the aparthotel, all units are soundproof. At the aparthotel, the units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Le Havre Beach is 2.8 km from the aparthotel, while Saint-Michel's Church is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Le Havre Octeville Airport, 7 km from All Suites Appart Hotel Le Havre.

name: Holiday Inn Express - Le Havre Centre
adresse: 126 Cours De La Republique, 76600 Le Havre, France
description:
Our hotel, located in Le Havre downtown and at 600 meters from the SNCF train station, welcomes you for a professional and leisure stay. Our location is ideal to quickly reach the city center or the beach by the streetcar, accessible in front of the hotel. You will appreciate the quality of amenities: Wi-Fi, snacking, buffet style breakfast and the lounge bar. In order to facilitate your arrival by car, you can enjoy our private parking
. Book one of our large cosy rooms and enjoy your stay!

name: Odalys City Le Havre Centre Les Docks
description:

The units come with carpeted floor and feature a fully equipped kitchenette with a dishwasher, a dining area, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine. At the aparthotel, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

A buffet breakfast is available daily at the aparthotel.

Le Havre Beach is 2.9 km from Odalys City Le Havre Centre Les Docks, while Saint-Michel's Church is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Le Havre Octeville Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: Résidence GABRIELLE
adresse: 27 Quai de Southampton, 76600 Le Havre, France
description:
A recently renovated property, Résidence GABRIELLE is set in Le Havre near Le Havre Beach, Le Volcan and Perret Model Appartment. The property has inner courtyard views and is less than 1 km from Eglise St-Joseph and a 17-minute walk from Saint-Michel's Church. The apartment features family rooms.

The units come with an oven, toaster, a kettle, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. The units come with a coffee machine, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while some rooms come with a terrace and some have sea views. At the apartment complex, the units include bed linen and towels.

Norman Museum of Ethnography and Popular Arts is 24 km from the apartment, while Honfleur's Old Harbour is 24 km away. The nearest airport is Le Havre Octeville Airport, 6 km from Résidence GABRIELLE.

name: The Originals Boutique, Hôtel d'Angleterre, Le Havre, centre, plage
adresse: 1 Rue Louis Philippe, Perret, 76600 Le Havre, France
description:
This hotel is located in the town centre of Le Havre, just 100 metres from the sea and next to the Malraux museum. It offers free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.

Each guest room at the The Originals Boutique, Hôtel d'Angleterre, Le Havre, centre, plage has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. A buffet breakfast is served every morning.

Parking is available in front of the hotel, which is free during the night and on Sundays and public holidays.

The The Originals Boutique, Hôtel d'Angleterre, Le Havre, centre, plage is a 30-minute drive from both Honfleur and Etretat. Deauville and Trouville are 40 km away.

name: Saint Michel - Centre Ville - Coty
adresse: 18 Parvis Saint-Michel, Perret, 76600 Le Havre, France
description:
Saint Michel - Centre Ville - Coty has a terrace and is situated in Le Havre, within just 1.4 km of Le Havre Beach and a few steps of Saint-Michel's Church. It is located less than 1 km from Le Volcan and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 700 metres from Perret Model Appartment.

With free WiFi, this apartment features a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and toaster. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Eglise St-Joseph is 1.3 km from the apartment, while Norman Museum of Ethnography and Popular Arts is 24 km from the property. The nearest airport is Le Havre Octeville Airport, 6 km from Saint Michel - Centre Ville - Coty.

name: Nomad Hotel le Havre
description:
Nomad Hotel le Havre is located in Le Havre and offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi access and a modern-style decor. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Dock Océane shopping centre is 900 metres from this hotel and the city centre and its city hall are a 5-minute drive away.

All of the rooms at Nomad Hotel le Havre feature a tablet and a video projector. They all include a bathroom with free toiletries and a shower.

A breakfast is served everyday. Restaurants, bars and shops can be found in the surroundings.

Le Havre Train Station is a 2-minute walk from the hotel and André Malraux Modern Art Museum is 2 km away.

name: Odalys City Le Havre Centre Gare
adresse: 25 Cours Commandant Fratacci, Perret, 76600 Le Havre, France
description:
Featuring 4-star accommodation, Odalys City Le Havre Centre Gare is situated in Le Havre, 2.4 km from Le Havre Beach and 1.6 km from Le Volcan. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The aparthotel has family rooms as well as facilities for disabled guests.

The aparthotel will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a desk, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also available, as well as a kettle. At the aparthotel, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

You can rustle up your own meal in the kitchenette before eating in the private dining area, and the aparthotel also has a snack bar.

Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Perret Model Appartment, Saint-Michel's Church and Eglise St-Joseph. The nearest airport is Deauville - Normandie Airport, 37 km from Odalys City Le Havre Centre Gare.

name: Fibre - Le Haussmann LH - B'PAM
description:
Situated in Le Havre, 1.9 km from Le Havre Beach, Fibre - Le Haussmann LH - B'PAM features recently renovated accommodation with free WiFi and a private beach area. It is located less than 1 km from Saint-Michel's Church and offers a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.2 km from Le Volcan.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. At the apartment, there is a dressing room for guests to change in.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Perret Model Appartment is less than 1 km from Fibre - Le Haussmann LH - B'PAM, while Eglise St-Joseph is 1.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Le Havre Octeville Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: JOST Hôtel Le Havre Centre Gare
description:
Set in Le Havre and with Le Havre Beach reachable within 2.3 km, JOST Hôtel Le Havre Centre Gare offers express check-in and check-out, non-smoking rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. The property is around 2.3 km from Eglise St-Joseph, 23 km from Norman Museum of Ethnography and Popular Arts and 23 km from Honfleur's Old Harbour. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or continental options. At the hotel you will find a restaurant serving Chinese, French and Indian cuisine. Vegetarian and halal options can also be requested.

You can play billiards and darts at the 3-star hotel.

Speaking German, English and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help.

Popular points of interest near JOST Hôtel Le Havre Centre Gare include Le Volcan, Saint-Michel's Church and Perret Model Appartment. The nearest airport is Le Havre Octeville Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel de Charme La Bonne Adresse
adresse: 29 Rue Du Général De Gaulle, Sainte-Adresse, 76310 Le Havre, France
description:
Just 150 metres from Le Havre's beaches, Hotel de Charme La Bonne Adresse is located in a residential neighbourhood in Sainte-Adresse. It offers en suite rooms and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at Hotel de Charme La Bonne Adresse are equipped with a telephone, flat-screen TV and private bathroom. Each room has a courtesy tray with tea and coffee and some rooms overlook the sea.

Guests can relax on the hotel’s terrace or in the courtyard.

Hotel de Charme La Bonne Adresse is a 2-minute drive from the centre of Le Havre. The hotel is a 35-minute drive from Deauville and 20 minutes from Honfleur and Etretat.

Hotel completely renovated in 2021 keeping the family house style. Come and discover the new decoration.

name: Hotel Spa Le Pasino
adresse: Place Jules Ferry, Perret, 76600 Le Havre, France
description:
Located at the heart of Le Havre, Hotel Spa le Pasino features an indoor swimming pool, a spa with sauna and a casino on site. It offers guest rooms with a flat-screen TV.

Each air-conditioned guest room features a queen-size bed and some offer views over the harbour. All private bathrooms include a hairdryer and bathrobes.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning and can be enjoyed in the comfort of your room.

Free Wi-Fi is available throughout Hotel Spa le Pasino. Guests can work out in the fitness centre or relax in the spa bath at the hotel's spa.

Le Havre Train Station is a 6-minute drive from the hotel and free private parking is available on site. Malraux Museum is 1 km away.

name: Mercure Le Havre Centre Bassin Du Commerce
adresse: Chaussée Georges Pompidou, 76600 Le Havre, France
description:
Mercure Le Havre Centre Bassin du Commerce is located in Le Havre’s city centre, opposite the Bassin du Commerce and near ferry-port. It offers air-conditioned guestrooms with LCD satellite TV and WiFi.

Guests of the Mercure Le Havre Centre Bassin du Commerce can relax with a drink and a snack at the bar and enjoy modern and local food in the hotel’s restaurant, Happy Dock.

The Mercure Le Havre Centre Bassin du Commerce is located in the historic town, 800 metres from the the National History Museum and Le Havre Cathedral. Honfleur is 24 km away and Deauville is 42 km from the property.

name: Best Western Plus Le Havre Centre Gare
adresse: 23, Cours De La République, 76600 Le Havre, France
description:
Located in central Le Havre, Best Western Plus Le Havre Centre Gare is a 4 star design hotel offering free WiFi just 10 minutes' drive from the beach.

The en-suite rooms all feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom includes a bath or shower and all rooms feature a hairdryer.

Best Western at Le Havre Centre Gare serves a daily buffet breakfast. Additional facilities include a bar.

Honfleur is just a 20-minute drive from  Best Western at Le Havre Centre Gare and the seaside towns of Trouville and Deauville are a 45-minute drive away. Le Havre Train Station is opposite the property and gives direct access to Paris.

A catering offer signed" Boco "is available at any time of the day: balanced and varied dishes prepared by starred chefs to be savored in our bar area or in your room.

name: Nouveau - Vivez l'Horizon sur la mer - plage
adresse: 118 Boulevard Clemenceau, Perret, 76600 Le Havre, France
description:
A recently renovated apartment located in Le Havre, Nouveau - Vivez l'Horizon sur la mer - plage features a garden. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and full-day security, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 600 metres from Le Havre Beach.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property offers sea views.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Eglise St-Joseph, Le Volcan and Perret Model Appartment. The nearest airport is Le Havre Octeville Airport, 5 km from Nouveau - Vivez l'Horizon sur la mer - plage.

name: Premiere Classe Le Havre Centre-LES DOCKS
adresse: Rue Nungesser et Coli, 76600 Le Havre, France
description:
Magnificent Première Classe Le Havre Centre-Les Docks; ideally located near the Océane stadium and the docks.

We offer a personalized reception 24/24 with a private paying and secure parking.

Come and discover our 86 modern rooms with private bathroom and shower, flat screen TV and free wifi.

Treat yourself to a buffet breakfast served daily in our dedicated room or on our terrace on a sunny day.

Take advantage of your stopover to discover the historical and cultural heritage: the church of Saint Joseph, the shipowner’s house, the museum MUMA, etc...

A 15 min walk from the station, you will also have easy access to the various transports to radiate on Normandy: Etretat, Honfleur, Deauville.

Also enjoy your stay in Le Havre, to put your towel on our beach.

name: Hôtel Spa Vent d'Ouest
adresse: 4 Rue De Caligny, Perret, 76600 Le Havre, France
description:
Located just 550 metres from the beach in Le Havre, this hotel is a 5-minute drive from the ferry terminal. It offers free Wi-Fi access, and the 200-m²  Nuxe spa includes a hammam, 3 massage rooms and 2 lounges.

Each guest room is equipped with a flat-screen TV, a safe and a private bathroom with free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is prepared every morning at Hôtel Spa Vent d'Ouest and can be taken in the guestrooms for a fee. Guests can enjoy bistronomic cuisine at Les Enfants Sages, located a 10-minute walk away or relax with a drink in the hotel bar and tea room.

Le Havre Train Station is 2 km from the hotel and private parking is available nearby.

name: Maison Valmer - L'armateur, élégant penthouse classé 4 étoiles
adresse: 294 Rue Félix Faure, 76620 Le Havre, France

Maison Valmer - L'armateur, élégant penthouse classé 4 étoiles is a beachfront property located in Le Havre, 1.9 km from Le Havre Beach and 800 metres from Saint-Michel's Church. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property offers sea views.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Perret Model Appartment, Le Volcan and Eglise St-Joseph. The nearest airport is Deauville - Normandie Airport, 38 km from Maison Valmer - L'armateur, élégant penthouse classé 4 étoiles.

name: Lili - Port De Pêche
adresse: 2 Rue des Etoupières, 76600 Le Havre, France
description:
Located in Le Havre, just 1.9 km from Le Havre Beach, Lili - Port De Pêche provides beachfront accommodation with free WiFi. The property features sea and city views, and is 700 metres from Le Volcan. The property is non-smoking and is situated less than 1 km from Perret Model Appartment.

Eglise St-Joseph is 1 km from the apartment, while Saint-Michel's Church is 1.4 km away. The nearest airport is Le Havre Octeville Airport, 7 km from Lili - Port De Pêche.

name: Hôtel Carmin
adresse: 15, Rue Georges Braque, Perret, 76600 Le Havre, France
description:
Hôtel Carmin is located in Le Havre town centre, 700m from the HAVRE beach It offers en suite rooms and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at the Carmin are equipped with a telephone and a flat-screen TV. Each guest room also has a private bathroom with bath or shower.

A breakfast is served at this hotel at an extra charge and upon prior reservation.

A number of Le Havre’s sites are near Carmin Hotel including St Joseph Cathedral and City Hall. There are also a number of restaurants within walking distance.

name: Studio Meublé Vue Mer
adresse: 104 Boulevard Clemenceau, Perret, 76600 Le Havre, France
description:
Offering inner courtyard views, Studio Meublé Vue Mer is an accommodation set in Le Havre, 800 metres from Le Havre Beach and 200 metres from Eglise St-Joseph. Situated on the beachfront, this property has a casino. Parking on-site is available and the apartment also features bike hire for guests who want to explore the surrounding area.

Featuring sea views, this apartment also includes a satellite flat-screen TV, a well-equipped kitchen with a microwave, a fridge and a stovetop, as well as 1 bathroom with a shower and free toiletries. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Popular points of interest near Studio Meublé Vue Mer include Le Volcan, Perret Model Appartment and Saint-Michel's Church. The nearest airport is Deauville - Normandie Airport, 38 km from the accommodation.

name: Best Western ARThotel
adresse: 147 Rue Louis Brindeau, Perret, 76600 Le Havre, France
description:
The Best Western Art Hotel is located in the heart of Perret in Le Havre, just a 10-minute walk from the beach. The main destinations in Normandy are located within driving distance, such as Honfleur, 20 minutes away, Etretat, 30 minutes away and Deauville, which is 40 minutes away.

Decorated in a contemporary style by various artists, all rooms feature free Wi-Fi access, a flat-screen TV, iPod docking stations and a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served daily in the guest rooms or in the dining room. Guests can also relax in the Art Hotel's bar.

A buffet breakfast is served only daily in the dining room.

name: Chambre acces privé COTY
description:
Situated 1.5 km from Le Havre Beach, 200 metres from Saint-Michel's Church and less than 1 km from Perret Model Appartment, Chambre acces privé COTY features accommodation set in Le Havre. This property offers access to a terrace and free private parking. Norman Museum of Ethnography and Popular Arts is 24 km away and Honfleur's Old Harbour is 24 km from the apartment.

All units are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a fridge and coffee machine. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and linens for a supplement. All units will provide guests with kitchenware.

Le Volcan is 1.1 km from the apartment, while Eglise St-Joseph is 1.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Le Havre Octeville Airport, 6 km from Chambre acces privé COTY.

name: Le Château du Haut-Koenigsbourg
description:
Offering city views, Le Château du Haut-Koenigsbourg is an accommodation situated in Sélestat, 24 km from House of the Heads and 24 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. It is set 14 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle and offers free WiFi plus a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 21 km from Colmar Expo.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 3 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and oven, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Colmar Train Station is 25 km from the apartment, while Würth Museum is 27 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 39 km from Le Château du Haut-Koenigsbourg.

name: EDEN
adresse: 1 21a Rue du 1E Bataillon de Choc, 68320 Durrenentzen, France
description:
Situated in Durrenentzen and only 12 km from Colmar Expo, EDEN features accommodation with garden views, free WiFi and free private parking. It is located 13 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church and provides full-day security. Outdoor dining is also possible at the apartment.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

House of the Heads is 13 km from EDEN, while Colmar Train Station is 15 km from the property. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg Airport, 66 km from the accommodation.

name: Chambres d'Hôtes Le Domaine des Remparts
description:
Located in Sélestat, a 10-minute drive from the Alsace Wine Route, this half-timbered house has a private courtyard with garden furniture. Bikes are available for free upon request.

The rooms have a TV and a private bathroom with shower. Free Wi-Fi is available in all of the accommodations and free parking is provided on site.

A homemade breakfast is available every morning and can be served to the comfort of guest rooms.

Sélestat Train Station is a 5-minute drive away while the Strasbourg Airport is a 30-minute drive away. You can visit the Château du Haut-Koenisgbourg, which is 15 km from Le Domaine des Remparts.

name: Gîte "AU CADRAN SOLAIRE"
description:
Offering city views, Gîte "AU CADRAN SOLAIRE" is an accommodation set in Triembach-au-Val, 20 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle and 31 km from Colmar Expo. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. Offering free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking holiday home has a hot tub.

The holiday home is fitted with 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with garden views. This holiday home also features a patio that doubles up as an outdoor dining area. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

There is a garden with a barbecue at this property and guests can go skiing and hiking nearby.

Würth Museum is 33 km from the holiday home, while House of the Heads is 34 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 37 km from Gîte "AU CADRAN SOLAIRE".

name: Pension Eichel
description:
Pension Eichel offers accommodation in Rust. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and free private parking is available on site.

Every room is fitted with a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms have a seating area for your convenience. Every unit has a private bathroom.

There is room service at the property.

The nearest airport is Baden Airpark Airport, 62 km from the property.

name: Gästehaus am Wasserpark
description:
Situated a 3-minute drive from the Europa Park fun park, this family-friendly guest house in Rust offers comfortable rooms and apartments. It offers free WiFi and free private parking.

Gästehaus am Wasserpark provides rooms with all standard facilities, as well as welcoming apartments with kitchenette.

Guests can eat or enjoy a cocktail in the BFB Restaurant | Bar | Lounge, where meals are freshly prepared. Meals can also be taken away and eaten in your room.

Adults can take a seat on the large garden terrace, while younger guests play in the wonderful playground.

Enjoy hiking and cycling through the surrounding countryside. Gästehaus am Wasserpark  is also an ideal base for day trips to the Black Forest and the Alsace region, and is just a 3-minute drive from the A5 motorway.

name: Gîte Binnert Bader
description:
Located in the Bas-Rhin, a wine producing region, Gîte Binnert Bader offers a terrace and soundproofed rooms. This holiday home is 15 km from Sélestat Train Station.

The 2-bedroom cottage features a seating area with a sofa and a flat-screen TV. It also has a washing machine, ironing facilities, and the private bathroom is complete with a sauna.

The fully-equipped kitchen includes a dining area, BBQ facilities, a refrigerator, an oven and a stove. An electric kettle and toaster are also provided.

Provided with free Wi-Fi, Gîte Binnert Bader is 84 km from Basel-Mulhouse Airport, La Bresse ski resort is a 45-minute drive away, and free private parking is provided on site.

name: Les Authentics - Le Domaine d'Autrefois & Spa
description:
Located in Bolsenheim, 20 minutes from Strasbourg, 15 minutes from the Route des Vins and 30 minutes from Europa-Park, in a small, quiet village. Les Authentics - Le Domaine d'Autrefois & Spa offers accommodation in a large estate, a former farmhouse that has been completely renovated. You also have access to the Spa "Jardins des Senteurs" with its indoor and outdoor saunas, various Scandinavian baths and Jacuzzis, and cocooning areas. You can also book wellness massages.

Each self-catering cottage has a private covered terrace with furniture and barbecue, a large living room with fully-equipped kitchen and dining area, large double bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with walk-in showers (1 on each floor).
There are 2 separate toilets (one on each floor).
The kitchen includes an oven, microwave, dishwasher and fridge/freezer.

The entire estate has a high-performance WIFI fiber connection, as well as free private parking on site. The nearest train station is 5 minutes from ERSTEIN. You can reach STRASBOURG in 20 min, COLMAR in 30 min and OBERNAI in 15 min.

name: Colmar Hotel
description:
Colmar Hotel is located in Colmar, 1 km from House of the Heads. Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains is 1.2 km away. It features free WiFi, a 24-hour reception, a bar and a free private parking in front of the hotel.

Every room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle and a private bathroom. Free toiletries and a hair dryer are available in all of the rooms.

Free parking and paid secured parking are available on site. Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 1.1 km from Colmar Hotel, while Colmar Expo is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Euro Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg Airport, 54 km from the property.

name: Suites Residences Spa
description:
An apartment nestled in the centre of Colmar, Suites Residences Spa has private parking, free WiFi, a spa and wellness centre and free bikes.
