The property is conveniently located a short distance from House of the Heads and Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. With city views, this accommodation offers a patio. The apartment features a hot tub and a 24-hour front desk.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some units feature a terrace or a balcony. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

The area is popular for skiing and hiking, and car hire is available at this 5-star apartment. Bike tours can be enjoyed nearby.

Colmar Train Station is 1 km from the apartment, while Colmar Expo is 3.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg, 55 km from Suites Residences Spa, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: La Maison 1603
description:
La Maison 1603 features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Hunawihr, 13 km from Colmar Expo, 16 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle and 16 km from House of the Heads. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment offers inner courtyard views, a sun terrace, and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The apartment provides guests with a patio, city views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with bath and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Guests can take advantage of the warm weather with the property's barbecue facilities.

You can play table tennis at this 4-star apartment, and the area is popular for skiing and cycling. The apartment has a children's playground and a picnic area.

Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 17 km from La Maison 1603, while Colmar Train Station is 17 km away. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 55 km from the accommodation.

name: Hôtel Le Mittelwihr
description:
Boasting an ideal location on the Wine Route, Hotel Le Mittelwihr offers a warm and friendly welcome in a building with a stunning design surrounded by a natural environment.

Hotel Le Mittelwihr features comfortable rooms with a decoration combining traditional style and modern facilities. Each room is air-conditioned and is a cosy backdrop for your stay in Alsace. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property.

In the morning, savour a delicious breakfast in the typical-style breakfast room or on the terrace.

For your relaxation, a sauna, a solarium and massages are available at the Mandelberg Hotel 200 metres from the hotel.

name: Hotel am Park
description:
This hotel is located directly opposite the entrance of Europa-Park in Rust. There are snacks and drinks available in the hotel shop. On-site parking is free.

The bright and spacious rooms at Hotel am Park feature wooden interiors. All rooms include a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

A traditional German breakfast is available each morning.

Tickets for Europa-Park can be reserved at the Hotel am Park in Rust. All children are welcome at the Hotel.

Hotel am Park is 4 km from the A5 motorway. It is a 30-minute drive from both Freiburg and Strasbourg.

name: Chambre d'Hôtes "Au Vigneron"
description:
Boasting garden views, Chambre d'Hôtes "Au Vigneron" offers accommodation with a garden and a balcony, around 20 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle. The property features city and inner courtyard views, and is 31 km from Colmar Expo. The homestay has parking on-site, a hot tub and a 24-hour front desk.

With free WiFi, this homestay features a satellite flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave. Guests can take in the views of the mountain from the terrace, which also has outdoor furniture. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Guests at the homestay will be able to enjoy activities in and around Triembach-au-Val, like hiking and walking tours. Skiing and cycling can be enjoyed nearby, while a ski equipment rental service and a ski pass sales point are also available on-site.

Würth Museum is 33 km from Chambre d'Hôtes "Au Vigneron", while House of the Heads is 34 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 37 km from the accommodation.

name: Brit Hotel, Spa & Restaurant - Colmar Est
description:
The Brit Hotel & Spa Colmar East is located just a 10-minute drive from the center of Colmar.

Our establishment is equipped with a paying Spa with as equipment a sauna, a hammam, a jacuzzi and a sanarium.

The swimming pool will be accessible during the summer months. The establishment offers traditional and local homemade cuisine. We are also equipped with a playground in the garden with swing and ping pong table.

Guests can enjoy visits to the nearby Alsatian vineyards and wine cellars. Other leisure activities in the area include hiking and cycling.

name: Villa Maeva - Parking, Sauna & Fitness
description:
En plein milieu du vignoble alsacien, et située à 2mn à pied du principal accès à la vieille ville de Riquewihr, la Villa Maeva prend place au sein d’une maison bourgeoise construite à la fin du 19ème siècle.

Vous pourrez choisir entre 2 logements indépendants classés 4 étoiles conçus pour offrir un très bon niveau de confort. Les appartements disposent de lits king size de grande qualité, de parkings privés avec borne de recharge pour véhicules électriques, d’une terrasse extérieure. L’établissement dispose d’un grand sauna finlandais privatisable et d’une salle de fitness.

Situé à Riquewihr, l'un des villages les plus connus d'Alsace et probablement le plus visité, la Villa Maeva a forgé sa réputation grâce à ses équipements de haute qualité, son emplacement central, son parking extérieur et l’accueil chaleureux des propriétaires.

name: Duplex tout confort sur la Route des Vins dans un village typique et médiéval - Appartements 3 et 4 personnes - Centre Alsace - Stationnement gratuit
adresse: 1 Rue de la Croix, 68750 Bergheim, France
description:
Offering quiet street views, Duplex tout confort sur la Route des Vins dans un village typique et médiéval - Appartements 3 et 4 personnes - Centre Alsace - Stationnement gratuit is an accommodation set in Bergheim, 11 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle and 14 km from Colmar Expo. Housed in a building dating from 1949, this apartment is 17 km from House of the Heads and 18 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. The apartment offers inner courtyard views, a sun terrace, and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Each unit is fitted with a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Colmar Train Station is 19 km from the apartment, while Würth Museum is 40 km away. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 52 km from Duplex tout confort sur la Route des Vins dans un village typique et médiéval - Appartements 3 et 4 personnes - Centre Alsace - Stationnement gratuit.

name: Family Apartments Abuja
description:
This family-friendly holiday apartment with free parking is just a 5-minute walk from the Europa-Park Theme Park in Rust. It features 3 bedrooms, a fully-equipped kitchen and a private garden.

Family Apartments Abuja offers a spacious living room with TV and dining area, and classically furnished bedrooms. A terrace with furniture, a barbecue and a children’s swing can be found in the large garden.

The surrounding Taubergiessen Nature Reserve is ideal for hiking and cycling, and guests can take a boat trip along the River Elz, just 100 metres from the Abuja apartment.

The A5 motorway is just 3 km from the Abuja Ferienwohnung, and provides a connection to Freiburg in 20 minutes. The French border is a 30-minute drive away.

name: Chalet Les Prés
adresse: 7 B rue des prés, 67220 Neubois, France
description:
Offering a garden and garden view, Chalet Les Prés is situated in Neubois, 28 km from Colmar Expo and 31 km from House of the Heads. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 17 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle.

Offering a terrace with mountain views, this holiday home also has a cable flat-screen TV, a well-equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, as well as 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Guests can take advantage of the warm weather with the property's barbecue facilities.

For guests with children, the holiday home offers a baby safety gate. If you would like to discover the area, walking tours is possible in the surroundings.

Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 31 km from Chalet Les Prés, while Colmar Train Station is 32 km away. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 38 km from the accommodation.

name: Appartement Béthanie
description:
Situated in Steige, in a historic building, 28 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle, Appartement Béthanie is an apartment with a garden and barbecue facilities. The property features mountain and garden views, and is 39 km from Colmar Expo. There is a sun terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi, free private parking and an electric vehicle charging station.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

You can play table tennis at the apartment, and the area is popular for skiing and cycling. With an outdoor fireplace and a picnic area, this apartment complex offers ample opportunities to wind down.

Würth Museum is 41 km from Appartement Béthanie, while House of the Heads is 42 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 45 km from the accommodation.

name: Les Chambres du Beau Regard
adresse: 2a rue du Beau Regard, 67220 Villé, France
description:
Offering a garden and garden view, Les Chambres du Beau Regard is set in Villé, 22 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle and 33 km from Colmar Expo. This bed and breakfast offers free private parking, a shared kitchen and free WiFi. It is possible for guests to sit outside and enjoy the property grounds.

The bed and breakfast provides guests with a terrace, mountain views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and a fridge, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. At the bed and breakfast, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

A selection of options including local specialities, fresh pastries and fruits is served for the continental breakfast. There is a coffee shop and lounge.

For guests with children, the bed and breakfast features outdoor play equipment. If you would like to discover the area, hiking is possible in the surroundings and Les Chambres du Beau Regard can arrange a bicycle rental service.

Würth Museum is 35 km from the accommodation, while House of the Heads is 36 km away. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 39 km from Les Chambres du Beau Regard.

name: Appartement de Prestige au centre avec jardin privé
description:
Situated less than 1 km from House of the Heads, 1.9 km from Colmar Train Station and 3.2 km from Colmar Expo, Appartement de Prestige au centre avec jardin privé offers accommodation located in Colmar. This property offers access to a terrace, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 700 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church.

The spacious apartment features 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with an a bath or shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

There is a garden with a barbecue at this property and guests can go skiing nearby.

Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 27 km from the apartment, while Parc Expo Mulhouse is 41 km away. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg Airport, 55 km from Appartement de Prestige au centre avec jardin privé.

name: Highway Hotel
description:
The Highway Hotel is easily accessible off highway A 5, halfway between the city of Offenburg and Freiburg.

Whether you would like to relax or plan business meetings, our hotel offers the suitable ambiance for each occasion.

name: Hotel Sleep & Dream Nähe Europa Park und Rulantica
description:
Situated in Ringsheim, 6 km from Europa-Park Main Entrance, Hotel Sleep & Dream Nähe Europa Park und Rulantica features accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking and a terrace. The property is set 34 km from Freiburg Cathedral, 36 km from Freiburg (Breisgau) Central Station and 36 km from Würth Museum. The property is allergy-free and is located 31 km from Freiburg’s Exhibition and Conference Centre.

At the hotel rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while some rooms include a balcony. At Hotel Sleep & Dream Nähe Europa Park und Rulantica all rooms include bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Guests at Hotel Sleep & Dream Nähe Europa Park und Rulantica will be able to enjoy activities in and around Ringsheim, like hiking and cycling.

Rohrschollen Nature Reserve is 42 km from the hotel, while Colmar Expo is 50 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 52 km from Hotel Sleep & Dream Nähe Europa Park und Rulantica.

name: Les Souvenirs d'Alsace
description:
Situated in the centre of Colmar, Les Souvenirs d'Alsace is a recently renovated accommodation, which features soundproof rooms. Free WiFi is available in this apartment, set 600 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church and less than 1 km from House of the Heads. Featuring a private entrance, the apartment allows guests to maintain their privacy.

Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a well-fitted kitchen, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Colmar Train Station is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Colmar Expo is 3.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg Airport, 55 km from Les Souvenirs d'Alsace.

name: Best Western Hotel & SPA Le Schoenenbourg
adresse: 2A, rue de la piscine, 68340 Riquewihr, France
description:
Surrounded by vineyards, the Best Western Hotel Le Schoenenbourg is opposite the ramparts of the medieval village of Riquewihr. This eco-friendly hotel features a complimentary spa area with an indoor pool, saunas and hammam as well as a seasonal outdoor pool. Riquewihr Christmas Market is 170 meters away.

Each room is decorated in neutral colours. The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with free WiFi access, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and tea and coffee making facilities. Please note that the restaurant is open.

Additional facilities at the Best Western include a bar. Guests can enjoy a daily buffet breakfast in the dining area or on the outdoor terrace overlooking the garden.

Hotel Le Schoenenbourg is 13 km from Colmar, 28 km from the border of Germany and 53 minutes from Strasbourg. Guests can go hiking in the Réserve Naturelle du Massif du Ventron.

name: UCPA SPORT STATION HOSTEL PARIS
adresse: 28 allee Rose Dieng Kuntz , 19th arr., 75019 Paris, France
description:
UCPA SPORT STATION HOSTEL PARIS features a fitness centre, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Paris. The property is set 2.6 km from Gare du Nord, 3 km from Gare de l'Est and 3.2 km from La Cigale Concert Hall. The accommodation offers evening entertainment and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the hostel, all rooms are equipped with a desk. The units feature bed linen.

Guests at UCPA SPORT STATION HOSTEL PARIS can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

You can play squash at the accommodation.

Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include German, English, Spanish and French.

Pigalle Metro Station is 3.4 km from UCPA SPORT STATION HOSTEL PARIS, while Stade de France is 3.9 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Charles de Gaulle Airport, 17 km from the hostel.

name: Hotel de L'Esperance
description:
Located a 2-minute walk from the lively rue Mouffetard in Paris, Hotel de L'Esperance offers an inner courtyard. Place Monge and the Latin district are a 10-minute's walk away. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property.

Every air conditioned room is fitted with a flat-screen TV and comes with a private bathroom with bath or shower.

There is a 24-hour front desk, a luggage room and concierge service at Hotel de L'Esperance. Vending machines for snacks and drinks are also featured.

The hotel also offers car hire. Censier Daubenton Metro Station is 350 metres from the property, providing access to central Paris within 20 minutes by public transport. The lively Buttes aux Cailles neighborhood is 1.5 km away.

name: Le Katorze Hôtel
adresse: 14 Rue du Docteur Heulin, 17th arr., 75017 Paris, France
description:
Boasting a terrace, Le Katorze Hôtel is situated in Paris in the Ile de France region, 1.9 km from La Cigale Concert Hall and 1.7 km from Pigalle Metro Station. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.5 km from Gare Saint-Lazare.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Le Katorze Hôtel rooms come with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

There is an in-house snack bar and guests can also make use of the business area.

Sacré-Coeur is 1.9 km from Le Katorze Hôtel, while Arc de Triomphe is 3.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Paris - Charles de Gaulle Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Moderniste
adresse: 5 Rue de Langeac, 15th arr., 75015 Paris, France
description:
Located in a beautiful and very quiet "bourgeois street" in the 15th arrondissement of Paris, in the heart of the Convention district and very close to the Porte de Versailles Exhibition Center, the Hotel Moderniste opens its doors after a complete renovation.

This brand new 4-star boutique hotel is a beautiful example of 1930s architecture in Paris and immerses us in the avant-garde atmosphere of this resolutely modern era.

Structured on 7 floors, the Hotel Moderniste offers 40 very comfortable rooms in a resolutely modern decor
Particular attention has been paid to the bedding and soundproofing of each room to ensure optimal sleep in the heart of the capital.

name: Beau M Paris
description:
Well situated in the 18th arr. District of Paris, Beau M Paris is set 1.7 km from La Cigale Concert Hall, 1.3 km from Sacré-Coeur and 1.7 km from Pigalle Metro Station. Among the facilities at this property are a shared lounge and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

All rooms are complete with a private bathroom and air conditioning, and certain rooms will provide you with a terrace. The units feature bed linen.

À la carte and continental breakfast options are available every morning at the hostel.

Languages spoken at the reception include English and French.

Gare du Nord is 2.4 km from Beau M Paris, while Gare Saint-Lazare is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Charles de Gaulle Airport, 20 km from the accommodation.

name: Hôtel Le Daum
description:
Just renovated, the Hotel Le Daum welcomes you in a warm and intimate

In soft and enveloping colors, with a retro chic design, the hotel is ideally located in the 12th district, close to the Gare de Lyon, the effervescence of Bercy Village and the calm of the Vincennes wood. Just a 3-minute walk from bus stations and Daumesnil Metro Station, which provides direct access to the Eiffel Tower via line 6 and the Opéra Garnier via line 8.

All our rooms are equipped with a smart TV allowing you to connect to your Netflix, Amazon prime, Disney +…subscriptions, free wifi and air conditioning.

The reception is open 24/7.

Continental breakfast is served in the lobby.

Art lovers can admire an original work by Georges Rousse. This artist with multiple distinctions intervenes on the architecture of the place following the principle of anamorphosis (transformation of the architecture by a trompe l'oeil).

The 12th arrondissement is the preferred area for travellers visiting Paris due to its geographical location and its proximity to public transport, according to independent guest reviews.

name: La Belle Ville
adresse: 349 Rue de Belleville, 19th arr., 75019 Paris, France
description:
Located 4.9 km from Gare du Nord, La Belle Ville offers 4-star accommodation in Paris and features a bar. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is allergy-free and is situated 5 km from Gare de l'Est.

All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, guest rooms at La Belle Ville have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms are fitted with a terrace. At the accommodation each room has bed linen and towels.

Guests at La Belle Ville can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Pompidou Centre is 5.1 km from the hotel, while La Cigale Concert Hall is 5.7 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Charles de Gaulle Airport, 19 km from La Belle Ville.

name: Le Mathurin Hotel & Spa
adresse: 43 Rue des Mathurins, 8th arr., 75008 Paris, France
description:
Le Mathurin Hotel & Spa is a 4-star hotel located in central Paris, a 8-minute walk from La Madeleine and Opera Garnier. It features a spa Nuxe with a hot tub, a hammam and a steam room. Massages can also be requested at an extra charge.

The air-conditioned rooms at Le Mathurin are decorated with the finest furnishings and feature contemporary marble bathrooms with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Each guest room have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a minibar. Some rooms also offer a private balcony with a view over Paris.

A buffet breakfast is served daily at the property. Le Mathurin Hotel & Spa features a bar for guests to relax at the end of a day of sightseeing.

There is a 24-hour front desk and a luggage storage at the property.

The hotel is 400 metres from Printemps Department Store. Le Mathurin Hotel & Spa is a 4-minute walk from St Augustin Metro Station, a 5-minute walk from Madeleine Metro Station and a 6-minute walk from Auber RER Station. This provides direct access to La Défense, the Arc de Triomphe and Disneyland Paris.

name: Hôtel Korner Etoile
adresse: 133 avenue de Villiers, 17th arr., 75017 Paris, France
description:
Located 1.5 km from the Palais des Congrès, this hotel offers soundproofed and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. Parc Monceau is a 15-minute walk from the hotel and Ard de Triomphe is less than 20 minutes' walk away.

Guest rooms at Hôtel Korner Etoile are simply furnished and have parquet floors. Each has a flat-screen TV with cable channels and an en suite bathroom with a shower.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning in the breakfast room at Hôtel Korner Etoile.
The hotel offers free WiFi throughout and complimentary hot beverages are offered upon arrival. The reception is open 24 hours a day.

Metro Station Porte de Champerret is less than a 1-minute walk from the hotel and offers direct access to Opera Garnier and The Marais.

name: Hôtel Aiglon
description:
Located in the heart of the Montparnasse district, this design hotel is just 30 metres from the Raspail Metro stop. Guest rooms are modern and stylish with free Wi-Fi access.

Each room at the Aiglon is soundproofed and air conditioned, and equipped with a mini-bar and satellite TV. All the guest rooms are accessible via a lift. Please note that the hotel has been fully renovated in 2023.

The Aiglon hotel serves a continental breakfast every morning, which can be enjoyed in the dining room or in the comfort of the guest rooms. Guests can relax with a drink in the bar, or in the lounge with library.

Additional facilities at the Aiglon include a 24-hour reception with express check-in, car hire and a tour desk.

name: Tinah Paris, Réaumur - Montorgeuil
description:
Tinah Paris, Réaumur - Montorgeuil features free WiFi throughout the property and views of city in Paris. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as Notre Dame Cathedral, Opéra Garnier, and Sainte-Chapelle. The property is 1.3 km from Pompidou Centre, and within 1.6 km of the city centre.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The units feature a wardrobe.

Popular points of interest near Tinah Paris, Réaumur - Montorgeuil include Louvre Museum, Gare de l'Est and Gare du Nord. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: Timhotel Opéra Blanche Fontaine
adresse: 34 Rue Pierre Fontaine, 9th arr., 75009 Paris, France
description:
The Timhotel Opéra Blanche Fontaine is located in the heart of Paris, close to the Moulin Rouge, Montmartre and the Sacré-Coeur Basilica. The hotel has a private indoor parking lot.

The guest rooms feature air conditioning, flat-screen TV with satellite channels and free Wi-Fi access. A safe is also provided and some double rooms are suitable for guests with reduced mobility.

 An airport shuttle is also available upon request with extra charge.

Breakfast is available at the property.

The hotel is just 200 metres from the Blanche Metro Station offering access to the capital’s many sites. Galeries Lafayette and Printemps Shopping Centres are a 15-minute walk away. Charles de Gaulle Airport is 21 km away.

name: Timhotel Montmartre
adresse: 11 rue Ravignan , Place Emile Goudeau, 18th arr., 75018 Paris, France
description:
Located in the Montmartre district of Paris, this Timhotel provides rooms with free Wi-Fi access, flat-screen TVs and private bathrooms.

A buffet breakfast is served daily at the Timhotel Montmartre. The hotel also provides a 24-hour reception, where guests can request hairdryers and ironing facilities.

The Timhotel Montmartre is a 5-minute walk from the Sacre Coeur Basilica, the Moulin Rouge and the Dali Museum. It is 100 metres from Abbesses Metro Station, which provides direct access to Montparnasse.

name: Hotel Elysees Opera
adresse: 17, rue de Turin, 8th arr., 75008 Paris, France
description:
Located in the chic 8th district in Paris, this hotel offers modern guest rooms with a balcony. It has a 24-hour reception with a tour desk and ticket service.

 All soundproofed guest rooms include a 43-inch flat-screen TV (108cm) with cable channels and free Wi-Fi access. Each room has a simple décor and a hairdryer in the private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room at Elysees Opera Hotel. Guests can enjoy a drink in the bar while reading the newspapers provided. Room service is available.

Rome Metro Station is 350 metres from the Elysees Opera, and provides access to the Moulin Rouge. Monceau Park is just a 15-minute walk away. An airport shuttle is available upon request.

name: Hôtel La Conversation
description:
Located 1.4 km from Porte de Versailles Exhibition centre, opposite Georges Brassens Park, Hôtel du Home Moderne offers contemporary rooms with free Wi-Fi internet access.

The air-conditioned rooms are stylishly decorated in pastel colours and feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, telephone and safe. All of the rooms are soundproofed and some of them also have facilities for guests with reduced mobility.

Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast in the hotel’s dining room, or in their guestroom upon request.The reception desk at Hotel du Home Moderne is open 24 hours day and offers a reservation service for excursions.

Several buses (line 95 and 80) link directly the hotel to Paris city centre. Convention Metro Station is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Le Relais du Marais
adresse: 76, rue de Turbigo, 3rd arr., 75003 Paris, France
description:
This hotel is located between Le Marais and La Place de la Republique, near the Pompidou Centre. Le Relais du Marais provides colourful en suite rooms with satellite TV.

A continental breakfast is served every morning at the Relais du Marais, and can be enjoy in the guest rooms.

Free Wi-Fi access is available in the entire hotel Le Relais du Marais. Front desk is open 24 hours and the staff speaks English, Spanish and Arabic.

Relais du Marais is right next to Temple Metro Station and 300 metres from Republique Metro Station. These transportation provide direct access to The Opera Garnier, Bastille, Saint Lazare Station and Gare du Nord Station.

name: Austin's Saint Lazare Hotel
description:
This Austin's hotel is located in central Paris, next to Saint-Lazare Train Station and 800 metres from Opéra Garnier. It offers soundproofed guest rooms with air-conditioning, flat-screen satellite TV and free WiFi.

All rooms at the Austin's Saint Lazare have lift access and a courtesy tray with tea and coffee. Guests can also enjoy a continental buffet breakfast in the dining room, or in your room.

The Austin's Saint Lazare Hotel is a short metro ride from Gare du Nord and Gare Saint-Lazare has four metro lines which offer connections throughout Paris.

name: Doisy Etoile - Orso Hotels
adresse: 55 avenue des Ternes, 17th arr., 75017 Paris, France
description:
Located in a pedestrian street near the Champs Elysées. The rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The air-conditioned guest rooms are individually decorated and are equipped with free WiFi access. All rooms have a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

At hotel Doisy Etoile - Orso Hotels, a buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room. Guests can also use the free computer and printer or enjoy a drink in the hotel bar while reading the newspapers provided.

Doisy Etoile - Orso Hotels is just a short walk to a metro station that offers direct access to central attractions such as the Louvre Museum and Notre-Dame Cathedral. Poncelet market is nearby, and the Arc de Triomphe is only 700 metres away.

name: Le Grey Hotel
adresse: 12 rue de Parme, 9th arr., 75009 Paris, France
description:
Located halfway between the Opéra Garnier and Montmartre, Le Grey Hôtel is a boutique hotel offering stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi access and an LCD TV. It provides luggage storage and it has a 24-hour reception.

Serviced by a lift, all of the air-conditioned rooms feature contemporary décor and have a bathroom with rain shower or bathtub and free toiletries. They are non-smoking and soundproofed, and include a safety deposit box and minibar.

A continental buffet breakfast is served in the morning and the hotel has a lounge and a bar. Complimentary tea, coffee and snacks are available throughout the day. Room service is available and a wide range of brasseries and restaurants can be found in the surrounding area.

The Grands Magasins department stores are a 20-minute walk away. Liège Metro Station, 100 metres away, provides access to the Champs Elysées and the Opéra Garnier in 15 minutes. Saint-Lazare Train Station is 500 metres away.

name: Hôtel France d'Antin Opéra
description:
Hôtel France d'Antin Opéra is situated in the centre of Paris, just a few metres from the famous Opéra Garnier. It offers a private cocktail bar and air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free WiFi.

The soundproofed rooms at the France d'Antin Opéra are all serviced by a lift. Each is equipped with a mini-bar and has a private bathroom. Some rooms also feature a balcony.

Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning, served in the dining room with bay windows overlooking the street. There is also a cosy lounge area.

Additional facilities at the Hôtel France d'Antin Opéra include a business corner with free internet, a 24-hour reception and a laundry service.

Hôtel France d'Antin Opéra is just 150 metres from the Opéra Metro stop. The Louvre Museum is a 10-minute walk from the hotel and the Tuileries Garden is also nearby.

name: Kraft Hotel
adresse: 37, rue du Hameau, 15th arr., 75015 Paris, France
description:
This hotel is located opposite the main entrance of Dôme de Paris - Palais des Sports, near the lively Vaugirard area with its boutiques, cafés and lovely restaurants.

The ambiance of the Kraft Hotel suits perfectly the diversity of guests who come to stay: those who come to discover the treasures of Paris and those who come to attend a show, symposium, fair or exposition.

Guestrooms are stylishly decorated and furnished to offer you high-quality comfort. They offer a private bathroom and a TV.

The Kraft Hotel is an ideal location for business or leisure. It is located near the local metro station which offers direct access into the heart of the capital.

name: Hôtel Plaza Étoile
adresse: 21 Avenue de Wagram, 17th arr., 75017 Paris, France
description:
Located just a 3-minute walk from the Arc de Triomphe, Hôtel Plaza Étoile offers a 24-hour front desk. Avenue Champs Elysées is a 4-minute walk away.

Decorated in a contemporary style, all rooms are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV, while some include a king-sized bed and views of the city. The private bathroom is complete with free toiletries. Some rooms have an Eiffel Tower view and each room has a welcome tray.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning. A take away breakfast or an express breakfast is also available. Snacks and drinks are available in the lobby.

Additional features include luggage storage, an elevator and free Wi-Fi access throughout. Charles de Gaulle- Etoile Metro Station is 200 metres away and offers direct access to the Louvre Museum and the Eiffel Tower. Porte Maillot Palais de Congrès is 1.3 km away.

name: Maison Eugenie
adresse: 167, rue de Rome, 17th arr., 75017 Paris, France
description:
Set in the 17th district in Paris, this hotel offers views of the Batignolles area and soundproofed rooms with a Napoléon III-style décor. It features a tearoom and a library with free Wi-Fi access and a bar where guests can enjoy a cocktail.

Satellite TV and a minibar are standard facilities in each air-conditioned room. Some rooms are fitted with a bathtub. Each elegant guest room has a hairdryer in the private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served in the elegant breakfast room at House Eugenie.

With a 24-hour reception, the House Eugenie also provides a ticket service.

Brochant Metro Station is an 8-minute walk from the hotel, providing direct access to the Champs Elysées. The Moulin Rouge is a 20-minute walk away.

name: Normandy Le Chantier
adresse: 7, Rue de l'Echelle, 1st arr., 75001 Paris, France
description:
Situated a 5-minute walk from the Louvre Museum and the Jardin des Tuileries, Normandy Le Chantier offers guests the opportunity to experience the transformation of its 19th century building during a two-year renovation project. The renovation is still during so it's not finished.

Guests will enjoy their stay in newly renovated rooms which boast high-speed WiFi, a flat-screen TV and double-glazed windows. The renovated rooms also feature modern bathrooms with a walk-in shower and a hairdryer.

Breakfast is available each morning, with room service being an option. The hotel has two restaurants, El Vecino inspired with authentic Mexican taqueria and Buckwheat, a traditional French crêperie. In the evening, guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel's speakeasy-style bar, Rehab.

The hotel has several meeting rooms, including an elegant reception room with Napoleon III-style ceilings, Il Palazzo, towering nearly 7 meters above your head. Other services include an ironing room, and use of a microwave.

Normandy Le Chantier is 240 meters from Palais Royal - Musée du Louvre Metro Station, which provides direct access to Arc de Triomphe, Opéra Garnier and the Champs-Elysées Avenue.

name: Hotel Verneuil Saint Germain
adresse: 8 rue de Verneuil, 7th arr., 75007 Paris, France
description:
Hotel Verneuil is located in a quiet street in the Saint Germain des Prés district of Paris. It offers finely decorated, comfortable guest rooms.

All of the air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a TV and free Wi-Fi access. The bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries. A telephone with free calls is provided. There is a staircase up to the first floor then lift access to higher floors.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning in the vaulted cellar and can be delivered to your room.

Hotel Verneuil is within walking distance to the River Seine, Notre Dame Cathedral and the Louvre Museum.

name: Hotel Strasbourg - Montagne Verte & Restaurant Louisiane
description:
Set near the River Ill, Hotel Strasbourg - Montagne Verte Restaurant Louisiane is 2 km from the historic district. It features a restaurant with a summer terrace and a garden.

The soundproofed guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and tea and coffee making facilities. Private bathrooms include a hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout Hotel Strasbourg - Montagne Verte Restaurant Louisiane.

Regional specialities are served in restaurant La Louisiane and guests can enjoy a drink in the bar while reading the newspapers provided. A buffet breakfast is served every morning from 06:30 until 11:00 at Hotel Strasbourg - Montagne Verte Restaurant Louisiane.

This Hotel offers a free private parking lot on site.
 Strasbourg Golf Club is 15 km from the hotel. Strasbourg International Airport is only 19 km away.

Please note that pets cannot be left alone in the rooms.

Please note that hotel rules are applicable for all reservations. Any stay involve the acceptation of the hotel rules, this guide of rules is available on request at the reception.

name: ClapClap Hôtel, Food & Bar
adresse: 24 rue du Faubourg National, 67000 Strasbourg, France
description:
ClapClap Hotel is a hotel located 400 metres from Strasbourg TGV Train station and Tram Station. It is 600 metres from the city centre and offers a terrace and rooms with free WiFi access.

Rooms are comfortable, soundproofed and fully equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The en suite includes a shower and a hairdryer. Rooms are serviced by an elevator.

Breakfast is served as a buffet every morning. You can also read the morning newspapers at ClapClap Hotel.

ClapClap Hotel is a 5-minute walk to the Petite France district with its tourist sites, pedestrian streets, shops and restaurants. The Strasbourg Museum of Modern and Contemporary Art is 6 minutes’ walk away.

We would like to limit the number of reservations for groups. Indeed, a different cancellation policy applies for more than 5 rooms booked.

name: Best Western Plus Hotel Villa D'est
description:
Located a 20-minute walk from the city centre of Strasbourg, Hôtel Villa d’Est features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi access. The sauna and fitness centre are available with a supplement and can also be privatised.

The soundproofed rooms at this boutique hotel are decorated in a contemporary style. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a desk.

Guests are invited to enjoy a buffet breakfast each morning, served in the breakfast room or in their guest room upon request. The hotel’s cosy bar, Le Rohan, serves drinks in the evening and during the summer months guests can use the outdoor terrace.

The Hôtel Villa d'Est offers a range of services including a 24-hour room service and front desk, daily newspapers and luggage storage.

The hotel is located 1.4 km from Strasbourg Train Station and a 15-minute walk from the Congress Centre.

name: Nemea Appart Hotel Elypseo Strasbourg Port
adresse: 45 A Avenue du Rhin, 67100 Strasbourg, France
description:
Situated in Strasbourg, Nemea Appart Hotel Elypseo Strasbourg Port features free WiFi, 2.8 km from Strasburg History Museum.

All units feature a satellite flat-screen TV, a private bathroom with shower and a fully equipped kitchenette. Bed linen and towels are included in the price and beds are made for your arrival.

Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Massage and beauty treatments in the comfort of your room can be booked at an extra cost.

The Botanical Gardens is 3 km from Nemea Appart Hotel Elypseo Strasbourg Port. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 18 km from the accommodation.

name: Hôtel Restaurant Athena Spa
description:
Hôtel Restaurant Athena Spa is located less than 3 km from the centre of Strasbourg and features a fitness centre that is open 24 hours a day. This design hotel has an à la carte restaurant, a bar and 24-hour reception. There is an sensory pool, open everyday available free of charge.

With free WiFi, the design and colorful rooms here provide a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, air conditioning and facilities for making tea and coffee. Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is prepared every morning and the bar is open every day from midday to midnight.

Guests can access the wellness area and the hotel's spa which has an sensory pool with hydromassage jets, a hammam, a Finnish sauna, a tropical sauna, a relaxation area and a multi-sensory shower.

A limited number of free outdoor, secure private parking spaces are available at this hotel and there is also an underground car park requiring an additional fee. Two charging stations for electric vehicles are available for an extra charge. It is 2.5 km from The 'Petite France' and 3 km from Strasbourg Cathedral. Strasbourg International Airport is 8 km away.

name: Séjours & Affaires Strasbourg Kleber
description:
This residence offers comfortable, self catering accommodation. It is in a quiet road in the city centre, a 5-minute walk from the historic Petite France district and Strasbourg Cathedral.

The studios at the Séjours & Affaires Strasbourg Kleber are equipped with free wired Internet and accessible by lift. They also have a flat-screen TV, work desk and a private bathroom. All studios have a fully equipped kitchenette.

Séjours & Affaires Strasbourg Kleber is accessible by car and a public car park is just 2 minutes away. It is well-linked by the tram to the rest of the city and just a 10-minute walk to the train station.

name: Appartement L'Ill au Sable
description:
Housed in a 19th-century building in Strasbourg, Appartement L'Ill au Sable has free WiFi access and is 400 metres from Strasbourg Cathedral.

A microwave, a fridge and a stovetop can be found in the kitchen. Towels, bed linen and a flat-screen TV are provided in this apartment. A combo washer dryer is also at guests' disposal.

The apartment is accessible by a spiral staircase and features wooden beams.

Strasbourg Christmas Market is 500 metres from Appartement L'Ill au Sable. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 16 km from the property.

name: Hôtel le Grillon
description:
This hotel is located in central Strasbourg, a 5-minute walk from the TGV train station and from Petite-France. It offers a wooden deck terrace and soundproofed accommodation with free Wi-Fi.

Guest rooms at the Grillon Hotel are individually decorated. They each have a TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with a shower.

A breakfast buffet is served daily in the Grillon's dining room. The terrace also provides tables and chairs. In the evening you can enjoy a drink at the hotel bar.

The hotel also provides a 24-hour reception. A bicycle rental service is available on request. Place Kleber as well as the Museum of Modern and Contemporary Art are 700 metres away.

name: City Résidence Strasbourg Centre
description:
City Résidence Strasbourg Centre is located 1 km from Strasbourg Train Station and 1.5 km from La Petite France district in Strasbourg city. It offers 24-hour reception and self-catering accommodation with soundproofing. Free WiFi is available throughout.

The spacious suites have a flat-screen TV, a dining area and a fully equipped kitchenette. Each accommodation has a private bathroom with a shower.

Guests at City Résidence Strasbourg Centre can enjoy a daily breakfast buffet in the dining hall.

The City Résidence Strasbourg Centre is a 20-minute walk from Strasbourg Cathedral and 2 km from the Strasbourg Exhibition Centre.

name: Lagrange Apart’Hotel Strasbourg Wilson
adresse: 5C Boulevard du Président Wilson, 67000 Strasbourg, France
description:
Located a 5-minute walk from Strasbourg Train Station, Lagrange Apart’Hotel Strasbourg Wilson offers free access to an indoor heated swimming pool. Place des Halles Shopping Centre is only 270 metres away and La Petite France district is a 15-minute walk from the property. Free WiFi is available throughout.

All apartments and studios are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV, seating area and bathroom with bathtub. The kitchenette is equipped with a stovetop, dishwasher and microwave.

A breakfast is available each morning at Lagrange Apart’Hotel Strasbourg Wilson and is served in the breakfast room. Grocery shops and restaurants can be reached within walking distance of the property.

A hammam and sauna are also available at an extra charge. Luggage storage is available for free at the property.

name: Hôtel Patricia - Strasbourg Hyper Centre
description:
Hôtel Patricia - Strasbourg Hyper Centre is located in the heart of Strasbourg’s picturesque centre, a short walk from the Cathedral, in the Petite France district. It offers affordable accommodation in an historic building.

Guest rooms at the Patricia are functional. Double, twin, triple and Quadruple rooms are available depending on your needs. Some have their own en suite bathroom. There is also a cheaper, budget option with shared facilities.

Guests can enjoy breakfast in the nearby Café, located 100 metres from the property.

The Hotel Patricia is in quiet surroundings, and is 100% non-smoking. It also offers Wi-Fi and a daily continental breakfast.

name: HANNONG Hotel & Wine Bar
description:
The Hannong Hotel is located in the heart of Strasbourg, just a 5-minute walk from the TGV train station, Petite France district and the Cathedral. It offers free Wi-Fi access.

Guest rooms at the Hannong are air conditioned and soundproofed. They are equipped with hardwood floors, European designed furniture, satellite TV and each have a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

A breakfast buffet is served every morning in the Hannong’s breakfast room. It includes hot drinks, handmade bread and French pastries, local products, jams and juices. Guests can enjoy a drink at the wine bar in the glass ceiling salon or on the large terrace.

Hotel Hannong is just 100 metres from the Tramway Central Station, Place de l'Homme de Fer. Strasbourg Train Station is a 9-minute walk from the property.

name: Le Grand Hotel
adresse: 12, Place de la Gare, 67000 Strasbourg, France
description:
Located opposite Strasbourg train station, the Grand Hotel is located a 10-minute walk from the city centre and Place Kléber. It offers a bar, terrace and free Wi-Fi access.

All of the rooms are set in modern decor and feature en suite facilities. Each features a flat-screen satellite TV, a telephone and free WiFi access. The rooms are serviced by a lift.

The buffet breakfast is served daily and is composed of sweet and savoury dishes. It can be sampled on the terrace when the weather is fine. Guests can order room service 24 hours a day. The lounge bar is ideal for relaxing after a day of sightseeing or business.

Located 15 km from the airport and 8 km from Germany’s borders, Le Grand Hotel is ideally located to visit the surrounding area. Guests may choose to visit the famous department store, Galeries Lafayette or Strasbourg Cathedral.

name: Aloft Strasbourg Etoile
description:
Boasting a bar, terrace and views of city, Aloft Strasbourg Etoile is set in Strasbourg, less than 2 km from Strasbourg Cathedral. Featuring a fitness centre, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage for guests.

The units in the hotel are fitted with a coffee machine. All guest rooms at Aloft Strasbourg Etoile come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box.
We also offer the possibility to make free worldwide calls from your room.

The accommodation offers a continental or buffet breakfast.

You can play billiards and table tennis at Aloft Strasbourg Etoile.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Strasbourg Cathedral, Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg and The 'Petite France'. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 10 km from Aloft Strasbourg Etoile.

This property has the ecological label "la clef verte".

name: Studio côté Parc des Contades
description:
A recently renovated property, Studio côté Parc des Contades is set in Strasbourg near Strasbourg Exhibition Centre, St. Paul's Church and Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg. The property has garden and inner courtyard views, and is 1.6 km from Strasbourg Cathedral. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and European Parliament is less than 1 km away.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Strasbourg History Museum is 1.9 km from the apartment, while Park of the Chateau de Pourtales is 4.1 km away. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 12 km from Studio côté Parc des Contades.

name: Hôtel LÉONOR the place to live
adresse: 11 Rue de la Nuée-Bleue, 67000 Strasbourg, France
description:
Attractively set in the centre of Strasbourg, Hôtel LÉONOR the place to live features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, private parking and room service. This 4-star hotel offers a bar. The property is non-smoking and is situated 600 metres from Strasbourg Cathedral.

The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. Rooms come with a private bathroom with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available each morning at Hôtel LÉONOR the place to live.

The accommodation offers a sun terrace.

Languages spoken at the reception include German, English and French.

Popular points of interest near Hôtel LÉONOR the place to live include St. Paul's Church, Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg and Strasbourg History Museum. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 12 km from the hotel.

name: Résidence La Canopée
description:
Résidence La Canopée is located in the Quartier Européen - Orangerie district of Strasbourg, less than 1 km from Strasbourg Christmas Market and a 14-minute walk from Strasbourg Cathedral. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property and private parking is available on site.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. There is also a fridge, stovetop and a kettle.

Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include St. Paul's Church, The 'Petite France' and Strasbourg History Museum. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 10 km from Résidence La Canopée.

name: Student Factory Strasbourg Etoile
description:
Conveniently located in the Bourse-Esplanade district of Strasbourg, Student Factory Strasbourg Etoile is located 1.4 km from St. Paul's Church, 1.3 km from Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg and 1 km from Strasbourg Cathedral. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property offers soundproof units and is set 700 metres from Strasbourg History Museum.

At the apartment complex, the units include a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels.

If you would rather not eat out, you can make use of the kitchen facilities, which include a stovetop and kitchenware.

Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

European Parliament is 3.1 km from the apartment, while Strasbourg Exhibition Centre is 3.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 11 km from Student Factory Strasbourg Etoile.

name: Aparthotel Adagio Access Strasbourg Petite France
description:
Located in the city centre, this Aparthotel with a 24-hour reception is just 1.5 km from Strasbourg Cathedral.  Free WiFi access and a fully equipped kitchen are in the modern studios and apartments.

A flat-screen TV and a telephone are included in all of the accommodations. The en suite bathroom is fitted with a shower and a hairdryer.

A microwave, fridge and coffee maker are provided in the kitchens. You can enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning in the breakfast room at the Aparthotel Adagio Access Strasbourg Petite France.

Strasbourg Museum of Modern and Contemporary Art is 350 metres from this residence and the train station is a 10-minute walk away. Private parking is possible on site,  at an extra cost and upon prior reservation.

name: Hotel Le 21ème
adresse: 21 rue du Fossé des Tanneurs, 67000 Strasbourg, France
description:
The Hotel Le 21Ème is located in central Strasbourg, a short walk from the Petite-France area and Place Kléber. All accommodation has lift access, a private bathroom, TV and free Wi-Fi.

The Hotel Le 21Ème is situated on Strasbourg’s Grande Île and guests can visit the Cathedral and the Musée des Beaux-Arts, a 10-minute walk away.

name: Ciarus
description:
Located in Strasbourg, this hotel is just 600 metres from the Palace of the Rhine and a 15-minute walk from Strasbourg Cathedral. It has a 24-hour reception and features a games area with billiard, air hockey and foosball.

Guest rooms have a simple décor with wooden furnishings. Each room has a private bathroom and is non-smoking. All rooms are serviced by a lift and some of them feature a balcony. A baby kit including a baby cot, a baby bath and a bottle warmer can be provided.

A continental breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room. The restaurant at Ciarus Hostel offers meals prepared with local products for lunch and dinner and guests can enjoy a drink in one of the property's 2 bars. Vending machines are available at reception. Children's facilities such as baby changing area, children's meals and children's high chair.

Wi-Fi access is available throughout the property.

Strasbourg Train Station is 1.5 km away. Strasbourg Entzheim Airport is 18 km away. Private parking is possible on site, upon reservation and at a surcharge.

name: voco Strasbourg Centre - The Garden, an IHG Hotel
description:
Boasting a garden and a restaurant, Voco - Strasbourg Centre - The Garden - Garden is set in Strasbourg. With a terrace, the property also features a shared lounge, as well as a bar. Attractions in the area include Strasbourg Christmas Market, 1.5 km away, or St. Paul's Church, located 1.9 km from the property.

At the hotel, all rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. The rooms at voco Strasbourg Centre feature air conditioning and a wardrobe.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

You can play table football at this 4-star hotel and the fitness centre is available free of charge 24 hours a day. Upon reservation, subject to availability and for an extra charge, guests aged 18 and over can access the swimming pool and wellness centre (see the Fine Print for rules on access by children). Massages are also possible, upon reservation and for an extra charge.

Around-the-clock assistance is available at the reception.

Strasbourg Cathedral is 2.3 km from Voco - Strasbourg Centre - The Garden - Garden. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 12 km from the property. Parking is subject to availability, upon reservation and for an extra charge.

name: Hôtel Tandem - Boutique Hôtel
adresse: 2 place de la Gare, 67000 Strasbourg, France
description:
Located opposite Strasbourg TGV Train Station, this eco-friendly Boutique Hotel is just 1.7 km from the city centre and a 5-minute walk from the picturesque Petite France district. The European Parliament is a 10-minute tram ride away and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The air-conditioned rooms at Hôtel Tandem - Boutique Hôtel offer a TV, a desk and a private bathroom with a shower.

A buffet breakfast with home-made products only is served every morning at Hôtel Tandem - Boutique Hôtel and includes local organic produce with a selection hot and cold options. Guests can enjoy a drink from the bar or relax on the patio, which is an inside terrace.

Our wine selection is entirely bio-dynamic

Several working areas are available for business guests and there is also a lounge and library area.

Bike and tandem rental is available onsite and secure bike storage space is also available. Public parking is available nearby for a supplement.

name: Hotel des Vosges BW Premier Collection
adresse: 3 Place De La Gare , 67000 Strasbourg, France
description:
Hotel des Vosges is located in Stasbourg near the train station and the city centre. It offers comfortable and affordable accommodation.

The hotel has a selection of well equipped and furnished guestrooms all serviced by a lift. Family rooms are available that can accommodate up to 3 people.

Breakfast is available daily and can be served to your room or enjoyed in the breakfast room.

name: Hilton Strasbourg
description:
Hilton Strasbourg is located near the European Parliament, just 3 tram stops away from Strasbourg city centre. Guests have free access to the fitness room and sauna in the well-being centre. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.

Each air-conditioned and soundproofed room at the Hilton Strasbourg Hotel features a view of the Parliament or the Cathedral. Some of them also have direct access to the executive lounge.

At the H! Brasserie you can enjoy a seasonal cuisine and Alsatian dishes. The H! Bar instead served several types of cocktails. In the morning you can choose between a buffet breakfast, a continental or an express breakfast.

It has a 24-hour front desk with laundry services, VIP services and valet parking. It also has a terrace where guests can relax. WiFi access is available for free in the lobby, bar and restaurant.

name: Hôtel La Monnaie Art & Spa
adresse: 3 Rue De La Monnaie, 17000 La Rochelle, France
description:
Ideally set in the historic La Rochelle, this 17th-century building overlooks the old harbour. Hôtel De La Monnaie is decorated by artworks and features a terrace and a wellness centre.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hôtel De La Monnaie offer views of the indoor courtyard or the old city encircled with fortifications. Each has a TV and free WiFi, tea/coffee making facilities, and a private bathroom.

Guests can have a drink at the bar and enjoy breakfast in the quaint living room, the sunny courtyard or in the privacy of their room.

The central location of the De La Monnaie hotel allows guests to stroll in the pedestrian streets and discover the many local restaurants, and the nearby market selling regional products. Private parking is available at an additional cost for guests arriving by car.

name: Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - La Rochelle Vieux Port
adresse: 4, Place de La Chaîne et 3 rue Saint-Jean du Perot, 17000 La Rochelle, France
description:
Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - La Rochelle Vieux Port is located in La Rochelle on the harbour. It offers free WiFi throughout the entire hotel.

Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - La Rochelle Vieux Port is close to many restaurants and is a short walk to the historic district, the beach and the attractions of La Rochelle. From here it is easy to access the island of Ré and Oléron.

It offers comfortable rooms with air-conditioning, en suite facilities and flat-screen TV with Canal+ and Eurosport.

Breakfast is be served from 07:00 to 11:00 on Saturday and Sunday and from 06:00 until 10:30 from Monday to Friday.

Please note that when booking more than 5 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply .

name: Hôtel Saint Nicolas
description:
Situated in the lively Saint Nicolas district in La Rochelle, this hotel is surrounded by antique dealers, bars and cafés. It offers free Wi-Fi and a conservatory with large sofas and tropical plants.

The air-conditioned guest rooms each have a flat-screen TV with canal+ and satellite channels. Private bathrooms are equipped with a shower or a bathroom and hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast featuring hot and fresh items is served daily in the conservatory. A continental breakfast can also be delivered directly to guests’ rooms. Local drinks, tea and coffee can be enjoyed in the bar.

Limited private secured parking can be booked at an extra cost, upon availability. The maximum height is 1m90 and the width of the parking spaces is about 2m.

Saint Nicolas Tower that guards the entrance to the old port is 550 metres from the hotel. La Rochelle Train Station is 700 metres away.

name: Hôtel François 1er
description:
Located in the heart of historic La Rochelle, this hotel is set in a 16th century building just a 5 minute walk from the Old Port and local market. Hôtel François 1er offers free unlimited WiFi and a 24-hour reception.

All room at Hôtel François 1er are spacious, and feature a design and cosy décor inspired by the themes of rock, movie, painting, graffiti or photography. They are fitted with a TV, and come with a private bathroom.

Various facilities are available at the property such as the room service, a bar lounge, and a chill out area. Upon prior request and at an extra cost, guests can park their car in the property's secure parking located in the city centre.

The hotel is within walking distance from several shops, restaurants and lively bars. Hôtel François 1er is also close to attractions such as the Aquarium, the Natural History Museum, the city's parks and beaches.

La Rochelle Train Station is conveniently located 1.9 km from Hôtel François 1er.

name: Best Western Premier Masqhotel
adresse: 17 Rue de L'ouvrage à Cornes, 17000 La Rochelle, France
description:
The Best Western Masqhotel is a design hotel located a 5-minute walk from La Rochelle’s Vieux Port. It offers contemporary rooms, a lounge bar and free WiFi.

Rooms and suites at the Masqhotel are air-conditioned and feature original artwork. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a desk and tea and coffee making facilities.

A buffet breakfast with hot and cold dishes is served each morning at the hotel. Guests are also invited to relax in the hotel’s lounge bar, which offers a large selection of drinks and free newspapers.

The hotel’s reception desk is open 24 hours a day. A laundry service and private parking are available at an additional cost.

An Eco-Label awarded hotel, Best Western Masqhotel is located 150 metres from La Rochelle Train Station and 6 km from La Rochelle Airport.

name: Charmant cocon iodé cosy équipé, baigné de lumière, situé au cœur de La Rochelle à 1min à pied du marché central avec TV, Netflix et Wifi
adresse: 9 Rue des Cloutiers, 17000 La Rochelle, France
description:
Charmant cocon iodé cosy équipé, baigné de lumière, situé au cœur de La Rochelle à 1min à pied du marché central avec TV, Netflix et Wifi is a recently renovated apartment in the centre of La Rochelle, 1.4 km from Concurrence and 1.4 km from La Rochelle Train Station. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a minimarket, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave, and 1 bathroom with walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

A car rental service is available at the apartment, while walking tours can be enjoyed nearby.

Popular points of interest near Charmant cocon iodé cosy équipé, baigné de lumière, situé au cœur de La Rochelle à 1min à pied du marché central avec TV, Netflix et Wifi include L'Espace Encan, Parc Expo de La Rochelle and La Rochelle Grosse Horloge. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 5 km from the accommodation.

name: Central Park Hôtel & Spa
adresse: 4, avenue Jean Guiton, 17000 La Rochelle, France
description:
The 4-star Central Park Hôtel & Spa is situated a 10-minute walk from the heart of La Rochelle, within walking distance from the beach, and next to the Old Harbour. Guests can enjoy the wellness centre featuring a gym, hot tubs, sauna, hammam, massages, and beauty treatments at an extra cost.

At this modern, yet eco-friendly hotel, all rooms have a private bathroom with free toiletries. The suites feature a seating area where you can relax, and some suites have a terrace with a hot tub. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is available in each bedroom.

In the morning, a buffet breakfast is served. It includes local and organic products. Set in a residential area, the hotel is also a few steps from shops and restaurants.

There is a 24-hour front desk and a shared lounge at the property.

Parc Expo de La Rochelle is 1.7 km from Central Park Hôtel & Spa, while La Rochelle Grosse Horloge is 600 metres from the property. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 3 km from the property.

name: Superbe T2 de 45m² en hyper centre
adresse: 33 Rue Chef de Ville, 17000 La Rochelle, France
description:
Offering free WiFi and city views, Superbe T2 de 45m² en hyper centre is an accommodation located in the centre of La Rochelle, just 700 metres from Concurrence and 1.2 km from La Rochelle Train Station. The 3-star apartment features quiet street views and is 1.6 km from Parc Expo de La Rochelle. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.4 km from L'Espace Encan.

This apartment includes 1 bedroom, a living room and a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dining area, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a washing machine. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Rochelle Grosse Horloge, Charruyer Park and Tower of the Lantern. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 4 km from Superbe T2 de 45m² en hyper centre.

name: Hôtel Le Transatlantique - Lycée Hôtelier La Rochelle
adresse: 1 Avenue des Minimes, 17000 La Rochelle, France
description:
Located in La Rochelle, 2.5 km from Parc Expo de La Rochelle,  The hotel and catering school property is around 5 km from La Rochelle Grosse Horloge, 1.5 km from Musée Maritime de La Rochelle and 1.8 km from La Rochelle Aquarium. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.5 km from L'Espace Encan.

At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. All guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

Continental and à la carte breakfast options are available every morning at Lycée Hôtelier La Rochelle. There are also 2 onsite restaurants with a daily menu, where guests can dine upon reservation.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include The Minimes Marina, Museum of Automata and La Rochelle University. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 11 km from Hôtel Transatlantique - Lycée Hôtelier La Rochelle.

name: Le Champlain
description:
Le Champlain is located opposite Parc Charruyer in the heart of La Rochelle. It offers spacious air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen cable TV and free WiFi.

Guestrooms at the Hotel Champlain are all serviced by a lift.

The hotel provides an express check in service and a 24-hour reception. Guests can relax in the gardens or in the hotel bar with a selection of international newspapers.

Hotel Champlain is just 5 minutes from the Old Port.

name: La Rochelle sur L'eau
description:
Located within 1.1 km of Minimes and 1.3 km of Plage Du Roux in La Rochelle, La Rochelle sur L'eau offers accommodation with seating area. This beachfront property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

Each unit comes with a fridge, stovetop, a coffee machine, as well as a kitchenware and kettle. Accommodation includes a terrace with sea views, a fully equipped kitchen, an outdoor dining area and a private bathroom with shower. At the boat, all units have bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available.

Guests at the boat will be able to enjoy activities in and around La Rochelle, like cycling and walking tours.

Popular points of interest near La Rochelle sur L'eau include L'Espace Encan, La Rochelle Train Station and The Minimes Marina. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Appart'City Classic La Rochelle Centre
adresse: 8 Rue Franc Lapeyre, 17000 La Rochelle, France
description:
This Appart'city is a 10-minute walk from La Rochelle Train Station and 15 minutes from the Old Port and the Old Town. It offers contemporary accommodation with a seating area and an LCD TV.

The apartments and studios at Appart'City Classic La Rochelle Centre have free WiFi internet access. Some offer a private balcony and all feature a kitchenette with a microwave and a fridge.

A buffet breakfast is served at the residence and is composed of various breads, including gluten-free bread, pastries, fresh and hot beverages. Fresh fruit, as well as cheeses and yogurts are also provided. Guests can also buy drinks and snacks at the reception.

Outdoor and underground parking is possible at Appart’city and La Rochelle Airport is a 15-minute drive away. Guests may also choose to visit Ile de Ré, which is just 15 km away.

name: Hotel de La Paix
description:
Located in the heart of the city and footsteps from the old port of La Rochelle, the hotel welcomes you in a genuine 18th century ship owner’s residence.

Set between the Market Place and Verdun Square, Hotel De La Paix features 19 comfortable rooms for one to 5 people, and a warm and friendly welcome whether you are on a business trip or a family holiday. 

The hotel also offers new services like hiring of meeting rooms and Wi-Fi access in all the rooms, and the chef’s cuisine is at once creative and traditional.

name: Résidence Odalys Archipel
adresse: Rue de La Huguenotte, 17000 La Rochelle, France
description:
Résidence Odalys Archipel is set in La Rochelle, just 1.4 km from the beaches, the port and the city centre. It offers fully furnished, ready-to-live-in apartments, an outdoor heated swimming pool, a fitness room and fiber-supported internet access.

All of the apartments have a private bathroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchenette, LCD TV and free internet access. Some have a terrace or balcony, subject to availability.

Laundry and a ticketing service are available at Résidence Odalys Archipel. Daily housekeeping is possible at an extra cost.

La Rochelle features numerous sites and attractions such as the old port and the marina, the old city and numerous art festivals.

name: Appartement Saint Claude - Centre Port
adresse: 35 Rue du Rempart Saint-Claude, 17000 La Rochelle, France
description:
Located 1.5 km from Concurrence and 2.7 km from Plage Du Roux in the centre of La Rochelle, Appartement Saint Claude - Centre Port provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The property features city views and is 1 km from L'Espace Encan and less than 1 km from Parc Expo de La Rochelle. The property is non-smoking and is set 700 metres from La Rochelle Train Station.

This apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom equipped with a bath. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. Additional in-room amenities include chocolates or cookies.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Rochelle Grosse Horloge, Saint-Sauveur Church and Bunker La Rochelle. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 7 km from Appartement Saint Claude - Centre Port.

name: Lagrange Apart'Hotel l’Escale Marine
adresse: 36 Avenue Amerigo Vespucci, 17000 La Rochelle, France
description:
Located in La Rochelle, beside Port des Minimes, this residence offers a covered, heated pool and a well being centre. It is a 5-minute walk from the Aquarium and the Vieux Port.

Each soundproofed apartment and studio at the Lagrange Appart'Hotel l’Escale Marine has a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave grill oven, a private bathroom and free WiFi. All apartment and suites are accessible by a lift.

Massages treatments are available at a surcharge and upon request. It is 1 km from La Rochelle Ville Train station, and 8 km from the La Rochelle- île de Ré Airport.

name: Séjours & Affaires La Rochelle Les Minimes
adresse: 27/29 rue Enrico FERMI, 17000 La Rochelle, France
description:
The Séjours & Affaires Les Minimes is located in La Rochelle, just a few steps from the harbour and only a 15-minute walk from the train station and the marina. It offers self-catering apartments and studios for minimum stays of 4 nights.

Each soundproofed apartment at the Séjours & Affaires La Rochelle Les Minimes is fully furnished and offers carpet and parquet floors, fully equipped kitchenette and private bathroom.

Beds are made before arrival and a house cleaning service is provided once a week for free. For guests coming by car, private parking is available.

The La Rochelle SNCF Train Station and Les Minimes are both just a 15-minute walk from the residence.

name: COSY FLAT MARKET
adresse: 2 Rue de l'Échelle de la Couronne, 17000 La Rochelle, France
description:
In the La Rochelle City Centre district of La Rochelle, close to La Rochelle Train Station, COSY FLAT MARKET features free WiFi and a washing machine. The property is located 4.8 km from The Minimes Marina, 12 km from Mytiliculture Museum and 300 metres from Bunker La Rochelle. The property is 1.6 km from Concurrence, and within 600 metres of the city centre.

The 2-bedroom apartment comes with a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include L'Espace Encan, Parc Expo de La Rochelle and La Rochelle Grosse Horloge. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 5 km from COSY FLAT MARKET.

name: ATHOME RESIDENCE ET SPA
adresse: 33 avenue du docteur planet, 17000 La Rochelle, France
description:
Offering garden views, ATHOME RESIDENCE ET SPA is an accommodation situated in La Rochelle, 1.1 km from Plage Du Roux and 1.7 km from Minimes. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The aparthotel has family rooms as well as facilities for disabled guests.

Each unit comes with a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining table, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the aparthotel, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with local specialities, fresh pastries and fruits are available each morning at the aparthotel. There is a coffee shop, bar and lounge.

ATHOME RESIDENCE ET SPA features a garden and sun terrace.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include L'Espace Encan, La Rochelle Train Station and Parc Expo de La Rochelle. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 8 km from ATHOME RESIDENCE ET SPA.

name: Apartment- La Rochelle historic city centre
adresse: 5 Rue du Palais, 17000 La Rochelle, France
description:
Offering free WiFi and inner courtyard views, Apartment- La Rochelle historic city centre is an accommodation set right in the centre of La Rochelle, just less than 1 km from Concurrence and a 14-minute walk from La Rochelle Train Station. The property is located 5.8 km from The Minimes Marina, 13 km from Mytiliculture Museum and 300 metres from Musee du Nouveau Monde. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.4 km from L'Espace Encan.

The 1-bedroom apartment has a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around La Rochelle, like cycling.

Popular points of interest near Apartment- La Rochelle historic city centre include Parc Expo de La Rochelle, La Rochelle Grosse Horloge and La Rochelle Cathedral. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 4 km from the accommodation.

name: Petite Roche
adresse: 22 rue des Fonderies, 17000 La Rochelle, France
description:
Petite Roche features accommodation within 400 metres of the centre of La Rochelle, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. The 3-star apartment has city views and is 1.4 km from Concurrence. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

At the apartment complex, units have a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units include a seating area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Rochelle Train Station, L'Espace Encan and Parc Expo de La Rochelle. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 6 km from Petite Roche.

name: Wonderful house with a nice terrasse - La Rochelle - Welkeys
adresse: 10 Rue Richard des Herbiers, 17000 La Rochelle, France
description:
