Set in La Rochelle in the Poitou-Charentes region, with La Rochelle Grosse Horloge and Muséum d'Histoire Naturelle de La Rochelle nearby, Wonderful house with a nice terrasse - La Rochelle - Welkeys offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. Boasting a garden, the holiday home is close to several noted attractions, around 1.5 km from Musee des Beaux-Arts and around 1.6 km from Musee du Nouveau Monde. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.5 km from Concurrence.

The holiday home is fitted with 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with city views.

La Rochelle Train Station is 3.5 km from the holiday home, while L'Espace Encan is 4.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 4 km from Wonderful house with a nice terrasse - La Rochelle - Welkeys.

name: Maison des Ambassadeurs
adresse: 43 rue du Minage, 17000 La Rochelle, France
description:
Nestled in the heart of La Rochelle and set in an 18th-century building, Maison des Ambassadeurs is just a 5-minute walk from the Old Harbour and offers a 24-hour front desk as well as a concierge service.

Featuring a high end décor, each room and suite at Maison des Ambassadeurs has an en-suite bathroom with free toiletries.

In the evening, guests can sip a drink at the piano bar or on the property’s terrace. Guests can also relax in the hotel’s lounges or along its outdoor dipping pool.

La Rochelle Aquarium and the Beach are just 1.5 km from the hotel, while Ile-de-Ré Bridge is a 15-minute drive away. Charging stations for electric cars are available at this property.

name: Hotel La Marine, Vieux Port
description:
Hotel La Marine, Vieux Port is situated in the centre of La Rochelle on the Old Port area in front of the medieval towers. It offers non-smoking rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Some of the guest rooms offer a view of the port and others, a view of the interior, flowered courtyard. All rooms have a TV.

Breakfast is available daily and served to your room.

The area surrounding the Hotel La Marine, Vieux Port has a number of restaurants and bars, as well as the aquarium and La Coursive Theatre. A shuttle to the islands (Oléron, Ré..) and Fort Boyard is available 5 minutes' walk from the hotel. The secure parking is located 500 metres away.

name: Hôtel Le Bord'O Vieux Port
adresse: 43, Rue Saint Nicolas, 17000 La Rochelle, France
description:
Set in an 18-century building, Hôtel Le Bord'O Vieux Port is located on a lively pedestrian street just 30 metres from La Rochelle’s Old Port. It offers air-conditioned rooms and a terrace. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.

The rooms at Hôtel Le Bord'O Vieux Port are equipped with a TV, telephone and private bathroom with shower and hairdryer.

Hôtel Le Bord'O Vieux Port serves a buffet breakfast that guests can have on the terrace during the summer.

Public parking is available nearby, at an extra cost. Hôtel Le Bord'O Vieux Port is 500 metres from La Rochelle’s train station and a 3-minute walk from the Aquarium and the Conference Centre.

name: Suites Residences Spa
description:
An apartment nestled in the centre of Colmar, Suites Residences Spa has private parking, free WiFi, a spa and wellness centre and free bikes. The property is conveniently located a short distance from House of the Heads and Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. With city views, this accommodation offers a patio. The apartment features a hot tub and a 24-hour front desk.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some units feature a terrace or a balcony. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

The area is popular for skiing and hiking, and car hire is available at this 5-star apartment. Bike tours can be enjoyed nearby.

Colmar Train Station is 1 km from the apartment, while Colmar Expo is 3.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg, 55 km from Suites Residences Spa, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Colmar Hotel
description:
Colmar Hotel is located in Colmar, 1 km from House of the Heads. Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains is 1.2 km away. It features free WiFi, a 24-hour reception, a bar and a free private parking in front of the hotel.

Every room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle and a private bathroom. Free toiletries and a hair dryer are available in all of the rooms.

Free parking and paid secured parking are available on site. Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 1.1 km from Colmar Hotel, while Colmar Expo is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Euro Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg Airport, 54 km from the property.

name: Les Souvenirs d'Alsace
description:
Situated in the centre of Colmar, Les Souvenirs d'Alsace is a recently renovated accommodation, which features soundproof rooms. Free WiFi is available in this apartment, set 600 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church and less than 1 km from House of the Heads. Featuring a private entrance, the apartment allows guests to maintain their privacy.

Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a well-fitted kitchen, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Colmar Train Station is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Colmar Expo is 3.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg Airport, 55 km from Les Souvenirs d'Alsace.

name: Quiet Corner
adresse: 1er étage droite 10 rue du landwasser, 68000 Colmar, France
description:
Featuring a patio with city views, a casino and a garden, Quiet Corner can be found in Colmar, close to Colmar Train Station and 1 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. The property features quiet street views and is 1.4 km from House of the Heads and 3.8 km from Colmar Expo. The apartment provides a picnic area, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available.

The apartment comes with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with garden views. This apartment also provides guests with a balcony that doubles up as an outdoor dining area. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Bike hire and car hire are available at the apartment and the area is popular for skiing and cycling. Hiking and walking tours can be enjoyed nearby.

Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 30 km from Quiet Corner, while Parc Expo Mulhouse is 42 km away. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg Airport, 55 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Arc-En-Ciel Colmar Contact Hotel
description:
Hotel Arc-En-Ciel Colmar Contact Hotel is situated in a verdant setting just 1 km from the city centre of Colmar and its historical sites and attractions.

All of the standard guest rooms feature modern en suite facilities, TV and free optic fibre WiFi internet access. There are also connecting rooms.

This hotel is a great starting point for discovering La Route des Vins, the local picturesque villages and leisure parks. Not to mention the regional cuisine and local wine.

The hotel also offers a free private car park, a garage for bicycles, an outdoor terrace, and veranda where guests can enjoy breakfast or a moment of quiet.

name: Greet Hotel Colmar
description:
Greet Hotel Colmar is located at the entrance of Colmar, just 1.3 km from to the historic quarter known as Little Venice. It offers free WiFi access.

Each room at the Greet Hotel Colmar is equipped with a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Also available are rooms suitable for guests who have limited mobility.

In the evening, dine in the hotel’s air-conditioned restaurant or on the terrace where guests can experience a meal with the various flavours and traditional Alsace cuisine. Everything served is made with the finest local and regional products.

Colmar Train Station is 2.3 km from the property. Bicycle storage and a free private parking are available on site.
Please not that this property doesn't accept roup reservations

name: ibis Budget Colmar Centre Gare
description:
Ibis budget Colmar Centre Ville is set in the Colmar Centre Ville district in Colmar, 300 metres from House of the Heads and 600 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church.

The rooms have a TV with satellite channels.

Colmar Expo is 2.5 km from ibis budget Colmar Centre Ville, while Theater Colmar is 200 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Basel Airport, 55 km from the property.

name: Cosy Corner
description:
Boasting a terrace with garden views, a casino and a garden, Cosy Corner can be found in Colmar, close to Colmar Train Station and 1 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. With city views, this accommodation provides a balcony. Outdoor dining is also possible at the holiday home.

With free WiFi, this holiday home offers a cable flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave. Towels and bed linen are offered in the holiday home. This holiday home is allergy-free and non-smoking.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Bike hire and car hire are available at Cosy Corner and the area is popular for skiing and cycling. An indoor play area is also available for guests at the accommodation.

House of the Heads is 1.4 km from Cosy Corner, while Colmar Expo is 3.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg Airport, 55 km from the holiday home.

name: Appartement Luxueux Centre Ville
adresse: 8 boulevard du Champs de Mars, 68000 Colmar, France
description:
Situated in the centre of Colmar, 90 metres from House of the Heads, the historic Appartement Luxueux Centre Ville features accommodation with free WiFi and a shared lounge. The property has garden and city views, and is 400 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. This 3-star apartment offers private entrance.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a dining area, a TV with satellite channels, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. At the apartment complex, units include bed linen and towels.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Colmar, like pub crawls.

Colmar Train Station is less than 1 km from Appartement Luxueux Centre Ville, while Colmar Expo is 4.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg Airport, 55 km from the accommodation.

name: PAUL & PIA - Welcome Home Hotel
adresse: 1, Rue De La Gare, 68000 Colmar, France
description:
This hotel is located 500 metres from Colmar Train Station and the Old Town. Colmar Christmas Market -  Place des Dominicains is 700 meters away.

All rooms have a satellite flat-screen TV, free WiFi access and a private bathroom.

There is also a bar and a 24-hour reception.

Guests can easily explore the medieval villages in the Alsace wine region and the Musée d'Unterlinden is 750 meters away. The Colmar-Houssen Airport is just 5 km from the Hotel Kyriad.

name: Comfort Hotel Expo Colmar
description:
Comfort Hotel Expo Colmar is 4 km from the centre of Colmar and 2 km from the A35 motorway. This hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a free private parking and a bar. (2 charging station for electric vehicles)

Serviced by a lift, all rooms are air-conditioned and feature a desk, a flat-screen TV, free wifi and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a shower.

Breakfast is served every morning at Comfort Hotel Expo Colmar. There is also a bar with terrace on site where guests can enjoy snacks.

Comfort Hotel Expo Colmar is a 10-minute drive from the Wine Route of Alsace and right at the opposite of  Colmar Expo Exhibition Centre.

name: Hôtel Turenne
description:
Hotel Turenne is located at the entrance to Colmar’s old quarter, 750 metres from the Saint Martin Church. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi access.

Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. All rooms are accessible by a lift.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast every morning, and there are many typical Alsatian restaurants in the surrounding area. Guests can also enjoy a drink in the hotel bar.

The Hotel Turenne’s reception is open 24 hours a day. Private parking for cars, bicycles and motorbikes is also available at an extra cost and is subject to availability (reservation is needed).

The hotel is close to the famous Unterlinden and Bartholdi museums and the town’s pedestrian and commercial districts. Gare de Colmar Train station is 1.3 km away, the German border is 20 km from the Hotel Turenne.

name: Grand studio Colmar Centre
adresse: 10 Rue De La Porte Neuve, 68000 Colmar, France
description:
Situated in the centre of Colmar, Grand studio Colmar Centre features accommodation with free WiFi in a historic building. Built in 18th century, this 4-star apartment is within less than 1 km of Colmar Train Station and a 3-minute walk of Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. The property is non-smoking and is set 300 metres from House of the Heads.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Colmar Expo is 4.2 km from the apartment, while Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 28 km from the property. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg Airport, 55 km from Grand studio Colmar Centre.

name: Hotel L'Europe
adresse: 15 route de Neuf Brisach - Horbourg Wihr, 68180 Colmar, France
description:
The restaurant "Le Comptoir d'Henri" offers traditional French and Alsatian cuisine prepared with fresh produce from the market. The restaurant is serving a buffet from seasonal and traditional products. It is open from Tuesday to Saturday included, from 6:45pm to 9:30pm.

For your information, our restaurant Le Comptoir d'Henri will be fully closed from the 06/01/2024 to the 18/03/2024 included, we will re-open our restaurant for dinner on the 19/03/2024.

There is also a bar "L'Eclipse" which is open from 4pm to midnight.

name: Gite "Karcher"
description:
Situated conveniently in Colmar, Gite "Karcher" offers express check-in and check-out and private parking. There is a private entrance at the holiday home for the convenience of those who stay. The property offers soundproof units and is set 500 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church.

Featuring a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, each unit also comes with a cable flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the holiday home also have free WiFi. At the holiday home, the units have bed linen and towels.

House of the Heads is 700 metres from the holiday home, while Colmar Train Station is 1.7 km away. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg Airport, 55 km from Gite "Karcher".

name: ibis Colmar Est - Hotel Restaurant en Alsace
adresse: 13, Route De Neuf-Brisach - Horbourg Wihr, 68180 Colmar, France
description:
The ibis Colmar East is located 5 km from the Alsace Wine Trail and 10 km from Kaysersberg, Riquewihr and Eguisheim. Wi-Fi is free of charge in the entire property.

The 86 rooms are comfortable and all have en suite facilities with a bath tub. The hotel also features an Alsatian brasserie, WinStub, a terrace, a free car park and secure car spaces.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. The property is a boutique hotel.

Ironing facilities and hairdryers are available upon request.

The property is a 5 minute drive from the old city centre of Colmar, wander through the Petite Venise area, visit the toy museum or admire the Isenheim Altarpiece at the Unterlinden Museum.

name: LUCKY PLACE - PARKING - CENTRE - BALCON
adresse: 5 Rue de la 5E Division Blindée, 68000 Colmar, France
description:
Located 600 metres from House of the Heads and less than 1 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church in the centre of Colmar, LUCKY PLACE - PARKING - CENTRE - BALCON provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.4 km from Colmar Train Station.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Colmar Expo is 2.6 km from the apartment, while Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 27 km away. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg Airport, 56 km from LUCKY PLACE - PARKING - CENTRE - BALCON.

name: Appartement de Prestige au centre avec jardin privé
description:
Situated less than 1 km from House of the Heads, 1.9 km from Colmar Train Station and 3.2 km from Colmar Expo, Appartement de Prestige au centre avec jardin privé offers accommodation located in Colmar. This property offers access to a terrace, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 700 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church.

The spacious apartment features 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with an a bath or shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

There is a garden with a barbecue at this property and guests can go skiing nearby.

Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 27 km from the apartment, while Parc Expo Mulhouse is 41 km away. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg Airport, 55 km from Appartement de Prestige au centre avec jardin privé.

name: Hotel Restaurant Le Maréchal - Les Collectionneurs
adresse: 6 place des six Montagnes Noires, 68000 Colmar, France
description:
Constructed in 1565 on the city’s original fortified walls, this 4-star hotel is located in the picturesque quarter of Colmar known as Little Venice.  Hostellerie Le Maréchal is set on the canal and is 700 meters from Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains.

Guestrooms and suites are air-conditioned and decorated with brocades and antique furniture. Most rooms overlook the canal, and all are en suite with free WiFi internet access.

The restaurant, A l’Echevin, serves traditional and regional gourmet cuisine using regional produce. In the summer months, guests are invited to eat on the terrace by the river.

The reception desk at Hostellerie Le Maréchal is open 24 hours a day and free newspapers are available in the lobby area.

The hotel is located 1.4 km from Colmar Train Station and public parking can be found in the surrounding area.

name: ColmarAppart Vauban
description:
Set in Colmar, ColmarAppart Vauban is 300 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. House of the Heads is 500 metres away. Free WiFi is featured .

The accommodation features a flat-screen TV and DVD player. Some units include a dining area and/or terrace. There is also a kitchen, fitted with a dishwasher. An oven is also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Private parking is also available at this apartment. Bed linen is offered.

Colmar Christmas Market is 150 meters away. Colmar Expo is 2.5 km from ColmarAppart Vauban. The nearest airport is Basel Airport, 55 km from ColmarAppart Vauban.

name: Odalys City Colmar La Rose d'Argent
description:
Located in Colmar, just 1.6 km from the train station, Odalys City Colmar La Rose d'Argent offers a fitness room and swimming pool with counter-current and massage jets. The property is 700 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church and 1 km from House of the Heads.

The accommodation features a seating area, flat-screen TV, wardrobe and private bathroom with a bath or shower. The kitchenette is equipped with a stovetop, microwave and refrigerator.

A breakfast is available each morning at Odalys City Colmar La Rose d'Argent and children can enjoy it at a reduced cost.  Restaurants can be reached within walking distance of the accommodation.

Additional features include free WiFi access throughout and private parking is available upon prior reservation. Colmar Expo Centre is 3.3 km away and Euro Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg Airport is located 54 km from the accommodation.

name: HAPPY MAMA COLMAR with PARKING
description:
Set 300 metres from House of the Heads and 600 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church in the centre of Colmar, HAPPY MAMA COLMAR with PARKING offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The property has city and inner courtyard views, and is 1.3 km from Colmar Train Station. The accommodation features a lift and luggage storage space for guests.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with mountain views. This apartment also features a balcony that doubles up as an outdoor dining area. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Colmar Expo is 3.4 km from the apartment, while Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 28 km from the property. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg Airport, 56 km from HAPPY MAMA COLMAR with PARKING.

name: Chaleureux F2 dans l’hypercentre colmarien
description:
Offering city views, Chaleureux F2 dans l’hypercentre colmarien is an accommodation situated in Colmar, 1.7 km from Colmar Train Station and 3 km from Colmar Expo. It is located 700 metres from House of the Heads and provides free WiFi plus a lift. The property is 400 metres from the city centre and 500 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 27 km from the apartment, while Parc Expo Mulhouse is 41 km away. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg Airport, 55 km from Chaleureux F2 dans l’hypercentre colmarien.

name: Kyriad Colmar Centre Unterlinden
adresse: 2 Rue De La Fecht, 68000 Colmar, France
description:
Situated 650 metres from the centre of Colmar in the heart of Alsace, this hotel offers free WiFi access and a lounge area. The Exhibition Park is just 1 km away.

With flat-screen TVs, satellite channels, all spacious rooms at Kyriad Colmar Centre Unterlinden feature a modern decor and a welcome tray. All en suite bathrooms are equipped with hairdryers.

Every morning a buffet-style breakfast is served and meal trays can be requested.

On-site parking is free of charge subject to availability and the Colmar Train Station is 2 km away. Strasbourg is a 1-hour drive away and the Colmar Airport is 3 km from the hotel.

name: Le Riesling Colmar All inclusive Free parking
description:
Offering inner courtyard views, Le Riesling Colmar All inclusive Free parking is an accommodation situated in Colmar, 800 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church and 1 km from House of the Heads. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The accommodation features a lift and full-day security for guests.

The apartment with a terrace and city views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some wine or champagne and chocolates or cookies. The apartment is allergy-free and soundproof.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Guests at Le Riesling Colmar All inclusive Free parking will be able to enjoy activities in and around Colmar, like hiking and walking tours.

Colmar Train Station is 2 km from the accommodation, while Colmar Expo is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg Airport, 55 km from Le Riesling Colmar All inclusive Free parking.
